segment.source: NVDA will announce dialog content for more Windows 10 and 11 dialogs. (#15729, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA e sada itati vie sadraja dijalokih okvira za vie Windows 10 i 11 dijalokih okvira. (#15729, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to read a newly loaded page in Microsoft Edge when using UI Automation. (#15736)
segment.target: NVDA e sada itati novu uitanu stranicu u Microsoft Edgeu prilikom koritenja UI automation. (#15736)

segment.source: When using say all or commands which spell text, pauses between sentences or characters no longer gradually decrease over time. (#15739, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Prilikom koritenja preaca za itanje cijelog teksta ili slovkanja teksta, pauze izmeu reenica ili znakova vie se ne smanjuju postupno tokom vremena. (#15739, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes freezes when speaking a large amount of text. (#15752, @jcsteh)
segment.target: NVDA vie se ne smrzava prilikom itanja velike koliine teksta. (#15752, @jcsteh)

segment.source: When accessing Microsoft Edge using UI Automation, NVDA is able to activate more controls in browse mode. (#14612)
segment.target: Prilikom pristupanja Microsoft Edgeu koristei UI automation, NVDA sada moe aktivirati vie kontrola u modusu itanja. (#14612)

segment.source: NVDA will not fail to start anymore when the configuration file is corrupted, but it will restore the configuration to default as it did in the past. (#15690, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: NVDA e se sada pokretati ispravno kada je konfiguracijska datoteka oteena, ali e se konfiguracija vratiti na zadane vrijednosti kao to je to bilo i u prolosti. (#15690, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Fixed support for System List view (`SysListView32`) controls in Windows Forms applications. (#15283, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Ispravljena podrka za System List view (`SysListView32`) kontrole U Windows forms aplikacijama. (#15283, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: It is not possible anymore to overwrite NVDA's Python console history. (#15792, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Sada nije vie mogue nadpisivanje NVDA povijesti Python konzole. (#15792, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: NVDA should remain responsive when being flooded with many UI Automation events, e.g. when large chunks of text are printed to a terminal or when listening to voice messages in WhatsApp messenger. (#14888, #15169)
segment.target: NVDA e ostati brz i stabilan kada postane preoptereen sa UI automation dogaajima, na primjer prilikom prikazivanja velike koliine teksta u Windows terminalu ili prilikom sluanja glasovnih poruka u WhatsAppu. (#14888, #15169)

segment.source: This new behavior can be disabled using the new "Use enhanced event processing" setting in NVDA's advanced settings.
segment.target: Ovo novo ponaanje moe se iskljuiti koristei opciju "Koristi unapreeno procesuiranje dogaaja" u NVDA naprednim postavkama.

segment.source: NVDA is again able to track the focus in applications running within Windows Defender Application Guard (WDAG). (#15164)
segment.target: NVDA sada ponovno moe slijediti fokus u aplikacijama unutar Windows defender application guarda (WDAG). (#15164)

segment.source: The speech text is no longer updated when the mouse moves in the Speech Viewer. (#15952, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Izgovoreni tekst se vie ne aurira prilikom pomicanja mia u Pregledniku govora. (#15952, @hwf1324)

segment.source: NVDA will again switch back to browse mode when closing combo boxes with `escape` or `alt+upArrow` in Firefox or Chrome. (#15653)
segment.target: NVDA e se opet prebaciti u modus itanja prilikom zatvaranja odabirnih okvira koristei tipku `escape` ili `alt+strelicu gore` u Firefox ili Chrome. (#15653)

segment.source: Arrowing up and down in combo boxes in iTunes will no longer inappropriately switch back to browse mode. (#15653)
segment.target: Kretanje strelicama gore ili dolje u iTunesu vie se nee prebacivati nazad u modus itanja. (#15653)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte [vodi za razvojne programere](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) za informacije o postupku zastarjelosti i uklanjanja NVDA API-ja.

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.
segment.target: Napomena: ovo je izdanje koje kri kompatibilnost dodatnog API-ja.

segment.source: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Dodatke e trebati ponovno testirati i aurirati njihov manifest.

segment.source: Building NVDA now requires Visual Studio 2022.
segment.target: Za izradu NVDA sada je potreban Visual Studio 2022.

segment.source: Please refer to the [NVDA docs](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/release-2024.1/projectDocs/dev/createDevEnvironment.md) for the specific list of Visual Studio components. (#14313)
segment.target: Pogledajte [NVDA docs](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/release-2024.1/projectDocs/dev/createDevEnvironment.md) za specifian popis komponenti Visual Studija. (#14313)

segment.source: Added the following extension points:
segment.target: Dodane su sljedee toke proirenja:

segment.source: `treeInterceptorHandler.post_browseModeStateChange`. (#14969, @nvdaes)
segment.target: 'treeInterceptorHandler.post_browseModeStateChange'. (#14969, @nvdaes)

segment.source: `speech.speechCanceled`. (#15700, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: 'speech.speechCanceled'. (#15700, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `_onErrorSoundRequested` (should be retrieved calling `logHandler.getOnErrorSoundRequested()`) (#15691, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: '_onErrorSoundRequested' (treba dohvatiti pozivom 'logHandler.getOnErrorSoundRequested()') (#15691, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: It is now possible to use plural forms in an add-on's translations. (#15661, @beqabeqa473)
segment.target: Sada je mogue koristiti oblike mnoine u prijevodima dodatka. (#15661, @beqabeqa473)

segment.source: Included python3.dll in the binary distribution for use by add-ons with external libraries utilizing the [stable ABI](https://docs.python.org/3.11/c-api/stable.html). (#15674, @mzanm)
segment.target: Ukljueno python3.dll u binarnu distribuciju za koritenje od strane dodataka s vanjskim bibliotekama koje koriste [stable ABI](https://docs.python.org/3.11/c-api/stable.html). (#15674, @mzanm)

segment.source: The `BrailleDisplayDriver` base class now has `numRows` and `numCols` properties to provide information about multi line braille displays.
segment.target: Osnovna klasa "BrailleDisplayDriver" sada ima svojstva "numRows" i "numCols" za pruanje informacija o vielinijskim prikazima brajice.

segment.source: Setting `numCells` is still supported for single line braille displays and `numCells` will return the total number of cells for multi line braille displays. (#15386)
segment.target: Postavljanje "numCells" i dalje je podrano za jednorednike brajice, a "numCells" e vratiti ukupan broj elija za brajice s vie redaka. (#15386)

segment.source: Updated BrlAPI for BRLTTY to version 0.8.5, and its corresponding python module to a Python 3.11 compatible build. (#15652, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Auriran BrlAPI za BRLTTY na verziju 0.8.5 i njegov odgovarajui python modul na verziju kompatibilnu s Pythonom 3.11. (#15652, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added the `speech.speakSsml` function, which allows you to write NVDA speech sequences using [SSML](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis11/). (#15699, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Dodana je funkcija 'speech.speakSsml' koja vam omoguuje pisanje NVDA govornih sekvenci pomou [SSML](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis11/). (#15699, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The following tags are currently supported and translated to appropriate NVDA speech commands:
segment.target: Sljedee oznake trenutno su podrane i prevedene u odgovarajue NVDA govorne naredbe:

segment.source: `Prosody` (`pitch`, `rate` and `volume`). Only multiplication (e.g. `200%` are supported.
segment.target: 'Prozodija' ('visina', 'stopa' i 'glasnoa'). Podrano je samo mnoenje (npr. '200%').

segment.source: `say-as` with the `interpret` attribute set to `characters`
segment.target: 'reci kao' s atributom 'interpret' postavljenim na 'znakovi'

segment.source: `voice` with the `xml:lang` set to an XML language
segment.target: 'voice' s 'xml:lang' postavljenim na XML jezik

segment.source: `break` with the `time` attribute set to a value in milliseconds, e.g. `200ms`
segment.target: 'break' s atributom 'vrijeme' postavljenim na vrijednost u milisekundama, npr. '200ms'

segment.source: `mark` with the `name` attribute set to a mark name, e.g. `mark1`, requires providing a callback
segment.target: 'mark' s atributom 'name' postavljenim na naziv marke, npr. 'mark1', zahtijeva povratni poziv

segment.source: Example: `speech.speakSsml('<speak><prosody pitch="200%">hello</prosody><break time="500ms" /><prosody rate="50%">John</prosody></speak>')`
segment.target: Example: `speech.speakSsml('<speak><prosody pitch="200%">hello</prosody><break time="500ms" /><prosody rate="50%">John</prosody></speak>')`

segment.source: The SSML parsing capabilities are backed by the `SsmlParser` class in the `speechXml` module.
segment.target: Mogunosti ralanjivanja SSML-a podrane su klasom 'SsmlParser' u modulu 'speechXml'.

segment.source: Changes to the NVDA Controller Client library:
segment.target: Promjene u biblioteci klijenta NVDA kontrolera:

segment.source: The file names of the library no longer contain a suffix denoting the architecture, i.e. `nvdaControllerClient32/64.dll` are now called `nvdaControllerClient.dll`. (#15718, #15717, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Nazivi datoteka biblioteke vie ne sadre sufiks koji oznaava arhitekturu, npr. 'nvdaControllerClient32/64.dll' sada se nazivaju 'nvdaControllerClient.dll'. (#15718, #15717, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added an example to demonstrate using nvdaControllerClient.dll from Rust. (#15771, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Dodan je primjer za demonstraciju koritenja nvdaControllerClient.dll iz Rusta. (#15771, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added the following functions to the controller client: (#15734, #11028, #5638, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Dodane su sljedee funkcije klijentu kontrolera: (#15734, #11028, #5638, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `nvdaController_getProcessId`: To get the process id (PID) of the current instance of NVDA the controller client is using.
segment.target: 'nvdaController_getProcessId': Za dobivanje ID-a procesa (PID) trenutne instance NVDA koju klijent kontrolera koristi.

segment.source: `nvdaController_speakSsml`: To instruct NVDA to speak according to the given SSML. This function also supports:
segment.target: 'nvdaController_speakSsml': Uputiti NVDA da govori u skladu s navedenim SSML-om. Ova funkcija takoer podrava:

segment.source: Providing the symbol level.
segment.target: Pruanje razine simbola.

segment.source: Providing the priority of speech to be spoken.
segment.target: Osiguravanje prioriteta govora koji se izgovara.

segment.source: Speaking both synchronously (blocking) and asynchronously (instant return).
segment.target: Govor sinkrono (blokiranje) i asinkrono (trenutni povratak).

segment.source: `nvdaController_setOnSsmlMarkReachedCallback`: To register a callback of type `onSsmlMarkReachedFuncType` that is called in synchronous mode for every `<mark />` tag encountered in the SSML sequence provided to `nvdaController_speakSsml`.
segment.target: `nvdaController_setOnSsmlMarkReachedCallback`: To register a callback of type `onSsmlMarkReachedFuncType` that is called in synchronous mode for every `<mark />` tag encountered in the SSML sequence provided to `nvdaController_speakSsml`.

segment.source: Note: the new functions in the controller client only support NVDA 2024.1 and above.
segment.target: Napomena: nove funkcije u klijentu kontrolera podravaju samo NVDA 2024.1 i novije verzije.

segment.source: Updated `include` dependencies:
segment.target: Aurirane ovisnosti o ukljuivanju:
Skretanje na '4b8c659f549b0ab21cf649377c7a84eb708f5e68'. (#15695)

segment.source: w3c-aria-practices to `9a5e55ccbeb0f1bf92b6127c9865da8426d1c864`. (#15695)
segment.target: w3c-aria-prakse na '9a5e55ccbeb0f1bf92b6127c9865da8426d1c864'. (#15695)

segment.source: Device info yielded by `hwPortUtils.listUsbDevices` now contain the bus reported description of the USB device (key `busReportedDeviceDescription`). (#15764, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Informacije o ureaju koje daje 'hwPortUtils.listUsbDevices' sada sadre opis USB ureaja koji je prijavljena sabirnica (klju 'busReportedDeviceDescription'). (#15764, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: For USB serial devices, `bdDetect.getConnectedUsbDevicesForDriver` and `bdDetect.getDriversForConnectedUsbDevices` now yield device matches containing a `deviceInfo` dictionary enriched with data about the USB device, such as `busReportedDeviceDescription`. (#15764, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Za USB serijske ureaje, 'bdDetect.getConnectedUsbDevicesForDriver' i 'bdDetect.getDriversForConnectedUsbDevices' sada daju podudaranja ureaja koja sadre 'deviceInfo' rjenik obogaen podacima o USB ureaju, kao to je 'busReportedDeviceDescription'. (#15764, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: When the configuration file `nvda.ini` is corrupted, a backup copy is saved before it is reinitialized. (#15779, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Kada je konfiguracijska datoteka 'nvda.ini' oteena, sigurnosna kopija se sprema prije ponovne inicijalizacije. (#15779, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: When defining a script with the script decorator, the `speakOnDemand` boolean argument can be specified to control if a script should speak while in "on-demand" speech mode. (#481, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Prilikom definiranja skripte pomou dekoratora skripte, moe se navesti logiki argument 'speakOnDemand' kako bi se kontroliralo treba li skripta govoriti dok je u govornom nainu rada "na zahtjev". (#481, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Scripts that provide information (e.g. say window title, report time/date) should speak in the "on-demand" mode.
segment.target: Skripte koje pruaju informacije (npr. naslov prozora, vrijeme/datum izvjea) trebale bi govoriti u nainu rada "na zahtjev".

segment.source: Scripts that perform an action (e.g. move the cursor, change a parameter) should not speak in the "on-demand" mode.
segment.target: Skripte koje izvode radnju (npr. pomicanje pokazivaa, promjena parametra) ne bi trebale govoriti u nainu rada "na zahtjev".

segment.source: Fixed bug where deleting git-tracked files during `scons -c` resulted in missing UIA COM interfaces on rebuild. (#7070, #10833, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Ispravljena greka zbog koje je brisanje datoteka praenih git-om tijekom 'scons -c' rezultiralo nedostatkom UIA COM suelja pri ponovnoj izgradnji. (#7070, #10833, @hwf1324)

segment.source: Fix a bug where some code changes were not detected when building `dist`, that prevented a new build from being triggered.
segment.target: Ispravite greku zbog koje neke promjene koda nisu otkrivene prilikom izrade 'dist', to je sprijeilo pokretanje nove verzije.

segment.source: Now `dist` always rebuilds. (#13372, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Sada se 'dist' uvijek obnavlja. (#13372, @hwf1324)

segment.source: A `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` with default type of standard, no longer throws a None conversion exception because no sound is assigned. (#16223, @XLTechie)
segment.target: 'gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog' sa zadanom vrstom standarda vie ne izbacuje iznimku pretvorbe None jer nije dodijeljen zvuk. (#16223, @XLTechie)

segment.source: API Breaking Changes
segment.target: Promjene koje prekidaju API

segment.source: These are breaking API changes.
segment.target: To su pokvarene promjene API-ja.

segment.source: Please open a GitHub issue if your Add-on has an issue with updating to the new API.
segment.target: Otvorite problem s GitHubom ako va dodatak ima problema s auriranjem na novi API.

segment.source: NVDA is now built with Python 3.11. (#12064)
segment.target: NVDA je sada izgraen s Pythonom 3.11. (#12064)

segment.source: Updated pip dependencies:
segment.target: Aurirane ovisnosti pipa:

segment.source: configobj to 5.1.0dev commit `e2ba4457c4651fa54f8d59d8dcdd3da950e956b8`. (#15544)
segment.target: configobj to 5.1.0dev commit 'e2ba4457c4651fa54f8d59d8dcdd3da950e956b8'. (#15544)

segment.source: Comtypes to 1.2.0. (#15513, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Komtipovi na 1.2.0. (#15513, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Flake8 to 4.0.1. (#15636, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: Pahuljice8 do 4.0.1. (#15636, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: py2exe to 0.13.0.1dev commit `4e7b2b2c60face592e67cb1bc935172a20fa371d`. (#15544)
segment.target: py2exe na 0.13.0.1dev commit '4e7b2b2c60face592e67cb1bc935172a20fa371d'. (#15544)

segment.source: robotframework to 6.1.1. (#15544)
segment.target: RobotFramework do 6.1.1. (#15544)

segment.source: SCons to 4.5.2. (#15529, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: SCons do 4.5.2. (#15529, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Removed pip dependencies:
segment.target: Uklonjene ovisnosti pipa:

segment.source: typing_extensions, these should be supported natively in Python 3.11 (#15544)
segment.target: typing_extensions, oni bi trebali biti izvorno podrani u Pythonu 3.11 (#15544)

segment.source: nose, instead unittest-xml-reporting is used to generate XML reports. (#15544)
segment.target: nose, umjesto toga unittest-xml-reporting koristi se za generiranje XML izvjea. (#15544)

segment.source: `IAccessibleHandler.SecureDesktopNVDAObject` has been removed.
segment.target: 'IAccessibleHandler.SecureDesktopNVDAObject' je uklonjen.

segment.source: Instead, when NVDA is running on the user profile, track the existence of the secure desktop with the extension point: `winAPI.secureDesktop.post_secureDesktopStateChange`. (#14488)
segment.target: Umjesto toga, kada je NVDA pokrenut na korisnikom profilu, pratite postojanje sigurne radne povrine pomou toke proirenja: 'winAPI.secureDesktop.post_secureDesktopStateChange'. (#14488)

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` has been removed with no public replacement. (#15163, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: 'Brailleovo pismo. BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate' uklonjen je bez javne zamjene. (#15163, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices and bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been removed.
segment.target: "bdDetect.addUsbDevices i bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices" su uklonjeni.

segment.source: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` class method instead.
segment.target: Upravljaki programi Brailleovog zaslona trebali bi umjesto toga implementirati metodu klase 'registerAutomaticDetection'.

segment.source: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Ta metoda prima objekt 'DriverRegistrar' na kojem se mogu koristiti metode 'addUsbDevices' i 'addBluetoothDevices'. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` now requires both the `threadSafe` and `supportsAutomaticDetection` attributes to be set to `True`. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Zadana implementacija metode provjere na 'BrailleDisplayDriver' sada zahtijeva da atributi 'threadSafe' i 'supportsAutomaticDetection' budu postavljeni na 'True'. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Passing lambda functions to `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` is no longer possible, as functions should be weakly referenceable. (#14627, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Prosljeivanje lambda funkcija u 'hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc' vie nije mogue jer bi funkcije trebale biti slabo referencirane. (#14627, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` has been removed. (#14924, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: 'IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference' je uklonjen. (#14924, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: To support capital pitch changes, synthesizers must now explicitly declare their support for the `PitchCommand` in the `supportedCommands` attribute on the driver. (#15433, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Kako bi podrali velike promjene visine, sintisajzeri sada moraju eksplicitno deklarirati svoju podrku za 'PitchCommand' u atributu 'supportedCommands' na upravljakom programu. (#15433, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars` has been removed. Use `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` instead of `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath`. (#15614, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: 'speechDictHandler.speechDictVars' je uklonjen. Upotrijebite 'NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir' umjesto 'speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath'. (#15614, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: `languageHandler.makeNpgettext` and `languageHandler.makePgettext` have been removed.
segment.target: 'languageHandler.makeNpgettext' i 'languageHandler.makePgettext' su uklonjeni.

segment.source: `npgettext` and `pgettext` are supported natively now. (#15546)
segment.target: 'npgettext' i 'pgettext' sada su izvorno podrani. (#15546)

segment.source: The app module for [Poedit](https://poedit.net) has been changed significantly. The `fetchObject` function has been removed. (#15313, #7303, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Modul aplikacije za [Poedit](https://poedit.net) znaajno je promijenjen. Funkcija 'fetchObject' je uklonjena. (#15313, #7303, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.canConfigTerminateOnDesktopSwitch` has been deprecated, as it became obsolete since Windows 7 is no longer supported. (#15644, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: 'easeOfAccess.canConfigTerminateOnDesktopSwitch' je zastario jer je zastario jer Windows 7 vie nije podran. (#15644, @LeonarddeR)

segment.target: Konstante 'bdDetect.DETECT_USB' i 'bdDetect.DETECT_BLUETOOTH' su zastarjele bez javne zamjene. (#15772, @LeonarddeR).

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue and installer issue.
segment.target: Ovo je verzija zakrpe koja ispravlja problem s instalacijom i jedan skgurnosni prropust.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno izvjetavajte o sigurnosnim propustima pratei [NVDA politiku sigurnosti](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke sigurnosti

segment.source: Prevents loading custom configuration while secure mode is forced.
segment.target: Onemogueno uitavanje koda prilikom prisilnog ukljuivanja sigurnog naina.

segment.source: ([GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45))
segment.target: ([GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke greaka

segment.source: Fixed bug which caused the NVDA process to fail to exit correctly. (#16123)
segment.target: Ispravljena greka prilikom koje NVDA proces se nije mogao ispravno prekinuti. (#16123)

segment.source: Fixed bug where if the previous NVDA process failed to exit correctly, an NVDA installation could fail to an unrecoverable state. (#16122)
segment.target: Ispravljena pogreka, prilikom koje ako prethodni NVDA proces NVDA se neuspjeno prekine, NVDA instalacija moe zavriti i stanju neoporavljivosti. (#16122)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Ovo je verzija zakrpe koja ispravlja sigurnosni propust.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno prijavljujte probleme sigurnosti u skladu sa NVDA [politikom sigurnosti](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke sigurnosnih propusta

segment.source: Prevents possible reflected XSS attack from crafted content to cause arbitrary code execution.
segment.target: Prevencija mogueg povratnog XSS izgraenog koda koji prouzrokuje arbitrarno izvravanje koda.

segment.source: ([GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8))
segment.target: ([GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Ovo je verzija zakrpe koja ispravlja sigurnosni propust.

segment.source: The security patch in 2023.3.1 was not resolved correctly.
segment.target: Sigurnosni propust iz verzije 2023.3.1 nije bio implementiran ispravno.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno prijavljujte probleme sigurnosti u skladu sa NVDA [politikom sigurnosti](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke sigurnosti

segment.source: The security patch in 2023.3.1 was not resolved correctly.
segment.target: Sigurnosni propust iz verzije 2023.3.1 nije bio implementiran ispravno.

segment.source: Prevents possible system access and arbitrary code execution with system privileges for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Prevenira mogui pristup sustavu i arbitrarno pokretanje koda sa privilegijama sustava za neautentificirane korisnike.

segment.source: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))
segment.target: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Ovo je verzija zakrpe koja ispravlja sigurnosni propust.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno prijavljujte probleme sigurnosti u skladu sa NVDA [politikom sigurnosti](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke sigurnosti

segment.source: Prevents possible system access and arbitrary code execution with system privileges for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Prevenira mogui pristup sustavu i arbitrarno pokretanje koda sa privilegijama sustava za neautentificirane korisnike.

segment.source: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))
segment.target: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))

segment.source: This release includes improvements to performance, responsiveness and stability of audio output.
segment.target: Ova inaica ukljuuje poboljanja stabilnosti i performansi pri izlazu zvuka.

segment.source: Options have been added to control the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps, or to have them follow the volume of the voice you are using.
segment.target: Dodane su opcije za kontrolu glasnoe NVDA zvukova i zvunih signala, ili ujednaavanja sa glasnoom glasa koji koristite.

segment.source: NVDA can now periodically refresh OCR results, speaking new text as it appears.
segment.target: NVDA moe s vremena na vrijeme osvjeavati rezultate prepoznavanja teksta kada se pojave.

segment.source: This can be configured in the Windows OCR category of NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Ovo se moe konfigurirati u Windows OCR kategoriji u dijalokom okviru postavki NVDA.

segment.source: There's been several braille fixes, improving device detection and caret movement.
segment.target: Dodane su ispravke za brajine redke, ukljuujui automatsko otkrivanje.

segment.source: It is now possible to opt-out unwanted drivers from automatic detection, to improve autodetection performance.
segment.target: Sada je mogue iskljuiti upravljake programe iz procesa automatskog otkrivanjau cilju poboljanja performansi.

segment.source: There are also new BRLTTY commands.
segment.target: Dodane su takoer nove komande za Brltty.

segment.source: There's also been bug fixes for the Add-on Store, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Edge context menus, and Windows Calculator.
segment.target: Ispravljene su greke u Add-on Storeu, Microsoft Officeu, Microsoft Edge kontekstnim izbornicima i u Windows kalkulatoru.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Enhanced sound management:
segment.target: Unapreeno upravljanje zvukom:

segment.source: A new Audio Settings panel:
segment.target: Novi panel postavki zvuka:

segment.source: This can be opened with `NVDA+control+u`. (#15497)
segment.target: Moe se otvoriti tipkovnikim preacom `NVDA+control+u`. (#15497)

segment.source: An option in Audio settings to have the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps follow the volume setting of the voice you are using. (#1409)
segment.target: Opcija koja omoguuje ujednaavanje glasnoe zvukova sa glasnoom govorne jedinice koju koristite. (#1409)

segment.source: An option in Audio settings to separately configure the volume of NVDA sounds. (#1409, #15038)
segment.target: Opcija za odvojenu konfiguraciju glasnoe NVDA zvukova. (#1409, #15038)

segment.source: The settings to change audio output device and toggle audio ducking have been moved to the new Audio settings panel from the Select Synthesizer dialog.
segment.target: Opcije za promjenu zvune kartice i utiavanje zvukova premjetene su u novu kategoriju postavki zvuka iz dijalokog okvira odabira govorne jedinice.

segment.source: These options will be removed from the "select synthesizer" dialog in 2024.1. (#15486, #8711)
segment.target: Ove e opcije biti uklonjene iz dijalokog okvira "odaberi govornu jedinicu" u inaici 2024.1. (#15486, #8711)

segment.source: NVDA will now output audio via the Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), which may improve the responsiveness, performance and stability of NVDA speech and sounds. (#14697, #11169, #11615, #5096, #10185, #11061)
segment.target: NVDA e sada emitirati zvuk putem Windows Audio Session API-ja (WASAPI), to moe poboljati odziv, performanse i stabilnost NVDA govora i zvukova. (#14697, #11169, #11615, #5096, #10185, #11061)

segment.source: Note: WASAPI is incompatible with some add-ons.
segment.target: Upozorenje: WASAPI je nekompatibilan sa nekim dodacima.

segment.source: Compatible updates are available for these add-ons, please update them before updating NVDA.
segment.target: Dostupne su kompatibilne nadogradnje tih dodataka, Nadogradite ih prije nadogradnje NVDA.

segment.source: Incompatible versions of these add-ons will be disabled when updating NVDA:
segment.target: Nekompatibilne verzije tih dodataka bit e iskljuene prilikom nadogradnje NVDA:

segment.source: Tony's Enhancements version 1.15 or older. (#15402)
segment.target: Tony's Enhancements inaica 1.15 ili starija. (#15402)

segment.source: NVDA global commands extension 12.0.8 or older. (#15443)
segment.target: NVDA global commands extension 12.0.8 ili starija. (#15443)

segment.source: NVDA is now able to continually update the result when performing optical character recognition (OCR), speaking new text as it appears. (#2797)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe kontinuirano osvjeavati rezultat prepoznavanja teksta kada se pojavi novi tekst. (#2797)

segment.source: To enable this functionality, enable the option "Periodically refresh recognized content" in the Windows OCR category of NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Kako biste ukljuili ovu opciju, molimo ukljuite opciju "S vremena na vrijeme osvjeavaj sadraj prepoznavanja" u kategoriji Windows Ocr u NVDA postavkama.

segment.source: Once enabled, you can toggle speaking new text by toggling report dynamic content changes (pressing `NVDA+5`).
segment.target: Kada je ova opcija ukljuena, moete ukljuiti ili iskljuiti izgovor novog teksta tako da ukljuite ili iskljuite itanje dinamikog sadraja (pritiskom `NVDA+5`).

segment.source: When using automatic detection of braille displays, it is now possible to opt-out drivers from detection from the braille display selection dialog. (#15196)
segment.target: Prilikom koritenja automatskog otkrivanja brajinih redaka, sada je mogue onemoguiti upravljake programe sa popisa automatski otkrivanih u dijalokom okviru izbora brajinog redka. (#15196)

segment.source: A new option in Document Formatting settings, "Ignore blank lines for line indentation reporting". (#13394)
segment.target: Nova opcija u opcijama oblikovanja dokumenta, "Ignoriraj prazne redke prilikom itanja uvlaenja". (#13394)

segment.source: Added an unassigned gesture to navigate by tab groupings in browse mode. (#15046)
segment.target: Dodana nedodijeljena gesta za kretanje po grupiranjima kartica svojstva u nainu pregleda. (#15046)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: izmjene

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Brajica:

segment.source: When the text in a terminal changes without updating the caret, the text on a braille display will now properly update when positioned on a changed line.
segment.target: Kada se tekst u naredbenom redku promijeni bez promjene fokusa, tekst na brajinom redku e se takoer obnoviti kada se nalazite na tom redku.

segment.source: This includes situations where braille is tethered to review. (#15115)
segment.target: Ovo ukljuuje situacije kada je brajica povezana na pregled. (#15115)

segment.source: More BRLTTY key bindings are now mapped to NVDA commands (#6483):
segment.target: Vie Brltty preaca je povezana sa NVDA preacima (#6483):

segment.source: `learn`: toggle NVDA input help
segment.target: `learn`: ukljui iskljui pomo pri unosu

segment.source: `prefmenu`: open the NVDA menu
segment.target: `prefmenu`: otvori nVDA izbornik

segment.source: `prefload`/`prefsave`: Load/save NVDA configuration
segment.target: `prefload`/`prefsave`: uitaj spremi NVDA konfiguraciju

segment.source: `time`: Show time
segment.target: `time`: pokai vrijeme

segment.source: `say_line`: Speak the current line where the review cursor is located
segment.target: `say_line`: Izgovori redak na kojem se nalazi pregledni kursor

segment.source: `say_below`: Say all using review cursor
segment.target: `say_below`: itaj sve koristei pregledni kursor

segment.source: The BRLTTY driver is only available when a BRLTTY instance with BrlAPI enabled is running. (#15335)
segment.target: BRLTTY upravljaki program je dostupan samo kada je Brltty pokrenut sa BRL api. (#15335)

segment.source: The advanced setting to enable support for HID braille has been removed in favor of a new option.
segment.target: Napredna postavka za iskljuivanje HID brajinog redka sada je uklonjena i zamijenjena novom opcijom.

segment.source: You can now disable specific drivers for braille display auto detection in the braille display selection dialog. (#15196)
segment.target: Sada moete iskljuiti odreene upravljake programe za automatsko prepoznavanje u dijalokom okviru brajinih postavki. (#15196)

segment.source: Add-on Store: Installed add-ons will now be listed in the Available Add-ons tab, if they are available in the store. (#15374)
segment.target: Add-on Store: dodaci e sada biti dostupni na kartici svojstva dostupnih dodataka, ako su dostupni u Add-on storeu. (#15374)

segment.source: Some shortcut keys have been updated in the NVDA menu. (#15364)
segment.target: Osvjeeni su neki preaci u NVDA izborniku. (#15364)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke greaka

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: Fixed crash in Microsoft Word when Document formatting options "report headings" and "report comments and notes" were not enabled. (#15019)
segment.target: Ispravljeno ruenje u Microsoft Word Kada su opcije u postavkama oblikovanja "itaj naslove" i "itaj komentare i biljeke" iskljuene. (#15019)

segment.source: In Word and Excel, text alignment will be correctly reported in more situations. (#15206, #15220)
segment.target: U Wordu i Excelu, poravnanje e biti ispravno proitano u vie situacija. (#15206, #15220)

segment.source: Fixes the announcement of some cell formatting shortcuts in Excel. (#15527)
segment.target: Ispravljeno itanje nekih preaca oblikovanja u Excelu. (#15527)

segment.source: Microsoft Edge:
segment.target: Microsoft Edge:

segment.source: NVDA will no longer jump back to the last browse mode position when opening the context menu in Microsoft Edge. (#15309)
segment.target: NVDA se vie nee vraati na prethodnu poziciju u modusu itanja pri otvaranju kontekstnog izbornika u Microsoft Edgeu. (#15309)

segment.source: NVDA is once again able to read context menus of downloads in Microsoft Edge. (#14916)
segment.target: NVDA opet moe itati kontekstni izbornik preuzimanja u Microsoft Edgeu. (#14916)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Brajica:

segment.source: The braille cursor and selection indicators will now always be updated correctly after showing or hiding respective indicators with a gesture. (#15115)
segment.target: Brajini kursor i pokaziva oznaenosti bit e ispravno osvjeeni poslije ukljuenja ili iskljuenja gestom. (#15115)

segment.source: Fixed bug where Albatross braille displays try to initialize although another braille device has been connected. (#15226)
segment.target: Ispravljena pogreka prilikom koje su se Albatros brajini redci pokuali inicijalizirati ak iako je drugi brajini redak bio spojen. (#15226)

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Trgovina dodataka:

segment.source: Fixed bug where unchecking "include incompatible add-ons" would result in incompatible add-ons still being listed in the store. (#15411)
segment.target: Ispravljena greka poslije odznaavanja "ukljui nekompatibilne dodatke" koja je prouzrokovala vidljivost nekompatibilnih dodataka. (#15411)

segment.source: Add-ons blocked due to compatibility reasons should now be filtered correctly when toggling the filter for enabled/disabled status. (#15416)
segment.target: Dodaci blokirani zbog nekompatibilnosti bi se sada trebali pravilno osvjeavati prilikom sortiranja po statusu ukljuenosti ili iskljuenosti. (#15416)

segment.source: Fixed bug preventing overridden enabled incompatible add-ons being upgraded or replaced using the external install tool. (#15417)
segment.target: Ispravljena pogreka nadpisivanja ili nadogradnje dodataka koristei runu instalaciju. (#15417)

segment.source: Fixed bug where NVDA would not speak until restarted after add-on installation. (#14525)
segment.target: Ispravljena pogreka prilikom koje NVDA nee govoriti poslije ponovnog pokretanja i zavretka NVDA instalacije. (#14525)

segment.source: Fixed bug where add-ons cannot be installed if a previous download failed or was cancelled. (#15469)
segment.target: Ispravljena pogreka pri instalaciji dodataka ako je prethodna instalacija ili preuzimanje prekinuto. (#15469)

segment.source: Fixed issues with handling incompatible add-ons when upgrading NVDA. (#15414, #15412, #15437)
segment.target: Ispravljene pogreke s rukovanjem nekompatibilnim dodacima pri nadogradnji NVDA. (#15414, #15412, #15437)

segment.source: NVDA once again announces calculation results in the Windows 32bit calculator on Server, LTSC and LTSB versions of Windows. (#15230)
segment.target: NVDA opet izgovara rezultate raunskih operacija u 32-bitnom kalkulatoru za Windows u operacijskim sustavima Server, LTSC i LTSB. (#15230)

segment.source: NVDA no longer ignores focus changes when a nested window (grand child window) gets focus. (#15432)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne ignorira izmjene fokusa kada vieslojni prozor (prozor koji se nalazi iznad drugog prozora) postane fokusiran. (#15432)

segment.source: Fixed a potential cause of crashing during NVDA startup. (#15517)
segment.target: Ispravljeno mogue ruenje prilikom pokretanja NVDA. (#15517)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte [vodi za razvojne programere](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) za informacije o postupku zastarjelosti i uklanjanja NVDA API-ja.

segment.source: `braille.handler.handleUpdate` and `braille.handler.handleReviewMove` have been changed in order not to update instantly.
segment.target: 'braille.handler.handleUpdate' i 'braille.handler.handleReviewMove' promijenjeni su kako se ne bi odmah aurirali.

segment.source: Before this change, when either of these methods was called very often, this would drain many resources.
segment.target: Prije ove promjene, kada se bilo koja od ovih metoda pozivala vrlo esto, to bi iscrpilo mnoge resurse.

segment.source: These methods now queue an update at the end of every core cycle instead.
segment.target: Ove metode sada umjesto toga stavljaju auriranje u red ekanja na kraju svakog jezgrenog ciklusa.

segment.source: They should also be thread safe, making it possible to call them from background threads. (#15163)
segment.target: Takoer bi trebali biti sigurni za niti, to omoguuje njihovo pozivanje iz pozadinskih niti. (#15163)

segment.source: Added official support to register custom braille display drivers in the automatic braille display detection process.
segment.target: Dodana je slubena podrka za registraciju prilagoenih upravljakih programa za Brailleovo pismo u procesu automatskog otkrivanja brajevog pisma.

segment.source: Consult the `braille.BrailleDisplayDriver` class documentation for more details.
segment.target: Pogledajte Brailleovo pismo. BrailleDisplayDokumentacija o klasi vozaa za vie detalja.

segment.source: Most notably, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` and the `registerAutomaticDetection` `classmethod` must be implemented. (#15196)
segment.target: Najznaajnije, atribut 'supportsAutomaticDetection' mora biti postavljen na 'True' i 'registerAutomaticDetection' 'classmethod' mora biti implementiran. (#15196)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Zastarjelosti

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` is now deprecated with no public replacement.
segment.target: 'Brailleovo pismo. BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate' sada je zastario bez javne zamjene.

segment.source: It will be removed in 2024.1. (#15163)
segment.target: Bit e uklonjen 2024.1. (#15163)

segment.source: Importing the constants `xlCenter`, `xlJustify`, `xlLeft`, `xlRight`, `xlDistributed`, `xlBottom`, `xlTop` from `NVDAObjects.window.excel` is deprecated.
segment.target: Uvoz konstanti 'xlCenter', 'xlJustify', 'xlLeft', 'xlRight', 'xlDistributed', 'xlBottom', 'xlTop' iz 'NVDAObjects.window.excel' je zastario.

segment.source: Use `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)
segment.target: Umjesto toga upotrijebite nabrajanje 'XlHAlign' ili 'XlVAlign'. (#15205)

segment.source: The mapping `NVDAObjects.window.excel.alignmentLabels` is deprecated.
segment.target: Mapiranje "NVDAObjects.window.excel.alignmentLabels" je zastarjelo.

segment.source: Use the `displayString` methods of `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)
segment.target: Umjesto toga koristite metode 'displayString' nabrajanja 'XlHAlign' ili 'XlVAlign'. (#15205)

segment.source: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices` and `bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been deprecated.
segment.target: 'bdDetect.addUsbDevices' i 'bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices' su zastarjeli.

segment.source: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` classmethod instead.
segment.target: Upravljaki programi Brailleovog zaslona trebali bi umjesto toga implementirati metodu klase 'registerAutomaticDetection'.

segment.source: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200)
segment.target: Ta metoda prima objekt 'DriverRegistrar' na kojem se mogu koristiti metode 'addUsbDevices' i 'addBluetoothDevices'. (#15200)

segment.source: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` uses `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices` for devices that are marked as thread safe.
segment.target: Zadana implementacija metode provjere na 'BrailleDisplayDriver' koristi 'bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices' za ureaje koji su oznaeni kao sigurni za niti.

segment.source: Starting from NVDA 2024.1, in order for the base method to use `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices`, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` as well. (#15200)
segment.target: Poevi od NVDA 2024.1, kako bi osnovna metoda koristila 'bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices', atribut 'supportsAutomaticDetection' takoer mora biti postavljen na 'True'. (#15200)

segment.source: This release introduces the Add-on Store to replace the Add-ons Manager.
segment.target: Ova verzija dodaje add-on store koja Zamjenjuje upravljanje dodacima.

segment.source: In the Add-on Store you can browse, search, install and update community add-ons.
segment.target: U Add-on storeu moete pregledavati, pretraivati, instalirati i aurirati dodatke zajednice.

segment.source: You can now manually override incompatibility issues with outdated add-ons at your own risk.
segment.target: Sada moete runo ignorirati probleme kompatibilnosti sa zastarjelim dodacima na vlastitu odgovornost.

segment.source: There are new braille features, commands, and display support.
segment.target: Dodane su nove funkcije za brajine redke, preice i novi podrani brajini redci.

segment.source: There are also new input gestures for OCR and flattened object navigation.
segment.target: Takoer su dodate nove preice za OCR i rasklopljeni prikaz kroz objekte.

segment.source: Navigating and reporting formatting in Microsoft Office is improved.
segment.target: Navigacija i itanje oblikovanja u Microsoft Office paketu je poboljana.

segment.source: There are many bug fixes, particularly for braille, Microsoft Office, web browsers and Windows 11.
segment.target: Puno greaka je ispravljeno, posebno za brajine redke, Microsoft Office, web preglednike i Windows 11.

segment.source: eSpeak-NG, LibLouis braille translator, and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: eSpeak-NG, LibLouis braille translator, i Unicode CLDR su aurirani.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Add-on Store has been added to NVDA. (#13985)
segment.target: Add-on store je dodan u NVDA. (#13985)

segment.source: Browse, search, install and update community add-ons.
segment.target: Pregled, pretraga, instalacija i auriranje dodataka zajednice.

segment.source: Manually override incompatibility issues with outdated add-ons.
segment.target: Runo uitajte nekompatibilne NVDA dodatke.

segment.source: The Add-ons Manager has been removed and replaced by the Add-on Store.
segment.target: upravitelj dodacima je uklonjen i zamenjen add-on store.

segment.source: For more information please read the updated user guide.
segment.target: za vie informacija molimo proitajte aurirani korisniki prirunik.

segment.source: New input gestures:
segment.target: Novi preaci:

segment.source: An unbound gesture to cycle through the available languages for Windows OCR. (#13036)
segment.target: Nova ulazna gesta bez dodijeljenog preaca za kruenje kroz dostupne jezike za Windows OCR. (#13036)

segment.source: An unbound gesture to cycle through the braille show messages modes. (#14864)
segment.target: nova ulazna gesta bez dodijeljenog preaca za kruenje kroz moduse prikazivanja poruka na brajinom redku. (#14864)

segment.source: An unbound gesture to toggle showing the selection indicator for braille. (#14948)
segment.target: Ulazna gesta bez dodijeljenog preaca za ukljuivanje ili iskljuivanje indikacije oznaavanja. (#14948)

segment.source: Added default keyboard gesture assignments to move to the next or previous object in a flattened view of the object hierarchy. (#15053)
segment.target: Dodani podrazumjevani preaci na tipkovnice za kretanje na sljedei ili prethodni objekt u raskropljenom prikazu hierarhije objekata. (#15053)

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+numpad9` and `NVDA+numpad3` to move to the previous and next objects respectively.
segment.target: stolno raunalo: `NVDA+numeriki9` i `NVDA+numeriki3` za kretanje na slijedei ili prethodni objekt.

segment.source: Laptop: `shift+NVDA+[` and `shift+NVDA+]` to move to the previous and next objects respectively.
segment.target: prijenosno raunalo: `ift+NVDA+[` i `ift+NVDA+]` za kretanje na prethodni i slijedei objekt.

segment.source: New braille features:
segment.target: Nove funkcije za brajine retke:

segment.source: Added support for the Help Tech Activator braille display. (#14917)
segment.target: Dodana podrka za Help Tech Activator brajini redak. (#14917)

segment.source: A new option to toggle showing the selection indicator (dots 7 and 8). (#14948)
segment.target: Nova opcija za ukljuivanje ili iskljuivanje prikazivanja indikacije oznaenosti (tokice 7 i 8). (#14948)

segment.source: A new option to optionally move the system caret or focus when changing the review cursor position with braille routing keys. (#14885, #3166)
segment.target: Nova opcija za pomicanje kursora sustava ili fokusa pri promjeni pozicije preglednog kursora gumbima na brajinom redku. (#14885, #3166)

segment.source: When pressing `numpad2` three times to report the numerical value of the character at the position of the review cursor, the information is now also provided in braille. (#14826)
segment.target: Kada se pritisne `numeriki2` tri puta za itanje brojane vrijednosti znaka na poziciji preglednog kursora, informacija se takoer prua na brajinom redku. (#14826)

segment.source: Added support for the `aria-brailleroledescription` ARIA 1.3 attribute, allowing web authors to override the type of an element shown on the braille display. (#14748)
segment.target: Dodata podrka za `aria-brailleroledescription` ARIA 1.3 atribut, koji e dozvoliti autorima web stranica zamjenu vrste elementa koja e se prikazati na brajinom redku. (#14748)

segment.source: Baum braille driver: added several braille chord gestures for performing common keyboard commands such as `windows+d` and `alt+tab`.
segment.target: Upravljaki program za Baum brajine redke: Dodano nekoliko vezanih brajinih preaca za izvravanje estih preica na tastaturi kao to su `windows+d` i `alt+tab`.

segment.source: Please refer to the NVDA User Guide for a full list. (#14714)
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte NVDA korisniko uputstvo za potpun popis. (#14714)

segment.source: Added pronunciation of Unicode symbols:
segment.target: Dodan izgovor Unicode znakova:

segment.source: braille symbols such as ``. (#13778)
segment.target: brajini znakovi kao to su ``. (#14548)

segment.source: Mac Option key symbol ``. (#14682)
segment.target: Znak za Mac tipku opcije ``. (#14682)

segment.source: Added gestures for Tivomatic Caiku Albatross braille displays. (#14844, #15002)
segment.target: Dodani preaci za Tivomatic Caiku Albatross brajine redke. (#14844, #15002)

segment.source: showing the braille settings dialog
segment.target: prikaz dijalokog okvira brajinih postavki

segment.source: accessing the status bar
segment.target: Pristup traci stanja

segment.source: cycling the braille cursor shape
segment.target: promjena oblika brajinog kursora

segment.source: cycling the braille show messages mode
segment.target: promjena modusa prikazivanja poruka

segment.source: toggling the braille cursor on/off
segment.target: Ukljuivanje i iskljuivanje brajinog kursora

segment.source: toggling the "braille show selection indicator" state
segment.target: Ukljuivanje i iskljuivanje kursora oznaavanja na brajinom redku

segment.source: cycling the "braille move system caret when routing review cursor" mode. (#15122)
segment.target: Promjena opcije "Pomakni kursor sustava prilikom usmjeravanja kursora pregleda ". (#15122)

segment.source: Microsoft Office features:
segment.target: Znaajke Microsoft Office:

segment.source: When highlighted text is enabled Document Formatting, highlight colours are now reported in Microsoft Word. (#7396, #12101, #5866)
segment.target: Kada se omogui itanje istaknutog teksta u opcijama oblikovanja dokumenta, boje isticanja se sada itaju u Microsoft Wordu. (#7396, #12101, #5866)

segment.source: When colors are enabled Document Formatting, background colours are now reported in Microsoft Word. (#5866)
segment.target: Kada se ukljui itanje boja u opcijama oblikovanja dokumenta, boje pozadine se sada itaju u Microsoft Wordu. (#5866)

segment.source: When using Excel shortcuts to toggle format such as bold, italic, underline and strike through of a cell in Excel, the result is now reported. (#14923)
segment.target: Kada se koriste Excel preaci za ukljuivanje ili iskljuivanje opcija oblikovanja poput podebljanih, kosih, podcrtanih i prekrienih slova za eliju u Excelu, rezultat se sada ita. (#14923)

segment.source: Experimental enhanced sound management:
segment.target: Eksperimentalno poboljano upravljanje zvukom:

segment.source: NVDA can now output audio via the Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), which may improve the responsiveness, performance and stability of NVDA speech and sounds. (#14697)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe reproducirati zvukove putem standarda Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), to moe poboljati brzinu, performanse i stabilnost NVDA govora i zvukova.

segment.source: WASAPI usage can be enabled in Advanced settings.
segment.target: Koritenje WASAPI se moe omoguiti u naprednim postavkama.

segment.source: Additionally, if WASAPI is enabled, the following Advanced settings can also be configured.
segment.target: Takoer, ako je WASAPI omoguen, sljedee napredne postavke se mogu regulirati.

segment.source: An option to have the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps follow the volume setting of the voice you are using. (#1409)
segment.target: Opcija koja prouzrokuje praenje glasnoe NVDA govornog izlaza i zvunih signala. (#1409)

segment.source: An option to separately configure the volume of NVDA sounds. (#1409, #15038)
segment.target: Opcija za odvojeno postavljanje glasnoe NVDA zvukova. (#1409, #15038)

segment.source: There is a known issue with intermittent crashing when WASAPI is enabled. (#15150)
segment.target: Postoji poznat problem sa povremenim ruenjem kada je WASAPI omoguen. (#15150)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, NVDA now reports when a control opens a dialog, grid, list or tree if the author has specified this using `aria-haspopup`. (#8235)
segment.target: U preglednicima Mozilla Firefox i Google Chrome, NVDA sada ita ako kontrola otvara dijaloki okvir, mreu, popis ili stablasti prikaz ako je autor ovo oznaio uz pomo `aria-haspopup` atributa . (#14709)

segment.source: It is now possible to use system variables (such as `%temp%` or `%homepath%`) in the path specification while creating portable copies of NVDA. (#14680)
segment.target: Sada je mogue koristiti varijable sustava (poput `%temp%` ili `%homepath%`) pri odreivanju putanje pri stvaranju NVDA prijenosne kopije. (#14680)

segment.source: In Windows 10 May 2019 Update and later, NVDA can announce virtual desktop names when opening, changing, and closing them. (#5641)
segment.target: u auriranju Windowsa 10 za svibanj 2019 i novijim, NVDA moe izgovarati imena virtualnih radnih povrina kada se otvaraju, mijenjaju ili zatvaraju. (#5641)

segment.source: A system wide parameter has been added to allow users and system administrators to force NVDA to start in secure mode. (#10018)
segment.target: Dodan je sveopi parametar sustava koji e dozvoliti korisnicima i administratorima sustava prisilno pokretanje NVDA u sigurnom modusu. (#10018)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Aurirane komponente:

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `ed9a7bcf`. (#15036)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je auriran na inaicu 1.52-dev commit `ed9a7bcf`. (#15036)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.26.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.26.0). (#14970)
segment.target: Auriran LibLouis brajini prevoditelj na inaicu [3.26.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.26.0). (#14970)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 43.0. (#14918)
segment.target: CLDR je auriran na inaicu 43.0. (#14918)

segment.source: LibreOffice changes:
segment.target: Izmjene u LibreOffice paketu:

segment.source: When reporting the review cursor location, the current cursor/caret location is now reported relative to the current page in LibreOffice Writer 7.6 and newer, similar to what is done for Microsoft Word. (#11696)
segment.target: Kada se ita pozicija preglednog kursora, trenutna pozicija kursora se sada ita u odnosu na trenutnu stranicu u programu LibreOffice Writer za LibreOffice inaicu 7.6 i novije, slino itanju u programu Microsoft Word. (#11696)

segment.source: Announcement of the status bar (e.g. triggered by `NVDA+end`) works for LibreOffice. (#11698)
segment.target: Izgovor trake stanja (na primjer kada se pritisne `NVDA+end`) radi u paketu LibreOffice. (#11698)

segment.source: When moving to a different cell in LibreOffice Calc, NVDA no longer incorrectly announces the coordinates of the previously focused cell when cell coordinate announcement is disabled in NVDA's settings. (#15098)
segment.target: Kada se prebacite na neku drugu eliju u programu LibreOffice Calc, NVDA vie nee neispravno izgovarati koordinate prethodno fokusirane elije kada se izgovor koordinata elija onemogui u NVDA postavkama. (#15098)

segment.source: Braille changes:
segment.target: Promjene za brajine redke:

segment.source: When using a braille display via the Standard HID braille driver, the dpad can be used to emulate the arrow keys and enter.
segment.target: Kada se koristi brajini redak uz pomo upravljakog programa za Hid brajini standard, dpad se sada moe koristiti za emuliranje strelica tipkovnice i entera.

segment.source: Also `space+dot1` and `space+dot4` now map to up and down arrow respectively. (#14713)
segment.target: Takoe, `razmaknica+toka1` i `razmaknica+toka4` sada se koriste kao strelice dole i gore. (#14713)

segment.source: Updates to dynamic web content (ARIA live regions) are now displayed in braille.
segment.target: Auriranja dinamikog sadraja na Web stranicama (ARIA ive regije) se sada prikazuju na brajinom redku.

segment.source: This can be disabled in the Advanced Settings panel. (#7756)
segment.target: Ovo se moe onemoguiti na panelu naprednih postavki. (#7756)

segment.source: Dash and em-dash symbols will always be sent to the synthesizer. (#13830)
segment.target: Simboli crtica i spojnica e uvijek biti poslani sintetizatoru. (#13830)

segment.source: Distance reported in Microsoft Word will now honour the unit defined in Word's advanced options even when using UIA to access Word documents. (#14542)
segment.target: Udaljenost koju Microsoft Word ita e sada potovati mjernu jedinicu koja je postavljena u naprednim postavkama Worda ak i kada se koristi UIA za pristup Word dokumentima. (#14542)

segment.source: NVDA responds faster when moving the cursor in edit controls. (#14708)
segment.target: NVDA bre reagira kada se pomie kursor u kontrolama za ureivanje. (#14708)

segment.source: Script for reporting the destination of a link now reports from the caret / focus position rather than the navigator object. (#14659)
segment.target: Skripta za prijavljivanje odredita poveznice sada ita sa pozicije kursora ili fokusa umesto objekta navigatora. (#14659)

segment.source: Portable copy creation no longer requires that a drive letter be entered as part of the absolute path. (#14680)
segment.target: Stvaranje prenosne kopije vie ne zahtijeva upisivanje slova diska kao dio apsolutne putanje. (#14680)

segment.source: If Windows is configured to display seconds in the system tray clock, using `NVDA+f12` to report the time now honors that setting. (#14742)
segment.target: Ako je Windows postavljen da prikazuje sekunde na satu podruja obavijesti, koritenje preaca `NVDA+f12` za itanje vremena sada prati ovo podeavanje. (#14742)

segment.source: NVDA will now report unlabeled groupings that have useful position information, such as in recent versions of Microsoft Office 365 menus. (#14878)
segment.target: NVDA e sada prijavljivati grupe bez oznake koje imaju korisne informacijje o poziciji, kakve se mogu pronai u novijim inaicama Microsoft Office 365 izbornika. (#14878)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke greaka

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Brajini redci:

segment.source: Several stability fixes to input/output for braille displays, resulting in less frequent errors and crashes of NVDA. (#14627)
segment.target: Nekoliko poboljanja u stabilnosti unosa/prikaza na brajinom redku, to e smanjiti uestalost greaka i ruenja programa NVDA. (#14627)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer unnecessarily switch to no braille multiple times during auto detection, resulting in a cleaner log and less overhead. (#14524)
segment.target: NVDA se vie nee bespotrebno prebacivati na opciju bez brajice vie puta u toku automatskog prepoznavanja, to donosi zapisnike i manje optereenje. (#14524)

segment.source: NVDA will now switch back to USB if a HID Bluetooth device (such as the HumanWare Brailliant or APH Mantis) is automatically detected and an USB connection becomes available.
segment.target: NVDA e se sada prebacivati na USB ako HID Bluetooth ureaj (kao to je HumanWare Brailliant ili APH Mantis) automatski bude prepoznat i USB veza postane dostupna.

segment.source: This only worked for Bluetooth Serial ports before. (#14524)
segment.target: Ovo je ranije radilo samo za Bluetooth serijske portove. (#14524)

segment.source: When no braille display is connected and the braille viewer is closed by pressing `alt+f4` or clicking the close button, the display size of the braille subsystem will again be reset to no cells. (#15214)
segment.target: Kada nijedan brajini redak nije povezan i preglednik brajinog redka se zatvori pritiskanjem `alt+f4` ili klikom na gumb zatvori, veliina brajevog podsistema e ponovo biti vraena na bez elija. (#15214)

segment.source: Web browsers:
segment.target: Web preglednici:

segment.source: NVDA no longer occasionally causes Mozilla Firefox to crash or stop responding. (#14647)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee ponekad izazivati ruenje ili prestanak rada programa Mozilla Firefox. (#14647)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, typed characters are no longer reported in some text boxes even when speak typed characters is disabled. (#8442)
segment.target: U pretraivaima Mozilla Firefox i Google Chrome, upisani znakovi se vie ne prijavljuju u nekim poljima za unos teksta ak i kada je izgovor upisanih znakova iskljuen. (#8442)

segment.source: You can now use browse mode in Chromium Embedded Controls where it was not possible previously. (#13493, #8553)
segment.target: Sada moete koristiti modus pretraivanja u Chromium umetnutim kontrolama u kojima to ranije nije bilo mogue. (#13493, #8553)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving the mouse over text after a link now reliably reports the text. (#9235)
segment.target: U Mozilli Firefox, pomicanje mia do teksta nakon linka sada ispravno ita tekst. (#9235)

segment.source: The destination of graphic links is now reported accurately in more cases in Chrome and Edge. (#14783)
segment.target: Odredite linkova na slikama se sada preciznije ispravno ita u veini sluajeva u programima Chrome i Edge. (#14779)

segment.source: When trying to report the URL for a link without a href attribute NVDA is no longer silent.
segment.target: Kada pokuavate itati adresu poveznice bez href atributa NVDA vie nee biti bez govora.

segment.source: Instead NVDA reports that the link has no destination. (#14723)
segment.target: Umjesto toga NVDA e prijaviti da poveznica nema odredite. (#14723)

segment.source: In Browse mode, NVDA will no longer incorrectly ignore focus moving to a parent or child control e.g. moving from a control to its parent list item or gridcell. (#14611)
segment.target: U modusu pretraivanja, NVDA nee neispravno ignorirati pomeranje fokusa na glavnu kontrolu ili kontrolu unutar nje na primer pomicanje sa kontrole na njenu unutranju stavku popisa ili eliju mree. (#14611)

segment.source: Note however that this fix only applies when the Automatically set focus to focusable elements" option in Browse Mode settings is turned off (which is the default).
segment.target: Napomena meutim da se ova ispravka primenjuje samo kada je opcija "Automatsko postavljanje fokusa na stavke koje se mogu fokusirati" u postavkama modusa pretraivanja iskljuena (to je podrazumevano postaka).

segment.source: Fixes for Windows 11:
segment.target: Ispravke za Windows 11:

segment.source: NVDA can once again announce Notepad status bar contents. (#14573)
segment.target: NVDA ponovo moe izgovarati sadraj trake stanja u bloku za pisanje. (#14573)

segment.source: Switching between tabs will announce the new tab name and position for Notepad and File Explorer. (#14587, #14388)
segment.target: Prebacivanje izmeu kartica e izgovoriti ime i poziciju nove kartice u bloku za pisanje i upravitelju datoteka. (#14587, #14388)

segment.source: NVDA will once again announce candidate items when entering text in languages such as Chinese and Japanese. (#14509)
segment.target: NVDA e ponovo izgovarati dostupne unose kada se tekst pie na jezicima kao to su Kineski i Japanski. (#14509)

segment.source: It is once again possible to open the Contributors and License items on the NVDA Help menu. (#14725)
segment.target: Ponovo je mogue otvoriti popis doprinositelja ili licencu iz menija NVDA pomoi. (#14725)

segment.source: Microsoft Office fixes:
segment.target: Microsoft Office ispravke:

segment.source: When rapidly moving through cells in Excel, NVDA is now less likely to report the wrong cell or selection. (#14983, #12200, #12108)
segment.target: Kada se brzo kreete kroz elije u Excelu, manja je vjerojatnost prijavljivanja pogrene elije ili pogrenog odabira. (#14983, #12200, #12108)

segment.source: When landing on an Excel cell from outside a work sheet, braille and focus highlighter are no longer needlessly updated to the object that had focus previously. (#15136)
segment.target: Kada stanete na Excel eliju van radnog lista, brajini redak i oznaavanje fokusa se vie nee bespotrebno aurirati na objekt koji je ranije bio fokusiran. (#15136)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce focusing password fields in Microsoft Excel and Outlook. (#14839)
segment.target: NVDA sada uspjeno izgovara fokusiranje na polja za lozinke u programima Microsoft Excel i Outlook. (#14839)

segment.source: For symbols which do not have a symbol description in the current locale, the default English symbol level will be used. (#14558, #14417)
segment.target: Za simbole koji nemaju opis na trenutnom jeziku, podrazumjevana Engleska razina simbola e se koristiti. (#14558, #14417)

segment.source: It is now possible to use the backslash character in the replacement field of a dictionaries entry, when the type is not set to regular expression. (#14556)
segment.target: Sada je mogue koristiti znak obrnuta kosa crta u polju zamjene unosa rjenika, kada tip nije postavljen kao pravilni izraz. (#14556)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and 11 Calculator, a portable copy of NVDA will no longer do nothing or play error tones when entering expressions in standard calculator in compact overlay mode. (#14679)
segment.target: U kalkulatoru u Windowsima 10 i 11, a prijenosna kopija NVDA e pravilno itati izraze u kompaktnom nainu. (#14679)

segment.source: NVDA again recovers from many more situations such as applications that stop responding which previously caused it to freeze completely. (#14759)
segment.target: NVDA se ponovo oporavlja u brojnim sluajevima kao to su aplikacije koje vie ne reagiraju, to je ranije izazivalo da NVDA u potpunosti prestane raditi. (#14759)

segment.source: When forcing UIA support with certain terminal and consoles, a bug is fixed which caused a freeze and the log file to be spammed. (#14689)
segment.target: Kada elite prisilno koristitiUIA podrku u odreenim Terminalima i konzolama, ispravljena je greka koja je izazivala ruenje i neprestano pisanje podataka u zapisniku. (#14689)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer refuse to save the configuration after a configuration reset. (#13187)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee odbijati spremanje konfiguracije nakon vraanja postavki na tvornike. (#13187)

segment.source: When running a temporary version from the launcher, NVDA will not mislead users into thinking they can save the configuration. (#14914)
segment.target: Kada se pokree privremena kopija iz instalacije, NVDA nee korisnicima davati pogrene informacije da postavke mogu biti spremljena. (#14914)

segment.source: NVDA now generally responds slightly faster to commands and focus changes. (#14928)
segment.target: NVDA sada bre reagira na preace i promjene fokusa. (#14928)

segment.source: Displaying the OCR settings will not fail on some systems anymore. (#15017)
segment.target: Prikazivanje OCR postavki vie nee biti neuspjeno na nekim sistemima. (#15017)

segment.source: Fix bug related to saving and loading the NVDA configuration, including switching synthesizers. (#14760)
segment.target: Ispravljena greka vezana za spremanje i vraanje NVDA postavki, ukljuujui promjenu sintetizatora. (#14760)

segment.source: Fix bug causing text review "flick up" touch gesture to move pages rather than move to previous line. (#15127)
segment.target: Ispravljena greka koja je izazvala da u pregledu teksta pokret "Povlaenje gore" pomie stranice umjesto prelaska na prethodni redak. (#15127)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte [vodi za razvojne programere](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) za informacije o postupku zastarjelosti i uklanjanja NVDA API-ja.

segment.source: Suggested conventions have been added to the add-on manifest specification.
segment.target: Predloene konvencije dodane su specifikaciji manifesta dodataka.

segment.source: These are optional for NVDA compatibility, but are encouraged or required for submitting to the Add-on Store. (#14754)
segment.target: Oni su opcionalni za NVDA kompatibilnost, ali se potiu ili zahtijevaju za slanje u Trgovinu dodataka. (#14754)

segment.source: Use `lowerCamelCase` for the name field.
segment.target: Upotrijebite 'lowerCamelCase' za polje naziva.

segment.source: Use `<major>.<minor>.<patch>` format for the version field (required for add-on datastore).
segment.target: Use `<major>.<minor>.<patch>` format for the version field (required for add-on datastore).

segment.source: Use `https://` as the schema for the url field (required for add-on datastore).
segment.target: Upotrijebite 'https://' kao shemu za polje url-a (obavezno za spremite podataka dodataka).

segment.source: Added a new extension point type called `Chain`, which can be used to iterate over iterables returned by registered handlers. (#14531)
segment.target: Dodana je nova vrsta toke proirenja pod nazivom 'Chain', koja se moe koristiti za ponavljanje iterables koje vraaju registrirani rukovatelji. (#14531)

segment.source: Added the `bdDetect.scanForDevices` extension point.
segment.target: Dodana je toka proirenja 'bdDetect.scanForDevices'.

segment.source: Handlers can be registered that yield `BrailleDisplayDriver/DeviceMatch` pairs that don't fit in existing categories, like USB or Bluetooth. (#14531)
segment.target: Mogu se registrirati rukovatelji koji daju parove "BrailleDisplayDriver/DeviceMatch" koji se ne uklapaju u postojee kategorije, kao to su USB ili Bluetooth. (#14531)

segment.source: Added extension point: `synthDriverHandler.synthChanged`. (#14618)
segment.target: Dodana toka proirenja: 'synthDriverHandler.synthChanged'. (#14618)

segment.source: The NVDA Synth Settings Ring now caches available setting values the first time they're needed, rather than when loading the synthesizer. (#14704)
segment.target: NVDA Synth Settings Ring sada predmemorira dostupne vrijednosti postavki kada su prvi put potrebne, a ne prilikom uitavanja sintisajzera. (#14704)

segment.source: You can now call the export method on a gesture map to export it to a dictionary.
segment.target: Sada moete pozvati metodu izvoza na mapi gesta da biste je izvezli u rjenik.

segment.source: This dictionary can be imported in another gesture by passing it either to the constructor of `GlobalGestureMap` or to the update method on an existing map. (#14582)
segment.target: Ovaj se rjenik moe uvesti u drugu gestu tako da ga proslijedite konstruktoru 'GlobalGestureMap' ili metodi auriranja na postojeoj karti. (#14582)

segment.source: `hwIo.base.IoBase` and its derivatives now have a new constructor parameter to take a `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`.
segment.target: 'hwIo.base.IoBase' i njegovi derivati sada imaju novi parametar konstruktora za uzimanje 'hwIo.ioThread.IoThread'.

segment.source: If not provided, the default thread is used. (#14627)
segment.target: Ako nije navedeno, koristi se zadani niz. (#14627)

segment.source: `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread` now has a `setWaitableTimer` method to set a waitable timer using a python function.
segment.target: 'hwIo.ioThread.IoThread' sada ima metodu 'setWaitableTimer' za postavljanje mjeraa vremena za ekanje pomou python funkcije.

segment.source: Similarly, the new `getCompletionRoutine` method allows you to convert a python method into a completion routine safely. (#14627)
segment.target: Slino tome, nova metoda 'getCompletionRoutine' omoguuje vam sigurno pretvaranje python metode u rutinu dovravanja. (#14627)

segment.source: `offsets.OffsetsTextInfo._get_boundingRects` should now always return `List[locationHelper.rectLTWH]` as expected for a subclass of `textInfos.TextInfo`. (#12424)
segment.target: 'Kompenzacije. OffsetsTextInfo._get_boundingRects' bi sada uvijek trebao vratiti 'List[locationHelper.rectLTWH]' kao to se i oekivalo za podklasu 'textInfos.TextInfo'. (#12424)

segment.source: `highlight-color` is now a format field attribute. (#14610)
segment.target: 'highlight-color' sada je atribut polja formata. (#14610)

segment.source: NVDA should more accurately determine if a logged message is coming from NVDA core. (#14812)
segment.target: NVDA bi trebao tonije utvrditi dolazi li zabiljeena poruka iz NVDA jezgre. (#14812)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer log inaccurate warnings or errors about deprecated appModules. (#14806)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee biljeiti netona upozorenja ili pogreke o zastarjelim appModules. (#14806)

segment.source: All NVDA extension points are now briefly described in a new, dedicated chapter in the Developer Guide. (#14648)
segment.target: Sve NVDA proirene toke sada su ukratko opisane u novom, posveenom poglavlju u Vodiu za razvojne programere. (#14648)

segment.source: `scons checkpot` will no longer check the `userConfig` subfolder anymore. (#14820)
segment.target: 'scons checkpot' vie nee provjeravati podmapu 'userConfig'. (#14820)

segment.source: Translatable strings can now be defined with a singular and a plural form using `ngettext` and `npgettext`. (#12445)
segment.target: Prevodivi nizovi sada se mogu definirati u obliku jednine i mnoine koristei 'ngettext' i 'npgettext'. (#12445)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Zastarjelosti

segment.source: Passing lambda functions to `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` is deprecated.
segment.target: Prosljeivanje lambda funkcija u 'hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc' je zastarjelo.

segment.source: Instead, functions should be weakly referenceable. (#14627)
segment.target: Umjesto toga, funkcije bi trebale biti slabo referentne. (#14627)

segment.source: Importing `LPOVERLAPPED_COMPLETION_ROUTINE` from `hwIo.base` is deprecated.
segment.target: Uvoz 'LPOVERLAPPED_COMPLETION_ROUTINE' iz 'hwIo.base' je zastario.

segment.source: Instead import from `hwIo.ioThread`. (#14627)
segment.target: Umjesto toga uvezite s 'hwIo.ioThread'. (#14627)

segment.source: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` is deprecated.
segment.target: 'IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference' je zastario.

segment.source: It was introduced in NVDA 2023.1 and was never meant to be part of the public API.
segment.target: Predstavljen je u NVDA 2023.1 i nikada nije trebao biti dio javnog API-ja.

segment.source: Until removal, it behaves as a no-op, i.e. a context manager yielding nothing. (#14924)
segment.target: Do uklanjanja se ponaa kao no-op, tj. (#14924)

segment.source: `gui.MainFrame.onAddonsManagerCommand` is deprecated, use `gui.MainFrame.onAddonStoreCommand` instead. (#13985)
segment.target: 'Gui. MainFrame.onAddonsManagerCommand' je zastario, koristite 'gui. MainFrame.onAddonStoreCommand'. (#13985)

segment.source: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath` is deprecated, use `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` instead. (#15021)
segment.target: 'speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath' je zastario, umjesto toga koristite 'NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir'. (#15021)

segment.source: Importing `voiceDictsPath` and `voiceDictsBackupPath` from `speechDictHandler.dictFormatUpgrade` is deprecated.
segment.target: Uvoz 'voiceDictsPath' i 'voiceDictsBackupPath' iz 'speechDictHandler.dictFormatUpgrade' je zastario.

segment.source: Instead use `WritePaths.voiceDictsDir` and `WritePaths.voiceDictsBackupDir` from `NVDAState`. (#15048)
segment.target: Umjesto toga koristite 'WritePaths.voiceDictsDir' i 'WritePaths.voiceDictsBackupDir' iz 'NVDAState'. (#15048)

segment.source: `config.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY` is deprecated.
segment.target: 'config.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY' je zastarjelo.

segment.source: Instead use `config.RegistryKey.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY`. (#15049)
segment.target: Umjesto toga koristite 'config. RegistryKey.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY'. (#15049)

segment.source: A new option has been added, "Paragraph Style" in "Document Navigation".
segment.target: Dodana je nova opcija, "stil odlomka" u kategoriji "kretanje po dokumentu".

segment.source: This can be used with text editors that do not support paragraph navigation natively, such as Notepad and Notepad++.
segment.target: Ona se moe koristiti u tekstualnim editorima koji ne podravaju nativno kretanje po odlomcima, kao to su to Notepad i Notepad++.

segment.source: There is a new global command to report the destination of a link, mapped to `NVDA+k`.
segment.target: Dodan je novi preac za itanje odredita na koje vodi poveznica, odreen kao `NVDA+k`.

segment.source: Support for annotated web content (such as comments and footnotes) has improved.
segment.target: Podrka za anotiran web sadraj (poput komentara i rubnih biljeaka) je unaprijeena.

segment.source: Press `NVDA+d` to cycle through summaries when annotations are reported (e.g. "has comment, has footnote").
