segment.source: In Microsoft Word accessed via UI Automation, NVDA will now make use of mathPlayer to read and navigate Office math equations. (#12946)
segment.target: Kada se pristupa programu Microsoft Word uz UI Automation, NVDA e sada koristiti mathPlayer za kretanje po matematikim zadacima i itanje. (#12946)

segment.source: For this to work, you must be running Microsoft Word 365/2016 build 14326 or later.
segment.target: Kako bi ovo radilo, morate koristiti Microsoft Word 365/2016 verziju 14326 ili novije.

segment.source: MathType equations must also be manually converted to Office Math by selecting each, opening the context menu, choosing Equation options, Convert to Office Math.
segment.target: MathType zadaci se takoe moraju runo pretvoriti u Office Math izborom svakog od njih, otvaranjem kontekstnog menija, izborom stavke opcije jednadba, pretvori u Office Math.

segment.source: Reporting of "has details" and the associated command to summarize the details relation have been updated to work in focus mode. (#13106)
segment.target: Prijavljivanje kada objekat "ima detalje " kao i odgovarajua komanda za prijavljivanje odnosa detalja sada se mogu koristiti u reimu fokusiranja. (#13106)

segment.source: Seika Notetaker can now be auto-detected when connected via USB and Bluetooth. (#13191, #13142)
segment.target: Seika brajina biljenica se sada moe automatski prepoznati putem USB i Bluetooth veze. (#13191, #13142)

segment.source: This affects the following devices: MiniSeika (16, 24 cells), V6, and V6Pro (40 cells)
segment.target: Ovo utie na slijedee ureaje: MiniSeika (16, 24 znakova), V6, i V6Pro (40 znakova)

segment.source: Manually selecting the bluetooth COM port is also now supported.
segment.target: Runo biranje bluetooth COM porta je sada takoe podrano.

segment.source: Added a command to toggle the braille viewer; there is no default associated gesture. (#13258)
segment.target: Dodana komanda za ukljuivanje i iskljuivanje preglednika brajinog redka; nema podrazumijevane pridruene preice. (#13258)

segment.source: Added commands for toggling multiple modifiers simultaneously with a Braille display (#13152)
segment.target: Dodate komande za ukljuivanje ili iskljuivanje vie modifikatora u isto vrieme na brajinom redku (#13152)

segment.source: The Speech Dictionary dialog now features a "Remove all" button to help clear a whole dictionary. (#11802)
segment.target: Dijalog za govorne renike sada sadri gumb "Ukloni sve" koji vam pomae da oistite cijeli rijenik. (#11802)

segment.source: Added support for Windows 11 Calculator. (#13212)
segment.target: Dodana podrka za Windows 11 kalkulator. (#13212)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word with UI Automation enabled on Windows 11, line numbers and section numbers can now be reported. (#13283, #13515)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word uz UI Automation omoguen na Windowsu 11, brojevi redaka i sekcija se sada mogu prijaviti. (#13283, #13515)

segment.source: For Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 and higher on Windows 11, NVDA will use UI Automation to access Microsoft Word documents by default, providing a significant performance improvement over the old Object model access. (#13437)
segment.target: Za Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 i novije na Windowsu 11, NVDA e podrazumijevano koristiti UI Automation za pristup Microsoft Word dokumentima, to prua znaajna poboljanja u brzini u odnosu na stariji nain pristupa. (#13437)

segment.source: This includes documents in Microsoft Word itself, and also the message reader and composer in Microsoft Outlook.
segment.target: Ovo ukljuuje dokumente u samom programu Microsoft Word, kao i itanje i pisanje poruka u programu Microsoft Outlook.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: izmijene

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.51-dev commit `7e5457f91e10`. (#12950)
segment.target: Espeak-ng je auriran na 1.51-dev commit `7e5457f91e10`. (#12950)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.21.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.21.0). (#13141, #13438)
segment.target: Auriran liblouis brajini prevoditelj na [3.21.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.21.0). (#13141, #13438)

segment.source: Added new braille table: Japanese (Kantenji) literary braille.
segment.target: Dodana nova brajina tablica: Japanski (Kantenji) literarna brajica.

segment.source: Added new German 6 dot computer braille table.
segment.target: Dodata nova Njemaka estotokasta kompjuterska brajina tablica.

segment.source: Added Catalan grade 1 braille table. (#13408)
segment.target: Dodana brajina tablica Katalonsko puno pismo. (#13408)

segment.source: NVDA will report selection and merged cells in LibreOffice Calc 7.3 and above. (#9310, #6897)
segment.target: NVDA e izgovarati oznaavanje i spajanje elija u programu LibreOffice Calc 7.3 i novijim. (#9310, #6897)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) to 40.0. (#12999)
segment.target: Auriran Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) na 40.0. (#12999)

segment.source: `NVDA+Numpad Delete` reports the location of the caret or focused object by default. (#13060)
segment.target: `NVDA+numerika tipka za brisanje ` podrazumjevano prijavljuje lokaciju kursora ili fokusiranog objekta. (#13060)

segment.source: `NVDA+Shift+Numpad Delete` reports the location of the review cursor. (#13060)
segment.target: `NVDA+ift+numerika tipka za brisanje` prijavljuje lokaciju preglednog kursora. (#13060)

segment.source: Added default bindings for toggling modifier keys to Freedom Scientific displays (#13152)
segment.target: Dodani podrazumjevani preaci za ukljuivanje i iskljuivanje modifikatorskih tastera na Freedom Scientific brajevim redovima (#13152)

segment.source: "Baseline" is no longer reported via the report text formatting command (`NVDA+f`). (#11815)
segment.target: "Osnovna linija " se vie nee izgovarati kada se koristi preac za prijavljivanje oblikovanja (`NVDA+f`). (#11815)

segment.source: Activate long description no longer has a default gesture assigned. (#13380)
segment.target: Prijavljivanje dugog opisa vie nema postavljenu podrazumjevan preac. (#13380)

segment.source: Report details summary now has a default gesture (`NVDA+d`). (#13380)
segment.target: Prijavljivanje kratkog opisa detalja sada ima podrazumjevan preac (`NVDA+d`). (#13380)

segment.source: NVDA needs to be restarted after installing MathPlayer. (#13486)
segment.target: NVDA mora ponovo biti pokrenut nakon to se instalira MathPlayer. (#13486)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke greaka

segment.source: Clipboard manager pane should no longer incorrectly steal focus when opening some Office programs. (#12736)
segment.target: Okno upravljaa privremene memorije vie nee neispravno biti fokusirano kada se otvaraju odreeni Office programi. (#12736)

segment.source: On a system where the user has chosen to swap the primary mouse button from the left to the right, NVDA will no longer accidentally bring up a context menu instead of activating an item, in applications such as web browsers. (#12642)
segment.target: Na sustavima na kojima je korisnik odredio da zamijeni primarni gumb na miu tako da desni klik aktivira stavke, NVDA vie nee otvarati kontekstni meni umesto da aktivira stavku, u aplikacijama kao to su Web pretraivai. (#12642)

segment.source: When moving the review cursor past the end of text controls, such as in Microsoft Word with UI Automation, "bottom" is correctly reported in more situations. (#12808)
segment.target: Kada se pregledni kursor pomjera od dna tekstualnih kontrola, kao to su u programu Microsoft Word uz UI Automation, "dno" se ispravno izgovara u vie situacija. (#12808)

segment.source: NVDA can report the application name and version for binaries placed in system32 when running under 64-bit version of Windows. (#12943)
segment.target: NVDA moe da prui ime aplikacije i verziju za binarne datoteke koje se nalaze u system32 kada je pokrenut na 64-bitnoj verziji Windowsa. (#12943)

segment.source: Improved consistency of output reading in terminal programs. (#12974)
segment.target: Poboljana dosliednost u itanju u terminal programima. (#12974)

segment.source: Note that in some situations, when inserting or deleting characters in the middle of a line, the characters after the caret may again be read out.
segment.target: Napomena da e se u odreenim situacijama, kada ubacujete ili briete znakove u sredini redka, znakovi nakon kursora moda ponovo proitati.

segment.source: MS word with UIA: heading quick nav in browse mode no longer gets stuck on the final heading of a document, nor is this heading shown twice in the NVDA elements list. (#9540)
segment.target: MS word uz UIA: Brza navigacija kroz naslove se nee vie zaglavljivati na posljednjem naslovu, niti e taj naslov biti prikazan dva puta u listi elemenata. (#9540)

segment.source: In Windows 8 and later, the File Explorer status bar can now be retrieved using the standard gesture NVDA+end (desktop) / NVDA+shift+end (laptop). (#12845)
segment.target: Na Windowsu 8 i novijim, statusna traka istraivaa datoteka se sada moe proitati koritenjem standardnih preica NVDA+end (desktop) / NVDA+ift+end (laptop). (#12845)

segment.source: Incoming messages in the chat of Skype for Business are reported again. (#9295)
segment.target: Dolazne poruke u avrljanjima aplikacije Skype za biznis se ponovo prijavljuju. (#9295)

segment.source: NVDA can again duck audio when using the SAPI5 synthesizer on Windows 11. (#12913)
segment.target: NVDA ponovo moe stiavati pozadinske zvukove kada se koristi SAPI5 sintetizator na Windowsu 11. (#12913)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will announce labels for history and memory list items. (#11858)
segment.target: U Kalkulatoru Windowsa 10, NVDA e izgovarati oznake za istoriju i stavke popisa memorije. (#11858)

segment.source: Gestures such as scrolling and routing again work with HID Braille devices. (#13228)
segment.target: Preaci kao to su pomeranje brajevog reda i prebacivanje ponovo rade na HID brajevim ureajima. (#13228)

segment.source: Windows 11 Mail: After switching focus between apps, while reading a long email, NVDA no longer gets stuck on a line of the email. (#13050)
segment.target: Windows 11 Mail: Nakon prebacivanja fokusa izmeu aplikacija, dok se ita dua EMail poruka, NVDA se vie nee zaglavljivati na jednom redu poruke. (#13050)

segment.source: HID braille: chorded gestures (e.g. `space+dot4`) can be successfully performed from the Braille display. (#13326)
segment.target: HID brajevi ureaji: Vezane komande (na primer `razmak+tokica4`) se mogu uspeno izvriti sa brajevog reda. (#13326)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where multiple settings dialogs could be opened at the same time. (#12818)
segment.target: Ispravljena greka koja je dozvoljavala da se otvori vie dijaloga sa postavkama u isto vrieme. (#12818)

segment.source: Fixed a problem where some Focus Blue Braille displays would stop working after waking the computer from sleep. (#9830)
segment.target: Ispravljen problem koji je izazvao da odreeni Focus Blue brajini redci prestanu raditi nakon to probudite raunalo iz stanja spavanja. (#9830)

segment.source: "Baseline" is no longer spuriously reported when the "report superscript and subscript" option is active. (#11078)
segment.target: "Osnovna linija " se vie ne izgovara bespotrebno kada je opcija "prijavi indekse i eksponente" omoguena. (#11078)

segment.source: In Windows 11, NVDA will no longer prevent navigation in emoji panel when selecting emojis. (#13104)
segment.target: U Windowsu 11, NVDA vie nee spreavati navigaciju kroz Emoji panel kada se bira emoji. (#13104)

segment.source: Prevents a bug causing double-reporting when using Windows Console and Terminal. (#13261)
segment.target: Sprijeena greka koja izaziva dvostruko prijavljivanje kada se koristi Windows konzola i terminal. (#13261)

segment.source: Fixed several cases where list items could not be reported in 64 bit applications, such as REAPER. (#8175)
segment.target: Ispravljeno nekoliko sluajeva u kojima stavke popisa nisu mogle biti prijavljene u 64 bitnim aplikacijama, kao to je REAPER. (#8175)

segment.source: In the Microsoft Edge downloads manager, NVDA will now automatically switch to focus mode once the list item with the most recent download gains focus. (#13221)
segment.target: U upravljau preuzimanja programa Microsoft Edge, NVDA e se automatski prebaciti u reim fokusiranja kada stavka liste sa najnovijim preuzimanjem postane fokusirana. (#13221)

segment.source: NVDA no longer causes 64-bit versions of Notepad++ 8.3 and above to crash. (#13311)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee izazvati ruenje 64-bitnih verzija programa Notepad++ 8.3 i novijih. (#13311)

segment.source: Adobe Reader no longer crashes on startup if Adobe Reader's protected mode is enabled. (#11568)
segment.target: Adobe Reader se vie ne rui pri pokretanju ako je njegov zatien reim omoguen. (#11568)

segment.source: Fixed a bug where selecting the Papenmeier Braille Display Driver caused NVDA to crash. (#13348)
segment.target: Ispravljena greka koja je izazivala ruenje programa NVDA kada se izabere Papenmeier upravljaki program. (#13348)

segment.source: In Microsoft word with UIA: page number and other formatting is no longer inappropriately announced when moving from a blank table cell to a cell with content, or from the end of the document into existing content. (#13458, #13459)
segment.target: Microsoft word uz UIA: Broj stranice i druge informacije o formatiranju se vie ne izgovaraju bespotrebno kada se prebacite iz prazne elije tabele u eliju sa sadrajem, ili sa kraja dokumenta na postojei sadraj. (#13458, #13459)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to report the page title and start automatically reading, when a page loads in Google chrome 100. (#13571)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee imati problema sa prijavljivanjem naslova stranice i poetka automatskog itanja, kada se stranica uita u programu Google chrome 100. (#13571)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when resetting the NVDA configuration to factory defaults while speak command keys is on. (#13634)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne rui kada se podeavanja vrate na tvornike vrijednosti uz ukljuen izgovor komandnih tastera. (#13634)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Note: this is a Add-on API compatibility breaking release. Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Napomena: ovo je izdanje koje kri kompatibilnost dodatnog API-ja. Dodatke e trebati ponovno testirati i aurirati njihov manifest.

segment.source: Although NVDA still requires Visual Studio 2019, Builds should no longer fail if a newer version of Visual Studio (E.g. 2022) is installed along side 2019. (#13033, #13387)
segment.target: Iako NVDA i dalje zahtijeva Visual Studio 2019, meuverzije vie ne bi trebale propasti ako je uz 2019. instalirana novija verzija Visual Studija (npr. 2022). (#13033, #13387)

segment.source: Updated SCons to version 4.3.0. (#13033)
segment.target: Aurirani SConi na verziju 4.3.0. (#13033)

segment.source: Updated py2exe to version 0.11.1.0. (#13510)
segment.target: Auriran py2exe na verziju 0.11.1.0. (#13510)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` has been removed. Use `apiLevel` instead. (#12955, #12660)
segment.target: "NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable" je uklonjeno. Umjesto toga upotrijebite 'apiLevel'. (#12955, #12660)

segment.source: `TVItemStruct` has been removed from `sysTreeView32`. (#12935)
segment.target: 'TVItemStruct' je uklonjen iz 'sysTreeView32'. (#12935)

segment.source: `MessageItem` has been removed from the Outlook appModule. (#12935)
segment.target: 'MessageItem' je uklonjen iz Outlook appModule. (#12935)

segment.source: `audioDucking.AUDIODUCKINGMODE_*` constants are now a `DisplayStringIntEnum`. (#12926)
segment.target: Konstante 'audioDucking.AUDIODUCKINGMODE_*' sada su 'DisplayStringIntEnum'. (#12926)

segment.source: usages should be replaced with `AudioDuckingMode.*`
segment.target: upotrebe treba zamijeniti s 'AudioDuckingMode.*'

segment.source: usages of `audioDucking.audioDuckingModes` should be replaced with `AudioDuckingMode.*.displayString`
segment.target: koritenje 'audioDucking.audioDuckingModes' treba zamijeniti s 'AudioDuckingMode.*.displayString'

segment.source: `audioDucking.ANRUS_ducking_*` constants usages should be replaced with `ANRUSDucking.*`. (#12926)
segment.target: Koritenje konstanti 'audioDucking.ANRUS_ducking_*' treba zamijeniti s 'ANRUSDucking.*'. (#12926)

segment.source: `synthDrivers.sapi5` changes (#12927):
segment.target: Promjene 'synthDrivers.sapi5' (#12927):

segment.source: `SPAS_*` usages should be replaced with `SPAudioState.*`
segment.target: Upotreba 'SPAS_*' trebala bi biti zamijenjena s 'SPAudioState.*'

segment.source: `constants.SVSF*` usages should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.*`
segment.target: 'konstante. SVSF*' treba zamijeniti s 'SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.*'

segment.source: Note: `SVSFlagsAsync` should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.Async` not `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.lagsAsync`
segment.target: Napomena: "SVSFlagsAsync" treba zamijeniti s "SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.Async", a ne "SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.lagsAsync"

segment.source: `constants.SVE*` usages should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceEvents.*`
segment.target: 'konstante. Koritenje SVE*' treba zamijeniti s 'SpeechVoiceEvents.*'

segment.source: The `soffice` appModule has the following classes and functions removed `JAB_OOTableCell`, `JAB_OOTable`, `gridCoordStringToNumbers`. (#12849)
segment.target: AppModule 'soffice' ima uklonjene sljedee klase i funkcije 'JAB_OOTableCell', 'JAB_OOTable', 'gridCoordStringToNumbers'. (#12849)

segment.source: `core.CallCancelled` is now `exceptions.CallCancelled`. (#12940)
segment.target: 'Jezgra. CallCancelled' je sada 'iznimke. Poziv otkazan'. (#12940)

segment.source: All constants starting with RPC from `core` and `logHandler` are moved into `RPCConstants.RPC` enum. (#12940)
segment.target: Sve konstante koje poinju s RPC iz 'core' i 'logHandler' premjetaju se u 'RPCConstants.RPC' enum. (#12940)

segment.source: It is recommended that `mouseHandler.doPrimaryClick` and `mouseHandler.doSecondaryClick` functions should be used to click the mouse to perform a logical action such as activating (primary) or secondary (show context menu),
segment.target: Preporuuje se da se funkcije 'mouseHandler.doPrimaryClick' i 'mouseHandler.doSecondaryClick' koriste za klikanje miem za izvoenje logike radnje kao to je aktiviranje (primarno) ili sekundarno (prikaz kontekstnog izbornika),

segment.source: rather than using `executeMouseEvent` and specifying the left or right mouse button specifically.
segment.target: umjesto koritenja 'executeMouseEvent' i specificiranja lijeve ili desne tipke mia.

segment.source: This ensures code will honor the Windows user setting for swapping the primary mouse button. (#12642)
segment.target: To osigurava da e kod potovati korisniku postavku sustava Windows za zamjenu primarne tipke mia. (#12642)

segment.source: `config.getSystemConfigPath` has been removed - there is no replacement. (#12943)
segment.target: 'config.getSystemConfigPath' je uklonjen - nema zamjene. (#12943)

segment.source: `shlobj.SHGetFolderPath` has been removed - please use `shlobj.SHGetKnownFolderPath` instead. (#12943)
segment.target: 'Shlobj. SHGetFolderPath' je uklonjen - molimo koristite 'shlobj. SHGetKnownFolderPath' umjesto toga. (#12943)

segment.source: `shlobj` constants have been removed. A new enum has been created, `shlobj.FolderId` for usage with `SHGetKnownFolderPath`. (#12943)
segment.target: Konstante 'shlobj' su uklonjene. Stvoren je novi enum, 'shlobj. FolderId' za koritenje s 'SHGetKnownFolderPath'. (#12943)

segment.source: `diffHandler.get_dmp_algo` and `diffHandler.get_difflib_algo` have been replaced with `diffHandler.prefer_dmp` and `diffHandler.prefer_difflib` respectively. (#12974)
segment.target: "diffHandler.get_dmp_algo" i "diffHandler.get_difflib_algo" zamjenjuju se slovima "diffHandler.prefer_dmp" i "diffHandler.prefer_difflib". (#12974)

segment.source: `languageHandler.curLang` has been removed - to get the current NVDA language use `languageHandler.getLanguage()`. (#13082)
segment.target: 'languageHandler.curLang' je uklonjen - za dobivanje trenutnog NVDA jezika koristite 'languageHandler.getLanguage()'. (#13082)

segment.source: A `getStatusBarText` method can be implemented on an appModule to customize the way NVDA fetches the text from the status bar. (#12845)
segment.target: Metoda 'getStatusBarText' moe se implementirati na appModule kako bi se prilagodio nain na koji NVDA dohvaa tekst sa statusne trake. (#12845)

segment.source: `globalVars.appArgsExtra` has been removed. (#13087)
segment.target: 'globalVars.appArgsExtra' je uklonjen. (#13087)

segment.source: If your add-on need to process additional command line arguments see the documentation of `addonHandler.isCLIParamKnown` and the developer guide for details.
segment.target: Ako va dodatak mora obraditi dodatne argumente naredbenog retka, pojedinosti potraite u dokumentaciji 'addonHandler.isCLIParamKnown' i vodiu za razvojne programere.

segment.source: The UIA handler module and other UIA support modules are now part of a UIAHandler package. (#10916)
segment.target: UIA modul za rukovanje i drugi moduli za podrku UIA sada su dio UIAHandler paketa. (#10916)

segment.source: `UIAUtils` is now `UIAHandler.utils`
segment.target: 'UIAUtils' je sada 'UIAHandler.utils'

segment.source: `UIABrowseMode` is now `UIAHandler.browseMode`
segment.target: 'UIABrowseMode' sada je 'UIAHandler.browseMode'

segment.source: `_UIAConstants` is now `UIAHandler.constants`
segment.target: '_UIAConstants' je sada 'UIAHandler.constants'

segment.source: `_UIACustomProps` is now `UIAHandler.customProps`
segment.target: '_UIACustomProps' je sada 'UIAHandler.customProps'

segment.source: `_UIACustomAnnotations` is now `UIAHandler.customAnnotations`
segment.target: '_UIACustomAnnotations' je sada 'UIAHandler.customAnnotations'

segment.source: The `IAccessibleHandler` `IA2_RELATION_*` constants have been replaced with the `IAccessibleHandler.RelationType` enum. (#13096)
segment.target: Konstante 'IAccessibleHandler' 'IA2_RELATION_*' zamijenjene su enumom 'IAccessibleHandler.RelationType'. (#13096)

segment.source: Removed `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_FROM`
segment.target: Uklonjeno 'IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_FROM'

segment.source: Removed `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_TO`
segment.target: Uklonjeno 'IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_TO'

segment.source: Removed `IA2_RELATION_CONTAINING_DOCUMENT`
segment.target: Uklonjeno 'IA2_RELATION_CONTAINING_DOCUMENT'

segment.source: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` and `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` are removed from `languageHandler` - use members of `languageHandler.LOCALE` instead. (#12753)
segment.target: 'LOCALE_SLANGUAGE', 'LOCALE_SLIST' i 'LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME' uklonjeni su iz 'languageHandler' - umjesto toga koristite lanove 'languageHandler.LOCALE'. (#12753)

segment.source: Switched from Minhook to Microsoft Detours as a hooking library for NVDA. Hooking with this library is mainly used to aid the display model. (#12964)
segment.target: Prebaen s Minhooka na Microsoft Detours kao biblioteku za spajanje za NVDA. Spajanje s ovom bibliotekom uglavnom se koristi za pomo modelu zaslona. (#12964)

segment.source: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` is removed. (#13211)
segment.target: 'winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS' se uklanja. (#13211)

segment.source: SCons now warns to build with a number of jobs that is equal to the number of logical processors in the system.
segment.target: SCons sada upozorava na izgradnju s brojem poslova koji je jednak broju logikih procesora u sustavu.

segment.source: This can dramatically decrease build times on multi core systems. (#13226, #13371)
segment.target: To moe dramatino smanjiti vrijeme izrade na viejezgrenim sustavima. (#13226, #13371)

segment.source: `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` constants are removed - please use `characterProcessing.SymbolLevel.*` instead. (#13248)
segment.target: Konstante 'characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*' su uklonjene - umjesto toga koristite 'characterProcessing.SymbolLevel.*'. (#13248)

segment.source: Functions `loadState` and `saveState` are removed from addonHandler - please use `addonHandler.state.load` and `addonHandler.state.save` instead. (#13245)
segment.target: Funkcije 'loadState' i 'saveState' uklonjene su iz addonHandlera - umjesto toga koristite 'addonHandler.state.load' i 'addonHandler.state.save'. (#13245)

segment.source: Moved the UWP/OneCore interaction layer of NVDAHelper [from C++/CX to C++/Winrt](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/uwp/cpp-and-winrt-apis/move-to-winrt-from-cx). (#10662)
segment.target: Premjeten je UWP/OneCore sloj interakcije NVDAHelpera [iz C++/CX u C++/Winrt](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/uwp/cpp-and-winrt-apis/move-to-winrt-from-cx). (#10662)

segment.source: It is now mandatory to subclass `DictionaryDialog` to use it. (#13268)
segment.target: Sada je obavezno podrazred 'DictionaryDialog' da biste ga koristili. (#13268)

segment.source: `config.RUN_REGKEY`, `config.NVDA_REGKEY` are deprecated, please use `config.RegistryKey.RUN`, `config.RegistryKey.NVDA` instead. These will be removed in 2023. (#13242)
segment.target: 'config. RUN_REGKEY', 'config. NVDA_REGKEY' su zastarjeli, upotrijebite 'config. RegistryKey.RUN', 'config. RegistryKey.NVDA'. Oni e biti uklonjeni 2023. godine. (#13242)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.ROOT_KEY`, `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_PATH` are deprecated, please use`easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.ROOT`, `easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.APP` instead. These will be removed in 2023. (#13242)
segment.target: 'easeOfAccess.ROOT_KEY', 'easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_PATH' su zastarjeli, umjesto toga koristite 'easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.ROOT', 'easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.APP'. Oni e biti uklonjeni 2023. godine. (#13242)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_NAME` has been deprecated, to be removed in 2023. (#13242)
segment.target: 'easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_NAME' je zastario i bit e uklonjen 2023. (#13242)

segment.source: `DictionaryDialog` and `DictionaryEntryDialog` are moved from `gui.settingsDialogs` to `gui.speechDict`. (#13294)
segment.target: 'DictionaryDialog' i 'DictionaryEntryDialog' premjeteni su iz 'gui.settingsDialogs' u 'gui.speechDict'. (#13294)

segment.source: IAccessible2 relations are now shown in developer info for IAccessible2 objects. (#13315)
segment.target: Odnosi IAccessible2 sada se prikazuju u informacijama za razvojne inenjere za objekte IAccessible2. (#13315)

segment.source: `languageHandler.windowsPrimaryLCIDsToLocaleNames` has been removed, instead use `languageHandler.windowsLCIDToLocaleName` or `winKernel.LCIDToLocaleName`. (#13342)
segment.target: 'languageHandler.windowsPrimaryLCIDsToLocaleNames' je uklonjen, umjesto toga koristite 'languageHandler.windowsLCIDToLocaleName' ili 'winKernel.LCIDToLocaleName'. (#13342)

segment.source: `UIAAutomationId` property for UIA objects should be preferred over `cachedAutomationId`. (#13125, #11447)
segment.target: Svojstvo 'UIAAutomationId' za UIA objekte treba imati prednost u odnosu na 'cachedAutomationId'. (#13125, #11447)

segment.source: `cachedAutomationId` can be used if obtained directly from the element.
segment.target: 'cachedAutomationId' moe se koristiti ako se dobije izravno iz elementa.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct` has moved to `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.Scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct`. (#13364)
segment.target: 'NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct' premjeteno je u 'NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.Scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct'. (#13364)

segment.source: Boolean `gui.isInMessageBox` is removed, please use the function `gui.message.isModalMessageBoxActive` instead. (#12984, #13376)
segment.target: Booleov 'gui.isInMessageBox' je uklonjen, umjesto toga koristite funkciju 'gui.message.isModalMessageBoxActive'. (#12984, #13376)

segment.source: `controlTypes` has been split up into various submodules. (#12510, #13588)
segment.target: 'controlTypes' je podijeljen u razliite podmodule. (#12510, #13588)

segment.source: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*` have been replaced with `Role.*` and `State.*`.
segment.target: "ROLE_*" i "STATE_*" zamjenjuju se s "Uloga.*" i "Drava.*".

segment.source: Although still available, the following should be considered deprecated:
segment.target: Iako je jo uvijek dostupan, sljedee bi se trebalo smatrati zastarjelim:

segment.source: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*`, use `Role.*` and `State.*` instead.
segment.target: 'ROLE_*' i 'STATE_*', umjesto toga koristite 'Role.*' i 'State.*'.

segment.source: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` and `negativeStateLabels`, usages like `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` should be replaced with their equivalent `Role.*.displayString` or `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.
segment.target: 'roleLabels', 'stateLabels' i 'negativeStateLabels', upotrebe kao to su 'roleLabels[ROLE_*]' treba zamijeniti njihovim ekvivalentom 'Role.*.displayString' ili 'State.*.negativeDisplayString'.

segment.source: `processPositiveStates` and `processNegativeStates` should use `processAndLabelStates` instead.
segment.target: 'processPositiveStates' i 'processNegativeStates' trebali bi umjesto toga koristiti 'processAndLabelStates'.

segment.source: Excel cell state constants (`NVSTATE_*`) are now values in the `NvCellState` enum, mirrored in the `NvCellState` enum in `NVDAObjects/window/excel.py` and mapped to `controlTypes.State` via _nvCellStatesToStates. (#13465)
segment.target: Konstante stanja elije programa Excel ("NVSTATE_*") sada su vrijednosti u enumu 'NvCellState', zrcaljene u enumu 'NvCellState' u 'NVDAObjects/window/excel.py' i mapirane u 'controlTypes.State' putem _nvCellStatesToStates. (#13465)

segment.source: `EXCEL_CELLINFO` struct member `state` is now `nvCellStates`.
segment.target: 'EXCEL_CELLINFO' struct member 'state' sada je 'nvCellStates'.

segment.source: `mathPres.ensureInit` has been removed, MathPlayer is now initialized when NVDA starts. (#13486)
segment.target: 'mathPres.ensureInit' je uklonjen, MathPlayer je sada inicijaliziran kada se NVDA pokrene. (#13486)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Ovo je manje auriranje kako bi se ispravio sigurnosni problem.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno prijavite sigurnosne probleme na adresu <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci sigurnosti

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-xc5m-v23f-pgr7`.
segment.target: Ispravljena sigurnosna preporuka `GHSA-xc5m-v23f-pgr7`.

segment.source: The symbol pronunciation dialog is now disabled in secure mode.
segment.target: Dijalog izgovora znakova interpunkcije i simbola je sada onemoguen u sigurnom nainu rada.

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several security issues raised.
segment.target: Ovo je manje auriranje kako bi se ispravilo nekoliko prijavljenih sigurnosnih problema.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno prijavite sigurnosne probleme na adresu <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Sigurnosni ispravci

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-354r-wr4v-cx28`. (#13488)
segment.target: Ispravljena sigurnosna preporuka `GHSA-354r-wr4v-cx28`. (#13488)

segment.source: Remove the ability to start NVDA with debug logging enabled when NVDA runs in secure mode.
segment.target: Uklonjena mogunost da se NVDA pokrene uz omoguene zapisnike za otklanjanje greaka kada je NVDA pokrenut u bezbednom nainu rada.

segment.source: Remove the ability to update NVDA when NVDA runs in secure mode.
segment.target: Uklonjena mogunost da se NVDA aurira kada je pokrenut u sigurnom nainu rada.

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-wg65-7r23-h6p9`. (#13489)
segment.target: Ispravljena sigurnosna preporuka `GHSA-wg65-7r23-h6p9`. (#13489)

segment.source: Remove the ability to open the input gestures dialog in secure mode.
segment.target: Uklonjena mogunost otvaranja dijaloga ulaznih gesti u bezbednom nainu rada.

segment.source: Remove the ability to open the default, temporary and voice dictionary dialogs in secure mode.
segment.target: Uklonjena mogunost otvaranja podrazumijevanog, privremenog i govornog rjenika u sigurnosnom nainu rada.

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-mvc8-5rv9-w3hx`. (#13487)
segment.target: Ispravljena sigurnosna preporuka `GHSA-mvc8-5rv9-w3hx`. (#13487)

segment.source: The wx GUI inspection tool is now disabled in secure mode.
segment.target: wx GUI inspection alat je sada onemoguena u sigurnom nainu rada.

segment.source: This release is identical to 2021.3.2.
segment.target: Ova verzija je identina verziji 2021.3.2.

segment.source: A bug existed in NVDA 2021.3.2 where it incorrectly identified itself as 2021.3.1.
segment.target: Dolo je do greke u verziji NVDA 2021.3.2 pa se ona identificirala kao 2021.3.1.

segment.source: This release correctly identifies itself as 2021.3.3.
segment.target: Ova verzija se ispravno identificira kao 2021.3.3.

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several security issues raised.
segment.target: Ovo je manje auriranje kako bi se ispravilo nekoliko prijavljenih sigurnosnih problema.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno prijavite sigurnosne probleme na adresu <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke greaka

segment.source: Security fix: Prevent object navigation outside of the lockscreen on Windows 10 and Windows 11. (#13328)
segment.target: Sigurnosna ispravka: Spreavanje objektne navigacije van zakljuanog ekrana na Windowsu 10 i Windowsu 11. (#13328)

segment.source: Security fix: The addons manager dialog is now disabled on secure screens. (#13059)
segment.target: Sigurnosna ispravka: Ekran upravljaa dodacima je sada onemoguen na sigurnim zaslonima. (#13059)

segment.source: Security fix: NVDA context help is no longer available on secure screens. (#13353)
segment.target: Sigurnosna ispravka: NVDA kontekstna pomo vie nije dostupna na sigurnim zaslonima. (#13353)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several issues in 2021.3.
segment.target: Ovo je manje auriranje kako bi se ispravilo nekoliko greaka u verziji 2021.3.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: The new HID Braille protocol is no longer preferred when another braille display driver can be used. (#13153)
segment.target: Novi HID brajini protokol vie nije izabran u situacijama kada postoji drugi upravljaki program za brajini redak koji se moe koristiti. (#13153)

segment.source: The new HID Braille protocol can be disabled via a setting in the advanced settings panel. (#13180)
segment.target: Novi HID brajini protokol se moe onemoguiti koritenjem opcije u panelu naprednih postavki. (#13180)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke greaka

segment.source: Landmark is once again abbreviated in braille. #13158
segment.target: Orjentiri e ponovo imati skraenice na brajinom redku. #13158

segment.source: Fixed unstable braille display auto detection for Humanware Brailliant and APH Mantis Q40 braille displays when using Bluetooth. (#13153)
segment.target: Ispravljjena nestabilnost u automatskom prepoznavanju brajinih redaka Humanware Brailliant i APH Mantis Q40 kada se koriste putem Bluetooth veze. (#13153)

segment.source: This release introduces support for the new HID Braille specification.
segment.target: Ova inaica uvodi podrku za novu HID specifikaciju za brajine retke.

segment.source: This specification aims to standardise support for Braille Displays without needing individual drivers.
segment.target: Ova specifikacija ima za cilj standardizaciju podrke za brajine retke bez potrebe za pojedinanim upravljakim programima.

segment.source: There are updates to eSpeak-NG and LibLouis, including new Russian and Tshivenda tables.
segment.target: Nadograeni su eSpeak-NG i LibLouis, ukljuujui nove tablice za ruski i Tshivenda jezike.

segment.source: Error sounds can be enabled in stable builds of NVDA via a new advanced settings option.
segment.target: Zvuci pogreaka mogu biti omogueni u stabilnim inaicama NVDA koristei novu opciju u naprednim postavkama.

segment.source: Say all in Word now scrolls the view to keep the current position visible.
segment.target: Preac itaj sve u Wordu sada prebacuje kako bi trenutna pozicija bila vidljiva.

segment.source: There are lots of improvements when using Office with UIA.
segment.target: Uinjeno je mnotvo poboljanja pri koritenju Office paketa sa UIA.

segment.source: One UIA fix is that Outlook now ignores more types of layout tables in messages.
segment.target: Jedna ispravka za UIA je ta da Outlook ignorira vie tablica izgleda u porukama.

segment.source: Important notes:
segment.target: Vana upozorenja:

segment.source: Due to an update to our security certificate, a small number of users get an error when NVDA 2021.2 checks for updates.
segment.target: Zbog nadogradnje naeg sigurnosnog certifikata, mali broj korisnika dobijaju pogreku kada NVDA 2021.2 provjerava nadogradnje.

segment.source: NVDA now asks Windows to update security certificates, which will prevent this error in future.
segment.target: NVDA sada pita operacijski sustav Windows treba li nadograditi sigurnosni certifikat, to znai da e takve greke u budunosti biti izbjegnute.

segment.source: Affected users will need to download this update manually.
segment.target: Korisnici koji su se susreli sa tom grekom e trebati runo preuzeti ovu nadogradnju.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Adds an input gesture for toggling settings for reporting the style of cell borders. (#10408)
segment.target: Dodan preac za ukljuivanje ili iskljuivanje izgovoraa stila granice rubova. (#10408)

segment.source: Support for the new HID Braille specification which aims to standardise support for Braille Displays. (#12523)
segment.target: Podrka nove HID specifikacije za brajine redke koja ima za cilj standardizaciju podrke brajinih redaka. (#12523)

segment.source: Devices that support this specification will be auto detected by NVDA.
segment.target: NVDA e automatski prepoznavati ureaje koji podravaju ovu specifikaciju.

segment.source: For technical details on NVDA's implementation of this specification, see https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/devDocs/hidBrailleTechnicalNotes.md
segment.target: Za tehnike detalje o NVDA implementaciji ove specifikacije, pogledajte https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/devDocs/hidBrailleTechnicalNotes.md

segment.source: Add support for the VisioBraille Vario 4 Braille Device. (#12607)
segment.target: Dodana podrka za VisioBraille Vario 4 brajini redak. (#12607)

segment.source: Error notifications can be enabled (advanced settings) when using any version of NVDA. (#12672)
segment.target: Obavijesti o pogrekama mogu biti ukljuene (napredne postavkew) kada se koristi bilo koja inaica NVDA. (#12672)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and later, NVDA will announce the suggestion count when entering search terms in apps such as Settings and Microsoft Store. (#7330, #12758, #12790)
segment.target: Pri koritenju Windowsa 10 i novijih inaica, NVDA e izgovarati broj sugestija prilikom upisivanja upita pretrage u programima poput postavki i Microsoft Storea. (#7330, #12758, #12790)

segment.source: Table navigation is now supported in grid controls created using the Out-GridView cmdlet in PowerShell. (#12928)
segment.target: Kretanje po tablicama je sada podrana u mreastim kontrolama koje su stvorene koristei Out-GridView cmdlet u PowerShellu. (#12928)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.51-dev commit `74068b91bcd578bd7030a7a6cde2085114b79b44`. (#12665)
segment.target: Espeak-ng je nadograen na inaicu 1.51-dev commit `74068b91bcd578bd7030a7a6cde2085114b79b44`. (#12665)

segment.source: NVDA will default to eSpeak if no installed OneCore voices support the NVDA preferred language. (#10451)
segment.target: NVDA e podrazumjevano koristiti eSpeak'ng ako ne postoji niti jedan OneCore glas koji podrava podrazumijevani jezik NVDA. (#10451)

segment.source: If OneCore voices consistently fail to speak, revert to eSpeak as a synthesizer. (#11544)
segment.target: Ako OneCore glasovi se ne uitavaju, koristit e se Espeak kao govorna jedinica. (#11544)

segment.source: When reading status bar with `NVDA+end`, the review cursor is no longer moved to its location.
segment.target: Prilikom itanja statusne trake koristei `NVDA+end`, pregledni kursor se nee pomicati na statusnu traku.

segment.source: If you need this functionality please assign a gesture to the appropriate script in the Object Navigation category in the Input Gestures dialog. (#8600)
segment.target: Ako vam je ta znaajka potrebna molimo dodijelite odgovarajui tipkovniki preac u kategoriji objektna navigacija u dijalokom okviru ulazne geste. (#8600)

segment.source: When opening a settings dialog which is already open, NVDA sets focus on the existing dialog rather than raise an error. (#5383)
segment.target: Prilikom otvaranja postavki koje su ve otvorene, NVDA e postaviti fokus na dijaloki okvir koji je ve otvoren to je bolje od prikazivanja pogreke. (#5383)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.19.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.19.0). (#12810)
segment.target: Nadograen liblouis brajini prevoditelj na inaicu [3.19.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.19.0). (#12810)

segment.source: New braille tables: Russian grade 1, Tshivenda grade 1, Tshivenda grade 2
segment.target: Nove brajine tablice: ruski kratkopis, Tshivenda puno pismo, Tshivenda kratkopis

segment.source: Instead of "marked content" or "mrkd", "highlight" or "hlght" will be announced for speech and braille respectively. (#12892)
segment.target: Umjesto "oznaeni sadraj" ili "mrkd", "istaknuto" ili "istk." biti e prikazano na brajinom retku. (#12892)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer attempt to exit when dialogs are awaiting a required action (eg Confirm/Cancel). (#12984)
segment.target: NVDA vie se nee pokuati iskljuiti kada se oekuje konkretna izvrena akcija u dijalokom okviru (eg Confirm/Cancel). (#12984)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke greaka

segment.source: Tracking keyboard modifiers (such as Control, or Insert) is more robust when watchdog is recovering. (#12609)
segment.target: Praenje modifikacijskih tipki poput tipaka Control, ili Insert je robusnije prilikom vraanja glavnih komponenti u radnu spremnost. (#12609)

segment.source: It is once again possible to check for NVDA updates on certain systems; e.g. clean Windows installs. (#12729)
segment.target: Sada je ponovno mogue provjeravati za nadogradnje na nekim verzijama operacijskog sustava Windows npr. na istim instalacijama operacijskog sustava Windows. (#12729)

segment.source: NVDA correctly announces blank table cells in Microsoft Word when using UI automation. (#11043)
segment.target: NVDA ispravno izgovara prazne elije tablice u Microsoft Wordu prilikom koritenja suelja UI automation. (#11043)

segment.source: In ARIA data grid cells on the web, the Escape key will now be passed through to the grid and no longer turn off focus mode unconditionally. (#12413)
segment.target: U ARIA elijama podatkovne tablice na web stranicama, tipka escape biti e preusmjerena na tablicu a nain fokusa se nee bezuvjetno iskljuiti. (#12413)

segment.source: When reading a header cell of a table in Chrome, fix the column name being announced twice. (#10840)
segment.target: Prilikom itanja zaglavlja elije tablice u Chromeu, ispravljeno je dvostruko itanje naziva stupca. (#10840)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports a numerical value for UIA sliders that have a textual representation of their value defined. (UIA ValuePattern is now preferred over RangeValuePattern). (#12724)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izgovara uzorak numerike vrijednosti za UIA klizae koji imaju definiranu svoju tekstualnu vrijednost. (UIA ValuePattern je preferiraniji od RangeValuePattern). (#12724)

segment.source: NVDA no longer treats the value of UIA sliders as always percentage based.
segment.target: NVDA vie ne tretira vrijednost UIA klizaa kao da su uvijek bazirani na postotcima.

segment.source: Reporting the location of a cell in Microsoft Excel when accessed via UI Automation again works correctly on Windows 11. (#12782)
segment.target: Izgovaranje pozicije elije u Microsoft Excelu kada se koristi suelje UI Automation ponovno ispravno radi u Windowsima 11. (#12782)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sets invalid Python locales. (#12753)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne postavlja netone python lokalizacije. (#12753)

segment.source: If a disabled addon is uninstalled and then re-installed it is re-enabled. (#12792)
segment.target: Ako je onemogueni dodatak deinstaliran a potom ponovno instaliran isti e ponovno biti omoguen. (#12792)

segment.source: Fixed bugs around updating and removing addons where the addon folder has been renamed or has files opened. (#12792, #12629)
segment.target: Ispravljene su pogreke vezane uz nadogradnju i deinstalaciju dodataka gdje je mapa dodatka preimenovana ili su datoteke bile otvorene. (#12792, #12629)

segment.source: When using UI Automation to access Microsoft Excel spreadsheet controls, NVDA no longer redundantly announces when a single cell is selected. (#12530)
segment.target: Prilikom koritenja suelja UI Automation za pristup Microsoft Excel kontrolama proraunskih tablica, NVDA vie ne izgovara izlina oznaavanja elija. (#12530)

segment.source: More dialog text is automatically read in LibreOffice Writer, such as in confirmation dialogs. (#11687)
segment.target: Vie tekstova dijalokih okvira sada e se itati u LibreOffice Writeru, poput dijalokih okvira potvrde. (#11687)

segment.source: Reading / navigating with browse mode in Microsoft Word via UI automation now ensures the document is always scrolled so that the current browse mode position is visible, and that the caret position in focus mode correctly reflects the browse mode position. (#9611)
segment.target: Kretanje po dokumentima u Microsoft Wordu koristei suelje UI automation sada provjerava vidljivost trenutne pozicije, te da pozicija dokumenta u nainu fokusa je istovjetna sa onom u nainu pregleda. (#9611)

segment.source: When performing Say all in Microsoft Word via UI automation, the document is now automatically scrolled, and the caret position is correctly updated. (#9611)
segment.target: Prilikom izvoenja preaca za itanje cijelog dokumenta u Microsoft Wordu koristei suelje UI automation, dokument se sada automatski prebacuje, i pozicija kursora sada se automatski osvjeava. (#9611)

segment.source: When reading emails in Outlook and NVDA is accessing the message with UI Automation, certain tables are now marked as layout tables, which means they will no longer be reported by default. (#11430)
segment.target: Prilikom itanja poruka elektronike pote u Outlooku kojima NVDA pristupa koristei suelje UI automation, neke vrste tablica sada se tretiraju kao tablice izgleda, to znai da se one nee podrazumjevano izgovarati. (#11430)

segment.source: A rare error when changing audio devices has been fixed. (#12620)
segment.target: Ispravljena je rijetka pogreka prilikom mijenjanja zvunih kartica. (#12620)

segment.source: Input with literary braille tables should behave more reliably when in edit fields. (#12667)
segment.target: Unos koristei literarne brajine tablice, odnosno tablice punog pisma sada bi trebao biti pouzdaniji prilikom upisivanja u poljima za ureivanje. (#12667)

segment.source: When navigating the Windows system tray calendar, NVDA now reports the day of the week in full. (#12757)
segment.target: Prilikom kretanja po kalendaru u podruju obavijesti, NVDA izgovara dan u tijednu u potpunosti. (#12757)

segment.source: When using a Chinese input method such as Taiwan - Microsoft Quick in Microsoft Word, scrolling the braille display forward and backward no longer incorrectly keeps jumping back to the original caret position. (#12855)
segment.target: Prilikom koritenja metoda unosa za kineski poput Tajvanski - Microsoft Quick u Microsoft Wordu, prebacivanje brajinog retka u naprijed ili nazad vie ne preskae neispravno nazad na na izvornu poziciju. (#12855)

segment.source: When accessing Microsoft Word documents via UIA, navigating by sentence (alt+downArrow / alt+upArrow) is again possible. (#9254)
segment.target: Prilikom pristupanja dokumentima u Microsoft Wordu uz pomo suelja UIA, sada je mogue ponovno kretati se po reenicama koristei preace alt+strelica dolje / alt+strelica gore. (#9254)

segment.source: When accessing MS Word with UIA, paragraph indenting is now reported. (#12899)
segment.target: Prilikom pristupa MS Wordu koristei UIA, sad se izgovaraju uvlaenja odlomaka. (#12899(

segment.source: When accessing MS Word with UIA, change tracking command and some other localized commands are now reported in Word . (#12904)
segment.target: Prilikom pristupa MS Wordu uz pomo UIA, preaci za praenje izmjena i drugi lokalizirani preaci sada se izgovaraju . (#12904)

segment.source: Fixed duplicate braille and speech when 'description' matches 'content' or 'name'. (#12888)
segment.target: Ispravljena pogreka dvostrukog izgovora i prikaza na brajinom redku kada se poklapao 'opis' sa 'sadrajem' ili 'nazivom'. (#12888)

segment.source: In MS Word with UIA enabled, more accurate playing of spelling error sounds as you type. (#12161)
segment.target: U MS Wordu sa ukljuenim UIA sueljem, sada se tonije reproduciraju zvukovi koji oznaavaju pravopisnu ili gramatiku pogreku prilikom pisanja. (#12161)

segment.source: In Windows 11, NVDA will no longer announce "pane" when pressing Alt+Tab to switch between programs. (#12648)
segment.target: U Windowsima 11, NVDA vie nee izgovarati "prozor" prilikom pritiska Alt+Tab kada se prebacujete izmeu programa. (#12648)

segment.source: The new Modern Comments side track pane is now supported in MS Word when not accessing the document via UIA. Press alt+f12 to move between the side track pane and the document. (#12982)
segment.target: Nova suvremena prozor-stranica za komentare sada je podrana u MS Wordu kada se dokumentu ne pristupa koristei UIA. Press alt+f12 to move between the side track pane and the document. (#12982)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Building NVDA now requires Visual Studio 2019 16.10.4 or later.
segment.target: Za izgradnju NVDA sada je potreban Visual Studio 2019 16.10.4 ili noviji.

segment.source: To match the production build environment, update Visual Studio to keep in sync with the [current version AppVeyor is using](https://www.appveyor.com/docs/windows-images-software/#visual-studio-2019). (#12728)
segment.target: Da biste odgovarali proizvodnom okruenju za meuverziju, aurirajte Visual Studio da bi bio sinkroniziran s [trenutnom verzijom koju koristi AppVeyor](https://www.appveyor.com/docs/windows-images-software/#visual-studio-2019). (#12728)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` has been deprecated for removal in 2022.1. (#12660)
segment.target: 'NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable' zastario je za uklanjanje u 2022.1. (#12660)

segment.source: Instead use `apiLevel` (see the comments at `_UIAConstants.WinConsoleAPILevel` for details).
segment.target: Umjesto toga upotrijebite 'apiLevel' (za detalje pogledajte komentare na '_UIAConstants.WinConsoleAPILevel').

segment.source: Transparency of text background color sourced from GDI applications (via the display model), is now exposed for add-ons or appModules. (#12658)
segment.target: Prozirnost boje pozadine teksta koja potjee iz GDI aplikacija (putem modela prikaza), sada je izloena za dodatke ili appModules. (#12658)

segment.source: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` and `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` are moved to the `LOCALE` enum in languageHandler.
segment.target: 'LOCALE_SLANGUAGE', 'LOCALE_SLIST' i 'LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME' premjetaju se u 'LOCALE' enum u languageHandleru.

segment.source: They are still available at the module level but are deprecated and to be removed in NVDA 2022.1. (#12753)
segment.target: I dalje su dostupni na razini modula, ali su zastarjeli i treba ih ukloniti u NVDA 2022.1. (#12753)

segment.source: The usage of functions `addonHandler.loadState` and `addonHandler.saveState` should be replaced with their equivalents `addonHandler.state.save` and `addonHandler.state.load` before 2022.1. (#12792)
segment.target: Koritenje funkcija 'addonHandler.loadState' i 'addonHandler.saveState' trebalo bi zamijeniti njihovim ekvivalentima 'addonHandler.state.save' i 'addonHandler.state.load' prije 2022.1. (#12792)

segment.source: Braille output can now be checked in system tests. (#12917)
segment.target: Izlaz Brailleovog pisma sada se moe provjeriti u testovima sustava. (#12917)

segment.source: This release introduces preliminary Windows 11 support.
segment.target: Ova inaica sadri ranu podrku za Windowse 11.

segment.source: While Windows 11 is yet to be released, this release has been tested on preview versions of Windows 11.
segment.target: Iako bi sustav Windows 11 tek trebao biti objavljen, ova je inaica NVDA testirana na predpreglednim inaicama operacijskog sustava Windows 11.

segment.source: This includes an important fix for Screen Curtain (see important notes).
segment.target: Ovo ukljuuje vanu ispravku za zaslonsku zavjesu (molimo pogledajte vana upozorenja).

segment.source: The COM Registration Fixing Tool can now resolve more problems when running NVDA.
segment.target: Alat za ispravljanje Com pogreaka sada moe ispraviti vie pogreaka kada je NVDA pokrenut.

segment.source: There are updates to the synthesizer eSpeak and braille translator LibLouis.
segment.target: Nadograeni su govorna jedinica eSpeak i brajini prevoditelj LibLouis.

segment.source: There are also various bug fixes and improvements, notably for braille support and Windows terminals, calculator, emoji panel and clipboard history.
segment.target: Ova inaica takoer dolazi sa jako puno poboljanja, od kojih su najvanija poboljanja podrke za brajicu i Windows terminalne programe, kalkulator, emoji panel i povijest meuspremnika.

segment.source: Important notes
segment.target: Vana upozorenja

segment.source: Due to a change in the Windows Magnification API, Screen Curtain had to be updated to support the newest versions of Windows.
segment.target: Zbog izmjena u Windows API-ju za uveavanje, funkcija zaslonske zavjese trebala je biti nadograena kako bi novije inaice operacijskog sustava Windows bile podrane.

segment.source: Use NVDA 2021.2 to activate Screen Curtain with Windows 10 21H2 (10.0.19044) or later.
segment.target: Kako biste koristili zaslonsku zavjesu, koristite NVDA 2021.2 sa Windowsima 10 21H2 (10.0.19044) iliji novije inaice operacijskog sustava.

segment.source: This includes Windows 10 Insiders and Windows 11.
segment.target: Ovo ukljuuje Windows 10 insidere i Windows 11.

segment.source: For security purposes, when using a new version of Windows, get visual confirmation that the Screen Curtain makes the screen entirely black.
segment.target: Iz sigurnosnih razloga, prilikom koritenja novije inaice operacijskog sustava Windows, provjerite radi li zaslonska zavjesa.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Experimental support for ARIA annotations:
segment.target: Eksperimentalna podrka Aria zabiljeki:

segment.source: adds a command to read a summary of details of an object with aria-details. (#12364)
segment.target: Dodaje preac za itanje detalja objekta koji sadri aria-details. (#12364)

segment.source: adds an option in advanced preferences to report if an object has details in browse mode. (#12439)
segment.target: Dodana opcija u naprednim postavkama za izvjetavanje o detaljima u nainu pregleda. (#12439)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Version 1909 and later (including Windows 11), NVDA will announce suggestion count when performing searches in File Explorer. (#10341, #12628)
segment.target: U Windowsima 10 verziji 1909 i novijim (ukljuujui Windows 11), NVDA e izgovarati broj prijedloga prilikom izvoenja pretrage u eksploreru za datoteke. (#10341, #12628)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now announces the result of indent and hanging indent shortcuts when executed. (#6269)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu, NVDA sada ita rezultat preaca za normalnu i viseu uvlaku pri izvravanju. (#6269)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.51-dev commit `ab11439b18238b7a08b965d1d5a6ef31cbb05cbb`. (#12449, #12202, #12280, #12568)
segment.target: Espeak-ng je nadograen na inaicu 1.51-dev commit `ab11439b18238b7a08b965d1d5a6ef31cbb05cbb`. (#12449, #12202, #12280, #12568)

segment.source: If article is enabled in the user preferences for document formatting, NVDA announces "article" after the content. (#11103)
segment.target: Ako je lanak ukljuen u korisnikim postavkama oblikovanja dokumenata, NVDA izgovara "lanak" poslje sadraja. (#11103)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.18.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.18.0). (#12526)
segment.target: Nadograen liblouis brajini prevoditelj na inaicu [3.18.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.18.0). (#12526)

segment.source: New braille tables: Bulgarian grade 1, Burmese grade 1, Burmese grade 2, Kazakh grade 1, Khmer grade 1, Northern Kurdish grade 0, Sepedi grade 1, Sepedi grade 2, Sesotho grade 1, Sesotho grade 2, Setswana grade 1, Setswana grade 2, Tatar grade 1, Vietnamese grade 0, Vietnamese grade 2, Southern Vietnamese grade 1, Xhosa grade 1, Xhosa grade 2, Yakut grade 1, Zulu grade 1, Zulu grade 2
segment.target: Nove brajine tablice: Bugarski puno pismo, Burmansko puno pismo, Burmanski kratkopis, Kazako puno pismo, Khmersko puno pismo, Sjevernokurdsko osnovno pismo, Sjeverni sotho puno pismo, Sjeverni sotho kratkopis, Juni sotho puno pismo, juni sotho kratkopis, Setswana puno pismo, Setswana kratkopis, tatarsko puno pismo, Vijetnamsko puno pismo, Vijetnamski kratkopis, Juni vijetnamski kratkopis, Xhosa puno pismo, Xhosa kratkopis, Jakutsko puno pismo, Zulu puno pismo, Zulu kratkopis

segment.source: Windows 10 OCR was renamed to Windows OCR. (#12690)
segment.target: Windows 10 OCR je preimenovan u Windows OCR. (#12690)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke greaka

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will announce calculator expressions on a braille display. (#12268)
segment.target: U Windows 10 kalkulatoru, NVDA e prikazivati izraze kalkulatora na brajinom redku. (#12268)

segment.source: In terminal programs on Windows 10 version 1607 and later, when inserting or deleting characters in the middle of a line, the characters to the right of the caret are no longer read out. (#3200)
segment.target: U programima terminala u Windowsima 10 inaica 1607 i novijim, prilikom umetanja ili brisanja teksta u sredini redka, znakovi desno od brisanog znaka nisu vie itani. (#3200)

segment.source: Diff Match Patch now enabled by default. (#12485)
segment.target: Diff Match Patch sada je ukljun podrazumijevano. (#12485)

segment.source: The braille input works properly with the following contracted tables: Arabic grade 2, Spanish grade 2, Urdu grade 2, Chinese (China, Mandarin) grade 2. (#12541)
segment.target: Unos brajinih znakova ponovno radi sa sljedeim tablicama: Arapski kratkopis, panjolski kratkopis, urdski kratkopis, Kineski (Kina, mandarinski) kratkopis. (#12541)

segment.source: The COM Registration Fixing Tool now resolves more issues, especially on 64 bit Windows. (#12560)
segment.target: Alat za ispravljanje pogreaka com registracija sada ispravlja vie pogreaka, posebno na 64-bitnim Windowsima. (#12560)

segment.source: Improvements to button handling for the Seika Notetaker braille device from Nippon Telesoft. (#12598)
segment.target: Ispravke upravljanja gumbima za Seika brajine biljenice braille tvrtke Nippon Telesoft. (#12598)

segment.source: Improvements to announcing the Windows emoji panel and clipboard history. (#11485)
segment.target: Unapreenja u itanju Windows panela emoji i povijesti meuspremnika. (#11485)

segment.source: Updated the Bengali alphabet character descriptions. (#12502)
segment.target: Nadograeni opisi znakova bengalske abecede. (#12502)

segment.source: NVDA exits safely when a new process is started. (#12605)
segment.target: NVDA izlazi sigurno kada se pokree novi proces. (#12605)

segment.source: Reselecting the Handy Tech braille display driver from the Select Braille Display dialog no longer causes errors. (#12618)
segment.target: Ponovno oznaavanje Handy Tech upravljakog progama za brajine redke iz dijalokog okvira odabira brajinog redka vie ne prouzrokuje greke. (#12618)

segment.source: Windows version 10.0.22000 or later is recognized as Windows 11, not Windows 10. (#12626)
segment.target: Inaice Windowsa 10.0.22000 ili novije sada se prepoznaju kao Windows 11, a ne kao Windows 10. (#12626)

segment.source: Screen curtain support has been fixed and tested for Windows versions up until 10.0.22000. (#12684)
segment.target: Ispravljena je podrka zaslonske zavjese te je ista testirana sa inaicama do 10.0.22000. (#12684)

segment.source: If no results are shown when filtering input gestures, the input gesture configuration dialog continues to work as expected. (#12673)
segment.target: Ako nema rezultata ulaznih gesti, dijaloki okvir konfiguracije i dalje radi kako je to oekivano. (#12673)

segment.source: Fixed a bug where the first menu item of a submenu is not announced in some contexts. (#12624)
segment.target: Ispravljena pogreka gdje je prva stavka izbornika nije izgovorena u nekim situacijama. (#12624)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` constants should be replaced using their equivalent `SymbolLevel.*` before 2022.1. (#11856, #12636)
segment.target: Konstante "characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*" trebalo bi zamijeniti njihovim ekvivalentom "SymbolLevel.*" prije 2022.1. (#11856, #12636)

segment.source: `controlTypes` has been split up into various submodules, symbols marked for deprecation must be replaced before 2022.1. (#12510)
segment.target: 'controlTypes' je podijeljen u razliite podmodule, simboli oznaeni za zastarjelo moraju se zamijeniti prije 2022.1. (#12510)

segment.source: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*` constants should be replaced to their equivalent `Role.*` and `State.*`.
segment.target: Konstante "ROLE_*" i "STATE_*" trebalo bi zamijeniti ekvivalentnim "Uloga.*" i "Drava.*".

segment.source: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` and `negativeStateLabels` have been deprecated, usages such as `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` should be replaced to their equivalent `Role.*.displayString` or `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.
segment.target: 'roleLabels', 'stateLabels' i 'negativeStateLabels' su zastarjeli, upotrebe kao to su 'roleLabels[ROLE_*]' trebale bi se zamijeniti njihovim ekvivalentom 'Role.*.displayString' ili 'State.*.negativeDisplayString'.

segment.source: `processPositiveStates` and `processNegativeStates` have been deprecated for removal.
segment.target: 'processPositiveStates' i 'processNegativeStates' su zastarjeli za uklanjanje.

segment.source: On Windows 10 Version 1511 and later (including Insider Preview builds), the current Windows feature update release name is obtained from Windows Registry. (#12509)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 10 verzije 1511 i novijim verzijama (ukljuujui meuverzije programa Insider Preview) naziv trenutnog izdanja auriranja znaajki sustava Windows dobiva se iz registra sustava Windows. (#12509)

segment.source: Deprecated: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` will be removed in 2022.1, there is no direct replacement. (#12544)
segment.target: Zastarjelo: 'winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS' bit e uklonjen 2022.1, nema izravne zamjene. (#12544)

segment.source: This release includes optional experimental support for UIA in Excel and Chromium browsers.
segment.target: Ova inaica sadri opcionalnu eksperimentalnu podrku za UIA u Excelu i preglednicima baziranima na Chromium platformi.

segment.source: There are fixes for several languages, and for accessing links in Braille.
segment.target: Dodane su ispravke za neke jezike, te je popravljen nain interakciej sa poveznicama koristei brajini redak.

segment.source: There are updates to Unicode CLDR, mathematical symbols, and LibLouis.
segment.target: Nadograeni su Unicode CLDR, matematiki simboli i LibLouis.

segment.source: As well as many bug fixes and improvements, including in Office, Visual Studio, and several languages.
segment.target: Kao i puno ispravaka greaka i unapreenja, ukljuujui ispravke greaka u Officeu, Visual Studio, te u nekim jezicima.

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: Upozorenje:

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Ova inaica zahtjeva nadogradnju na novije inaice dodataka.

segment.source: This release also drops support for Adobe Flash.
segment.target: Ova inaica takoer ukida podrku za tehnologiju Adobe flash.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Early support for UIA with Chromium based browsers (such as Edge). (#12025)
segment.target: Rana podrka za UIA u preglednicima baziranim na Chromium platformi. (such as Edge). (#12025)

segment.source: Optional experimental support for Microsoft Excel via UI Automation. Only recommended for Microsoft Excel build 16.0.13522.10000 or higher. (#12210)
segment.target: Rana eksperimentalna podrka za Microsoft Excel koristei UI Automation. Preporuuje se samo sa Microsoft Excel inaicom 16.0.13522.10000 ili novijom. (#12210)

segment.source: Easier navigation of output in NVDA Python Console. (#9784)
segment.target: Lake kretanje po rezultatima u NVDA Python konzoli. (#9784)

segment.source: alt+up/down jumps to the previous/next output result (add shift for selecting).
segment.target: alt+strelice gore/dolje skae na prethodni odnosno sljedei rezultat (add shift for selecting).

segment.source: control+l clears the output pane.
segment.target: control+l brie okno rezultata.

segment.source: NVDA now reports the categories assigned to an appointment in Microsoft Outlook, if any. (#11598)
segment.target: NVDA sada izgovara kategorije zadataka u Microsoft Outlooku, ako postoje. (#11598)

segment.source: Support for the Seika Notetaker braille display from Nippon Telesoft. (#11514)
segment.target: Podrka za Seika brajinu biljenicu tvrtke Nippon Telesoft. (#11514)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: In browse mode, controls can now be activated with braille cursor routing on their descriptor (ie. "lnk" for a link). This is especially useful for activating eg. check-boxes with no labels. (#7447)
segment.target: U modusu itanja, kontrole se mogu aktivirati uz pomo brajinog kursora koji se nalazi na opisu kontrole (na primjer. "pvz" za poveznicu). To je korisno za aktivaciju na primjer potvrdnih okvira bez oznaka. (#7447)

segment.source: NVDA now prevents the user from performing Windows 10 OCR if screen curtain is enabled. (#11911)
segment.target: NVDA sada sprjeava izvoenje prepoznavanja teksta uz pomo Windows 10 OCR, ako je zaslonska zavjesa ukljuena. (#11911)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) to 39.0. (#11943, #12314)
segment.target: Nadograen repozitorij zajednikih podataka o lokalizaciju (CLDR) na inaicu 39.0. (#11943)

segment.source: Added more mathematical symbols to the symbols dictionary. (#11467)
segment.target: Dodano vie matematikih simbola u rjenik simbola. (#11467)

segment.source: The user guide, changes file, and key commands listing now have a refreshed appearance. (#12027)
segment.target: Vodi za korisnike, datoteka sa popisom izmjena, i popis tipkovnikih preaca sada imaju osvjeen izgled. (#12027)

segment.source: "Unsupported" now reported when attempting to toggle screen layout in applications that do not support it, such as Microsoft Word. (#7297)
segment.target: Sada NVDA izgovara"nije podrano" prilikom pokuaja izmjene izgleda u aplikacijama koje to ne podravaju, kao to je to Microsoft Word. (#7297)

segment.source: 'Attempt to cancel speech for expired focus events' option in the advanced settings panel now enabled by default. (#10885)
segment.target: 'Pokuaj ignoriranja dogaaja govora koji su istekli' u naprednom panelu postavki je sada podrazumjevano omoguena. (#10885)

segment.source: This behaviour can be disabled by setting this option to "No".
segment.target: Ta se opcija moe onemoguiti tako da se vrijednost postavi na "Ne".

segment.source: Web applications (E.G. Gmail) no longer speak outdated information when moving focus rapidly.
segment.target: Web aplikacije (npr. Gmail) vie ne izgovaraju informacije koje su istekle pri brzom premjetanju fokusa.

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.17.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.17.0). (#12137)
segment.target: Nadograen Liblouis brajini prevoditelj na inaicu [3.17.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.17.0). (#12137)

segment.source: New braille tables: Belarusian literary braille, Belarusian computer braille, Urdu grade 1, Urdu grade 2.
segment.target: Nove brajine tablice: bjeloruska literarna brajica, bjeloruska kompjutorska brajica, Urdsko puno pismo, urdski kratkopis.

segment.source: Support for Adobe Flash content has been removed from NVDA due to the use of Flash being actively discouraged by Adobe. (#11131)
segment.target: Podrka za Flash sadraj je uklonjena iz NVDA zbog toga to Adobe ne preporuuje koritenje te tehnologije. (#11131)

segment.source: NVDA will exit even with windows still open, the exit process now closes all NVDA windows and dialogs. (#1740)
segment.target: NVDA e se iskljuiti ak iako su prozori otvoreni, u procesu izlazka iz NVDA zatvaraju se svi prozori NVDA sa njihovim pripadajuim dijalokim okvirima. (#1740)

segment.source: The Speech Viewer can now be closed with `alt+F4` and has a standard close button for easier interaction with users of pointing devices. (#12330)
segment.target: Preglednik govora moe biti zatvoren uz pomo `alt+F4` te sadri gumb zatvori za laku interakciju sa pokazivakim ureajima. (#12330)

segment.source: The Braille Viewer now has a standard close button for easier interaction with users of pointing devices. (#12328)
segment.target: Preglednik brajice sada posjeduje standardnu tipku zatvori za laku interakciju sa pokazivakim ureajima. (#12328)

segment.source: In the Elements List dialog, the accelerator key on the "Activate" button has been removed in some locales to avoid collision with an element type radio button label. When available, the button is still the default of the dialog and as such can still be invoked by simply pressing enter from the elements list itself. (#6167)
segment.target: U popisu elemenata, preac na gumbu "aktiviraj" je uklonjen kako bise izbjegle kolizije za neke jezike sa oznakom izbornog gumba tip elementa. Kada je dostupan, gumb je podrazumjevani u dijalokom okviru i kao takav se moe aktivirati jednostavnim pritiskom tipke enter iz samog popisa elemenata. (#6167)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke greaka

segment.source: The list of messages in Outlook 2010 is once again readable. (#12241)
segment.target: Popis poruka u Outlooku 2010 je ponovno itljiv. (#12241)

segment.source: In terminal programs on Windows 10 version 1607 and later, when inserting or deleting characters in the middle of a line, the characters to the right of the caret are no longer read out. (#3200)
segment.target: U terminalnim programima u Windows 10 inaici 1607 i novijim, prilikom umetanja ili brisanja znakova usred redka, znakovi sa desne strane se vie ne itaju. (#3200)

segment.source: This experimental fix must be manually enabled in NVDA's advanced settings panel by changing the diff algorithm to Diff Match Patch.
segment.target: Ova ispravka treba biti runo ukljuena u naprednim korisnicima NVDA tako da se promjeni nain itanja izmjena u terminalnih programima na Diff Match Patch.

segment.source: In MS Outlook, inappropriate distance reporting when shift+tabbing from the message body to the subject field should not occur anymore. (#10254)
segment.target: U MS Outlooku, nepotrebno izgovaranje daljine prilikom prelazka iz polja za ureivanje poruke u u polje za upisivanje naslova vie se ne bi smjelo dogaati. (#10254)

segment.source: In the Python Console, inserting a tab for indentation at the beginning of a non-empty input line and performing tab-completion in the middle of an input line are now supported. (#11532)
segment.target: U Python konzoli, sada je podrano unoenje znaka znaka tab za uvlaenje redka, i automatsko dovravanje. (#11532)

segment.source: Formatting information and other browseable messages no longer present unexpected blank lines when screen layout is turned off. (#12004)
segment.target: Informacije o oblikovanju teksta i druge poruke u modusu itanja vie ne pokazuju neoekivane prazne redke kada se iskljui izlged ekrana. (#12004)

segment.source: It is now possible to read comments in MS Word with UIA enabled. (#9285)
segment.target: Sada je mogue proitati komentare u MS Wordu sa ukljuenom podrkom za UIA. (#9285)

segment.source: Performance when interacting with Visual Studio has been improved. (#12171)
segment.target: Unapreene su performanse prilikom interakcije sa Visual studio. (#12171)

segment.source: Fix graphical bugs such as missing elements when using NVDA with a right-to-left layout. (#8859)
segment.target: Ispravljene su grafike pogreke kao to su to na primjer izostavljeni elementi kada se NVDA koristi sa jezikom koji se pie s desna na lijevo. (#8859)

segment.source: Respect the GUI layout direction based on the NVDA language, not the system locale. (#638)
segment.target: Potuje se izgled prozora i njegov smjer baziran na jeziku NVDA, umjesto na jeziku sustava. (#638)

segment.source: known issue for right-to-left languages: the right border of groupings clips with labels/controls. (#12181)
segment.target: Poznata pogreka za jezike koji su pisani s desna na lijevo: desni graninik grupiranja poklapa se sa oznakama/kontrolama. (#12181)

segment.source: The python locale is set to match the language selected in preferences consistently, and will occur when using the default language. (#12214)
segment.target: Jezik pythona sada potuje jezik namjeten u postavkama, te e se isti koristiti prilikom koritenja podrazumjevanog jezika sustava. (#12214)

segment.source: TextInfo.getTextInChunks no longer freezes when called on Rich Edit controls such as the NVDA log viewer. (#11613)
segment.target: TextInfo.getTextInChunks vie se ne rui kada se poziva na kontrolu obogaenog teksta kao to je to NVAD preglednik zapisnika. (#11613)

segment.source: It is once again possible to use NVDA in languages containing underscores in the locale name such as de_CH on Windows 10 1803 and 1809. (#12250)
segment.target: Sada je ponovno mogue koristiti NVDA sa jezicima koji u sebi sadre znak podvlaka u nazivu jezika kao na primjer de_CH u verzijama operacijskog sustava Windows 10 1803 i 1809. (#12250)

segment.source: In WordPad, configuration of superscript/subscript reporting works as expected. (#12262)
segment.target: U WordPadu, podeavanje izgovora indeksa i eksponenata radi kao to je to i oekivano. (#12262)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce the newly focused content on a web page if the old focus disappears and is replaced by the new focus in the same position. (#12147)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne neuspijeva izgovoriti novofokusirani sadraj na web stranici ako stari fokus nestane i bude zamijenjen novim u na toj istoj poziciji. (#12147)

segment.source: Strikethrough, superscript and subscript formatting for entire Excel cells are now reported if the corresponding option is enabled. (#12264)
segment.target: Podcrtano, eksponent i indeks sada se izgovaraju za cijele elije u Excelu ako je odgovarajua opcija ukljuena. (#12264)

segment.source: Fixed copying config during installation from a portable copy when default destination config directory is empty. (#12071, #12205)
segment.target: Ispravljeno je kopiranje konfiguracije tijekom instalacije iz prijenosne kopije kada je odredina putanja prazna. (#12071, #12205)

segment.source: Fixed incorrect announcement of some letters with accents or diacritic when 'Say cap before capitals' option is checked. (#11948)
segment.target: Ispravljen je neispravan izgovor nekih slova sa akcentima ili dijakritikih znakova kada je opcija 'izgovori veliko prije velikih slova' ukljuena. (#11948)

segment.source: Fixed the pitch change failure in SAPI4 speech synthesizer. (#12311)
segment.target: Ispravljena je nemogunost izmjene visine pri pisanju velikih slova koristei SAPI4 govornu jedinicu. (#12311)

segment.source: The NVDA installer now also honors the `--minimal` command line parameter and does not play the start-up sound, following the same documented behavior as an installed or portable copy NVDA executable. (#12289)
segment.target: Instalacijski program NVDA sada takoer potuje `--minimal` opciju naredbenog redka te ne reproducira zvuk pokretanja, ponaajui se kao prijenosna kopija NVDA izvrne datoteke. (#12289)

segment.source: In MS Word or Outlook, the table quick navigation key can now jump to layout table if "Include layout tables" option is enabled in Browse mode settings. (#11899)
segment.target: U MS Wordu ili Outlooku, tipke za kretanje poi tablicama sada mogu se koristiti za kretanej po tablicama izgleda ako ej opcija "ukljui tablce izgleda" ukljuena u postavkama modusa itanja. (#11899)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce "" for emojis in particular languages. (#11963)
segment.target: vie nee izgovarati "" za emoji znakove u odreenim jezicima. (#11963)

segment.source: Espeak now supports Cantonese and Mandarin again. (#10418)
segment.target: Espeak sada podrava kantonski i mandarinski kineski. (#10418)

segment.source: In the new Chromium based Microsoft Edge, text fields such as the address bar are now announced when empty. (#12474)
segment.target: U novom Microsoft Edge pregledniku baziranom na Chromium platformi, tekstualna polja poput adresne trake sada se izgovaraju kada su prazna. (#12474)

segment.source: Fix Seika Braille driver. (#10787)
segment.target: Ispravljen upravljaki program za Seika brajine redke. (#10787)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release. Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Napomena: ovo je izdanje koje kri kompatibilnost dodatnog API-ja. Dodatke e trebati ponovno testirati i aurirati njihov manifest.

segment.source: NVDA's build system now fetches all Python dependencies with pip and stores them in a Python virtual environment. This is all done transparently.
