segment.target: NVDA-in sustav izrade sada dohvaa sve Python ovisnosti s pip-om i pohranjuje ih u Python virtualno okruenje. Sve se to radi transparentno.

segment.source: To build NVDA, SCons should continue to be used in the usual way. E.g. executing scons.bat in the root of the repository. Running `py -m SCons` is no longer supported, and `scons.py` has also been removed.
segment.target: Za izgradnju NVDA-a, SConi bi se trebali nastaviti koristiti na uobiajeni nain. Npr. izvravanje scons.bat u korijenu repozitorija. Pokretanje 'py -m SCons' vie nije podrano, a 'scons.py' je takoer uklonjeno.

segment.source: To run NVDA from source, rather than executing `source/nvda.pyw` directly, the developer should now use `runnvda.bat` in the root of the repository. If you do try to execute `source/nvda.pyw`, a message box will alert you this is no longer supported.
segment.target: Za pokretanje NVDA iz izvora, umjesto izravnog izvravanja 'source/nvda.pyw', programer bi sada trebao koristiti 'runnvda.bat' u korijenu repozitorija. Ako pokuate izvriti 'source/nvda.pyw', okvir s porukom e vas upozoriti da vie nije podran.

segment.source: To perform unit tests, execute `rununittests.bat [<extra unittest discover options>]`
segment.target: To perform unit tests, execute `rununittests.bat [<extra unittest discover options>]`

segment.source: To perform system tests: execute `runsystemtests.bat [<extra robot options>]`
segment.target: To perform system tests: execute `runsystemtests.bat [<extra robot options>]`

segment.source: To perform linting, execute `runlint.bat <base branch>`
segment.target: To perform linting, execute `runlint.bat <base branch>`

segment.source: Please refer to readme.md for more details.
segment.target: Za vie detalja pogledajte readme.md.

segment.source: The following Python dependencies have also been upgraded:
segment.target: Sljedee Python ovisnosti takoer su nadograene:

segment.source: comtypes updated to 1.1.8.
segment.target: Komtipovi aurirani na 1.1.8.

segment.source: pySerial updated to 3.5.
segment.target: pySerial auriran na 3.5.

segment.source: wxPython updated to 4.1.1.
segment.target: wxPython auriran na 4.1.1.

segment.source: Py2exe updated to 0.10.1.0.
segment.target: Py2exe auriran na 0.10.1.0.

segment.source: `LiveText._getTextLines` has been removed. (#11639)
segment.target: 'LiveText._getTextLines' je uklonjeno. (#11639)

segment.source: Instead, override `_getText` which returns a string of all text in the object.
segment.target: Umjesto toga, nadjaajte '_getText' koji vraa niz svih tekstova u objektu.

segment.source: `LiveText` objects can now calculate diffs by character. (#11639)
segment.target: Objekti 'LiveText' sada mogu izraunati razlike po znaku. (#11639)

segment.source: To alter the diff behaviour for some object, override the `diffAlgo` property (see the docstring for details).
segment.target: Da biste promijenili ponaanje diff za neki objekt, nadjaajte svojstvo 'diffAlgo' (pogledajte docstring za detalje).

segment.source: When defining a script with the script decorator, the 'allowInSleepMode' boolean argument can be specified to control if a script is available in sleep mode or not. (#11979)
segment.target: Kada definirate skriptu pomou dekoratora skripte, moe se navesti logiki argument 'allowInSleepMode' kako bi se kontroliralo je li skripta dostupna u stanju mirovanja ili ne. (#11979)

segment.source: The following functions are removed from the config module. (#11935)
segment.target: Sljedee funkcije su uklonjene iz konfiguracijskog modula. (#11935)

segment.source: canStartOnSecureScreens - use config.isInstalledCopy instead.
segment.target: canStartOnSecureScreens - umjesto toga koristite config.isInstalledCopy.

segment.source: hasUiAccess and execElevated - use them from the systemUtils module.
segment.target: hasUiAccess i execElevated - koristite ih iz modula systemUtils.

segment.source: getConfigDirs - use globalVars.appArgs.configPath instead.
segment.target: getConfigDirs - umjesto toga koristite globalVars.appArgs.configPath.

segment.source: Module level REASON_* constants are removed from controlTypes - please use controlTypes.OutputReason instead. (#11969)
segment.target: Konstante REASON_* razine modula uklanjaju se iz controlTypes umjesto toga koristite controlTypes.OutputReason. (#11969)

segment.source: REASON_QUICKNAV has been removed from browseMode - use controlTypes.OutputReason.QUICKNAV instead. (#11969)
segment.target: REASON_QUICKNAV je uklonjen iz browseMode umjesto toga upotrijebite controlTypes.OutputReason.QUICKNAV. (#11969)

segment.source: `NVDAObject` (and derivatives) property `isCurrent` now strictly returns Enum class `controlTypes.IsCurrent`. (#11782)
segment.target: 'NVDAObject' (i izvedenice) svojstvo 'isCurrent' sada strogo vraa klasu Enum 'controlTypes.IsCurrent'. (#11782)

segment.source: `isCurrent` is no longer Optional, and thus will not return None.
segment.target: 'isCurrent' vie nije Optional i stoga nee vratiti None.

segment.source: When an object is not current `controlTypes.IsCurrent.NO` is returned.
segment.target: Kada objekt nije aktualan, vraa se 'controlTypes.IsCurrent.NO'.

segment.source: The `controlTypes.isCurrentLabels` mapping has been removed. (#11782)
segment.target: Mapiranje 'controlTypes.isCurrentLabels' je uklonjeno. (#11782)

segment.source: Instead use the `displayString` property on a `controlTypes.IsCurrent` enum value.
segment.target: Umjesto toga, upotrijebite svojstvo 'displayString' na vrijednosti enuma 'controlTypes.IsCurrent'.

segment.source: For example: `controlTypes.IsCurrent.YES.displayString`.
segment.target: Na primjer: 'controlTypes.IsCurrent.YES.displayString'.

segment.source: `winKernel.GetTimeFormat` has been removed - use `winKernel.GetTimeFormatEx` instead. (#12139)
segment.target: 'winKernel.GetTimeFormat' je uklonjen - umjesto toga koristite 'winKernel.GetTimeFormatEx'. (#12139)

segment.source: `winKernel.GetDateFormat` has been removed - use `winKernel.GetDateFormatEx` instead. (#12139)
segment.target: 'winKernel.GetDateFormat' je uklonjen - umjesto toga koristite 'winKernel.GetDateFormatEx'. (#12139)

segment.source: `gui.DriverSettingsMixin` has been removed - use `gui.AutoSettingsMixin`. (#12144)
segment.target: 'Gui. DriverSettingsMixin' je uklonjen - koristite 'gui. AutoSettingsMixin'. (#12144)

segment.source: `speech.getSpeechForSpelling` has been removed - use `speech.getSpellingSpeech`. (#12145)
segment.target: 'speech.getSpeechForSpelling' je uklonjen - koristite 'speech.getSpellingSpeech'. (#12145)

segment.source: Commands cannot be directly imported from speech as `import speech; speech.ExampleCommand()` or `import speech.manager; speech.manager.ExampleCommand()` - use `from speech.commands import ExampleCommand` instead. (#12126)
segment.target: Naredbe se ne mogu izravno uvesti iz govora kao 'uvoz govora; govor. ExampleCommand()' ili 'uvoz speech.manager; speech.manager.ExampleCommand()' - umjesto toga upotrijebite 'from speech.commands import ExampleCommand'. (#12126)

segment.source: `speakTextInfo` will no longer send speech through `speakWithoutPauses` if reason is `SAYALL`, as `SayAllHandler` does this manually now. (#12150)
segment.target: 'speakTextInfo' vie nee slati govor putem 'speakWithoutPauses' ako je razlog 'SAYALL', jer 'SayAllHandler' to sada radi runo. (#12150)

segment.source: The `synthDriverHandler` module is no longer star imported into `globalCommands` and `gui.settingsDialogs` - use `from synthDriverHandler import synthFunctionExample` instead. (#12172)
segment.target: Modul 'synthDriverHandler' vie nije uvezen zvjezdicom u 'globalCommands' i 'gui.settingsDialogs' - umjesto toga koristite 'from synthDriverHandler import synthFunctionExample'. (#12172)

segment.source: `ROLE_EQUATION` has been removed from controlTypes - use `ROLE_MATH` instead. (#12164)
segment.target: 'ROLE_EQUATION' je uklonjen iz controlTypes - umjesto toga koristite 'ROLE_MATH'. (#12164)

segment.source: `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting` classes are removed from `driverHandler` - please use them from `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting`. (#12168)
segment.target: Klase 'autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting' uklonjene su iz 'driverHandler' - koristite ih iz 'autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting'. (#12168)

segment.source: `autoSettingsUtils.utils` classes are removed from `driverHandler` - please use them from `autoSettingsUtils.utils`. (#12168)
segment.target: Klase 'autoSettingsUtils.utils' uklonjene su iz 'driverHandler' - koristite ih iz 'autoSettingsUtils.utils'. (#12168)

segment.source: Support of `TextInfo`s that do not inherit from `contentRecog.BaseContentRecogTextInfo` is removed. (#12157)
segment.target: Podrka za 'TextInfo's koji ne nasljeuju od 'contentRecog.BaseContentRecogTextInfo' je uklonjena. (#12157)

segment.source: `speech.speakWithoutPauses` has been removed - please use `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses(speakFunc=speech.speak).speakWithoutPauses` instead. (#12195, #12251)
segment.target: 'speech.speakWithoutPauses' je uklonjen - umjesto toga koristite 'speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses(speakFunc=speech.speak).speakWithoutPauses'. (#12195, #12251)

segment.source: `speech.re_last_pause` has been removed - please use `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses.re_last_pause` instead. (#12195, #12251)
segment.target: 'speech.re_last_pause' je uklonjeno - umjesto toga koristite 'speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses.re_last_pause'. (#12195, #12251)

segment.source: `WelcomeDialog`, `LauncherDialog` and `AskAllowUsageStatsDialog` are moved to the `gui.startupDialogs`. (#12105)
segment.target: 'WelcomeDialog', 'LauncherDialog' i 'AskAllowUsageStatsDialog' premjeteni su u 'gui.startupDialogs'. (#12105)

segment.source: `getDocFilePath` has been moved from `gui` to the `documentationUtils` module. (#12105)
segment.target: 'getDocFilePath' je premjeten iz 'gui' u modul 'documentationUtils'. (#12105)

segment.source: The gui.accPropServer module as well as the AccPropertyOverride and ListCtrlAccPropServer classes from the gui.nvdaControls module have been removed in favor of WX native support for overriding accessibility properties. When enhancing accessibility of WX controls, implement wx.Accessible instead. (#12215)
segment.target: Modul gui.accPropServer kao i klase AccPropertyOverride i ListCtrlAccPropServer iz modula gui.nvdaControls uklonjeni su u korist WX izvorne podrke za nadjaavanje svojstava pristupanosti. Kada poboljavate pristupanost WX kontrola, implementirajte wx. Umjesto toga pristupaan. (#12215)

segment.source: Files in `source/comInterfaces/` are now more easily consumable by developer tools such as IDEs. (#12201)
segment.target: Datoteke u 'source/comInterfaces/' sada se lake koriste alatima za razvojne programere kao to su IDE. (#12201)

segment.source: Convenience methods and types have been added to the winVersion module for getting and comparing Windows versions. (#11909)
segment.target: Praktine metode i vrste dodane su u winVersion modul za dohvaanje i usporedbu verzija sustava Windows. (#11909)

segment.source: isWin10 function found in winVersion module has been removed.
segment.target: isWin10 funkcija pronaena u winVersion modulu je uklonjena.

segment.source: class winVersion.WinVersion is a comparable and order-able type encapsulating Windows version information.
segment.target: class winVersion.WinVersion je usporediv tip koji se moe naruiti koji obuhvaa informacije o verziji sustava Windows.

segment.source: Function winVersion.getWinVer has been added to get a winVersion.WinVersion representing the currently running OS.
segment.target: Dodana je funkcija winVersion.getWinVer kako bi se dobila winVersion.WinVersion koja predstavlja trenutno pokrenuti OS.

segment.source: Convenience constants have been added for known Windows releases, see winVersion.WIN* constants.
segment.target: Za poznata izdanja sustava Windows dodane su konstante praktinosti, pogledajte konstante winVersion.WIN*.

segment.source: IAccessibleHandler no longer star imports everything from IAccessible and IA2 COM interfaces - please use them directly. (#12232)
segment.target: IAccessibleHandler vie ne uvozi sve iz IAccessible i IA2 COM suelja - koristite ih izravno. (#12232)

segment.source: TextInfo objects now have start and end properties which can be compared mathematically with operators such as < <= == != >= >. (#11613)
segment.target: TextInfo objects now have start and end properties which can be compared mathematically with operators such as < <= == != >= >. (#11613)

segment.source: E.g. ti1.start <= ti2.end
segment.target: E.g. ti1.start <= ti2.end

segment.source: This usage is now prefered instead of ti1.compareEndPoints(ti2,"startToEnd") <= 0
segment.target: This usage is now prefered instead of ti1.compareEndPoints(ti2,"startToEnd") <= 0

segment.source: TextInfo start and end properties can also be set to each other. (#11613)
segment.target: Poetna i zavrna svojstva TextInfo takoer se mogu meusobno postaviti. (#11613)

segment.source: E.g. ti1.start = ti2.end
segment.target: Npr. ti1.start = ti2.kraj

segment.source: This usage is prefered instead of ti1.SetEndPoint(ti2,"startToEnd")
segment.target: Ova upotreba je poeljnija umjesto ti1. SetEndPoint(ti2;"startToEnd")

segment.source: `wx.CENTRE_ON_SCREEN` and `wx.CENTER_ON_SCREEN` are removed, use `self.CentreOnScreen()` instead. (#12309)
segment.target: 'wx. CENTRE_ON_SCREEN' i 'wx. CENTER_ON_SCREEN' su uklonjeni, koristite 'self. CentreOnScreen()'. (#12309)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.isSupported` has been removed, NVDA only supports versions of Windows where this evaluates to `True`. (#12222)
segment.target: 'easeOfAccess.isSupported' je uklonjen, NVDA podrava samo verzije Windowsa za koje se to procjenjuje kao 'True'. (#12222)

segment.source: `sayAllHandler` has been moved to `speech.sayAll`. (#12251)
segment.target: 'sayAllHandler' je premjeten u 'speech.sayAll'. (#12251)

segment.source: `speech.sayAll.SayAllHandler` exposes the functions `stop`, `isRunning`, `readObjects`, `readText`, `lastSayAllMode`.
segment.target: 'speech.sayAll.SayAllHandler' izlae funkcije 'stop', 'isRunning', 'readObjects', 'readText', 'lastSayAllMode'.

segment.source: `SayAllHandler.stop` also resets the `SayAllHandler` `SpeechWithoutPauses` instance.
segment.target: 'SayAllHandler.stop' takoer resetira instancu 'SayAllHandler' 'SpeechWithoutPauses'.

segment.source: `CURSOR_REVIEW` and `CURSOR_CARET` has been replaced with `CURSOR.REVIEW` and `CURSOR.CARET`.
segment.target: "CURSOR_REVIEW" i "CURSOR_CARET" zamjenjuju se slovima "CURSOR. RECENZIJA' i 'KURSOR. KARET'.

segment.source: `speech.SpeechWithoutPauses` has been moved to `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses`. (#12251)
segment.target: 'govor. SpeechWithoutPauses' je premjeten u 'speech.speechWithout Pauses.SpeechWithoutPauses'. (#12251)

segment.source: `speech.curWordChars` has been renamed `speech._curWordChars`. (#12395)
segment.target: 'speech.curWordChars' je preimenovan u 'speech._curWordChars'. (#12395)

segment.source: the following have been removed from `speech` and can be accessed through `speech.getState()`. These are readonly values now. (#12395)
segment.target: sljedee je uklonjeno iz 'speech' i moe im se pristupiti putem 'speech.getState()'. To su sada vrijednosti samo za itanje. (#12395)

segment.source: speechMode
segment.target: speechMode

segment.source: speechMode_beeps_ms
segment.target: speechMode_beeps_ms

segment.source: beenCanceled
segment.target: bio je otkazan

segment.source: isPaused
segment.target: isPauzirano

segment.source: to update `speech.speechMode` use `speech.setSpeechMode`. (#12395)
segment.target: Da biste aurirali 'speech.speechMode', upotrijebite 'speech.setSpeechMode'. (#12395)

segment.source: the following have been moved to `speech.SpeechMode`. (#12395)
segment.target: Sljedee je premjeteno u 'Govor. SpeechMode'. (#12395)

segment.source: `speech.speechMode_off` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.off`
segment.target: 'speech.speechMode_off' postaje 'govor. SpeechMode.off'

segment.source: `speech.speechMode_beeps` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.beeps`
segment.target: 'speech.speechMode_beeps' postaje 'govor. SpeechMode.bieps'

segment.source: `speech.speechMode_talk` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.talk`
segment.target: 'speech.speechMode_talk' postaje 'govor. SpeechMode.talk'

segment.source: `IAccessibleHandler.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType` is now `IAccessibleHandler.types.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType`. (#12367)
segment.target: 'IAccessibleHandler.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType' sada je 'IAccessibleHandler.types.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType'. (#12367)

segment.source: The following in `NVDAObjects.UIA.WinConsoleUIA` have been changed (#12094)
segment.target: Sljedee u 'NVDAObjects.UIA.WinConsoleUIA' je promijenjeno (#12094)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.is21H1Plus` renamed `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable`.
segment.target: 'NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.is21H1Plus' preimenovan 'NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable'.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfo` renamed to start class name with upper case.
segment.target: 'NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfo' preimenovan je u poetni naziv klase velikim slovima.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfoPre21H1` renamed `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.ConsoleUIATextInfoWorkaroundEndInclusive`
segment.target: 'NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfoPre21H1' preimenovan 'NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.ConsoleUIATextInfoWorkaroundEndInclusive'

segment.source: The implementation works around both end points being inclusive (in text ranges) before [microsoft/terminal PR 4018](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/4018)
segment.target: Implementacija radi oko obje krajnje toke koje su inkluzivne (u rasponima teksta) prije [microsoft/terminal PR 4018](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/4018)

segment.source: Workarounds for `expand`, `collapse`, `compareEndPoints`, `setEndPoint`, etc
segment.target: Zaobilazna rjeenja za 'expand', 'collapse', 'compareEndPoints', 'setEndPoint' itd

segment.source: This release includes new Chinese Input methods, an update to Liblouis and the elements list (NVDA+f7) now works in focus mode.
segment.target: Ova inaica ukljuuje novu metodu unosa za kineski, nadogradnja Liblouisa te popis elemenata (NVDA+f7) u modusu fokusa.

segment.source: Context sensitive help is now available when pressing F1 in NVDA dialogs.
segment.target: Kontekstualna pomo od sada je dostupna prilikom pritiska F1 u NVDA dijalokim okvirima.

segment.source: Improvements to symbol pronunciation rules, speech dictionary, Braille message and skim reading.
segment.target: Unapreenje pravila itanja simbola, govornih rjenika, brajinih poruka i letiminog itanja.

segment.source: Bug fixes and improvements to Mail, Outlook, Teams, Visual Studio, Azure Data Studio, Foobar2000.
segment.target: Ispravke greaka i unapreenja za Mail u windowsima 10, outlook, Teams, Visual Studio, Azure Data Studio, Foobar2000.

segment.source: On the web, there are improvements to Google Docs, and greater support for ARIA.
segment.target: Na web stranicama, unapreenja u Google docs, i vea podrka za ARIA.

segment.source: Plus many other important bug fixes and improvements.
segment.target: Te puno drugih vanih ispravaka greaka i unapreenja.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Pressing F1 inside NVDA dialogs will now open the help file to most relevant section. (#7757)
segment.target: Pritiskom tipkovnikog preaca f1 u dijalokim okvirima, otvorit e se dio dokumentacije za za odreeni dijaloki okvir. (#7757)

segment.source: Support for auto complete suggestions (IntelliSense) in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio plus Visual Studio 2017 and higher. (#7504)
segment.target: Podrka samodovravanja (IntelliSense) u Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio i Visual Studio 2017 i novijim inaicama. (#7504)

segment.source: Symbol pronunciation: Support for grouping in a complex symbol definition and support group references in a replacement rule making them simpler and more powerful. (#11107)
segment.target: Izgovor simbola i interpunkcije: podrka grupiranja u definiciji kompleksnih simbola te podrka za grupne reference u zamjenama inei ih tako jednostavnijim i monijim alatom. (#11107)

segment.source: Users are now notified when attempting to create Speech Dictionary entries with invalid regular expression substitutions. (#11407)
segment.target: Od sada se korisnik obavjetava prilikom pokuaja stvaranja zapisa sa netonom zamjenom regularnog izraza. (#11407)

segment.source: Specifically grouping errors are now detected.
segment.target: Tonije otkrivaju se greke prilikom grupiranja.

segment.source: Added support for the new chinese Traditional Quick and Pinyin Input methods in Windows 10. (#11562)
segment.target: Dodana podrka za nove metode unosa Kineski tradicionalni Quick i Pinyin U Windowsima 10. (#11562)

segment.source: Tab headers are now considered form fields with quick navigation f key. (#10432)
segment.target: Zaglavlje kartica od sada se tretiraju kao formulari po kojima se moe kretati uz pomo preaca "f" za brzu navigaciju. (#10432)

segment.source: Added a command to toggle reporting of marked (highlighted) text; There is no default associated gesture. (#11807)
segment.target: Dodan preac za ukljuivanje ili iskljuivanje oznaenog (istaknutog) teksta; Ne postoji podrazumjevana pridjeljena gesta. (#11807)

segment.source: Added the --copy-portable-config command line parameter that allows you to automatically copy the provided configuration to the user account when silently installing NVDA. (#9676)
segment.target: Dodan parametar --copy-portable-config koji omoguuje kopiranje konfiguracije u NVDA prijenosnu kopiju. (#9676)

segment.source: Braille routing is now supported with the Braille Viewer for mouse users, hover to route to a braille cell. (#11804)
segment.target: Za korisnike mia koji koriste brajini preglednik, od sada su dostupne virtualne routing tipke, prijeite preko elije kako biste se na nju usmjerili. (#11804)

segment.source: NVDA will now automatically detect the Humanware Brailliant BI 40X and 20X devices via both USB and Bluetooth. (#11819)
segment.target: NVDA od sada moe automatski otkrivati Humanware Brailliant BI 40X and 20X brajine redke kada su spojeni preko USB ili bluetoth portova. (#11819)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.16.1:
segment.target: Nadograen liblouis brajini prevoditelj na inaicu 3.16.1:

segment.source: Addresses multiple crashes
segment.target: Ispravljena viestruka ruenja

segment.source: Adds Bashkir grade 1 Braille table
segment.target: Dodana brajina tablica za bakirsko puno pismo

segment.source: Adds Coptic 8 dot computer braille table
segment.target: Dodana koptska kompjutorska brajina tablica

segment.source: Adds Russian literary braille and Russian literary braille (detailed) tables
segment.target: Dodana ruska literarna i ruska literarna sa prikazom velikih slova.

segment.source: Adds Added Afrikaans grade 2 braille table
segment.target: Dodana brajina tablica za afrikanersko puno pismo

segment.source: Removes the Russian grade 1 Braille table
segment.target: Izbrisana je brajina tablica za rusko staro puno pismo

segment.source: When reading with say all in browse mode, the find next and find previous commands do not stop reading anymore if Allow skim reading option is enabled; say all rather resumes from after the next or previous found term. (#11563)
segment.target: Prilikom itanja cijelog dokumenta u modusu pregleda, preaci trai sljedee i trai prethodno vie ne zaustavljaju itanje ako je opcija omogui letimino itanje ukljuena; umjesto toga itanje svega se nastavlja prije prethodnog ili sljedeeg pronaenog termina. (#11563)

segment.source: For HIMS braille displays F3 has been remapped to Space + dots 148. (#11710)
segment.target: Za HIMS brajine retke kombinacija tipaka F3 je promijenjena u razmaknica + tokice 148. (#11710)

segment.source: Improvements to the UX of the "braille message timeout" and "Show messages indefinitely" options. (#11602)
segment.target: Unapreenje izgleda opcija "stanka za poruke u milisekundama" i "Pokazuj poruke beskonano". (#11602)

segment.source: In web browsers and other applications that support browse mode, the Elements List dialog (NVDA+F7) can now be invoked when in focus mode. (#10453)
segment.target: U internetskim preglednicima i ostalim aplikacijama koje podravaju modus itanja, dijaloki okvir popis elemenata (NVDA+F7) moe se otvoriti kada se nalazite u modusu fokusa. (#10453)

segment.source: Updates to ARIA live regions are now suppressed when reporting of dynamic content changes is disabled. (#9077)
segment.target: Osvjeavanje aria ivih regija od sada je utiavano kada je izvjetavanje o promjenama dinamikog sadraja iskljueno. (#9077)

segment.source: NVDA will now report "Copied to clipboard" before the copied text. (#6757)
segment.target: NVDA e sada izgovoriti "kopirano u meuspremnik" prije kopiranog teksta. (#6757)

segment.source: Presentation of graphical view table in disk management has been improved. (#10048)
segment.target: Unapreeno itanje tablice grafikog pregleda u upravljanju tvrdim diskovima. (#10048)

segment.source: Labels for controls are now disabled (greyed out) when the control is disabled. (#11809)
segment.target: Oznake kontrola su od sada onemoguene (posivljene) kada je kontrola onemoguena. (#11809)

segment.source: Updated CLDR emoji annotation to version 38. (#11817)
segment.target: Nadograena CLDR anotacija Emoji na inaicu 38. (#11817)

segment.source: The inbuilt "Focus Highlight" feature has been renamed "Vision Highlight". (#11700)
segment.target: Ugraena funkcija "praenje fokusa" preimenovana je u "vizualno praenje". (#11700)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke greaka

segment.source: NVDA once again works correctly with edit fields when using the Fast Log Entry application. (#8996)
segment.target: NVDA sada ponovno radi u poljima za ureivanje pri koritenju Fast Log Entry programa. (#8996)

segment.source: Report elapsed time in Foobar2000 if no total time is available (e.g. when playing a live stream). (#11337)
segment.target: Izgovaranje preostalog vremena u Foobar2000 ako ne postoji ukupno trajanje (NPR. prilikom reproduciranja streama u ivo). (#11337)

segment.source: NVDA now honors the aria-roledescription attribute on elements in editable content in web pages. (#11607)
segment.target: NVDA sada potuje aria-roledescription atribut na elementima u sadraju koji se moe ureivati na web stranicama. (#11607)

segment.source: 'list' is no longer announced on every line of a list in Google Docs or other editable content in Google Chrome. (#7562)
segment.target: 'popis' se vie ne izgovara za svaki redak popisa u Google Docs u otvorenom sadraju koji se ureuje u Google Chromeu. (#7562)

segment.source: When arrowing by character or word from one list item to another in editable content on the web, entering the new list item is now announced. (#11569)
segment.target: Prilikom kretanja kursorskim tipkama po znakovima ili slovima od jedne stavke popisa do druge u sadraju koji se moe ureivati na web stranicama, izgovara se ulazak u novi popis. (#11569)

segment.source: NVDA now reads the correct line when the caret is placed at the end of a link on the end of a list item in Google Docs or other editable content on the web. (#11606)
segment.target: NVDA sada ita ispravni redak prilikom izmjetanja kursora na kraj poveznice na kraju popisa u Google Docsu ili drugom sadraju koji se moe ureivati na web stranicama. (#11606)

segment.source: On Windows 7, opening and closing the start menu from the desktop now sets focus correctly. (#10567)
segment.target: U Windowsima 7, otvaranje i zatvaranje start izbornika sa radne povrine sada postavlja fokus pravilno. (#10567)

segment.source: When "attempt to cancel expired focus events" is enabled, the title of the tab is now announced again when switching tabs in Firefox. (#11397)
segment.target: Kada je opcija "pokuaj otkloniti dogaaje fokusa koji su istekli" omoguena, naslov kartice se sada izgovara ponovno prilikom prebacivanja kartica u Firefoxu. (#11397)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce a list item after typing a character in a list when speaking with the SAPI5 Ivona voices. (#11651)
segment.target: NVDA vie nema probleme poslije upisivanja znakova u popisu prilikom koritenja SAPI5 Ivona glasova. (#11651)

segment.source: It is again possible to use browse mode when reading emails in Windows 10 Mail 16005.13110 and later. (#11439)
segment.target: Sada je ponovno mogue koritenje modusa itanja prilikom itanja elektronike pote u Windows 10 Mailu 16005.13110 and later. (#11439)

segment.source: When using the SAPI5 Ivona voices from harposoftware.com, NVDA is now able to save configuration, switch synthesizers, and no longer will stay silent after restarting. (#11650)
segment.target: Prilikom koritenja SAPI5 Ivona glasova sa stranice harposoftware.com, NVDA sada moe spremati svoju konfiguraciju, prebacivati govorne jedinice, te vie te se nee utiavati poslije ponovnog pokretanja. (#11650)

segment.source: It is now possible to enter number 6 in computer braille from a braille keyboard on HIMS displays. (#11710)
segment.target: Sada je mogue upisati znamenku 6 koristei kompjutorsku brajicu sa brajine tipkovnice na Himsovim brajinim redcima. (#11710)

segment.source: Major performance improvements in Azure Data Studio. (#11533, #11715)
segment.target: Drastino poboljanje performansi u Azure Data Studiu. (#11533, #11715)

segment.source: With "Attempt to Cancel speech for expired focus events" enabled the title of the NVDA Find dialog is announced again. (#11632)
segment.target: Sa ukljuenom opcijom "pokuaj ignoriranja dogaaja fokusa koji su istekli" naslov dijalokog okvira NVDA pretrage ponovno se ita. (#11632)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer freeze when waking the computer and focus lands in a Microsoft Edge document. (#11576)
segment.target: NVDA vie se ne bi trebao ruiti prilikom buenja raunala i premjetanja fokusa u Microsoft edge dokumentu. (#11576)

segment.source: It is no longer necessary to press tab or move focus after closing a context menu in MS Edge for browse mode to be functional again. (#11202)
segment.target: Vie nije potrebno pritiskati tabulator ili premjetati fokus poslije zatvaranja kontekstnog izbornika kako bi nain pregleda bio funkcionalan u MS edgeu. (#11202)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to read items in list views within a 64-bit application such as Tortoise SVN. (#8175)
segment.target: NVDA sada ita stavke popisa unutar 64-bitnih aplikacija poput Tortoise SVN-a. (#8175)

segment.source: ARIA treegrids are now exposed as normal tables in browse mode in both Firefox and Chrome. (#9715)
segment.target: Aria mreaste strukture sada se pokazuju kao normalne tablice u modusu itanja u Firefoxu i Chromeu. (#9715)

segment.source: A reverse search can now be initiated with 'find previous' via NVDA+shift+F3 (#11770)
segment.target: Obratna pretraga sada moe biti zapoeta uz pomo komande 'trai prethodno' NVDA+shift+F3 (#11770)

segment.source: An NVDA script is no longer treated as being repeated if an unrelated key press happens in between the two executions of the script. (#11388)
segment.target: NVDA skripta se vie ne tretira kao ponovljena ako se dogodi nerelevantni pritisak izmeu dva izvravanja skripte. (#11388)

segment.source: Strong and emphasis tags in Internet Explorer can again be suppressed from being reported by turning off Report Emphasis in NVDA's Document Formatting settings. (#11808)
segment.target: Strong i emphasis tagovi u Internet exploreru opet mogu biti utiani tako da se iskljui opcija izvjetavaj o isticanju u postavkama oblikovanja. (#11808)

segment.source: A freeze of several seconds experienced by a small amount of users when arrowing between cells in Excel should no longer occur. (#11818)
segment.target: Zastoj od nekoliko sekundi koji je iskusio mali broj korisnika a koji se dogaao prilikom kretanja po elijama u Excel vie se ne bi trebao dogaati. (#11818)

segment.source: In Microsoft Teams builds with version numbers like 1.3.00.28xxx, NVDA no longer fails reading messages in chats or Teams channels due to an incorrectly focused menu. (#11821)
segment.target: U Microsoft Teams kompilacijama sa brojevima verzija poput 1.3.00.28xxx, NVDA vie nee odbijati itati poruke u avrljanjima ili kanalima skupine zbog nekorektno fokusiranog izbornika. (#11821)

segment.source: Text marked both as being a spelling and grammar error at the same time in Google Chrome will be appropriately announced as both a spelling and grammar error by NVDA. (#11787)
segment.target: Tekst koji je u Google Chrome oznaen istovremeno kao pravopisna i gramatika pogreka tako e biti i izgovoren. (#11787)

segment.source: When using Outlook (French locale), the shortcut for 'Reply all' (control+shift+R) works again. (#11196)
segment.target: Prilikom koritenja Microsoft outlooka na francuskom jeziku, preac za akciju 'odgovori svima' (control+shift+R) radi ponovno. (#11196)

segment.source: In Visual Studio, IntelliSense tool tips that provide additional details about the currently selected IntelliSense item are now only reported once. (#11611)
segment.target: U Visual Studio, IntelliSense alatni savjetnici koji daju vie detalja o trenutnoj stavci IntelliSense sada se izgovaraju samo jednom. (#11611)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will not announce progress of calculations if speak typed characters is disabled. (#9428)
segment.target: U Windows 10 kalkulatoru, NVDA vie nee izgovarati tijek izrauna ako je opcija izgovor upisanih znakova iskljuena. (#9428)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when using English US grade 2 and expand to computer Braille at the cursor is on, when displaying certain content such as a URL in Braille. (#11754)
segment.target: NVDA vie se ne rui prilikom koritenja Engleskog kratkopisa za sjedinjene drave te proiri rije na kompjutorsku brajicu pod kursorom , prilikom prikazivanja odreenog sadraja kao pto je to internetska adresa. (#11754)

segment.source: It is again possible to report formatting information for the focused Excel cell using NVDA+F. (#11914)
segment.target: Od sada je ponovno mogue itati informacije o oblikovanju za fokusiranu eliju u Excelu koristei preac NVDA+F. (#11914)

segment.source: QWERTY input on Papenmeier braille displays that support it again works and no longer causes NVDA to randomly freeze. (#11944)
segment.target: Unos sa qwerty tipkovnice na papenmeierovim brajinim redcima, koji to podravaju ponovno radi, a NVDA se vie ne smrzava u sluajnim situacijama. (#11944)

segment.source: In Chromium based browsers, several cases were solved where table navigation didn't work and NVDA didn't report the number of rows/columns of the table. (#12359)
segment.target: U preglednicima temeljenim na Chromiumu rijeeno je nekoliko sluajeva u kojima navigacija tablicom nije radila, a NVDA nije izvjetavao o broju redaka/stupaca tablice. (#12359)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: System tests can now send keys using spy.emulateKeyPress, which takes a key identifier that conforms to NVDA's own key names, and by default also blocks until the action is executed. (#11581)
segment.target: Testovi sustava sada mogu slati kljueve pomou spy.emulateKeyPress, koji uzima identifikator kljua koji je u skladu s NVDA vlastitim imenima kljueva, a prema zadanim postavkama takoer blokira dok se akcija ne izvri. (#11581)

segment.source: NVDA no longer requires the current directory to be the NVDA application directory in order to function. (#6491)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne zahtijeva da trenutni direktorij bude direktorij NVDA aplikacije kako bi mogao funkcionirati. (#6491)

segment.source: The aria live politeness setting for live regions can now be found on NVDA Objects using the liveRegionPoliteness property. (#11596)
segment.target: Postavka uljudnosti arije uivo za ive regije sada se moe pronai na NVDA objektima koristei svojstvo liveRegionPoliteness. (#11596)

segment.source: It is now possible to define separate gestures for Outlook and Word document. (#11196)
segment.target: Sada je mogue definirati zasebne geste za Outlook i Word dokument. (#11196)

segment.source: This release includes several large improvements to stability and performance particularly in Microsoft Office applications. There are new settings to toggle touchscreen support and graphics reporting.
segment.target: Ovo izdanje ukljuuje nekoliko velikih poboljanja stabilnosti i performansi, posebno u aplikacijama sustava Microsoft Office. Postoje nove postavke za prebacivanje podrke za zaslon osjetljiv na dodir i izvjeivanje o grafici.

segment.source: The existence of marked (highlighted) content can be reported in browsers, and there are new German braille tables.
segment.target: Postojanje oznaenog (istaknutog) sadraja moe se prijaviti u preglednicima, a postoje i nove njemake tablice na Brailleovom pismu.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: You can now toggle reporting of graphics from NVDA's document formatting settings. Note that disabling this option will still read the alternative texts of graphics. (#4837)
segment.target: Sada moete prebaciti izvjetavanje o grafici iz NVDA postavki oblikovanja dokumenta. Imajte na umu da e onemoguavanje ove opcije i dalje itati alternativne tekstove grafike. (#4837)

segment.source: You can now toggle NVDA's touchscreen support. An option has been added to the Touch Interaction panel of NVDA's settings. The default gesture is NVDA+control+alt+t. (#9682)
segment.target: Sada moete prebaciti podrku za NVDA zaslon osjetljiv na dodir. Dodana je opcija na zaslon Interakcija dodirom u postavkama NVDA-a. Zadana gesta je NVDA+control+alt+t. (#9682)

segment.source: Added new German braille tables. (#11268)
segment.target: Dodane su nove njemake tablice na Brailleovom pismu. (#11268)

segment.source: NVDA now detects read-only text UIA controls. (#10494)
segment.target: NVDA sada detektira UIA kontrole teksta samo za itanje. (#10494)

segment.source: The existence of marked (highlighted) content is reported in both speech and braille in all web browsers. (#11436)
segment.target: Postojanje oznaenog (istaknutog) sadraja prijavljuje se i u govoru i na Brailleovom pismu u svim web-preglednicima. (#11436)

segment.source: This can be toggled on and off by a new NVDA Document Formatting option for Highlighting.
segment.target: To se moe ukljuiti i iskljuiti novom opcijom NVDA formatiranja dokumenta za isticanje.

segment.source: New emulated system keyboard keys can be added from NVDA's Input gestures dialog. (#6060)
segment.target: Nove emulirane tipke sistemske tipkovnice mogu se dodati iz NVDA dijalokog okvira Ulazne geste. (#6060)

segment.source: To do this, press the add button after you selected the Emulated system keyboard keys category.
segment.target: Da biste to uinili, pritisnite gumb za dodavanje nakon to ste odabrali kategoriju Oponaane tipke sistemske tipkovnice.

segment.source: Handy Tech Active Braille with joystick is now supported. (#11655)
segment.target: Sada je podran Handy Tech Active Braille s joystickom. (#11655)

segment.source: "Automatic focus mode for caret movement" setting is now compatible with disabling "Automatically set focus to focusable elements". (#11663)
segment.target: Postavka "Automatski nain fokusiranja za kretanje kurseta" sada je kompatibilna s onemoguavanjem opcije "Automatski postavi fokus na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati". (#11663)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The Report formatting script (NVDA+f) has now been changed to report the formatting at the system caret rather than at the review cursor position. To report formatting at the review cursor position now use NVDA+shift+f. (#9505)
segment.target: Skripta za oblikovanje izvjea (NVDA+f) sada je promijenjena tako da izvjetava o oblikovanju u sistemskom kursoru, a ne na poloaju kursora za pregled. Za prijavu formatiranja na poziciji kursora za pregled sada koristite NVDA+shift+f. (#9505)

segment.source: NVDA no longer automatically sets the system focus to focusable elements by default in browse mode, improving performance and stability. (#11190)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne postavlja automatski fokus sustava na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati prema zadanim postavkama u nainu pregledavanja, poboljavajui performanse i stabilnost. (#11190)

segment.source: CLDR updated from version 36.1 to version 37. (#11303)
segment.target: CLDR auriran s verzije 36.1 na verziju 37. (#11303)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to 1.51-dev, commit 1fb68ffffea4
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak-NG na 1.51-dev, commit 1fb68ffffea4

segment.source: You can now utilize table navigation in list boxes with checkable list items when the particular list has multiple columns. (#8857)
segment.target: Sada moete koristiti navigaciju tablicom u okvirima popisa sa stavkama popisa koje se mogu oznaiti kada odreeni popis ima vie stupaca. (#8857)

segment.source: In the Add-ons manager, when prompted to confirm removal of an add-on, "No" is now the default. (#10015)
segment.target: U upravitelju dodataka, kada se od vas zatrai da potvrdite uklanjanje dodatka, "Ne" je sada zadano. (#10015)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the Elements List dialog now presents formulas in their localized form. (#9144)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel dijaloki okvir Popis elemenata sada prikazuje formule u njihovom lokaliziranom obliku. (#9144)

segment.source: NVDA now reports the correct terminology for notes in MS Excel. (#11311)
segment.target: NVDA sada izvjetava o ispravnoj terminologiji za biljeke u MS Excelu. (#11311)

segment.source: When using the "move review cursor to focus" command in browse mode, the review cursor is now set at the position of the virtual caret. (#9622)
segment.target: Kada koristite naredbu "premjesti kursor pregleda u fokus" u nainu pregledavanja, kursor pregleda sada je postavljen na poloaj virtualnog kursora. (#9622)

segment.source: Information reported in browse mode, such as the formatting info with NVDA+F, are now displayed in a slightly bigger window centered on screen. (#9910)
segment.target: Informacije prijavljene u nainu pregledavanja, kao to su informacije o formatiranju pomou NVDA+F, sada se prikazuju u malo veem prozoru centriranom na zaslonu. (#9910)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: NVDA now always speaks when navigating by word and landing on any single symbol followed by white space, whatever the verbosity settings. (#5133)
segment.target: NVDA sada uvijek govori kada se kreete po rijei i slijeete na bilo koji pojedinani simbol iza kojeg slijedi razmak, bez obzira na postavke opirnosti. (#5133)

segment.source: In applications using QT 5.11 or newer, object descriptions are again reported. (#8604)
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste QT 5.11 ili noviji, opisi objekata ponovno se prijavljuju. (#8604)

segment.source: When deleting a word with control+delete, NVDA no longer remains silent. (#3298, #11029)
segment.target: Prilikom brisanja rijei pomou control+delete, NVDA vie ne ostaje tih. (#3298, #11029)

segment.source: Now the word to the right of the deleted word is announced.
segment.target: Sada je najavljena rije desno od izbrisane rijei.

segment.source: In general settings panel, the language list is now sorted correctly. (#10348)
segment.target: Na ploi opih postavki popis jezika sada je ispravno sortiran. (#10348)

segment.source: In the Input Gestures dialog, significantly improved performance while filtering. (#10307)
segment.target: U dijalokom okviru Ulazne geste znaajno su poboljane performanse tijekom filtriranja. (#10307)

segment.source: You can now send Unicode characters beyond U+FFFF from a braille display. (#10796)
segment.target: Sada moete slati Unicode znakove izvan U+FFFF sa Brailleovog pisma. (#10796)

segment.source: NVDA will announce Open With dialog content in Windows 10 May 2020 Update. (#11335)
segment.target: NVDA e objaviti sadraj dijalokog okvira Otvori s u auriranju sustava Windows 10 za svibanj 2020. (#11335)

segment.source: A new experimental option in Advanced settings (Enable selective registration for UI Automation events and property changes) can provide major performance improvements in Microsoft Visual Studio and other UIAutomation based applications if enabled. (#11077, #11209)
segment.target: Nova eksperimentalna mogunost u Naprednim postavkama (Omogui selektivnu registraciju za dogaaje automatizacije korisnikog suelja i promjene svojstava) moe pruiti znaajna poboljanja performansi u Microsoft Visual Studiju i drugim aplikacijama temeljenim na UIAutomation ako je omogueno. (#11077, #11209)

segment.source: For checkable list items, the selected state is no longer announced redundantly, and if applicable, the unselected state is announced instead. (#8554)
segment.target: Za stavke popisa koje se mogu provjeriti, odabrano stanje vie se ne najavljuje suvino, a ako je primjenjivo, umjesto toga najavljuje se neodabrano stanje. (#8554)

segment.source: On Windows 10 May 2020 Update, NVDA now shows the Microsoft Sound Mapper when viewing output devices from synthesizer dialog. (#11349)
segment.target: Na auriranju sustava Windows 10 za svibanj 2020., NVDA sada prikazuje Microsoft Sound Mapper prilikom pregledavanja izlaznih ureaja iz dijalokog okvira sintisajzera. (#11349)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, numbers are now announced correctly for ordered lists if the list does not start with 1. (#8438)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer brojevi se sada ispravno najavljuju za poredane popise ako popis ne poinje s 1. (#8438)

segment.source: In Google chrome, NVDA will now report not checked for all checkable controls (not just check boxes) that are currently not checked. (#11377)
segment.target: U pregledniku Google chrome, NVDA e sada izvijestiti da nisu oznaene sve kontrole koje se mogu oznaiti (ne samo potvrdne okvire) koje trenutno nisu oznaene. (#11377)

segment.source: It is once again possible to navigate in various controls when NVDA's language is set to Aragonese. (#11384)
segment.target: Ponovno je mogue kretati se u razliitim kontrolama kada je NVDA jezik postavljen na aragonski. (#11384)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer sometimes freeze in Microsoft Word when rapidly arrowing up and down or typing characters with Braille enabled. (#11431, #11425, #11414)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne bi trebao ponekad zamrznuti u Microsoft Wordu prilikom brzog strelice gore-dolje ili upisivanja znakova s omoguenom Brailleovom pismom. (#11431, #11425, #11414)

segment.source: NVDA no longer appends nonexistent trailing space when copying the current navigator object to the clipboard. (#11438)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne dodaje nepostojei zavrni prostor prilikom kopiranja trenutnog objekta navigatora u meuspremnik. (#11438)

segment.source: NVDA no longer activates the Say All profile if there is nothing to read. (#10899, #9947)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne aktivira profil Reci sve ako nema to itati. (#10899, #9947)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer unable to read the features list in Internet Information Services (IIS) Manager. (#11468)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne moe itati popis znaajki u upravitelju internetskih informacijskih usluga (IIS). (#11468)

segment.source: NVDA now keeps the audio device open improving performance on some sound cards (#5172, #10721)
segment.target: NVDA sada dri audio ureaj otvorenim poboljavajui performanse na nekim zvunim karticama (#5172, #10721)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer freeze or exit when holding down control+shift+downArrow in Microsoft Word. (#9463)
segment.target: NVDA se vie nee zamrznuti ili izai kada drite pritisnutu tipku control+shift+strelica prema dolje u Microsoft Wordu. (#9463)

segment.source: The expanded / collapsed state of directories in the navigation treeview on drive.google.com is now always reported by NVDA. (#11520)
segment.target: Proireno/saeto stanje direktorija u navigacijskom prikazu stabla na drive.google.com sada uvijek izvjetava NVDA. (#11520)

segment.source: NVDA will auto detect the NLS eReader Humanware braille display via Bluetooth as its Bluetooth name is now "NLS eReader Humanware". (#11561)
segment.target: NVDA e automatski detektirati NLS eReader Humanware Braille zaslon putem Bluetootha jer je njegovo Bluetooth ime sada "NLS eReader Humanware". (#11561)

segment.source: Major performance improvements in Visual Studio Code. (#11533)
segment.target: Velika poboljanja performansi u Visual Studio Codeu. (#11533)

segment.source: Changes For Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: The GUI Helper's BoxSizerHelper.addDialogDismissButtons supports a new "separated" keyword argument, for adding a standard horizontal separator to dialogs (other than messages and single input dialogs). (#6468)
segment.target: GUI Helper's BoxSizerHelper.addDialogDismissButtons podrava novi argument "odvojene" kljune rijei, za dodavanje standardnog horizontalnog razdjelnika dijalozima (osim poruka i dijalokog okvira s jednim unosom). (#6468)

segment.source: Additional properties were added to app modules, including path for the executable (appPath), is a Windows Store app (isWindowsStoreApp), and machine architecture for the app (appArchitecture). (#7894)
segment.target: Modulima aplikacije dodana su dodatna svojstva, ukljuujui put za izvrnu datoteku (appPath), aplikaciju iz Windows trgovine (isWindowsStoreApp) i arhitekturu raunala za aplikaciju (appArchitecture). (#7894)

segment.source: It is now possible to create app modules for apps hosted inside wwahost.exe on Windows 8 and later. (#4569)
segment.target: Sada je mogue izraditi module aplikacija za aplikacije koje se nalaze unutar wwahost.exe u sustavu Windows 8 i novijima. (#4569)

segment.source: A fragment of the log can now be delimited and then copied to clipboard using NVDA+control+shift+F1. (#9280)
segment.target: Fragment dnevnika sada se moe razdvojiti i zatim kopirati u meuspremnik koristei NVDA+control+shift+F1. (#9280)

segment.source: NVDA-specific objects that are found by Python's cyclic garbage collector are now logged when being deleted by the collector to aide in removing reference cycles from NVDA. (#11499)
segment.target: Objekti specifini za NVDA koje pronae Pythonov cikliki sakuplja smea sada se biljee kada ih sakuplja brie kako bi pomogao u uklanjanju referentnih ciklusa iz NVDA. (#11499)

segment.source: The majority of NVDA's classes are tracked including NVDAObjects, appModules, GlobalPlugins, SynthDrivers, and TreeInterceptors.
segment.target: Veina NVDA klasa se prati, ukljuujui NVDAObjects, appModules, GlobalPlugins, SynthDrivers i TreeInterceptors.

segment.source: A class that needs to be tracked should inherit from garbageHandler.TrackedObject.
segment.target: Klasa koju je potrebno pratiti trebala bi naslijediti od garbageHandler.TrackedObject.

segment.source: Significant debug logging for MSAA events can be now enabled in NVDA's Advanced settings. (#11521)
segment.target: Znaajno biljeenje otklanjanja pogreaka za MSAA dogaaje sada se moe omoguiti u NVDA Naprednim postavkama. (#11521)

segment.source: MSAA winEvents for the currently focused object are no longer filtered out along with other events if the event count for a given thread is exceeded. (#11520)
segment.target: MSAA winEvents za trenutno fokusirani objekt vie se ne filtriraju zajedno s drugim dogaajima ako se prekorai broj dogaaja za odreenu nit. (#11520)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for a new braille display from Nattiq, better support for ESET antivirus GUI and Windows Terminal, performance improvements in 1Password, and with Windows OneCore synthesizer. Plus many other important bug fixes and improvements.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju podrku za novi zaslon na brajici tvrtke Nattiq, bolju podrku za ESET-ov antivirusni grafiki prikaz i Windows terminal, poboljanja performansi u aplikaciji 1Password i za Windows OneCore sintesajzer. Plus mnogi drugi vani ispravci greaka i poboljanja.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Support for new braille displays:
segment.target: Podrka za nove Brailleove zaslone:

segment.source: Nattiq nBraille (#10778)
segment.target: Nattiq nBraille (#10778)

segment.source: Added script to open NVDA configuration directory (no default gesture). (#2214)
segment.target: Dodana skripta za otvaranje NVDA konfiguracijskog direktorija (bez zadane geste). (#2214)

segment.source: Better support for ESET antivirus GUI. (#10894)
segment.target: Bolja podrka za ESET-ov antivirusni GUI. (#10894)

segment.source: Added support for Windows Terminal. (#10305)
segment.target: Dodana podrka za Windows terminal. (#10305)

segment.source: Added a command to report the active configuration profile (no default gesture). (#9325)
segment.target: Dodana je naredba za prijavu aktivnog konfiguracijskog profila (bez zadane geste). (#9325)

segment.source: Added a command to toggle reporting of subscripts and superscripts (no default gesture). (#10985)
segment.target: Dodana je naredba za prebacivanje izvjeivanja o indeksima i eksponentima (nema zadane geste). (#10985)

segment.source: Web applications (E.G. Gmail) no longer speak outdated information when moving focus rapidly. (#10885)
segment.target: Web aplikacije (npr. Gmail) vie ne govore zastarjele informacije pri brzom premjetanju fokusa. (#10885)

segment.source: This experimental fix must be manually enabled via the 'Attempt to cancel speech for expired focus events' option in the advanced settings panel.
segment.target: Ovaj eksperimentalni popravak mora se runo omoguiti putem opcije "Pokuaj otkazivanja govora za istekle fokusne dogaaje" na ploi naprednih postavki.

segment.source: Many more symbols have been added to the default symbols dictionary. (#11105)
segment.target: Mnogo je vie simbola dodano u zadani rjenik simbola. (#11105)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator from 3.12 to [3.14.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.14.0). (#10832, #11221)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis s 3.12 na [3.14.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.14.0). (#10832, #11221)

segment.source: The reporting of superscripts and subscripts is now controlled separately to the reporting of font attributes. (#10919)
segment.target: Izvjeivanje o eksponentima i indeksima sada se kontrolira odvojeno od izvjeivanja o atributima fonta. (#10919)

segment.source: Due to changes made in VS Code, NVDA no longer disables browse mode in Code by default. (#10888)
segment.target: Zbog promjena napravljenih u VS Codeu, NVDA vie ne onemoguuje nain pregledavanja u Codeu prema zadanim postavkama. (#10888)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports "top" and "bottom" messages when moving the review cursor directly to the first or last line of the current navigator object with the move to top and move to bottom review cursor scripts respectively. (#9551)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izvjetava o porukama "gore" i "dolje" kada pomaknete kursor za pregled izravno na prvi ili zadnji redak trenutnog objekta navigatora sa skriptama kursora za pomicanje na vrh i pomicanje na dno. (#9551)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports "left" and "right" messages when directly moving the review cursor to the first or last character of the line for the current navigator object with the move to beginning of line and move to end of line review cursor scripts respectively. (#9551)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izvjetava o "lijevim" i "desnom" porukama kada izravno pomaknete kursor na prvi ili zadnji znak retka za trenutni objekt navigatora s premjetanjem na poetak retka i premjetanjem na kraj reda. (#9551)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: NVDA now starts correctly when the log file cannot be created. (#6330)
segment.target: NVDA se sada ispravno pokree kada se datoteka dnevnika ne moe stvoriti. (#6330)

segment.source: In recent releases of Microsoft Word 365, NVDA will no longer announce "delete back word" when Control+Backspace is pressed while editing a document. (#10851)
segment.target: U nedavnim izdanjima programa Microsoft Word 365, NVDA vie nee najavljivati "brisanje rijei" kada se pritisne Control+Backspace tijekom ureivanja dokumenta. (#10851)

segment.source: In Winamp, NVDA will once again announce toggle status of shuffle and repeat. (#10945)
segment.target: U Winampu, NVDA e jo jednom objaviti status prebacivanja nasuminog i ponavljanja. (#10945)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer extremely sluggish when moving within the list of items in 1Password. (#10508)
segment.target: NVDA vie nije ekstremno spor kada se kree unutar popisa stavki u 1Passwordu. (#10508)

segment.source: The Windows OneCore speech synthesizer no longer lags between utterances. (#10721)
segment.target: Windows OneCore sintetizator govora vie ne zaostaje izmeu izgovora. (#10721)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes when you open the context menu for 1Password in the system notification area. (#11017)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne zamrzava kada otvorite kontekstni izbornik za 1Password u podruju obavijesti sustava. (#11017)

segment.source: In Office 2013 and older:
segment.target: U sustavu Office 2013 i starijim verzijama:

segment.source: Ribbons are announced when focus moves to them for the first time. (#4207)
segment.target: Vrpce se najavljuju kada se fokus prvi put pomakne na njih. (#4207)

segment.source: Context menu items are once again reported properly. (#9252)
segment.target: Stavke kontekstnog izbornika ponovno se ispravno prijavljuju. (#9252)

segment.source: Ribbon sections are consistently announced when navigating with Control+arrows. (#7067)
segment.target: Odjeljci vrpce dosljedno se najavljuju prilikom navigacije pomou tipke Control + strelice. (#7067)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, text no longer incorrectly appears on a separate line when web content uses CSS display: inline-flex. (#11075)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u Mozilla Firefoxu i Google Chromeu, tekst se vie ne prikazuje pogreno u zasebnom retku kada web sadraj koristi CSS prikaz: inline-flex. (#11075)

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, it is now possible to activate elements that aren't focusable.
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja s onemoguenim opcijama Automatski postavi fokus sustava na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati, sada je mogue aktivirati elemente koji se ne mogu fokusirati.

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, it is now possible to activate elements reached by pressing the tab key. (#8528)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja s onemoguenim opcijama Automatski postavi fokus sustava na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati, sada je mogue aktivirati elemente do kojih se dolazi pritiskom na tipku Tab. (#8528)

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, activating certain elements no longer clicks in an incorrect location. (#9886)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja s onemoguenom opcijom Automatski postavi fokus sustava na elemente koji se mogu izotriti, aktiviranje odreenih elemenata vie ne klikne na pogrenoj lokaciji. (#9886)

segment.source: NVDA error sounds are no longer heard when accessing DevExpress text controls. (#10918)
segment.target: NVDA zvukovi pogreaka vie se ne uju prilikom pristupa DevExpress tekstualnim kontrolama. (#10918)

segment.source: The tool-tips of the icons in the system tray are no longer reported upon keyboard navigation if their text is equal to the name of the icons, to avoid double announcing. (#6656)
segment.target: Opisi alata ikona u programskoj traci vie se ne prijavljuju pri navigaciji tipkovnicom ako je njihov tekst jednak nazivu ikona, kako bi se izbjeglo dvostruko najavljivanje. (#6656)

segment.source: In browse mode with 'Automatically set system focus to focusable elements' disabled, switching to focus mode with NVDA+space now focuses the element under the caret. (#11206)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja s onemoguenom opcijom "Automatski postavi fokus sustava na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati", prebacivanje u nain fokusiranja s NVDA+razmak sada fokusira element ispod kursora. (#11206)

segment.source: It is once again possible to check for NVDA updates on certain systems; e.g. clean Windows installs. (#11253)
segment.target: Ponovno je mogue provjeriti NVDA auriranja na odreenim sustavima; npr. iste instalacije sustava Windows. (#11253)

segment.source: Focus is not moved in Java application when the selection is changed in an unfocused tree, table or list. (#5989)
segment.target: Fokus se ne pomie u Java aplikaciji kada se odabir promijeni u nefokusiranom stablu, tablici ili popisu. (#5989)

segment.source: Changes For Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: execElevated and hasUiAccess have moved from config module to systemUtils module. Usage via config module is deprecated. (#10493)
segment.target: execElevated i hasUiAccess premjeteni su iz konfiguracijskog modula u modul systemUtils. Upotreba putem konfiguracijskog modula je zastarjela. (#10493)

segment.source: Updated configobj to 5.1.0dev commit f9a265c4. (#10939)
segment.target: Auriran configobj na 5.1.0dev commit f9a265c4. (#10939)

segment.source: Automated testing of NVDA with Chrome and a HTML sample is now possible. (#10553)
segment.target: Sada je mogue automatizirano testiranje NVDA s Chromeom i HTML uzorkom. (#10553)

segment.source: IAccessibleHandler has been converted into a package, OrderedWinEventLimiter has been extracted to a module and unit tests added (#10934)
segment.target: IAccessibleHandler je pretvoren u paket, OrderedWinEventLimiter je izdvojen u modul i dodani su jedinini testovi (#10934)

segment.source: Updated BrlApi to version 0.8 (BRLTTY 6.1). (#11065)
segment.target: Auriran BrlApi na verziju 0.8 (BRLTTY 6.1). (#11065)

segment.source: Status bar retrieval may now be customized by an AppModule. (#2125, #4640)
segment.target: Dohvaanje statusne trake sada moe prilagoditi AppModule. (#2125, #4640)

segment.source: NVDA no longer listens for IAccessible EVENT_OBJECT_REORDER. (#11076)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne oslukuje IAccessible EVENT_OBJECT_REORDER. (#11076)

segment.source: A broken ScriptableObject (such as a GlobalPlugin missing a call to its base class' init method) no longer breaks NVDA's script handling. (#5446)
segment.target: Pokvareni ScriptableObject (kao to je GlobalPlugin koji proputa poziv na init metodu svoje osnovne klase) vie ne prekida NVDA-ino rukovanje skriptom. (#5446)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for several new braille displays from HumanWare and APH, plus many other important bug fixes such as the ability to again read math in Microsoft Word using MathPlayer / MathType.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju podrku za nekoliko novih Brailleovih zaslona iz HumanWarea i APH-a, plus mnoge druge vane ispravke greaka kao to je mogunost ponovnog itanja matematike u programu Microsoft Word pomou MathPlayera / MathTypea.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: The currently selected item in listboxes is again presented in browse mode in Chrome, similar to NVDA 2019.1. (#10713)
segment.target: Trenutno odabrana stavka u okvirima s popisima ponovno se prikazuje u nainu pregledavanja u Chromeu, slino kao u NVDA 2019.1. (#10713)

segment.source: You can now perform right mouse clicks on touch devices by doing a one finger tap and hold. (#3886)
segment.target: Sada moete kliknuti desnom tipkom mia na dodirnim ureajima dodirom i dranjem jednim prstom. (#3886)

segment.source: Support for New braille displays: APH Chameleon 20, APH Mantis Q40, HumanWare BrailleOne, BrailleNote Touch v2, and NLS eReader. (#10830)
segment.target: Podrka za nove Brailleove zaslone: APH Chameleon 20, APH Mantis Q40, HumanWare BrailleOne, BrailleNote Touch v2 i NLS eReader. (#10830)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: NVDA will prevent the system from locking or going to sleep when in say all. (#10643)
segment.target: NVDA e sprijeiti zakljuavanje sustava ili odlazak u stanje mirovanja kada je u redu. (#10643)

segment.source: Support for out-of-process iframes in Mozilla Firefox. (#10707)
segment.target: Podrka za iframeove izvan procesa u Mozilla Firefoxu. (#10707)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.12. (#10161)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na verziju 3.12. (#10161)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Fixed NVDA not announcing Unicode minus symbol (U+2212). (#10633)
segment.target: Ispravljen NVDA koji nije najavljivao Unicode minus simbol (U+2212). (#10633)

segment.source: When installing add-on from add-ons manager, names of files and folders in the browse window are no longer reported twice. (#10620, #2395)
segment.target: Prilikom instaliranja dodatka iz upravitelja dodataka, nazivi datoteka i mapa u prozoru za pregledavanje vie se ne prijavljuju dvaput. (#10620, #2395)

segment.source: In Firefox, when loading Mastodon with the advanced web interface enabled, all timelines now render correctly in browse mode. (#10776)
segment.target: U Firefoxu, prilikom uitavanja Mastodona s omoguenim naprednim web sueljem, sve vremenske trake sada se ispravno prikazuju u nainu pregledavanja. (#10776)

segment.source: In browse mode, NVDA now reports "not checked" for unchecked check boxes where it sometimes didn't previously. (#10781)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, NVDA sada izvjetava o "nije oznaeno" za neoznaene potvrdne okvire tamo gdje se prije ponekad nije javljalo. (#10781)

segment.source: ARIA switch controls no longer report confusing information such as "not pressed checked" or "pressed checked". (#9187)
segment.target: ARIA kontrole prekidaa vie ne prijavljuju zbunjujue informacije kao to su "nije pritisnuto oznaeno" ili "pritisnuto oznaeno". (#9187)

segment.source: SAPI4 voices should no longer refuse to speak certain text. (#10792)
segment.target: SAPI4 glasovi vie ne bi trebali odbijati izgovarati odreeni tekst. (#10792)

segment.source: NVDA can again read and interact with math equations in Microsoft Word. (#10803)
segment.target: NVDA ponovno moe itati i komunicirati s matematikim jednadbama u programu Microsoft Word. (#10803)

segment.source: NVDA will again announce text being unselected in browse mode if pressing an arrow key while text is selected. (#10731).
segment.target: NVDA e ponovno objaviti da je tekst neodabran u nainu pregledavanja ako pritisnete tipku sa strelicom dok je tekst odabran. (#10731).

segment.source: NVDA no longer exits if there is an error initializing eSpeak. (#10607)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izlazi ako postoji pogreka pri inicijalizaciji eSpeaka. (#10607)

segment.source: Errors caused by unicode in translations for shortcuts no longer stop the installer, mitigated by falling back to the English text. (#5166, #6326)
segment.target: Pogreke uzrokovane Unicodeom u prijevodima za preace vie ne zaustavljaju instalacijski program, to se ublaava vraanjem na engleski tekst. (#5166, #6326)

segment.source: Arrowing out and away from lists and tables in sayAll with skim reading enabled no longer continuously announces exiting the list or table. (#10706)
segment.target: Strelica prema van i dalje od popisa i tablica u sayAll s omoguenim preletnim itanjem vie ne najavljuje kontinuirano izlazak iz popisa ili tablice. (#10706)

segment.source: Fix mouse tracking for some MSHTML elements in Internet Explorer. (#10736)
segment.target: Ispravite praenje mia za neke MSHTML elemente u pregledniku Internet Explorer. (#10736)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Developer documentation is now build using sphinx. (#9840)
segment.target: Dokumentacija za razvojne programere sada se izrauje pomou sfinge. (#9840)

segment.source: Several speech functions have been split into two. (#10593)
segment.target: Nekoliko govornih funkcija podijeljeno je na dva dijela. (#10593)

segment.source: The speakX version remains, but now depends on a getXSpeech function which returns a speech sequence.
segment.target: Verzija speakX ostaje, ali sada ovisi o funkciji getXSpeech koja vraa govorni slijed.

segment.source: speakObjectProperties now relies on getObjectPropertiesSpeech
segment.target: speakObjectProperties sada se oslanja na getObjectPropertiesSpeech

segment.source: speakObject now relies on getObjectSpeech
segment.target: speakObject sada se oslanja na getObjectSpeech

segment.source: speakTextInfo now relies on getTextInfoSpeech
segment.target: speakTextInfo sada se oslanja na getTextInfoSpeech

segment.source: speakWithoutPauses has been converted into a class, and refactored, but should not break compatibility.
segment.target: speakWithoutPauses je pretvoren u klasu i refaktoriran, ali ne bi trebao naruiti kompatibilnost.

segment.source: getSpeechForSpelling is deprecated (though still available) use getSpellingSpeech instead.
segment.target: getSpeechForSpelling je zastario (iako je jo uvijek dostupan) umjesto toga koristite getSpellingSpeech.

segment.source: Private changes that should not affect addon developers:
segment.target: Privatne promjene koje ne bi trebale utjecati na programere dodataka:

segment.source: _speakPlaceholderIfEmpty is now _getPlaceholderSpeechIfTextEmpty
segment.target: _speakPlaceholderIfEmpty je sada _getPlaceholderSpeechIfTextEmpty

segment.source: _speakTextInfo_addMath is now _extendSpeechSequence_addMathForTextInfo
segment.target: _speakTextInfo_addMath je sada _extendSpeechSequence_addMathForTextInfo

segment.source: Speech 'reason' has been converted to an Enum, see controlTypes.OutputReason class. (#10703)
segment.target: Govorni 'razlog' pretvoren je u Enum, pogledajte klasu controlTypes.OutputReason (#10703)

segment.source: Module level 'REASON_*' constants are deprecated.
segment.target: Konstante 'REASON_*' na razini modula su zastarjele.

segment.source: Compiling NVDA dependencies now requires Visual Studio 2019 (16.2 or newer). (#10169)
segment.target: Za kompajliranje NVDA ovisnosti sada je potreban Visual Studio 2019 (16.2 ili noviji). (#10169)

segment.source: Updated SCons to version 3.1.1. (#10169)
segment.target: Aurirani SConi na verziju 3.1.1. (#10169)

segment.source: Again allow behaviors._FakeTableCell to have no location defined (#10864)
segment.target: Ponovno dopustite behaviors._FakeTableCell da nema definiranu lokaciju (#10864)

segment.source: NVDA 2019.3 is a very significant release containing many under-the-hood changes including the upgrade of Python 2 to Python 3, and a major re-write of NVDA's speech subsystem.
segment.target: NVDA 2019.3 je vrlo znaajno izdanje koje sadri mnoge promjene ispod haube, ukljuujui nadogradnju Pythona 2 na Python 3 i veliko ponovno pisanje NVDA-inog govornog podsustava.

segment.source: Although these changes do break compatibility with older NVDA add-ons, the upgrade to Python 3 is necessary for security, and the changes to speech allow for some exciting innovations in the near future.
segment.target: Iako ove promjene naruavaju kompatibilnost sa starijim NVDA dodacima, nadogradnja na Python 3 neophodna je zbog sigurnosti, a promjene govora omoguuju neke uzbudljive inovacije u bliskoj budunosti.

segment.source: Other highlights in this release include 64 bit support for Java VMs, Screen Curtain and Focus Highlight functionality, support for more braille displays and a new Braille viewer, and many many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Ostale znaajke u ovom izdanju ukljuuju 64-bitnu podrku za Java VM-ove, funkciju Screen Curtain i Focus Isticanje, podrku za vie Brailleovih zaslona i novi preglednik Brailleovog pisma te mnoge druge ispravke greaka.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: The accuracy of the move mouse to navigator object command has been improved in text fields in Java applications. (#10157)
segment.target: Tonost naredbe za pomicanje mia na objekt navigatora poboljana je u tekstualnim poljima u Java aplikacijama. (#10157)

segment.source: Added support for the following Handy Tech Braille displays (#8955):
segment.target: Dodana podrka za sljedee Handy Tech Brailleove zaslone (#8955):

segment.source: Basic Braille Plus 40
segment.target: Osnovna Brailleova pisma Plus 40

segment.source: Basic Braille Plus 32
segment.target: Osnovna Brailleova pisma Plus 32

segment.source: Connect Braille
segment.target: Povezivanje Brailleovog pisma

segment.source: All user-defined gestures can now be removed via a new "Reset to factory defaults" button in the Input Gestures dialog. (#10293)
segment.target: Sve korisniki definirane geste sada se mogu ukloniti putem novog gumba "Vrati na tvornike postavke" u dijalokom okviru Ulazne geste. (#10293)

segment.source: Font reporting in Microsoft Word now includes if text is marked as hidden. (#8713)
segment.target: Izvjeivanje o fontovima u programu Microsoft Word sada ukljuuje ako je tekst oznaen kao skriven. (#8713)

segment.source: Added a command to move the review cursor to the position previously set as start marker for selection or copy: NVDA+shift+F9. (#1969)
segment.target: Dodana je naredba za pomicanje kursora za pregled na poloaj koji je prethodno postavljen kao oznaka poetka za odabir ili kopiranje: NVDA+shift+F9. (#1969)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Microsoft Edge and recent versions of Firefox and Chrome, landmarks are now reported in focus mode and object navigation. (#10101)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru, Microsoft Edgeu i najnovijim verzijama Firefoxa i Chromea orijentiri se sada prijavljuju u nainu fokusiranja i navigaciji objektima. (#10101)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, You can now navigate by article and grouping using quick navigation scripts. These scripts are unbound by default and can be assigned in the Input Gestures dialog when the dialog is opened from a browse mode document. (#9485, #9227)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru, Google Chromeu i Mozilla Firefoxu sada se moete kretati po lanku i grupiranju pomou skripti za brzu navigaciju. Te skripte prema zadanim postavkama nisu vezane i mogu se dodijeliti u dijalokom okviru Geste unosa kada se dijaloki okvir otvori iz dokumenta naina pregledavanja. (#9485, #9227)

segment.source: Figures are also reported. They are considered objects and therefore navigable with the o quick navigation key.
segment.target: Izvjetavaju se i brojke. Smatraju se objektima i stoga se mogu kretati pomou tipke za brzu navigaciju.

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, article elements are now reported with object navigation, and optionally in browse mode if turned on in Document Formatting settings. (#10424)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru, Google Chromeu i Mozilla Firefoxu elementi lanaka sada se prijavljuju pomou navigacije objektima, a po elji i u nainu pregledavanja ako su ukljueni u postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta. (#10424)

segment.source: Added screen curtain, which when enabled, makes the whole screen black on Windows 8 and later. (#7857)
segment.target: Dodana zavjesa zaslona, koja, kada je omoguena, ini cijeli zaslon crnim u sustavu Windows 8 i novijima. (#7857)

segment.source: Added a script to enable screen curtain (until next restart with one press, or always while NVDA is running with two presses), no default gesture is assigned.
segment.target: Dodana je skripta za omoguavanje zavjese zaslona (do sljedeeg ponovnog pokretanja jednim pritiskom, ili uvijek dok NVDA radi s dva pritiska), nije dodijeljena zadana gesta.

segment.source: Can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Moe se aktivirati i konfigurirati putem kategorije 'vid' u dijalokom okviru postavki NVDA.

segment.source: Added screen highlight functionality to NVDA. (#971, #9064)
segment.target: NVDA je dodana funkcija isticanja zaslona. (#971, #9064)

segment.source: Highlighting of the focus, navigator object, and browse mode caret position can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Isticanje fokusa, objekta navigatora i poloaja kursora u nainu pregledavanja moe se omoguiti i konfigurirati putem kategorije 'vid' u NVDA dijalokom okviru postavki.

segment.source: Note: This feature is incompatible with the focus highlight add-on, however, the add-on can still be used while the built-in highlighter is disabled.
segment.target: Napomena: Ova znaajka nije kompatibilna s dodatkom za isticanje fokusa, meutim, dodatak se i dalje moe koristiti dok je ugraeni highlighter onemoguen.

segment.source: Added Braille Viewer tool, allows viewing braille output via an on-screen window. (#7788)
segment.target: Dodan alat za preglednik Brailleovog pisma, omoguuje pregled Brailleovog ispisa putem prozora na zaslonu. (#7788)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The user guide now describes how to use NVDA in the Windows Console. (#9957)
segment.target: Korisniki prirunik sada opisuje kako koristiti NVDA u Windows konzoli. (#9957)

segment.source: Running nvda.exe now defaults to replacing an already running copy of NVDA. The -r|--replace command line parameter is still accepted, but ignored. (#8320)
segment.target: Pokretanje nvda.exe sada prema zadanim postavkama zamjenjuje ve pokrenutu kopiju NVDA. Parametar naredbenog retka -r|--replace i dalje je prihvaen, ali zanemaren. (#8320)

segment.source: On Windows 8 and later, NVDA will now report product name and version information for hosted apps such as apps downloaded from Microsoft Store using information provided by the app. (#4259, #10108)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 8 i novijim verzijama, NVDA e sada izvjetavati o nazivu proizvoda i informacijama o verzijama hostiranih aplikacija, kao to su aplikacije preuzete iz trgovine Microsoft Store, koristei informacije koje prua aplikacija. (#4259, #10108)

segment.source: When toggling track changes on and off with the keyboard in Microsoft Word, NVDA will announce the state of the setting. (#942)
segment.target: Prilikom ukljuivanja i iskljuivanja promjena zapisa pomou tipkovnice u programu Microsoft Word, NVDA e objaviti stanje postavke. (#942)

segment.source: The NVDA version number is now logged as the first message in the log. This occurs even if logging has been disabled from the GUI. (#9803)
segment.target: Broj verzije NVDA sada je zabiljeen kao prva poruka u dnevniku. To se dogaa ak i ako je zapisivanje onemogueno iz GUI-ja. (#9803)

segment.source: The settings dialog no longer allows for changing the configured log level if it has been overridden from the command line. (#10209)
segment.target: Dijaloki okvir postavki vie ne doputa promjenu konfigurirane razine zapisnika ako je nadjaana iz naredbenog retka. (#10209)
