segment.target: Trenutno su podrani ALVA, Baum/HumanWare/APH/Orbit, Eurobraille, Handy Tech, Hims, SuperBraille i HumanWare BrailleNote i Brailliant BI/B zasloni.

segment.source: You can enable this feature by selecting the automatic option from the list of braille displays in NVDA's braille display selection dialog.
segment.target: Ovu znaajku moete omoguiti odabirom opcije automatski s popisa prikaza brajice u NVDA dijalokom okviru za odabir brajice.

segment.source: Please consult the documentation for additional details.
segment.target: Dodatne pojedinosti potraite u dokumentaciji.

segment.source: Added support for various modern input features introduced in recent Windows 10 releases. These include emoji panel (Fall Creators Update), dictation (Fall Creators Update), hardware keyboard input suggestions (April 2018 Update), and cloud clipboard paste (October 2018 Update). (#7273)
segment.target: Dodana je podrka za razne moderne znaajke unosa uvedene u nedavnim izdanjima sustava Windows 10. To ukljuuje plou emojija (Fall Creators Update), diktiranje (Fall Creators Update), prijedloge za unos hardverske tipkovnice (auriranje za travanj 2018.) i lijepljenje meuspremnika u oblaku (auriranje za listopad 2018.). (#7273)

segment.source: Content marked as a block quote using ARIA (role blockquote) is now supported in Mozilla Firefox 63. (#8577)
segment.target: Sadraj oznaen kao blok citat pomou ARIA (role blockquote) sada je podran u Mozilla Firefoxu 63. (#8577)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The list of available languages in NVDA's General Settings is now sorted based on language names instead of ISO 639 codes. (#7284)
segment.target: Popis dostupnih jezika u NVDA Opim postavkama sada je sortiran na temelju naziva jezika umjesto ISO 639 kodova. (#7284)

segment.source: Added default gestures for Alt+Shift+Tab and Windows+Tab with all supported Freedom Scientific braille displays. (#7387)
segment.target: Dodane su zadane geste za Alt+Shift+Tab i Windows+Tab sa svim podranim Freedom Scientific brajicama. (#7387)

segment.source: For ALVA BC680 and protocol converter displays, it is now possible to assign different functions to the left and right smart pad, thumb and etouch keys. (#8230)
segment.target: Za ALVA BC680 i zaslone pretvaraa protokola sada je mogue dodijeliti razliite funkcije lijevoj i desnoj pametnoj tipki, palcu i tipkama etouch. (#8230)

segment.source: For ALVA BC6 displays, the key combination sp2+sp3 will now announce the current date and time, whereas sp1+sp2 emulates the Windows key. (#8230)
segment.target: Za ALVA BC6 zaslone, kombinacija tipki sp2+sp3 sada e objaviti trenutni datum i vrijeme, dok sp1+sp2 oponaa Windows tipku. (#8230)

segment.source: The user is asked once when NVDA starts if they are happy sending usage statistics to NV Access when checking for NVDA updates. (#8217)
segment.target: Korisnik se jednom pita kada NVDA pokrene je li zadovoljan slanjem statistike koritenja NV Accessu prilikom provjere NVDA auriranja. (#8217)

segment.source: When checking for updates, if the user has agreed to allow sending usage statistics to NV Access, NVDA will now send the name of the current synth driver and braille display in use, to aide in better prioritization for future work on these drivers. (#8217)
segment.target: Prilikom provjere auriranja, ako je korisnik pristao dopustiti slanje statistike koritenja NV Accessu, NVDA e sada poslati naziv trenutnog sintisajzerskog drajvera i Brailleovog pisma koji se koristi, kako bi pomogao u boljem odreivanju prioriteta za budui rad na tim upravljakim programima. (#8217)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.6.0. (#8365)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na verziju 3.6.0. (#8365)

segment.source: Updated the path to the correct Russian eight-dots Braille table. (#8446)
segment.target: Auriran put do ispravne ruske tablice Brailleovog pisma s osam toaka. (#8446)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-ng to 1.49.3dev commit 910f4c2. (#8561)
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak-ng na 1.49.3dev commit 910f4c2. (#8561)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Accessible labels for controls in Google Chrome are now more readily reported in browse mode when the label does not appear as content itself. (#4773)
segment.target: Pristupane oznake za kontrole u pregledniku Google Chrome sada se lake prijavljuju u nainu pregledavanja kada se oznaka ne prikazuje kao sam sadraj. (#4773)

segment.source: Notifications are now supported in Zoom. For example, this includes mute/unmute status, and incoming messages. (#7754)
segment.target: Obavijesti su sada podrane u Zoomu. Na primjer, to ukljuuje status iskljuivanja/ukljuivanja zvuka i dolazne poruke. (#7754)

segment.source: Switching braille context presentation when in browse mode no longer causes braille output to stop following browse mode cursor. (#7741)
segment.target: Prebacivanje kontekstne prezentacije brajice u modu pretraivanja vie ne uzrokuje prestanak ispisa brajice pratei pokaziva naina pretraivanja. (#7741)

segment.source: ALVA BC680 braille displays no longer intermittently fail to initialize. (#8106)
segment.target: ALVA BC680 Brajievi zasloni vie se povremeno ne inicijaliziraju. (#8106)

segment.source: By default, ALVA BC6 displays will no longer execute emulated system keyboard keys when pressing key combinations involving sp2+sp3 to trigger internal functionality. (#8230)
segment.target: Prema zadanim postavkama, ALVA BC6 zasloni vie nee izvravati emulirane tipke sistemske tipkovnice kada pritisnete kombinacije tipki koje ukljuuju sp2+sp3 za pokretanje interne funkcionalnosti. (#8230)

segment.source: Pressing sp2 on an ALVA BC6 display to emulate the alt key now works as advertised. (#8360)
segment.target: Pritiskom na sp2 na ALVA BC6 zaslonu za emulaciju alt tipke sada radi kako je reklamirano. (#8360)

segment.source: NVDA no longer announces redundant keyboard layout changes. (#7383, #8419)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne najavljuje suvine promjene rasporeda tipkovnice. (#7383, #8419)

segment.source: Mouse tracking is now much more accurate in Notepad and other plain text edit controls when in a document with more than 65535 characters. (#8397)
segment.target: Praenje mia sada je mnogo preciznije u Notepadu i drugim kontrolama za ureivanje obinog teksta kada je u dokumentu s vie od 65535 znakova. (#8397)

segment.source: NVDA will recognize more dialogs in Windows 10 and other modern applications. (#8405)
segment.target: NVDA e prepoznati vie dijaloga u sustavu Windows 10 i drugim modernim aplikacijama. (#8405)

segment.source: On Windows 10 October 2018 Update and Server 2019 and above, NVDA no longer fails to track the system focus when an application freezes or floods the system with events. (#7345, #8535)
segment.target: Na Windows 10 auriranju za listopad 2018. i Server 2019 i novijim verzijama, NVDA vie ne uspijeva pratiti fokus sustava kada se aplikacija zamrzne ili preplavi sustav dogaajima. (#7345, #8535)

segment.source: Users are now informed when attempting to read or copy an empty status bar. (#7789)
segment.target: Korisnici su sada obavijeteni prilikom pokuaja itanja ili kopiranja prazne statusne trake. (#7789)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where the "not checked" state on controls is not reported in speech if the control has previously been half checked. (#6946)
segment.target: Rijeen je problem zbog kojeg se stanje "nije provjereno" na kontrolama ne prijavljuje u govoru ako je kontrola prethodno napola provjerena. (#6946)

segment.source: In the list of languages in NVDA's General Settings, language name for Burmese is displayed correctly on Windows 7. (#8544)
segment.target: Na popisu jezika u NVDA Opim postavkama, naziv jezika za burmanski jezik ispravno je prikazan u sustavu Windows 7. (#8544)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, NVDA will announce notifications such as reading view availability and page load progress. (#8423)
segment.target: U Microsoft Edgeu, NVDA e objaviti obavijesti kao to su dostupnost prikaza za itanje i napredak uitavanja stranice. (#8423)

segment.source: When navigating into a list on the web, NVDA will now report its label if the web author has provided one. (#7652)
segment.target: Prilikom navigacije na popis na webu, NVDA e sada prijaviti svoju oznaku ako ju je autor web stranice naveo. (#7652)

segment.source: When manually assigning functions to gestures for a particular braille display, these gestures now always show up as being assigned to that display. Previously, they showed up as if they were assigned to the currently active display. (#8108)
segment.target: Prilikom runog dodjeljivanja funkcija gestama za odreeni brajini zaslon, te se geste sada uvijek prikazuju kao dodijeljene tom zaslonu. Prije su se prikazivali kao da su dodijeljeni trenutno aktivnom zaslonu. (#8108)

segment.source: The 64-bit version of Media Player Classic is now supported. (#6066)
segment.target: Sada je podrana 64-bitna verzija programa Media Player Classic. (#6066)

segment.source: Several improvements to braille support in Microsoft Word with UI Automation enabled:
segment.target: Nekoliko poboljanja podrke za Brailleovo pismo u programu Microsoft Word s omoguenom automatizacijom korisnikog suelja:

segment.source: Similar to other multiline text fields, When positioned at the start of a document in Braille, the display is now panned such that the first character of the document is at the start of the display. (#8406)
segment.target: Slino drugim tekstnim poljima s vie redaka, kada se postavi na poetak dokumenta na Brailleovom pismu, zaslon se sada pomie tako da je prvi znak dokumenta na poetku prikaza. (#8406)

segment.source: Reduced overly verbose focus presentation in both speech and braille when focusing a Word document. (#8407)
segment.target: Smanjena je pretjerano opirna prezentacija fokusa u govoru i na Brailleovom pismu prilikom fokusiranja dokumenta programa Word. (#8407)

segment.source: Cursor routing in braille now works correctly when in a list in a Word document. (#7971)
segment.target: Usmjeravanje pokazivaa na Brailleovom pismu sada ispravno funkcionira kada je na popisu u dokumentu programa Word. (#7971)

segment.source: Newly inserted bullets/numbers in a Word document are correctly reported in both speech and braille. (#7970)
segment.target: Novoumetnute grafike oznake/brojevi u Word dokumentu ispravno se prijavljuju i u govoru i na Brailleovom pismu. (#7970)

segment.source: In Windows 10 1803 and later, it is now possible to install add-ons if the "Use Unicode UTF-8 for worldwide language support" feature is enabled. (#8599)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 10 1803 i novijim verzijama sada je mogue instalirati dodatke ako je omoguena znaajka "Koristi Unicode UTF-8 za svjetsku jezinu podrku". (#8599)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer make iTunes 12.9 and newer completely unusable to interact with. (#8744)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee uiniti iTunes 12.9 i novije verzije potpuno neupotrebljivima za interakciju. (#8744)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Added scriptHandler.script, which can function as a decorator for scripts on scriptable objects. (#6266)
segment.target: Dodan scriptHandler.script, koji moe funkcionirati kao dekorator za skripte na objektima koji se mogu skriptirati. (#6266)

segment.source: A system test framework has been introduced for NVDA. (#708)
segment.target: Uveden je okvir za testiranje sustava za NVDA. (#708)

segment.source: Some changes have been made to the hwPortUtils module: (#1271)
segment.target: Napravljene su neke promjene u modulu hwPortUtils: (#1271)

segment.source: listUsbDevices now yields dictionaries with device information including hardwareID and devicePath.
segment.target: listUsbDevices sada daje rjenike s informacijama o ureaju, ukljuujui hardwareID i devicePath.

segment.source: Dictionaries yielded by listComPorts now also contain a usbID entry for COM ports with USB VID/PID information in their hardware ID.
segment.target: Rjenici koje daje listComPorts sada takoer sadre unos usbID-a za COM prikljuke s USB VID/PID informacijama u njihovom hardverskom ID-u.

segment.source: Updated wxPython to 4.0.3. (#7077)
segment.target: Auriran wxPython na 4.0.3. (#7077)

segment.source: As NVDA now only supports Windows 7 SP1 and later, the key "minWindowsVersion" used to check if UIA should be enabled for a particular release of Windows has been removed. (#8422)
segment.target: Budui da NVDA sada podrava samo Windows 7 SP1 i novije verzije, uklonjen je klju "minWindowsVersion" koji se koristi za provjeru treba li UIA biti omoguen za odreeno izdanje Windowsa. (#8422)

segment.source: You can now register to be notified about configuration saves/reset actions via new config.pre_configSave, config.post_configSave, config.pre_configReset, and config.post_configReset actions. (#7598)
segment.target: Sada se moete registrirati da biste bili obavijeteni o radnjama spremanja/resetiranja konfiguracije putem novih radnji config.pre_configSave, config.post_configSave, config.pre_configReset i config.post_configReset. (#7598)

segment.source: config.pre_configSave is used to be notified when NVDA's configuration is about to be saved, and config.post_configSave is called after configuration has been saved.
segment.target: config.pre_configSave se koristi za obavjetavanje kada se NVDA konfiguracija sprema za spremanje, a config.post_configSave se poziva nakon spremanja konfiguracije.

segment.source: config.pre_configReset and config.post_configReset includes a factory defaults flag to specify if settings are reloaded from disk (false) or reset to defaults (true).
segment.target: config.pre_configReset i config.post_configReset ukljuuje zastavicu tvorniki zadane postavke koja odreuje hoe li se postavke ponovno uitati s diska (false) ili vratiti na zadane postavke (true).

segment.source: config.configProfileSwitch has been renamed to config.post_configProfileSwitch to reflect the fact that this action is called after profile switch takes place. (#7598)
segment.target: config.configProfileSwitch preimenovan je u config.post_configProfileSwitch kako bi odraavao injenicu da se ta radnja poziva nakon promjene profila. (#7598)

segment.source: UI Automation interfaces updated to Windows 10 October 2018 Update and Server 2019 (IUIAutomation6 / IUIAutomationElement9). (#8473)
segment.target: Suelja za automatizaciju korisnikog suelja aurirana su na Windows 10 auriranje za listopad 2018. i Server 2019 (IUIAutomation6 / IUIAutomationElement9). (#8473)

segment.source: This release includes translation updates due to last-minute removal of a feature which caused problems.
segment.target: Ovo izdanje ukljuuje auriranja prijevoda zbog uklanjanja znaajke koja je uzrokovala probleme u zadnji as.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include Support for tables in Kindle for PC, support for HumanWare BrailleNote Touch and BI14 Braille displays, Improvements to both Onecore and Sapi5 speech synthesizers, improvements in Microsoft Outlook and much more.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja ukljuuju podrku za tablice u Kindleu za PC, podrku za HumanWare BrailleNote Touch i BI14 Brailleove zaslone, poboljanja Onecore i Sapi5 sintisajzera govora, poboljanja u programu Microsoft Outlook i jo mnogo toga.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: row and column span for table cells is now reported in speech and braille. (#2642)
segment.target: Raspon redaka i stupaca za elije tablice sada se izvjetava u govoru i Brailleovom pismu. (#2642)

segment.source: NVDA table navigation commands are now supported in Google Docs (with Braille mode enabled). (#7946)
segment.target: Naredbe za navigaciju NVDA tablicom sada su podrane u Google dokumentima (s omoguenim Brailleovim modom). (#7946)

segment.source: Added ability to read and navigate tables in Kindle for PC. (#7977)
segment.target: Dodana je mogunost itanja i navigacije tablicama u Kindleu za PC. (#7977)

segment.source: Support for HumanWare BrailleNote touch and Brailliant BI 14 braille displays via both USB and bluetooth. (#6524)
segment.target: Podrka za HumanWare BrailleNote touch i Brailliant BI 14 brajice putem USB-a i Bluetootha. (#6524)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Fall Creators Update and later, NVDA can announce notifications from apps such as Calculator and Windows Store. (#7984)
segment.target: U Windows 10 Fall Creators Update i novijim verzijama, NVDA moe najavljivati obavijesti iz aplikacija kao to su Kalkulator i Windows Store. (#7984)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Lithuanian 8 dot, Ukrainian, Mongolian grade 2. (#7839)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: litavski 8 toaka, ukrajinski, mongolski razred 2. (#7839)

segment.source: Added a script to report formatting information for the text under a specific braille cell. (#7106)
segment.target: Dodana je skripta za izvjeivanje o informacijama o oblikovanju teksta ispod odreene elije brajice. (#7106)

segment.source: When updating NVDA, it is now possible to postpone the installation of the update to a later moment. (#4263)
segment.target: Prilikom auriranja NVDA-a sada je mogue odgoditi instalaciju auriranja za kasniji trenutak. (#4263)

segment.source: New languages: Mongolian, Swiss German.
segment.target: Novi jezici: mongolski, vicarski njemaki.

segment.source: You can now toggle control, shift, alt, windows and NVDA from your braille keyboard and combine these modifiers with braille input (e.g. press control+s). (#7306)
segment.target: Sada moete prebacivati control, shift, alt, windows i NVDA s brajice i kombinirati te modifikatore s brajinim unosom (npr. pritisnite control+s). (#7306)

segment.source: You can assign these new modifier toggles using the commands found under Emulated system keyboard keys in the Input gestures dialog.
segment.target: Ove nove prekidae modifikatora moete dodijeliti pomou naredbi koje se nalaze u odjeljku Emulirane tipke sistemske tipkovnice u dijalokom okviru Geste unosa.

segment.source: Restored support for Handy Tech Braillino and Modular (with old firmware) displays. (#8016)
segment.target: Vraena podrka za Handy Tech Braillino i Modular (sa starim firmware) zaslonima. (#8016)

segment.source: Date and time for supported Handy Tech devices (such as Active Braille and Active Star) will now automatically be synchronized by NVDA when out of sync more than five seconds. (#8016)
segment.target: Datum i vrijeme za podrane Handy Tech ureaje (kao to su Active Braille i Active Star) sada e se automatski sinkronizirati od strane NVDA kada nisu sinkronizirani dulje od pet sekundi. (#8016)

segment.source: An input gesture can be assigned to temporarily disable all configuration profile triggers. (#4935)
segment.target: Moe se dodijeliti gesta unosa kako bi se privremeno onemoguili svi okidai konfiguracijskog profila. (#4935)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The status column in the addons manager has been changed to indicate if the addon is enabled or disabled rather than running or suspended. (#7929)
segment.target: Stupac statusa u upravitelju dodataka promijenjen je kako bi se naznailo je li dodatak omoguen ili onemoguen, a ne pokrenut ili obustavljen. (#7929)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 3.5.0. (#7839)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na 3.5.0. (#7839)

segment.source: The Lithuanian braille table has been renamed to Lithuanian 6 dot to avoid confusion with the new 8 dot table. (#7839)
segment.target: Litavska tablica na Brailleovom pismu preimenovana je u litavsku tablicu sa 6 toaka kako bi se izbjegla zabuna s novom tablicom s 8 toaka. (#7839)

segment.source: The French (Canada) grade 1 and grade 2 tables have been removed. Instead, the French (unified) 6 dot computer braille and Grade 2 tables will be used respectively. (#7839)
segment.target: Francuske (Kanada) tablice 1. i 2. razreda su uklonjene. Umjesto toga, koristit e se francuska (ujedinjena) raunalna brajica sa 6 toaka i tablice 2. stupnja. (#7839)

segment.source: The secondary routing buttons on Alva BC6, EuroBraille and Papenmeier braille displays now report formatting information for the text under the braille cell of that button. (#7106)
segment.target: Sekundarni gumbi za usmjeravanje na Alva BC6, EuroBrailleovom i Papenmeierovom Brailleovom pismu sada izvjetavaju o informacijama o oblikovanju teksta ispod brajice tog gumba. (#7106)

segment.source: Contracted braille input tables will automatically fall back to uncontracted mode in non-editable cases (i.e. controls where there is no cursor or in browse mode). (#7306)
segment.target: Skraene tablice za unos Brailleovog pisma automatski e se vratiti u neskraeni nain rada u sluajevima koji se ne mogu ureivati (tj. kontrole u kojima nema pokazivaa ili u nainu pregledavanja). (#7306)

segment.source: NVDA is now less verbose when an appointment or time slot in the Outlook calendar covers an entire day. (#7949)
segment.target: NVDA je sada manje opiran kada termin ili termin u Outlook kalendaru pokriva cijeli dan. (#7949)

segment.source: All of NVDA's Preferences can now be found in one settings dialog under NVDA Menu -> Preferences -> Settings, rather than scattered throughout many dialogs. (#577)
segment.target: Sve NVDA postavke sada se mogu pronai u jednom dijalokom okviru postavki pod NVDA izbornikom -> Postavke -> Postavke, umjesto da su razbacane po mnogim dijalokim okvirima. (#577)

segment.source: The default speech synthesizer when running on Windows 10 is now oneCore speech rather than eSpeak. (#8176)
segment.target: Zadani sintisajzer govora kada se izvodi u sustavu Windows 10 sada je oneCore govor, a ne eSpeak. (#8176)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to read focused controls in the Microsoft Account sign-in screen in Settings after entering an email address. (#7997)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne uspijeva itati fokusirane kontrole na zaslonu za prijavu na Microsoftov raun u Postavkama nakon unosa adrese e-pote. (#7997)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to read the page when going back to a previous page in Microsoft Edge. (#7997)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne uspijeva proitati stranicu kada se vratite na prethodnu stranicu u Microsoft Edgeu. (#7997)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer incorrectly announce the final character of a windows 10 sign-in PIN as the machine unlocks. (#7908)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee pogreno najavljivati konani znak PIN-a za prijavu na Windows 10 dok se ureaj otkljuava. (#7908)

segment.source: Labels of checkboxes and radio buttons in Chrome and Firefox are no longer reported twice when tabbing or using quick navigation in Browse mode. (#7960)
segment.target: Oznake potvrdnih okvira i izbornih gumba u Chromeu i Firefoxu vie se ne prijavljuju dvaput prilikom kartice ili upotrebe brze navigacije u nainu pregledavanja. (#7960)

segment.source: aria-current with a value of false will be announced as "false" instead of "true". (#7892).
segment.target: aria-current s vrijednou false bit e objavljen kao "false" umjesto "true". (#7892).

segment.source: Windows OneCore Voices no longer fails to load if the configured voice has been uninstalled. (#7553)
segment.target: Windows OneCore Voices vie se ne uitava ako je konfigurirani glas deinstaliran. (#7553)

segment.source: Changing voices in the Windows OneCore Voices is now a lot faster. (#7999)
segment.target: Promjena glasova u Windows OneCore Voices sada je puno bra. (#7999)

segment.source: Fixed malformed braille output for several braille tables, including capital signs in 8 dot contracted Danish braille. (#7526, #7693)
segment.target: Popravljen je neispravan izlaz Brailleovog pisma za nekoliko tablica na Brailleovom pismu, ukljuujui velike znakove u danskom Brailleovom pismu sa skraenim 8 toaka. (#7526, #7693)

segment.source: NVDA can now report more bullet types in Microsoft Word. (#6778)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe prijaviti vie vrsta grafikih oznaka u programu Microsoft Word. (#6778)

segment.source: Pressing the report formatting script no longer incorrectly moves the reviewPosition and therefore pressing it multiple times no longer gives different results. (#7869)
segment.target: Pritiskom na skriptu za oblikovanje izvjea vie se ne pomie reviewPosition pogreno i stoga viekratni pritisak vie ne daje razliite rezultate. (#7869)

segment.source: Braille input no longer allows you to use contracted braille in cases where it is not supported (i.e. whole words will no longer be sent to the system outside text content and in browse mode). (#7306)
segment.target: Unos Brailleovog pisma vie ne doputa koritenje ugovorene brajice u sluajevima kada nije podran (tj. cijele rijei vie se nee slati u sustav izvan tekstualnog sadraja i u nainu pregledavanja). (#7306)

segment.source: Fixed connection stability issues for Handy Tech Easy Braille and Braille Wave displays. (#8016)
segment.target: Rijeeni su problemi sa stabilnou veze za zaslone Handy Tech Easy Braille i Braille Wave. (#8016)

segment.source: On Windows 8 and later, NVDA will no longer announce "unknown" when opening quick link menu )Windows+X) and selecting items from this menu. (#8137)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 8 i novijim verzijama, NVDA vie nee objavljivati "nepoznato" prilikom otvaranja izbornika brzih veza )Windows+X) i odabira stavki iz ovog izbornika. (#8137)

segment.source: Model specific gestures to buttons on Hims displays are now working as advertised in the user guide. (#8096)
segment.target: Geste specifine za model na gumbima na Hims zaslonima sada rade kako je oglaeno u korisnikom priruniku. (#8096)

segment.source: NVDA will now try to correct system COM registration issues causing programs such as Firefox and Internet Explorer to become inaccessible and report "Unknown" by NVDA. (#2807)
segment.target: NVDA e sada pokuati ispraviti probleme s registracijom COM-a sustava uzrokujui da programi kao to su Firefox i Internet Explorer postanu nedostupni i prijave "Nepoznato" od strane NVDA-e. (#2807)

segment.source: Worked around a bug in Task Manager causing NVDA to not allow users to access the contents of specific details about processes. (#8147)
segment.target: Zaobiao je greku u Upravitelju zadataka zbog koje NVDA ne doputa korisnicima pristup sadraju odreenih detalja o procesima. (#8147)

segment.source: Newer Microsoft SAPI5 voices no longer lag at the end of speech, making it much more efficient to navigate with these voices. (#8174)
segment.target: Noviji glasovi Microsoft SAPI5 vie ne zaostaju na kraju govora, to ini navigaciju s tim glasovima mnogo uinkovitijom. (#8174)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports (LTR and RTL marks) in Braille or per-character speech when accessing the clock in recent versions of Windows. (#5729)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izvjetava (LTR i RTL oznake) na Brailleovom pismu ili govoru po znaku prilikom pristupa satu u novijim verzijama sustava Windows. (#5729)

segment.source: Detection of scroll keys on Hims Smart Beetle displays is once more no longer unreliable. (#6086)
segment.target: Otkrivanje tipki za pomicanje na zaslonima Hims Smart Beetle ponovno nije nepouzdano. (#6086)

segment.source: In some text controls, particularly in Delphi applications, the information provided about editing and navigating is now much more reliable. (#636, #8102)
segment.target: U nekim tekstualnim kontrolama, posebno u Delphi aplikacijama, informacije o ureivanju i navigaciji sada su mnogo pouzdanije. (#636, #8102)

segment.source: In Windows 10 RS5, NVDA no longer reports extra redundant information when switching tasks with alt+tab. (#8258)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 10 RS5 NVDA vie ne izvjetava o dodatnim suvinim informacijama prilikom prebacivanja zadataka pomou alt+tab. (#8258)

segment.source: Changes for developers
segment.target: Promjene za razvojne programere

segment.source: The developer info for UIA objects now contains a list of the UIA patterns available. (#5712)
segment.target: Informacije za razvojne inenjere za UIA objekte sada sadre popis dostupnih UIA uzoraka. (#5712)

segment.source: App modules can now force certain windows to always use UIA by implementing the isGoodUIAWindow method. (#7961)
segment.target: Moduli aplikacije sada mogu prisiliti odreene prozore da uvijek koriste UIA implementacijom metode isGoodUIAWindow. (#7961)

segment.source: The hidden boolean flag "outputPass1Only" in the braille section of the configuration has again been removed. Liblouis no longer supports pass 1 only output. (#7839)
segment.target: Skrivena logika oznaka "outputPass1Only" u odjeljku Brailleovog pisma konfiguracije ponovno je uklonjena. Liblouis vie ne podrava izlaz samo za prolaz 1. (#7839)

segment.source: This is a special release of NVDA which addresses a bug in the Onecore Windows Speech synthesizer driver, which was causing it to speak with a higher pitch and speed in Windows 10 Redstone 4 (1803). (#8082)
segment.target: Ovo je posebno izdanje NVDA koje rjeava greku u upravljakom programu Onecore Windows Speech sintisajzera, zbog ega je govorio s veom visinom i brzinom u sustavu Windows 10 Redstone 4 (1803). (#8082)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for charts in Microsoft word and PowerPoint, support for new braille displays including Eurobraille and the Optelec protocol converter, improved support for Hims and Optelec braille displays, performance improvements for Mozilla Firefox 58 and higher, and much more.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja ukljuuju podrku za grafikone u Microsoft Wordu i PowerPointu, podrku za nove Brailleove zaslone ukljuujui Eurobraille i pretvara protokola Optelec, poboljanu podrku za Brailleove zaslone Hims i Optelec, poboljanja performansi za Mozilla Firefox 58 i novije verzije i jo mnogo toga.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: It is now possible to interact with charts in Microsoft Word and Microsoft PowerPoint, similar to the existing support for charts in Microsoft Excel. (#7046)
segment.target: Sada je mogua interakcija s grafikonima u programima Microsoft Word i Microsoft PowerPoint, slino postojeoj podrci za grafikone u programu Microsoft Excel. (#7046)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word: When in browse mode, cursor to an embedded chart and press enter to interact with it.
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word: Kada ste u nainu pregledavanja, pokaziva na ugraeni grafikon i pritisnite enter za interakciju s njim.

segment.source: In Microsoft PowerPoint when editing a slide: tab to a chart object, and press enter or space to interact with the chart.
segment.target: U programu Microsoft PowerPoint prilikom ureivanja slajda: tabulatorom do objekta grafikona i pritisnite enter ili razmaknicu za interakciju s grafikonom.

segment.source: To stop interacting with a chart, press escape.
segment.target: Da biste zaustavili interakciju s grafikonom, pritisnite escape.

segment.source: New language: Kyrgyz.
segment.target: Novi jezik: kirgiski.

segment.source: Added support for VitalSource Bookshelf. (#7155)
segment.target: Dodana podrka za VitalSource Bookshelf. (#7155)

segment.source: Added support for the Optelec protocol converter, a device that allows one to use Braille Voyager and Satellite displays using the ALVA BC6 communication protocol. (#6731)
segment.target: Dodana je podrka za pretvara protokola Optelec, ureaj koji omoguuje koritenje Brailleovog Voyagera i satelitskih zaslona pomou komunikacijskog protokola ALVA BC6. (#6731)

segment.source: It is now possible to use braille input with an ALVA 640 Comfort braille display. (#7733)
segment.target: Sada je mogue koristiti Brailleov ulaz s ALVA 640 Comfort brajinim pismom. (#7733)

segment.source: NVDA's braille input functionality can be used with these as well as other BC6 displays with firmware 3.0.0 and above.
segment.target: NVDA funkcija brajinog unosa moe se koristiti s ovim, kao i s drugim BC6 zaslonima s firmverom 3.0.0 i novijim.

segment.source: Early support for Google Sheets with Braille mode enabled. (#7935)
segment.target: Rana podrka za Google tablice s omoguenim nainom rada Brailleovog pisma. (#7935)

segment.source: Support for Eurobraille Esys, Esytime and Iris braille displays. (#7488)
segment.target: Podrka za Eurobraille Esys, Esytime i Iris Brailleove zaslone. (#7488)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The HIMS Braille Sense/Braille EDGE/Smart Beetle and Hims Sync Braille display drivers have been replaced by one driver. The new driver will automatically be activated for former syncBraille driver users. (#7459)
segment.target: Upravljaki programi HIMS Braille Sense/Braille EDGE/Smart Beetle i Hims Sync Brailleovog zaslona zamijenjeni su jednim upravljakim programom. Novi upravljaki program automatski e se aktivirati za bive korisnike upravljakog programa za sinkronizaciju Brailleovog pisma. (#7459)

segment.source: Some keys , notably scroll keys, have been reassigned to follow the conventions used by Hims products. Consult the user guide for more details.
segment.target: Neke tipke, posebno tipke za pomicanje, prerasporeene su kako bi slijedile konvencije koje koriste Himsovi proizvodi. Za vie detalja pogledajte korisniki prirunik.

segment.source: When typing with the on-screen keyboard via touch interaction, by default you now need to double tap each key the same way you would activate any other control. (#7309)
segment.target: Kada tipkate zaslonskom tipkovnicom putem interakcije dodirom, prema zadanim postavkama sada morate dvaput dodirnuti svaku tipku na isti nain na koji biste aktivirali bilo koju drugu kontrolu. (#7309)

segment.source: To use the existing "touch typing" mode where simply lifting your finger off the key is enough to activate it, Enable this option in the new Touch Interaction settings dialog found in the Preferences menu.
segment.target: Da biste koristili postojei nain "tipkanja dodirom" u kojem je jednostavno podizanje prsta s tipke dovoljno da biste ga aktivirali, omoguite ovu opciju u novom dijalokom okviru postavki interakcije dodirom koji se nalazi u izborniku Postavke.

segment.source: It is no longer necessary to explicitly tether braille to focus or review, as this will happen automatically by default. (#2385)
segment.target: Vie nije potrebno izriito vezati Brailleovo pismo za fokusiranje ili pregled jer e se to automatski dogoditi prema zadanim postavkama. (#2385)

segment.source: Note that automatic tethering to review will only occur when using a review cursor or object navigation command. Scrolling will not activate this new behavior.
segment.target: Imajte na umu da e se automatsko povezivanje za pregled dogoditi samo kada koristite pokaziva pregleda ili naredbu za navigaciju objektom. Pomicanje nee aktivirati ovo novo ponaanje.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Browseable messages such as showing current formatting when pressing NVDA+f twice quickly no longer fails when NVDA is installed on a path with non-ASCII characters. (#7474)
segment.target: Poruke koje se mogu pregledavati, kao to je prikaz trenutnog formatiranja kada se dvaput brzo pritisne NVDA+f, vie ne uspijevaju kada je NVDA instaliran na putu s ne-ASCII znakovima. (#7474)

segment.source: Focus is now once again restored correctly when returning to Spotify from another application. (#7689)
segment.target: Fokus se sada ponovno ispravno vraa kada se vratite na Spotify iz druge aplikacije. (#7689)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Fall Creaters Update, NVDA no longer fails to update when Controlled Folder Access is enabled from Windows Defender Security Center. (#7696)
segment.target: U Windows 10 Fall Creaters Update, NVDA se vie ne aurira kada je omoguen kontrolirani pristup mapi iz Windows Defender Security Centera. (#7696)

segment.source: Detection of scroll keys on Hims Smart Beetle displays is no longer unreliable. (#6086)
segment.target: Otkrivanje tipki za pomicanje na zaslonima Hims Smart Beetle vie nije nepouzdano. (#6086)

segment.source: A slight performance improvement when rendering large amounts of content in Mozilla Firefox 58 and later. (#7719)
segment.target: Blago poboljanje performansi pri renderiranju velikih koliina sadraja u Mozilla Firefoxu 58 i novijim verzijama. (#7719)

segment.source: In Microsoft Outlook, reading emails containing tables no longer causes errors. (#6827)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Outlook itanje e-pote koja sadri tablice vie ne uzrokuje pogreke. (#6827)

segment.source: Braille display gestures that emulate system keyboard key modifiers can now also be combined with other emulated system keyboard keys if one or more of the involved gestures are model specific. (#7783)
segment.target: Geste na Brailleovom pismu koje oponaaju modifikatore tipki tipkovnice sustava sada se mogu kombinirati i s drugim emuliranim tipkama tipkovnice sustava ako je jedna ili vie ukljuenih gesti specifino za model. (#7783)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, browse mode now works correctly in pop-ups created by extensions such as LastPass and bitwarden. (#7809)
segment.target: U pregledniku Mozilla Firefox, nain pregledavanja sada ispravno funkcionira u skonim prozorima koje stvaraju proirenja kao to su LastPass i bitwarden. (#7809)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes freezes on every focus change if Firefox or Chrome have stopped responding such as due to a freeze or crash. (#7818)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne zamrzava pri svakoj promjeni fokusa ako Firefox ili Chrome prestanu reagirati, primjerice zbog zamrzavanja ili ruenja. (#7818)

segment.source: In twitter clients such as Chicken Nugget, NVDA will no longer ignore the last 20 characters of 280 character tweets when reading them. (#7828)
segment.target: U twitter klijentima kao to je Chicken Nugget, NVDA vie nee ignorirati posljednjih 20 znakova od 280 znakova tweetova kada ih ita. (#7828)

segment.source: NVDA now uses the correct language when announcing symbols when text is selected. (#7687)
segment.target: NVDA sada koristi ispravan jezik prilikom najavljivanja simbola kada je odabran tekst. (#7687)

segment.source: In recent versions of Office 365, it is again possible to navigate Excel charts using the arrow keys. (#7046)
segment.target: U novijim verzijama sustava Office 365 ponovno je mogue kretati se Excel grafikonima pomou tipki sa strelicama. (#7046)

segment.source: In speech and braille output, control states will now always be reported in the same order, regardless whether they are positive or negative. (#7076)
segment.target: U govoru i Brailleovom pismu, kontrolna stanja sada e se uvijek izvjetavati istim redoslijedom, bez obzira jesu li pozitivna ili negativna. (#7076)

segment.source: In apps such as Windows 10 Mail, NVDA will no longer fail to announce deleted characters when pressing backspace. (#7456)
segment.target: U aplikacijama kao to je Windows 10 Mail, NVDA vie nee proputati najavljivati izbrisane znakove kada pritisnete backspace. (#7456)

segment.source: All keys on the Hims Braille Sense Polaris displays are now working as expected. (#7865)
segment.target: Sve tipke na zaslonima Hims Braille Sense Polaris sada rade prema oekivanjima. (#7865)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to start on Windows 7 complaining about an internal api-ms dll, when a particular version of the Visual Studio 2017 redistributables have been installed by another application. (#7975)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne pokree u sustavu Windows 7 koji se ali na interni api-ms dll, kada je odreena verzija programa Visual Studio 2017 za redistribuciju instalirana u drugoj aplikaciji. (#7975)

segment.source: Changes for developers
segment.target: Promjene za razvojne programere

segment.source: Added a hidden boolean flag to the braille section in the configuration: "outputPass1Only". (#7301, #7693, #7702)
segment.target: Dodana je skrivena logika zastavica u odjeljak brajice u konfiguraciji: "outputPass1Only". (#7301, #7693, #7702)

segment.source: This flag defaults to true. If false, liblouis multi pass rules will be used for braille output.
segment.target: Ova zastavica je zadana na true. Ako je netono, liblouis multi pass pravila koristit e se za Brailleov izlaz.

segment.source: A new dictionary (braille.RENAMED_DRIVERS) has been added to allow for smooth transition for users using drivers that have been superseded by others. (#7459)
segment.target: Novi rjenik (Brailleovo pismo. RENAMED_DRIVERS) je dodan kako bi se omoguio nesmetan prijelaz za korisnike koji koriste upravljake programe koje su zamijenili drugi. (#7459)

segment.source: Updated comtypes package to 1.1.3. (#7831)
segment.target: Auriran paket komtipova na 1.1.3. (#7831)

segment.source: Implemented a generic system in braille.BrailleDisplayDriver to deal with displays which send confirmation/acknowledgement packets. See the handyTech braille display driver as an example. (#7590, #7721)
segment.target: Implementiran je generiki sustav na Brailleovom pismu. BrailleDisplayDriver za rad sa zaslonima koji alju pakete potvrde/potvrde. Pogledajte handyTech upravljaki program za brajicu kao primjer. (#7590, #7721)

segment.source: A new "isAppX" variable in the config module can be used to detect if NVDA is running as a Windows Desktop Bridge Store app. (#7851)
segment.target: Nova varijabla "isAppX" u konfiguracijskom modulu moe se koristiti za otkrivanje radi li NVDA kao Windows Desktop Bridge Store aplikacija. (#7851)

segment.source: For document implementations such as NVDAObjects or browseMode that have a textInfo, there is now a new documentBase.documentWithTableNavigation class that can be inherited from to gain standard table navigation scripts. Please refer to this class to see which helper methods must be provided by your implementation for table navigation to work. (#7849)
segment.target: Za implementacije dokumenata kao to su NVDAObjects ili browseMode koje imaju textInfo, sada postoji nova klasa documentBase.documentWithTableNavigation koja se moe naslijediti da bi se dobile standardne skripte za navigaciju tablicama. Molimo pogledajte ovaj razred da biste vidjeli koje pomone metode mora osigurati vaa implementacija da bi navigacija tablicom funkcionirala. (#7849)

segment.source: The scons batch file now better handles when Python 3 is also installed, making use of the launcher to specifically launch python 2.7 32 bit. (#7541)
segment.target: Skupna datoteka scons sada se bolje nosi kada je instaliran i Python 3, koristei pokreta za posebno pokretanje pythona 2.7 32 bita. (#7541)

segment.source: hwIo.Hid now takes an additional parameter exclusive, which defaults to True. If set to False, other applications are allowed to communicate with a device while it is connected to NVDA. (#7859)
segment.target: hwIo.Hid sada uzima dodatni parametar exclusive, koji je zadani True. Ako je postavljeno na False, drugim aplikacijama doputeno je komunicirati s ureajem dok je povezan s NVDA. (#7859)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include many fixes and enhancements to web support including browse mode for web dialogs by default, better reporting of field group labels in browse mode, support for new Windows 10 technologies such as Windows Defender Application Guard and Windows 10 on ARM64, and automatic reporting of screen orientation and battery status.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja ukljuuju mnoge popravke i poboljanja web-podrke, ukljuujui nain pregledavanja za web-dijaloke okvire prema zadanim postavkama, bolje izvjeivanje o oznakama grupa polja u nainu pregledavanja, podrku za nove tehnologije sustava Windows 10 kao to su Windows Defender Application Guard i Windows 10 na ARM64 te automatsko izvjeivanje o orijentaciji zaslona i statusu baterije.

segment.source: Please note that this version of NVDA no longer supports Windows XP or Windows Vista. The minimum requirement for NVDA is now windows 7 with Service Pack 1.
segment.target: Imajte na umu da ova verzija NVDA vie ne podrava Windows XP ili Windows Vista. Minimalni preduvjet za NVDA sada je Windows 7 sa servisnim paketom Service Pack 1.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: In browse mode, it is now possible to skip past/to the start of landmarks using the skip to end/beginning of container commands (comma/shift+comma). (#5482)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, sada je mogue preskoiti pored/na poetak orijentira pomou naredbi "preskoi na kraj/poetak kontejnera" (zarez/shift+zarez). (#5482)

segment.source: In Firefox, Chrome and Internet Explorer, quick navigation to edit fields and form fields now includes editable rich text content (I.e. contentEditable). (#5534)
segment.target: U Firefoxu, Chromeu i Internet Exploreru brza navigacija za ureivanje polja i polja obrazaca sada ukljuuje sadraj obogaenog teksta koji se moe ureivati (tj. (#5534)

segment.source: In web browsers, the Elements List can now list form fields and buttons. (#588)
segment.target: U web-preglednicima popis elemenata sada moe navesti polja i gumbe obrasca. (#588)

segment.source: Initial support for Windows 10 on ARM64. (#7508)
segment.target: Poetna podrka za Windows 10 na ARM64. (#7508)

segment.source: Early support for reading and interactive navigation of mathematical content for Kindle books with accessible math. (#7536)
segment.target: Rana podrka za itanje i interaktivnu navigaciju matematikim sadrajem za Kindle knjige s pristupanom matematikom. (#7536)

segment.source: Added support for Azardi e-book reader. (#5848)
segment.target: Dodana podrka za Azardi ita e-knjiga. (#5848)

segment.source: Version information for add-ons is now reported when being updated. (#5324)
segment.target: Informacije o verziji dodataka sada se prijavljuju prilikom auriranja. (#5324)

segment.source: Added new command line parameters to create a portable copy of NVDA. (#6329)
segment.target: Dodani su novi parametri naredbenog retka za stvaranje prijenosne kopije NVDA. (#6329)

segment.source: Support for Microsoft Edge running within Windows Defender Application Guard in Windows 10 Fall Creators Update. (#7600)
segment.target: Podrka za Microsoft Edge koji se izvodi unutar Windows Defender Application Guarda u Windows 10 Fall Creators Update. (#7600)

segment.source: If running on a laptop or tablet, NVDA will now report when a charger is connected/disconnected, and when the screen orientation changes. (#4574, #4612)
segment.target: Ako radi na prijenosnom raunalu ili tabletu, NVDA e sada izvijestiti kada je punja spojen/iskljuen i kada se promijeni orijentacija zaslona. (#4574, #4612)

segment.source: New language: Macedonian.
segment.target: Novi jezik: makedonski.

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Croatian grade 1, Vietnamese grade 1. (#7518, #7565)
segment.target: Nove tablice prijevoda na Brailleovom pismu: hrvatski razred 1, vijetnamski razred 1. razred. (#7518, #7565)

segment.source: Support for the Actilino braille display from Handy Tech has been added. (#7590)
segment.target: Dodana je podrka za Actilino Brailleov zaslon tvrtke Handy Tech. (#7590)

segment.source: Braille input for Handy Tech braille displays is now supported. (#7590)
segment.target: Unos brajice za zaslone za Brailleovo pismo Handy Tech sada je podran. (#7590)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The minimum supported Operating System for NVDA is now Windows 7 Service Pack 1, or Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1. (#7546)
segment.target: Minimalni podrani operativni sustav za NVDA sada je Windows 7 Service Pack 1 ili Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1. (#7546)

segment.source: Web dialogs in Firefox and Chrome web browsers now automatically use browse Mode, unless inside of a web application. (#4493)
segment.target: Web dijaloki okviri u Firefox i Chrome web preglednicima sada automatski koriste nain pregledavanja, osim ako se ne nalaze u web aplikaciji. (#4493)

segment.source: In browse mode, tabbing and moving with quick navigation commands no longer announces jumping out of containers such as lists and tables, which makes navigating more efficient. (#2591)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, tabulatori i pomicanje pomou naredbi za brzu navigaciju vie ne najavljuju iskakanje iz spremnika kao to su popisi i tablice, to navigaciju ini uinkovitijom. (#2591)

segment.source: In Browse mode for Firefox and Chrome, the name of form field groups are now announced when moving into them with quick navigation or when tabbing. (#3321)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja za Firefox i Chrome, nazivi grupa polja obrasca sada se najavljuju kada se kreete u njih brzom navigacijom ili prilikom kartice. (#3321)

segment.source: In browse mode, the quick navigation command for embedded objects (o and shift+o) now includes audio and video elements as well as elements with the aria roles application and dialog. (#7239)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, naredba za brzu navigaciju za ugraene objekte (o i shift+o) sada ukljuuje audio i video elemente, kao i elemente s aplikacijom aria uloga i dijalokim okvirom. (#7239)

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.49.2, resolving some issues with producing release builds. (#7385, #7583)
segment.target: Espeak-ng je auriran na 1.49.2, rjeavajui neke probleme s proizvodnjom verzija izdanja. (#7385, #7583)

segment.source: On the third activation of the 'read status bar' command, its contents is copied to the clipboard. (#1785)
segment.target: Pri treoj aktivaciji naredbe 'itaj statusnu traku', njezin se sadraj kopira u meuspremnik. (#1785)

segment.source: When assigning gestures to keys on a Baum display, you can limit them to the model of the braille display in use (e.g. VarioUltra or Pronto). (#7517)
segment.target: Kada dodjeljujete geste tipkama na Baumovom zaslonu, moete ih ograniiti na model zaslona za brajicu koji se koristi (npr. VarioUltra ili Pronto). (#7517)

segment.source: The hotkey for the filter field in the elements list in browse mode has changed from alt+f to alt+e. (#7569)
segment.target: Preac za polje filtra na popisu elemenata u nainu pregledavanja promijenio se iz alt+f u alt+e. (#7569)

segment.source: An unbound command has been added for browse mode to toggle the inclusion of layout tables on the fly. You can find this command in the Browse mode category of the Input Gestures dialog. (#7634)
segment.target: Dodana je nevezana naredba za nain pregledavanja kako bi se ukljuilo ukljuivanje tablica izgleda u hodu. Ovu naredbu moete pronai u kategoriji Nain pregledavanja u dijalokom okviru Ulazne geste. (#7634)

segment.source: Upgraded liblouis braille translator to 3.3.0. (#7565)
segment.target: Nadograen liblouis prevoditelj brajice na 3.3.0. (#7565)

segment.source: The hotkey for the regular expression radio button in the dictionary dialog has changed from alt+r to alt+e. (#6782)
segment.target: Preac za izborni gumb regularnog izraza u dijalokom okviru rjenika promijenio se iz alt+r u alt+e. (#6782)

segment.source: Voice dictionary files are now versioned and have been moved to the 'speechDicts/voiceDicts.v1' directory. (#7592)
segment.target: Datoteke glasovnog rjenika sada su verzionirane i premjetene su u direktorij 'speechDicts/voiceDicts.v1'. (#7592)

segment.source: Versioned files (user configuration, voice dictionaries) modifications are no longer saved when NVDA is run from the launcher. (#7688)
segment.target: Izmjene verzija datoteka (korisnika konfiguracija, glasovni rjenici) vie se ne spremaju kada se NVDA pokrene iz pokretaa. (#7688)

segment.source: The Braillino, Bookworm and Modular (with old firmware) braille displays from Handy Tech are no longer supported out of the box. Install the Handy Tech Universal Driver and NVDA add-on to use these displays. (#7590)
segment.target: Braillino, Bookworm i Modular (sa starim firmware) Braillino, Bookworm i modularni (sa starim firmware) zasloni za brajicu tvrtke Handy Tech vie nisu podrani iz kutije. Instalirajte Handy Tech Universal Driver i NVDA dodatak za koritenje ovih zaslona. (#7590)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Links are now indicated in braille in applications such as Microsoft Word. (#6780)
segment.target: Veze su sada oznaene na Brailleovom pismu u aplikacijama kao to je Microsoft Word. (#6780)

segment.source: NVDA no longer becomes noticeably slower when many tabs are open in either Firefox or Chrome web browsers. (#3138)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne postaje osjetno sporiji kada je otvoreno mnogo kartica u Firefox ili Chrome web preglednicima. (#3138)

segment.source: Cursor routing for the MDV Lilli Braille display no longer incorrectly moves one braille cell ahead of where it should be. (#7469)
segment.target: Usmjeravanje kursora za MDV Lilli Brailleov zaslon vie se ne pomie pogreno za jednu Brajicovu eliju ispred mjesta na kojem bi trebala biti. (#7469)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML documents, the HTML5 required attribute is now supported to indicate the required state of a form field. (#7321)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML dokumentima sada je podran obavezni atribut HTML5 koji oznaava obavezno stanje polja obrasca. (#7321)

segment.source: Braille displays are now updated when typing Arabic characters in a left-aligned WordPad document. (#511)
segment.target: Brajievi se zasloni sada auriraju prilikom upisivanja arapskih znakova u dokument programa WordPad poravnat ulijevo. (#511)

segment.source: Accessible labels for controls in Mozilla Firefox are now more readily reported in browse mode when the label does not appear as content itself. (#4773)
segment.target: Pristupane oznake za kontrole u Mozilla Firefoxu sada se lake prijavljuju u nainu pregledavanja kada se oznaka ne pojavljuje kao sam sadraj. (#4773)

segment.source: On windows 10 Creaters Update, NVDA can again access Firefox after a restart of NVDA. (#7269)
segment.target: Na Windows 10 Creaters Updateu, NVDA moe ponovno pristupiti Firefoxu nakon ponovnog pokretanja NVDA-a. (#7269)

segment.source: When restarting NVDA with Mozilla Firefox in focus, browse mode will again be available, though you may need to alt+tab away and back again. (#5758)
segment.target: Prilikom ponovnog pokretanja NVDA s Mozilla Firefoxom u fokusu, nain pregledavanja e ponovno biti dostupan, iako ete moda morati iskljuiti alt+tab i ponovno natrag. (#5758)

segment.source: It is now possible to access math content in Google Chrome on a system with out Mozilla Firefox installed. (#7308)
segment.target: Sada je mogue pristupiti matematikom sadraju u pregledniku Google Chrome na sustavu bez instaliranog Mozilla Firefoxa. (#7308)

segment.source: The Operating System and other applications should be more stable directly after installing NVDA before rebooting, as compaired with installs of previous NVDA versions. (#7563)
segment.target: Operativni sustav i druge aplikacije trebale bi biti stabilnije neposredno nakon instalacije NVDA prije ponovnog pokretanja, u usporedbi s instalacijama prethodnih NVDA verzija. (#7563)

segment.source: When using a content recognition command (e.g. NVDA+r), NVDA now reports an error message instead of nothing if the navigator object has disappeared. (#7567)
segment.target: Kada koristite naredbu za prepoznavanje sadraja (npr. NVDA+r), NVDA sada izvjetava o pogreci umjesto nita ako je objekt navigatora nestao. (#7567)

segment.source: Backward scrolling functionality has been fixed for Freedom Scientific braille displays containing a left bumper bar. (#7713)
segment.target: Ispravljena je funkcija pomicanja unatrag za Brailleove zaslone Freedom Scientific koji sadre lijevu ipku branika. (#7713)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: "scons tests" now checks that translatable strings have translator comments. You can also run this alone with "scons checkPot". (#7492)
segment.target: "Scons testovi" sada provjerava imaju li prevodivi nizovi komentare prevoditelja. Ovo moete pokrenuti i sami s "scons checkPot". (#7492)

segment.source: There is now a new extensionPoints module which provides a generic framework to enable code extensibility at specific points in the code. This allows interested parties to register to be notified when some action occurs (extensionPoints.Action), to modify a specific kind of data (extensionPoints.Filter) or to participate in deciding whether something will be done (extensionPoints.Decider). (#3393)
segment.target: Sada postoji novi modul extensionPoints koji prua generiki okvir za omoguavanje proirivosti koda na odreenim tokama u kodu. To omoguuje zainteresiranim stranama da se registriraju kako bi bile obavijetene kada se dogodi neka radnja (extensionPoints.Action), da izmijene odreenu vrstu podataka (extensionPoints.Filter) ili da sudjeluju u odluivanju hoe li se neto poduzeti (extensionPoints.Decider). (#3393)

segment.source: You can now register to be notified about configuration profile switches via the config.configProfileSwitched Action. (#3393)
segment.target: Sada se moete registrirati da biste bili obavijeteni o promjenama konfiguracijskog profila putem radnje config.configProfileSwitched. (#3393)

segment.source: Braille display gestures that emulate system keyboard key modifiers (such as control and alt) can now be combined with other emulated system keyboard keys without explicit definition. (#6213)
segment.target: Geste na Brailleovom pismu koje oponaaju modifikatore tipki tipkovnice sustava (kao to su Control i Alt) sada se mogu kombinirati s drugim emuliranim tipkama tipkovnice sustava bez eksplicitne definicije. (#6213)

segment.source: For example, if you have a key on your display bound to the alt key and another display key to downArrow, combining these keys will result in the emulation of alt+downArrow.
segment.target: Na primjer, ako imate tipku na zaslonu vezanu za tipku alt i drugu tipku za prikaz sa strelicom prema dolje, kombiniranje tih tipki rezultirat e emulacijom alt+downArrow.

segment.source: The braille.BrailleDisplayGesture class now has an extra model property. If provided, pressing a key will generate an additional, model specific gesture identifier. This allows a user to bind gestures limited to a specific braille display model.
segment.target: Brailleovo pismo. Klasa BrailleDisplayGesture sada ima dodatno svojstvo modela. Ako je navedeno, pritiskom na tipku generirat e se dodatni identifikator geste specifian za model. To korisniku omoguuje povezivanje gesta ogranienih na odreeni model Brailleovog pisma.

segment.source: See the baum driver as an example for this new functionality.
segment.target: Pogledajte baum upravljaki program kao primjer za ovu novu funkcionalnost.

segment.source: NVDA is now compiled with Visual Studio 2017 and the Windows 10 SDK. (#7568)
segment.target: NVDA je sada kompajliran sa Visual Studio 2017 i Windows 10 SDK. (#7568)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include input of contracted braille, support for new Windows OneCore voices available on Windows 10, in-built support for Windows 10 OCR, and many significant improvements regarding Braille and the web.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja ukljuuju unos ugovorene Brailleove pisme, podrku za nove Windows OneCore glasove dostupne u sustavu Windows 10, ugraenu podrku za Windows 10 OCR i mnoga znaajna poboljanja u vezi s Brailleovim pismom i webom.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: A Braille setting has been added to "show messages indefinitely". (#6669)
segment.target: Dodana je postavka Brailleovog pisma za "prikazivanje poruka na neodreeno vrijeme". (#6669)

segment.source: In Microsoft Outlook message lists, NVDA now reports if a message is flagged. (#6374)
segment.target: Na popisima poruka u programu Microsoft Outlook, NVDA sada izvjetava je li poruka oznaena zastavicom. (#6374)

segment.source: In Microsoft PowerPoint, the exact type of a shape is now reported when editing a slide (such as triangle, circle, video or arrow), rather than just "shape". (#7111)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft PowerPoint sada se prilikom ureivanja slajda (kao to su trokut, krug, videozapis ili strelica) izvjeuje o tonoj vrsti oblika, a ne samo o "obliku". (#7111)

segment.source: Mathematical content (provided as MathML) is now supported in Google Chrome. (#7184)
segment.target: Matematiki sadraj (dostupan kao MathML) sada je podran u pregledniku Google Chrome. (#7184)

segment.source: NVDA can now speak using the new Windows OneCore voices (also known as Microsoft Mobile voices) included in Windows 10. You access these by selecting Windows OneCore voices in NVDA's Synthesizer dialog. (#6159)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe govoriti koristei nove Windows OneCore glasove (poznate i kao Microsoft Mobile glasovi) ukljuene u Windows 10. Njima moete pristupiti odabirom Windows OneCore glasova u NVDA dijalokom okviru sintisajzera. (#6159)

segment.source: NVDA user configuration files can now be stored in the user's local application data folder. This is enabled via a setting in the registry. See "System Wide Parameters" in the User Guide for more details. (#6812)
segment.target: NVDA korisnike konfiguracijske datoteke sada se mogu pohraniti u korisnikovu mapu s podacima lokalne aplikacije. To je omogueno putem postavke u registru. Za vie detalja pogledajte "Parametri za cijeli sustav" u Korisnikom priruniku. (#6812)

segment.source: In web browsers, NVDA now reports placeholder values for fields (specifically, aria-placeholder is now supported). (#7004)
segment.target: U web preglednicima, NVDA sada izvjetava o vrijednostima rezerviranih mjesta za polja (tonije, sada je podrano aria-placeholder). (#7004)

segment.source: In Browse mode for Microsoft Word, it is now possible to navigate to spelling errors using quick navigation (w and shift+w). (#6942)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja za Microsoft Word sada je mogue navigirati do pravopisnih pogreaka pomou brze navigacije (w i shift+w). (#6942)

segment.source: Added support for the Date picker control found in Microsoft Outlook Appointment dialogs. (#7217)
segment.target: Dodana je podrka za kontrolu Odabir datuma koja se nalazi u dijalokim okvirima Obveze programa Microsoft Outlook. (#7217)

segment.source: The currently selected suggestion is now reported in Windows 10 Mail to/cc fields and the Windows 10 Settings search field. (#6241)
segment.target: Trenutano odabrani prijedlog sada se prijavljuje u poljima Windows 10 Pota na/cc i polje za pretraivanje postavki sustava Windows 10. (#6241)

segment.source: A sound is now playd to indicate the appearance of suggestions in certain search fields in Windows 10 (E.g. start screen, settings search, Windows 10 mail to/cc fields). (#6241)
segment.target: Sada se reproducira zvuk koji oznaava pojavu prijedloga u odreenim poljima za pretraivanje u sustavu Windows 10 (npr. poetni zaslon, pretraivanje postavki, polja pote na / cc u sustavu Windows 10). (#6241)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports notifications in Skype for Business Desktop, such as when someone starts a conversation with you. (#7281)
segment.target: NVDA sada automatski izvjetava o obavijestima u Skype za tvrtke za stolna raunala, primjerice kada netko zapone razgovor s vama. (#7281)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports incoming chat messages while in a Skype for Business conversation. (#7286)
segment.target: NVDA sada automatski izvjetava o dolaznim chat porukama dok ste u Skype za Business razgovoru. (#7286)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports notifications in Microsoft Edge, such as when a download starts. (#7281)
segment.target: NVDA sada automatski izvjetava o obavijestima u Microsoft Edgeu, primjerice kada preuzimanje zapone. (#7281)

segment.source: You can now type in both contracted and uncontracted braille on a braille display with a braille keyboard. See the Braille Input section of the User Guide for details. (#2439)
segment.target: Sada moete upisivati i skraenu i neskraenu brajicu na Brailleovom pismu s brajinom tipkovnicom. Pojedinosti potraite u odjeljku Unos brajice u Korisnikom priruniku. (#2439)

segment.source: You can now enter Unicode braille characters from the braille keyboard on a braille display by selecting Unicode braille as the input table in Braille Settings. (#6449)
segment.target: Sada moete unijeti Unicode brajeve znakove s brajine tipkovnice na Brajievom pismu tako da odaberete Unicode brajicu kao ulaznu tablicu u postavkama brajice. (#6449)

segment.source: Added support for the SuperBraille braille display used in Taiwan. (#7352)
segment.target: Dodana je podrka za SuperBrailleov zaslon na brajici koji se koristi na Tajvanu. (#7352)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Danish 8 dot computer braille, Lithuanian, Persian 8 dot computer braille, Persian grade 1, Slovenian 8 dot computer braille. (#6188, #6550, #6773, #7367)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prevoenje Brailleovog pisma: danski raunalni braille s 8 toaka, litavski, perzijski raunalni braille s 8 toaka, perzijski razred 1, slovenski raunalni braille s 8 toaka. (#6188, #6550, #6773, #7367)

segment.source: Improved English (U.S.) 8 dot computer braille table, including support for bullets, the euro sign and accented letters. (#6836)
segment.target: Poboljana engleska (SAD) raunalna brajeva tablica s 8 toaka, ukljuujui podrku za grafike oznake, znak eura i slova s naglaskom. (#6836)

segment.source: NVDA can now use the OCR functionality included in Windows 10 to recognize the text of images or inaccessible applications. (#7361)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe koristiti OCR funkcionalnost ukljuenu u Windows 10 za prepoznavanje teksta slika ili nedostupnih aplikacija. (#7361)

segment.source: The language can be set from the new Windows 10 OCR dialog in NVDA Preferences.
segment.target: Jezik se moe postaviti u novom Windows 10 OCR dijalokom okviru u NVDA postavkama.

segment.source: To recognize the content of the current navigator object, press NVDA+r.
segment.target: Za prepoznavanje sadraja trenutnog objekta navigatora pritisnite NVDA+r.

segment.source: See the Content Recognition section of the User Guide for further details.
segment.target: Dodatne pojedinosti potraite u odjeljku Prepoznavanje sadraja u Korisnikom priruniku.

segment.source: You can now choose what context information is shown on a braille display when an object gets focus using the new "Focus context presentation" setting in the Braille Settings dialog. (#217)
segment.target: Sada moete odabrati koje e se kontekstne informacije prikazivati na Brailleovom pismu kada se objekt fokusira pomou nove postavke "Fokus kontekstne prezentacije" u dijalokom okviru Postavke brajice. (#217)

segment.source: For example, the "Fill display for context changes" and "Only when scrolling back" options can make working with lists and menus more efficient, since the items won't continually change their position on the display.
segment.target: Na primjer, opcije "Ispuni prikaz za promjene konteksta" i "Samo pri pomicanju unatrag" mogu uiniti rad s popisima i izbornicima uinkovitijim, budui da stavke nee stalno mijenjati svoj poloaj na zaslonu.

segment.source: See the section on the "Focus context presentation" setting in the User Guide for further details and examples.
segment.target: Pogledajte odjeljak o postavki "Prezentacija konteksta fokusa" u Korisnikom priruniku za dodatne pojedinosti i primjere.

segment.source: In Firefox and Chrome, NVDA now supports complex dynamic grids such as spreadsheets where only some of the content might be loaded or displayed (specifically, the aria-rowcount, aria-colcount, aria-rowindex and aria-colindex attributes introduced in ARIA 1.1). (#7410)
segment.target: U Firefoxu i Chromeu, NVDA sada podrava sloene dinamike reetke kao to su proraunske tablice u kojima se samo dio sadraja moe uitati ili prikazati (tonije, atributi aria-rowcount, aria-colcount, aria-rowindex i aria-colindex uvedeni u ARIA 1.1). (#7410)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: An unbound command has been added to restart NVDA on demand. You can find it in the Miscelaneous category of the Input Gestures dialog. (#6396)
segment.target: Dodana je nevezana naredba za ponovno pokretanje NVDA na zahtjev. Moete ga pronai u kategoriji Razno dijalokog okvira Ulazne geste. (#6396)

segment.source: The keyboard layout can now be set from the NVDA Welcome dialog. (#6863)
segment.target: Raspored tipkovnice sada se moe podesiti iz NVDA dijalokog okvira dobrodolice. (#6863)

segment.source: Many more control types and states have been abbreviated for braille. Landmarks have also been abbreviated. Please see "Control Type, State and Landmark Abbreviations" under Braille in the User Guide for a complete list. (#7188, #3975)
segment.target: Mnogo vie vrsta kontrole i stanja skraeno je za Brailleovo pismo. Znamenitosti su takoer skraene. Za potpuni popis pogledajte "Vrsta kontrole, drava i kratice orijentira" pod Brailleovim pismom u Korisnikom priruniku. (#7188, #3975)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak NG to 1.49.1. (#7280)
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak NG na 1.49.1. (#7280)

segment.source: The output and input table lists in the Braille Settings dialog are now sorted alphabetically. (#6113)
segment.target: Popisi izlazne i ulazne tablice u dijalokom okviru Postavke brajice sada su poredani abecednim redom. (#6113)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 3.2.0. (#6935)
segment.target: Auriran liblouis prevoditelj brajice na 3.2.0. (#6935)

segment.source: The default braille table is now Unified English Braille Code grade 1. (#6952)
segment.target: Zadana tablica brajice sada je Unified English Braille Code 1. stupnja. (#6952)

segment.source: By default, NVDA now only shows the parts of the context information that have changed on a braille display when an object gets focus. (#217)
segment.target: Prema zadanim postavkama, NVDA sada prikazuje samo dijelove kontekstnih informacija koji su se promijenili na Brailleovom pismu kada se objekt fokusira. (#217)

segment.source: Previously, it always showed as much context information as possible, regardless of whether you have seen the same context information before.
segment.target: Prije je uvijek prikazivao to vie informacija o kontekstu, bez obzira na to jeste li ve vidjeli iste informacije o kontekstu.

segment.source: You can revert to the old behaviour by changing the new "Focus context presentation" setting in the Braille Settings dialog to "Always fill display".
segment.target: Moete se vratiti na staro ponaanje promjenom nove postavke "Kontekstna prezentacija fokusa" u dijalokom okviru postavki Brailleovog pisma u "Uvijek ispuniti prikaz".

segment.source: When using Braille, the cursor can be configured to be a different shape when tethered to focus or review. (#7122)
segment.target: Kada koristite Brailleovo pismo, pokaziva se moe konfigurirati tako da bude razliitog oblika kada je vezan za fokusiranje ili pregled. (#7122)

segment.source: The NVDA logo has been updated. The updated NVDA logo is a stylised blend of the letters NVDA in white, on a solid purple background. This ensures it will be visible on any colour background, and uses the purple from the NV Access logo. (#7446)
segment.target: NVDA logotip je auriran. Aurirani NVDA logotip stilizirana je mjeavina slova NVDA u bijeloj boji, na jednobojnoj ljubiastoj pozadini. To osigurava da e biti vidljiv na pozadini bilo koje boje i koristi ljubiastu boju s logotipa NV Access. (#7446)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Editable div elements in Chrome no longer have their label reported as their value while in browse mode. (#7153)
segment.target: Oznaka elemenata div koji se mogu ureivati u Chromeu vie se ne prijavljuje kao vrijednost dok su u nainu pregledavanja. (#7153)

segment.source: Pressing end while in browse mode for an empty Microsoft Word document no longer causes a runtime error. (#7009)
segment.target: Pritiskom na end dok ste u nainu pregledavanja za prazan Microsoft Word dokument vie ne uzrokuje pogreku tijekom izvoenja. (#7009)

segment.source: Browse mode is now correctly supported in Microsoft Edge where a document has been given a specific ARIA role of document. (#6998)
segment.target: Nain pregledavanja sada je ispravno podran u pregledniku Microsoft Edge gdje je dokumentu dodijeljena odreena ARIA uloga dokumenta. (#6998)

segment.source: In browse mode, you can now select or unselect to the end of the line using shift+end even when the caret is on the last character of the line. (#7157)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja sada moete odabrati ili ponititi odabir do kraja retka pomou shift+end ak i kada je kursor na posljednjem znaku retka. (#7157)

segment.source: If a dialog contains a progress bar, the dialog text is now updated in braille when the progress bar changes. This means, for example, that the remaining time can now be read in NVDA's "Downloading Update" dialog. (#6862)
segment.target: Ako dijaloki okvir sadri traku napretka, tekst dijalokog okvira sada se aurira na Brailleovom pismu kada se promijeni traka napretka. To znai, na primjer, da se preostalo vrijeme sada moe oitati u NVDA dijalokom okviru "Preuzimanje auriranja". (#6862)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce selection changes for certain Windows 10 combo boxes such as AutoPlay in Settings. (#6337).
segment.target: NVDA e sada objaviti promjene odabira za odreene kombinirane okvire sustava Windows 10 kao to je automatska reprodukcija u postavkama. (#6337).

segment.source: Pointless information is no longer announced when entering Meeting / Appointment creation dialogs in Microsoft Outlook. (#7216)
segment.target: Besmislene informacije vie se ne objavljuju prilikom ulaska u dijaloke okvire za stvaranje sastanka / sastanka u programu Microsoft Outlook. (#7216)

segment.source: Beeps for indeterminate progress bar dialogs such as the update checker only when progress bar output is configured to include beeps. (#6759)
segment.target: Zvuni signali za neodreene dijaloke okvire trake napretka, kao to je alat za provjeru auriranja, samo kada je izlaz trake napretka konfiguriran tako da ukljuuje zvune signale. (#6759)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel 2003 and 2007, cells are again reported when arrowing around a worksheet. (#7243)
segment.target: U programima Microsoft Excel 2003 i 2007 elije se ponovno prijavljuju prilikom strelica oko radnog lista. (#7243)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Creators Update and later, browse mode is again automatically enabled when reading emails in Windows 10 Mail. (#7289)
segment.target: U Windows 10 Creators Update i novijim verzijama, nain pregledavanja ponovno je automatski omoguen prilikom itanja e-pote u Windows 10 Mailu. (#7289)

segment.source: On most braille displays with a braille keyboard, dot 7 now erases the last entered braille cell or character, and dot 8 presses the enter key. (#6054)
segment.target: Na veini brajevih zaslona s brajinom tipkovnicom, toka 7 sada brie posljednju unesenu brajinu eliju ili znak, a toka 8 pritie tipku Enter. (#6054)

segment.source: In editable text, when moving the caret (e.g. with the cursor keys or backspace), NVDA's spoken feedback is now more accurate in many cases, particularly in Chrome and terminal applications. (#6424)
segment.target: U tekstu koji se moe ureivati, prilikom pomicanja kursora (npr. tipkama kursora ili backspaceom), NVDA govorne povratne informacije sada su tonije u mnogim sluajevima, posebno u Chrome i terminalnim aplikacijama. (#6424)

segment.source: The content of the Signature Editor in Microsoft Outlook 2016 can now be read. (#7253)
segment.target: Sada se moe itati sadraj ureivaa potpisa u programu Microsoft Outlook 2016. (#7253)

segment.source: In Java Swing applications, NVDA no longer sometimes causes the application to crash when navigating tables. (#6992)
segment.target: U Java Swing aplikacijama, NVDA vie ponekad ne uzrokuje ruenje aplikacije prilikom navigacije tablicama. (#6992)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Creators Update, NVDA will no longer announce toast notifications multiple times. (#7128)
segment.target: U Windows 10 Creators Updateu, NVDA vie nee najavljivati obavijesti o tostu vie puta. (#7128)

segment.source: In The start menu in Windows 10, pressing Enter to close the start menu after a search no longer causes NVDA to announce search text. (#7370)
segment.target: U izborniku Start u sustavu Windows 10 pritiskom na Enter za zatvaranje izbornika Start nakon pretraivanja vie ne uzrokuje da NVDA najavljuje tekst pretraivanja. (#7370)

segment.source: Performing quick navigation to headings in Microsoft Edge is now significantly faster. (#7343)
segment.target: Brza navigacija do naslova u pregledniku Microsoft Edge sada je znatno bra. (#7343)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, navigating in browse mode no longer skips large parts of certain web pages such as the Wordpress 2015 theme. (#7143)
segment.target: U pregledniku Microsoft Edge navigacija u nainu pregledavanja vie ne preskae velike dijelove odreenih web-stranica kao to je tema Wordpress 2015. (#7143)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, landmarks are correctly localized in languages other than English. (#7328)
segment.target: U pregledniku Microsoft Edge orijentiri su ispravno lokalizirani na jezike koji nisu engleski. (#7328)

segment.source: Braille now correctly follows the selection when selecting text beyond the width of the display. For example, if you select multiple lines with shift+downArrow, braille now shows the last line you selected. (#5770)
segment.target: Brailleovo pismo sada ispravno prati odabir prilikom odabira teksta izvan irine zaslona. Ako, primjerice, odaberete vie redaka pomou shift+strelica prema dolje, brajica sada prikazuje zadnji redak koji ste odabrali. (#5770)

segment.source: In Firefox, NVDA no longer spuriously reports "section" several times when opening details for a tweet on twitter.com. (#5741)
segment.target: U Firefoxu, NVDA vie ne izvjetava lano o "odjeljku" nekoliko puta kada otvara detalje za tweet na twitter.com. (#5741)

segment.source: Table navigation commands are no longer available for layout tables in Browse Mode unless reporting of layout tables is enabled. (#7382)
segment.target: Naredbe za navigaciju tablicom vie nisu dostupne za tablice izgleda u nainu pregledavanja osim ako nije omogueno izvjeivanje o tablicama izgleda. (#7382)

segment.source: In Firefox and Chrome, Browse Mode table navigation commands now skip over hidden table cells. (#6652, #5655)
segment.target: U Firefoxu i Chromeu naredbe za navigaciju tablicom Nain pregledavanja sada preskau skrivene elije tablice. (#6652, #5655)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Timestamps in the log now include milliseconds. (#7163)
segment.target: Vremenske oznake u dnevniku sada ukljuuju milisekunde. (#7163)

segment.source: NVDA must now be built with Visual Studio Community 2015. Visual Studio Express is no longer supported. (#7110)
segment.target: NVDA se sada mora izgraditi pomou Visual Studio Community 2015. Visual Studio Express vie nije podran. (#7110)

segment.source: The Windows 10 Tools and SDK are now also required, which can be enabled when installing Visual Studio.
segment.target: Sada su potrebni i Windows 10 alati i SDK, koji se mogu omoguiti prilikom instalacije Visual Studija.
