segment.source: See the Installed Dependencies section of the readme for additional details.
segment.target: Dodatne pojedinosti potraite u odjeljku Instalirane ovisnosti u readme-u.

segment.source: Support for content recognizers such as OCR and image description tools can be easily implemented using the new contentRecog package. (#7361)
segment.target: Podrka za prepoznavae sadraja kao to su OCR i alati za opis slika moe se jednostavno implementirati pomou novog paketa contentRecog. (#7361)

segment.source: The Python json package is now included in NVDA binary builds. (#3050)
segment.target: Python json paket sada je ukljuen u NVDA binarne verzije. (#3050)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include full support for audio ducking in the Windows 10 Creators Update; fixes for several selection issues in browse mode, including problems with select all; significant improvements in Microsoft Edge support; and improvements on the web such as indication of elements marked as current (using aria-current).
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju punu podrku za priguivanje zvuka u auriranju Windows 10 Creators Update; popravci za nekoliko problema s odabirom u nainu pregledavanja, ukljuujui probleme s odabirom svega; znaajna poboljanja u podrci za Microsoft Edge; i poboljanja na webu, kao to je oznaavanje elemenata oznaenih kao tekui (pomou ARIA-current).

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Cell border information can now be reported in Microsoft Excel by using NVDA+f. (#3044)
segment.target: Informacije o obrubu elije sada se mogu prijaviti u programu Microsoft Excel pomou NVDA+f. (#3044)

segment.source: In web browsers, NVDA now indicates when an element has been marked as current (specifically, using the aria-current attribute). (#6358)
segment.target: U web preglednicima, NVDA sada pokazuje kada je element oznaen kao trenutni (tonije, koristei atribut aria-current). (#6358)

segment.source: Automatic language switching is now supported in Microsoft Edge. (#6852)
segment.target: Automatska promjena jezika sada je podrana u pregledniku Microsoft Edge. (#6852)

segment.source: Added support for Windows Calculator on Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB (Long-Term Servicing Branch) and Server. (#6914)
segment.target: Dodana je podrka za Windows Calculator na Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB (Long-Term Servicing Branch) i Serveru. (#6914)

segment.source: Performing the read current line command three times quickly spells the line with character descriptions. (#6893)
segment.target: Izvoenjem naredbe za itanje trenutnog retka tri puta brzo se pie redak s opisima znakova. (#6893)

segment.source: New language: Burmese.
segment.target: Novi jezik: burmanski.

segment.source: Unicode up and down arrows and fraction symbols are now spoken appropriately. (#3805)
segment.target: Unicode strelice gore i dolje i simboli razlomaka sada se izgovaraju na odgovarajui nain. (#3805)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: When navigating with simple review in applications using UI Automation, more extraneous objects are now ignored, making navigation easier. (#6948, #6950)
segment.target: Prilikom navigacije jednostavnim pregledom u aplikacijama koje koriste automatizaciju korisnikog suelja, vie stranih objekata sada se zanemaruje, to olakava navigaciju. (#6948, #6950)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Web page menu items can now be activated while in browse mode. (#6735)
segment.target: Stavke izbornika web stranice sada se mogu aktivirati dok ste u nainu pregledavanja. (#6735)

segment.source: Pressing escape while the configuration profile "Confirm Deletion" dialog is active now dismisses the dialog. (#6851)
segment.target: Pritiskom na escape dok je konfiguracijski profil "Potvrdi brisanje" dijaloki okvir sada se zatvara dijaloki okvir. (#6851)

segment.source: Fixed some crashes in Mozilla Firefox and other Gecko applications where the multi-process feature is enabled. (#6885)
segment.target: Ispravljena su neka ruenja u Mozilla Firefoxu i drugim Gecko aplikacijama gdje je omoguena znaajka vie procesa. (#6885)

segment.source: Reporting of background color in screen review is now more accurate when text was drawn with a transparent background. (#6467)
segment.target: Izvjetavanje o boji pozadine u pregledu zaslona sada je tonije kada je tekst nacrtan s prozirnom pozadinom. (#6467)

segment.source: Improved support for control descriptions provided on web pages in Internet Explorer 11 (specifically, support for aria-describedby within iframes and when multiple IDs are provided). (#5784)
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za opise kontrola na web-stranicama u pregledniku Internet Explorer 11 (konkretno, podrka za aria-describedby unutar iframeova i kada je navedeno vie ID-ova). (#5784)

segment.source: In the Windows 10 Creators Update, NVDA's audio ducking again works as in previous Windows releases; i.e. Duck with speech and sounds, always duck and no ducking are all available. (#6933)
segment.target: U auriranju Windows 10 Creators Update, NVDA-ino priguivanje zvuka ponovno radi kao u prethodnim izdanjima sustava Windows; tj. Patka s govorom i zvukovima, uvijek patka i bez saganja su dostupni. (#6933)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to navigate to or report certain (UIA) controls where a keyboard shortcut is not defined. (#6779)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee proputati navigaciju ili prijavljivanje odreenih (UIA) kontrola u kojima tipkovniki preac nije definiran. (#6779)

segment.source: Two empty spaces are no longer added in keyboard shortcut information for certain (UIA) controls. (#6790)
segment.target: Dva prazna mjesta vie se ne dodaju u informacije o tipkovnim preacima za odreene (UIA) kontrole. (#6790)

segment.source: Certain combinations of keys on HIMS displays (e.g. space+dot4) no longer fail intermittently. (#3157)
segment.target: Odreene kombinacije tipki na HIMS zaslonima (npr. razmak+toka4) vie ne otkazuju povremeno. (#3157)

segment.source: Fixed an issue when opening a serial port on systems using certain languages other than English which caused connecting to braille displays to fail in some cases. (#6845)
segment.target: Rijeen je problem prilikom otvaranja serijskog porta na sustavima koji koriste odreene jezike osim engleskog, to je u nekim sluajevima uzrokovalo neuspjeh povezivanja s Brailleovim zaslonima. (#6845)

segment.source: Reduced the chance of the configuration file being corrupted when Windows shuts down. Configuration files are now written to a temporary file before replacing the actual configuration file. (#3165)
segment.target: Smanjena je mogunost oteenja konfiguracijske datoteke prilikom iskljuivanja sustava Windows. Konfiguracijske datoteke sada se zapisuju u privremenu datoteku prije zamjene stvarne konfiguracijske datoteke. (#3165)

segment.source: When performing the read current line command twice quickly to spell the line, the appropriate language is now used for the spelled characters. (#6726)
segment.target: Kada dvaput brzo izvrite naredbu za itanje trenutnog retka kako biste napisali redak, sada se koristi odgovarajui jezik za napisane znakove. (#6726)

segment.source: Navigating by line in Microsoft Edge is now up to three times faster in the Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6994)
segment.target: Navigacija po liniji u Microsoft Edgeu sada je do tri puta bra u auriranju Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6994)

segment.source: NVDA no longer announces "Web Runtime grouping" when focusing Microsoft Edge documents in the Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6948)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne najavljuje "Web Runtime grupiranje" kada fokusira Microsoft Edge dokumente u Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6948)

segment.source: All existing versions of SecureCRT are now supported. (#6302)
segment.target: Sada su podrane sve postojee verzije SecureCRT-a. (#6302)

segment.source: Adobe Acrobat Reader no longer crashes in certain PDF documents (specifically, those containing empty ActualText attributes). (#7021, #7034)
segment.target: Adobe Acrobat Reader vie se ne rui u odreenim PDF dokumentima (tonije onima koji sadre prazne atribute stvarnog teksta). (#7021, #7034)

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Edge, interactive tables (ARIA grids) are no longer skipped when navigating to tables with t and shift+t. (#6977)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u pregledniku Microsoft Edge interaktivne tablice (ARIA reetke) vie se ne preskau prilikom navigacije do tablica s t i shift+t. (#6977)

segment.source: In browse mode, pressing shift+home after selecting forward now unselects to the beginning of the line as expected. (#5746)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, pritiskom na shift+home nakon odabira naprijed sada se ponitava odabir na poetku retka kao to se oekivalo. (#5746)

segment.source: In browse mode, select all (control+a) no longer fails to select all text if the caret is not at the start of the text. (#6909)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja odabir svega (control+a) vie ne uspijeva odabrati sav tekst ako se kursor ne nalazi na poetku teksta. (#6909)

segment.source: Fixed some other rare selection problems in browse mode. (#7131)
segment.target: Rijeeni su neki drugi rijetki problemi s odabirom u nainu pregledavanja. (#7131)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Commandline arguments are now processed with Python's argparse module, rather than optparse. This allows certain options such as -r and -q to be handled exclusively. (#6865)
segment.target: Argumenti naredbenog retka sada se obrauju pomou Pythonovog modula argparse, a ne optparse. To omoguuje iskljuivo rukovanje odreenim opcijama kao to su -r i -q. (#6865)

segment.source: core.callLater now queues the callback to NVDA's main queue after the given delay, rather than waking the core and executing it directly. This stops possible freezes due to the core accidentally going to sleep after processing a callback, in the midle of a modal call such as the desplaying of a message box. (#6797)
segment.target: core.callLater sada stavlja povratni poziv u NVDA glavni red ekanja nakon zadanog kanjenja, umjesto da probudi jezgru i izvri je izravno. Ovo zaustavlja mogua zamrzavanja zbog sluajnog odlaska jezgre u stanje mirovanja nakon obrade povratnog poziva, u sredini modalnog poziva, kao to je uklanjanje okvira s porukama. (#6797)

segment.source: The InputGesture.identifiers property has been changed so that it is no longer normalized. (#6945)
segment.target: Svojstvo InputGesture.identifiers promijenjeno je tako da se vie ne normalizira. (#6945)

segment.source: Subclasses no longer need to normalize identifiers before returning them from this property.
segment.target: Podklase vie ne moraju normalizirati identifikatore prije nego to ih vrate iz ovog svojstva.

segment.source: If you want normalized identifiers, there is now an InputGesture.normalizedIdentifiers property which normalizes the identifiers returned by the identifiers property .
segment.target: Ako elite normalizirane identifikatore, sada postoji svojstvo InputGesture.normalizedIdentifiers koje normalizira identifikatore koje vraa svojstvo identifiers .

segment.source: The InputGesture.logIdentifier property is now deprecated. Callers should use InputGesture.identifiers[0] instead. (#6945)
segment.target: Svojstvo InputGesture.logIdentifier sada je zastarjelo. Pozivatelji bi umjesto toga trebali koristiti InputGesture.identifiers[0]. (#6945)

segment.source: Removed some deprecated code:
segment.target: Uklonjen je neki zastarjeli kod:

segment.source: `speech.REASON_*` constants: `controlTypes.REASON_*` should be used instead. (#6846)
segment.target: 'govor. REASON_*' konstante: umjesto toga treba koristiti 'controlTypes.REASON_*'. (#6846)

segment.source: `i18nName` for synth settings: `displayName` and `displayNameWithAccelerator` should be used instead. (#6846, #5185)
segment.target: 'i18nName' za postavke sintisajzera: umjesto toga treba koristiti 'displayName' i 'displayNameWithAccelerator'. (#6846, #5185)

segment.source: `config.validateConfig`. (#6846, #667)
segment.target: 'config.validateConfig'. (#6846, #667)

segment.source: `config.save`: `config.conf.save` should be used instead. (#6846, #667)
segment.target: 'config.save': umjesto toga treba koristiti 'config.conf.save'. (#6846, #667)

segment.source: The list of completions in the autocomplete context menu of the Python Console no longer shows any object path leading up to the final symbol being completed. (#7023)
segment.target: Popis dovretka u kontekstnom izborniku automatskog dovravanja Python konzole vie ne prikazuje nijedan put objekta koji vodi do dovretka konanog simbola. (#7023)

segment.source: There is now a unit testing framework for NVDA. (#7026)
segment.target: Sada postoji okvir za testiranje jedinica za NVDA. (#7026)

segment.source: Unit tests and infrastructure are located in the tests/unit directory. See the docstring in the tests\unit\init.py file for details.
segment.target: Jedinini testovi i infrastruktura nalaze se u imeniku testova/jedinica. Pojedinosti potraite u docstringu u datoteci tests\unit\init.py.

segment.source: You can run tests using "scons tests". See the "Running Tests" section of readme.md for details.
segment.target: Testove moete pokrenuti pomou "scons testova". Pojedinosti potraite u odjeljku "Izvoenje testova" u readme.md.

segment.source: If you are submitting a pull request for NVDA, you should first run the tests and ensure they pass.
segment.target: Ako aljete zahtjev za povlaenje za NVDA, prvo biste trebali pokrenuti testove i provjeriti jesu li proli.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include reporting of sections and text columns in Microsoft Word; Support for reading, navigating and annotating books in Kindle for PC; and improved support for Microsoft Edge.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju izvjetavanje o odjeljcima i tekstualnim stupcima u programu Microsoft Word; Podrka za itanje, navigaciju i komentiranje knjiga u Kindleu za PC; i poboljana podrka za Microsoft Edge.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, the types of section breaks and section numbers can now be reported. This is enabled with the "Report page numbers" option in the Document Formatting dialog. (#5946)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word sada se mogu prijaviti vrste prijeloma sekcija i brojevi sekcija. To je omogueno opcijom "Brojevi stranica izvjea" u dijalokom okviru Oblikovanje dokumenta. (#5946)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, text columns can now be reported. This is enabled with the "Report page numbers" option in the document formatting dialog. (#5946)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word sada se mogu izvjetavati o tekstnim stupcima. To je omogueno opcijom "Brojevi stranica izvjea" u dijalokom okviru za oblikovanje dokumenta. (#5946)

segment.source: Automatic language switching is now supported in WordPad. (#6555)
segment.target: Automatska promjena jezika sada je podrana u programu WordPad. (#6555)

segment.source: The NVDA find command (NVDA+control+f) is now supported in browse mode in Microsoft Edge. (#6580)
segment.target: NVDA naredba za pronalaenje (NVDA+control+f) sada je podrana u nainu pregledavanja u pregledniku Microsoft Edge. (#6580)

segment.source: Quick navigation for buttons in browse mode (b and shift+b) is now supported in Microsoft Edge. (#6577)
segment.target: Brza navigacija gumbima u nainu pregledavanja (b i shift+b) sada je podrana u pregledniku Microsoft Edge. (#6577)

segment.source: When copying a sheet in Microsoft Excel, column and row headers are remembered. (#6628)
segment.target: Prilikom kopiranja lista u programu Microsoft Excel pamte se zaglavlja stupaca i redaka. (#6628)

segment.source: Support for reading and navigating books in Kindle for PC version 1.19, including access to links, footnotes, graphics, highlighted text and user notes. Please see the Kindle for PC section of the NVDA User Guide for further information. (#6247, #6638)
segment.target: Podrka za itanje i navigaciju knjigama u Kindleu za PC verzije 1.19, ukljuujui pristup vezama, fusnotama, grafikama, istaknutom tekstu i korisnikim biljekama. Za vie informacija pogledajte odjeljak Kindle za PC u NVDA korisnikom priruniku. (#6247, #6638)

segment.source: Browse mode table navigation is now supported in Microsoft Edge. (#6594)
segment.target: Navigacija tablicom naina pregledavanja sada je podrana u pregledniku Microsoft Edge. (#6594)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the report review cursor location command (desktop: NVDA+numpadDelete, laptop: NVDA+delete) now reports the name of the worksheet and the cell location. (#6613)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel naredba za pregled pokazivaa izvjea (radna povrina: NVDA+numpadDelete, prijenosno raunalo: NVDA+delete) sada izvjetava o nazivu radnog lista i lokaciji elije. (#6613)

segment.source: Added an option to the exit dialog to restart with debug level logging. (#6689)
segment.target: Dodana je opcija u izlazni dijaloki okvir za ponovno pokretanje s zapisivanjem na razini otklanjanja pogreaka. (#6689)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The minimum braille cursor blink rate is now 200 ms. If this was previously set lower, it will be increased to 200 ms. (#6470)
segment.target: Minimalna brzina treptanja kursora na Brailleovom pismu sada je 200 ms. Ako je ovo prethodno postavljeno nie, poveat e se na 200 ms. (#6470)

segment.source: A check box has been added to the braille settings dialog to allow enabling/disabling braille cursor blinking. Previously a value of zero was used to achieve this. (#6470)
segment.target: U dijaloki okvir postavki brajice dodan je potvrdni okvir koji omoguuje omoguavanje/onemoguavanje treptanja pokazivaa brajice. Ranije se za to koristila vrijednost nula. (#6470)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak NG (commit e095f008, 10 January 2017). (#6717)
segment.target: Aurirano eSpeak NG (commit e095f008, 10. sijenja 2017.). (#6717)

segment.source: Due to changes In the Windows 10 Creators Update, the "Always duck" mode is no longer available in NVDA's Audio ducking settings. It is still available on older windows 10 releases. (#6684)
segment.target: Zbog promjena U auriranju za kreatore sustava Windows 10, nain "Uvijek se sputa" vie nije dostupan u NVDA postavkama priguivanja zvuka. Jo uvijek je dostupan na starijim izdanjima sustava Windows 10. (#6684)

segment.source: Due to changes in the Windows 10 Creators Update, the "Duck when outputting speech and sounds" mode can no longer ensure audio has ducked fully before starting to speak, nor will it keep audio ducked long enough after speaking to stop rappid bouncing in volume. These changes do not affect older windows 10 releases. (#6684)
segment.target: Zbog promjena u auriranju Windows 10 Creators Update, nain rada "Duck when outoutput speech and sounds" vie ne moe osigurati da se zvuk potpuno sagnuo prije nego to pone govoriti, niti e zadrati zvuk dovoljno dugo nakon govora da zaustavi rappid poskakivanje u glasnoi. Te promjene ne utjeu na starija izdanja sustava Windows 10. (#6684)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Fixed freeze in Microsoft Word when moving by paragraph through a large document while in browse mode. (#6368)
segment.target: Popravljeno zamrzavanje u programu Microsoft Word pri kretanju po odlomku kroz veliki dokument dok je u nainu pregledavanja. (#6368)

segment.source: Tables in Microsoft Word that have been copied from Microsoft Excel are no longer treeted as layout tables and therefore are no longer ignored. (#5927)
segment.target: Tablice u programu Microsoft Word koje su kopirane iz programa Microsoft Excel vie se ne prikazuju kao tablice izgleda i stoga se vie ne zanemaruju. (#5927)

segment.source: When trying to type in Microsoft Excel while in protected view, NVDA now makes a sound rather than speaking characters that were not actually typed. (#6570)
segment.target: Kada pokuavate tipkati u Microsoft Excelu dok ste u zatienom prikazu, NVDA sada proizvodi zvuk umjesto da izgovara znakove koji zapravo nisu upisani. (#6570)

segment.source: Pressing escape in Microsoft Excel no longer incorrectly switches to browse mode, unless the user has previously switched to browse mode explicitly with NVDA+space and then entered focus mode by pressing enter on a form field. (#6569)
segment.target: Pritiskom na escape u Microsoft Excelu vie se ne prebacuje pogreno u nain pregledavanja, osim ako je korisnik prethodno preao u nain pregledavanja eksplicitno s NVDA+razmak i zatim uao u nain fokusiranja pritiskom na enter u polju obrasca. (#6569)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes in Microsoft Excel spreadsheets where an entire row or column is merged. (#6216)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne zamrzava u Microsoft Excel proraunskim tablicama gdje se spaja cijeli redak ili stupac. (#6216)

segment.source: Reporting of cropped/overflowed text in Microsoft Excel cells should now be more accurate. (#6472)
segment.target: Izvjeivanje o izrezanom/preplavljenom tekstu u elijama programa Microsoft Excel sada bi trebalo biti tonije. (#6472)

segment.source: NVDA now reports when a check box is read-only. (#6563)
segment.target: NVDA sada izvjetava kada je potvrdni okvir samo za itanje. (#6563)

segment.source: The NVDA launcher will no longer show a warning dialog when it can't play the logo sound due to no audio device being available. (#6289)
segment.target: NVDA pokreta vie nee prikazivati dijaloki okvir upozorenja kada ne moe reproducirati zvuk logotipa jer nema dostupnog audio ureaja. (#6289)

segment.source: Controls in the Microsoft Excel Ribbon that are unavailable are now reported as such. (#6430)
segment.target: Kontrole na vrpci programa Microsoft Excel koje nisu dostupne sada se prijavljuju kao takve. (#6430)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce "pane" when minimizing windows. (#6671)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee najavljivati "okno" prilikom minimiziranja prozora. (#6671)

segment.source: Typed characters are now spoken in Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps (including Microsoft Edge) in the Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6017)
segment.target: Upisani znakovi sada se izgovaraju u aplikacijama Universal Windows Platform (UWP) (ukljuujui Microsoft Edge) u auriranju Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6017)

segment.source: Mouse tracking now works across all screens on computers with multiple monitors. (#6598)
segment.target: Praenje mia sada radi na svim zaslonima na raunalima s vie monitora. (#6598)

segment.source: NVDA no longer becomes unusable after exiting Windows Media Player while focused on a slider control. (#5467)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne postaje neupotrebljiv nakon izlaska iz Windows Media Playera dok je usredotoen na kontrolu klizaa. (#5467)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Profiles and configuration files are now automatically upgraded to meet the requirements of schema modifications. If there is an error during upgrade, a notification is shown, the configuration is reset and the old configuration file is available in the NVDA log at 'Info' level. (#6470)
segment.target: Profili i konfiguracijske datoteke sada se automatski nadograuju kako bi zadovoljili zahtjeve izmjena sheme. Ako doe do pogreke tijekom nadogradnje, prikazuje se obavijest, konfiguracija se resetira i stara konfiguracijska datoteka dostupna je u NVDA dnevniku na razini 'Info'. (#6470)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include improved support for Microsoft Edge; browse mode in the Windows 10 Mail app; and significant improvements to NVDA's dialogs.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju poboljanu podrku za Microsoft Edge; nain pregledavanja u aplikaciji Windows 10 Mail; i znaajna poboljanja NVDA dijaloga.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: NVDA can now indicate line indentation using tones. This can be configured using the "Line indentation reporting" combo box in NVDA's Document Formatting preferences dialog. (#5906)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe oznaavati uvlaenje linije pomou tonova. To se moe konfigurirati pomou kombiniranog okvira "Izvjeivanje o uvlaenju linije" u NVDA dijalokom okviru postavki formatiranja dokumenta. (#5906)

segment.source: Support for the Orbit Reader 20 braille display. (#6007)
segment.target: Podrka za Orbit Reader 20 Braille Display. (#6007)

segment.source: An option to open the speech viewer window on startup has been added. This can be enabled via a check box in the speech viewer window. (#5050)
segment.target: Dodana je opcija za otvaranje prozora preglednika govora pri pokretanju. To se moe omoguiti putem potvrdnog okvira u prozoru preglednika govora. (#5050)

segment.source: When re-opening the speech viewer window, the location and dimensions will now be restored. (#5050)
segment.target: Prilikom ponovnog otvaranja prozora preglednika govora, mjesto i dimenzije sada e se vratiti. (#5050)

segment.source: Cross-reference fields in Microsoft Word are now treated like hyperlinks. They are reported as links and can be activated. (#6102)
segment.target: Polja unakrsnih referenci u programu Microsoft Word sada se tretiraju kao hiperveze. Prijavljuju se kao poveznice i mogu se aktivirati. (#6102)

segment.source: Support for the Baum SuperVario2, Baum Vario 340 and HumanWare Brailliant2 braille displays. (#6116)
segment.target: Podrka za Baum SuperVario2, Baum Vario 340 i HumanWare Brailliant2 brajice. (#6116)

segment.source: Initial support for the Anniversary update of Microsoft Edge. (#6271)
segment.target: Poetna podrka za auriranje Microsoft Edgea za godinjicu. (#6271)

segment.source: Browse mode is now used when reading emails in the Windows 10 mail app. (#6271)
segment.target: Nain pregledavanja sada se koristi prilikom itanja e-pote u aplikaciji za potu sustava Windows 10. (#6271)

segment.source: New language: Lithuanian.
segment.target: Novi jezik: litavski.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 3.0.0. This includes significant enhancements to Unified English Braille. (#6109, #4194, #6220, #6140)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na 3.0.0. To ukljuuje znaajna poboljanja objedinjenog engleskog Brailleovog pisma. (#6109, #4194, #6220, #6140)

segment.source: In the Add-ons Manager, the Disable add-on and Enable add-on buttons now have keyboard shortcuts (alt+d and alt+e, respectively). (#6388)
segment.target: U Upravitelju dodataka, gumbi Onemogui dodatak i Omogui dodatak sada imaju tipkovne preace (alt+d i alt+e). (#6388)

segment.source: Various padding and alignment issues in NVDA's dialogs have been resolved. (#6317, #5548, #6342, #6343, #6349)
segment.target: Razni problemi s podmetanjem i poravnanjem u NVDA dijalokim okvirima su rijeeni. (#6317, #5548, #6342, #6343, #6349)

segment.source: The document formatting dialog has been adjusted so that the contents scrolls. (#6348)
segment.target: Dijaloki okvir za oblikovanje dokumenta prilagoen je tako da se sadraj pomie. (#6348)

segment.source: Adjusted the layout of the Symbol Pronunciation dialog so the full width of the dialog is used for the symbols list. (#6101)
segment.target: Prilagoen je izgled dijalokog okvira Izgovor simbola tako da se puna irina dijalokog okvira koristi za popis simbola. (#6101)

segment.source: In browse mode in web browsers, the edit field (e and shift+e) and form field (f and shift+f) single letter navigation commands can now be used to move to read-only edit fields. (#4164)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u web-preglednicima, jednoslovne navigacijske naredbe polja za ureivanje (e i shift+e) i polja obrasca (f i shift+f) sada se mogu koristiti za premjetanje u polja za ureivanje samo za itanje. (#4164)

segment.source: In NVDA's Document Formatting settings, "Announce formatting changes after the cursor" has been renamed to "Report formatting changes after the cursor", as it affects braille as well as speech. (#6336)
segment.target: U NVDA postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta, "Najavi promjene formatiranja nakon kursora" preimenovano je u "Prijavi promjene formatiranja nakon kursora", jer utjee na Brailleovo pismo kao i na govor. (#6336)

segment.source: Adjusted the appearance of the NVDA "Welcome dialog". (#6350)
segment.target: Podeen je izgled NVDA "Dijaloga dobrodolice". (#6350)

segment.source: NVDA dialog boxes now have their "ok" and "cancel" buttons aligned to the right of the dialog. (#6333)
segment.target: NVDA dijaloki okviri sada imaju gumbe "ok" i "cancel" poravnate desno od dijalokog okvira. (#6333)

segment.source: Spin Controls are now used for numeric input fields such as the "Capital pitch change percentage" setting in the Voice Settings dialog. You can enter the desired value or use the up and down arrow keys to adjust the value. (#6099)
segment.target: Kontrole vrtnje sada se koriste za numerika polja za unos kao to je postavka "Postotak promjene visine tona velikim slovom" u dijalokom okviru Postavke glasa. Moete unijeti eljenu vrijednost ili koristiti tipke sa strelicama gore i dolje za podeavanje vrijednosti. (#6099)

segment.source: The way IFrames (documents embedded within documents) are reported has been made more consistent across web browsers. IFrames are now reported as "frame" in Firefox. (#6047)
segment.target: Nain na koji se IFrames (dokumenti ugraeni u dokumente) izvjetavaju postao je dosljedniji u svim web preglednicima. IFrame se sada prijavljuju kao "okvir" u Firefoxu. (#6047)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Fixed a rare error when exiting NVDA while the speech viewer is open. (#5050)
segment.target: Ispravljena je rijetka pogreka prilikom izlaska iz NVDA dok je preglednik govora otvoren. (#5050)

segment.source: Image maps now render as expected in browse mode in Mozilla Firefox. (#6051)
segment.target: Slikovne karte sada se prikazuju prema oekivanjima u nainu pregledavanja u pregledniku Mozilla Firefox. (#6051)

segment.source: While in the dictionary dialog, pressing the enter key now saves any changes you have made and closes the dialog. Previously, pressing enter did nothing. (#6206)
segment.target: Dok ste u dijalokom okviru rjenika, pritiskom na tipku enter sada se spremaju sve promjene koje ste napravili i zatvara se dijaloki okvir. Prije toga, pritiskom na Enter nije bilo nita. (#6206)

segment.source: Messages are now displayed in braille when changing input modes for an input method (native input/alphanumeric, full shaped/half shaped, etc.). (#5892, #5893)
segment.target: Poruke se sada prikazuju na Brailleovom pismu prilikom promjene naina unosa za nain unosa (izvorni unos/alfanumeriki, puni oblik/poluoblikovan itd.). (#5892, #5893)

segment.source: When disabling and then immediately re-enabling an add-on or vice versa, the add-on status now correctly reverts to what it was previously. (#6299)
segment.target: Kada onemoguite, a zatim odmah ponovno omoguite dodatak ili obrnuto, status dodatka sada se ispravno vraa na ono to je bio prije. (#6299)

segment.source: When using Microsoft Word, page number fields in headers can now be read. (#6004)
segment.target: Kada koristite Microsoft Word, polja s brojevima stranica u zaglavljima sada se mogu itati. (#6004)

segment.source: The mouse can now be used to move focus between the symbol list and the edit fields in the symbol pronunciation dialog. (#6312)
segment.target: Mi se sada moe koristiti za pomicanje fokusa izmeu popisa simbola i polja za ureivanje u dijalokom okviru za izgovor simbola. (#6312)

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Word, Fixed an issue that stops the elements list from appearing when a document contains an invalid hyperlink. (#5886)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u programu Microsoft Word, rijeen je problem koji sprjeava pojavljivanje popisa elemenata kada dokument sadri nevaeu hipervezu. (#5886)

segment.source: After being closed via the task bar or the alt+F4 shortcut, the speech viewer check box in the NVDA menu will now reflect the actual visibility of the window. (#6340)
segment.target: Nakon zatvaranja putem programske trake ili preaca alt+F4, potvrdni okvir preglednika govora u NVDA izborniku sada e odraavati stvarnu vidljivost prozora. (#6340)

segment.source: The reload plugins command no longer causes problems for triggered configuration profiles, new documents in web browsers and screen review. (#2892, #5380)
segment.target: Naredba za ponovno uitavanje dodataka vie ne uzrokuje probleme za pokrenute konfiguracijske profile, nove dokumente u web preglednicima i pregled zaslona. (#2892, #5380)

segment.source: In the list of languages in NVDA's General Settings dialog, languages such as Aragonese are now displayed correctly on Windows 10. (#6259)
segment.target: Na popisu jezika u NVDA dijalokom okviru Ope postavke, jezici poput aragonskog sada se ispravno prikazuju u sustavu Windows 10. (#6259)

segment.source: Emulated system keyboard keys (e.g. a button on a braille display which emulates pressing the tab key) are now presented in the configured NVDA language in input help and the Input Gestures dialog. Previously, they were always presented in English. (#6212)
segment.target: Emulirane tipke sistemske tipkovnice (npr. gumb na Brailleovom pismu koji emulira pritiskanje tipke tabulatora) sada su prikazani na konfiguriranom NVDA jeziku u pomoi za unos i dijalokom okviru Geste unosa. Prije su uvijek bili predstavljeni na engleskom jeziku. (#6212)

segment.source: Changing the NVDA language (from the General Settings dialog) now has no effect until NVDA is restarted. (#4561)
segment.target: Promjena NVDA jezika (iz dijalokog okvira Ope postavke) sada nema uinka dok se NVDA ponovno ne pokrene. (#4561)

segment.source: It is no longer possible to leave the Pattern field blank for a new speech dictionary entry. (#6412)
segment.target: Vie nije mogue ostaviti polje Uzorak prazno za novi unos u govorni rjenik. (#6412)

segment.source: Fixed a rare issue when scanning for serial ports on some systems which made some braille display drivers unusable. (#6462)
segment.target: Rijeen je rijedak problem prilikom skeniranja serijskih prikljuaka na nekim sustavima zbog kojeg su neki upravljaki programi za Brailleovo pismo bili neupotrebljivi. (#6462)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, Numbered bullets in table cells are now read when moving by cell. (#6446)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word numerirane grafike oznake u elijama tablice sada se itaju prilikom premjetanja po eliji. (#6446)

segment.source: It is now possible to assign gestures to commands for the Handy Tech braille display driver in the NVDA Input Gestures dialog. (#6461)
segment.target: Sada je mogue dodijeliti geste naredbama za upravljaki program za Brailleovo pismo Handy Tech u dijalokom okviru NVDA Input Gestures. (#6461)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, pressing enter or numpadEnter when navigating a spreadsheet now correctly reports navigation to the next row. (#6500)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel pritiskom na Enter ili numpad prilikom navigacije proraunskom tablicom sada ispravno izvjetava o navigaciji do sljedeeg retka. (#6500)

segment.source: iTunes no longer intermittently freezes forever when using browse mode for the iTunes Store, Apple Music, etc. (#6502)
segment.target: iTunes se vie ne zamrzava povremeno zauvijek kada koristite nain pregledavanja za iTunes Store, Apple Music itd. (#6502)

segment.source: Fixed crashes in 64 bit Mozilla and Chrome-based applications. (#6497)
segment.target: Ispravljena ruenja u 64-bitnim aplikacijama temeljenim na Mozilli i Chromeu. (#6497)

segment.source: In Firefox with multi-process enabled, browse mode and editable text fields now function correctly. (#6380)
segment.target: U Firefoxu s omoguenim vie procesa, nain pregledavanja i tekstualna polja koja se mogu ureivati sada ispravno funkcioniraju. (#6380)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: It is now possible to provide app modules for executables containing a dot (.) in their names. Dots are replaced with underscores (_). (#5323)
segment.target: Sada je mogue osigurati module aplikacije za izvrne datoteke koje sadre toku (.) u nazivu. Toke se zamjenjuju podvlakama (_). (#5323)

segment.source: The new gui.guiHelper module includes utilities to simplify the creation of wxPython GUIs, including automatic management of spacing. This facilitates better visual appearance and consistency, as well as easing creation of new GUIs for blind developers. (#6287)
segment.target: Novi modul gui.guiHelper ukljuuje uslune programe za pojednostavljenje izrade wxPython GUI-ja, ukljuujui automatsko upravljanje razmacima. To olakava bolji vizualni izgled i dosljednost, kao i olakavanje stvaranja novih GUI-ja za slijepe programere. (#6287)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include the ability to disable individual add-ons; support for form fields in Microsoft Excel; significant improvements to reporting of colors; fixes and improvements related to several braille displays; and fixes and improvements to support for Microsoft Word.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju mogunost onemoguavanja pojedinanih dodataka; podrka za polja obrazaca u programu Microsoft Excel; znaajna poboljanja u izvjeivanju o bojama; popravci i poboljanja vezani uz nekoliko Brailleovih zaslona; te popravci i poboljanja podrke za Microsoft Word.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Browse mode can now be used to read PDF documents in Microsoft Edge in the Windows 10 Anniversary Update. (#5740)
segment.target: Nain pregledavanja sada se moe koristiti za itanje PDF dokumenata u pregledniku Microsoft Edge u auriranju Windows 10 Anniversary Update. (#5740)

segment.source: Strikethrough and double-strikethrough are now reported if appropriate in Microsoft Word. (#5800)
segment.target: Precrtani i dvostruki precrtani sada se prijavljuju ako je prikladno u programu Microsoft Word. (#5800)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, the title of a table is now reported if one has been provided. If there is a description, it can be accessed using the open long description command (NVDA+d) in browse mode. (#5943)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word naslov tablice sada se prijavljuje ako je naveden. Ako postoji opis, moe mu se pristupiti pomou naredbe otvorenog dugog opisa (NVDA+d) u nainu pregledavanja. (#5943)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now reports position information when moving paragraphs (alt+shift+downArrow and alt+shift+upArrow). (#5945)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu, NVDA sada izvjetava o poloaju prilikom premjetanja paragrafa (alt+shift+strelica prema dolje i alt+shift+strelica gore). (#5945)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, line spacing is now reported via NVDA's report formatting command, when changing it with various Microsoft word shortcut keys, and when moving to text with different line spacing if Report Line Spacing is turned on in NVDA's Document Formatting Settings. (#2961)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu, razmak izmeu redaka sada se prijavljuje putem NVDA naredbe za oblikovanje izvjea, kada ga mijenjate pomou razliitih tipki preaca Microsoft Word i kada prelazite na tekst s razliitim proredima ako je Izvjeivanje o razmaku izmeu redaka ukljueno u NVDA postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta. (#2961)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, HTML5 structural elements are now recognised. (#5591)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer sada se prepoznaju strukturni elementi HTML5. (#5591)

segment.source: Reporting of comments (such as in Microsoft Word) can now be disabled via a Report Comments checkbox in NVDA's Document Formatting settings dialog. (#5108)
segment.target: Izvjetavanje o komentarima (kao to je u Microsoft Wordu) sada se moe onemoguiti putem potvrdnog okvira Prijavi komentare u NVDA dijalokom okviru postavki formatiranja dokumenta. (#5108)

segment.source: It is now possible to disable individual add-ons in the Add-ons Manager. (#3090)
segment.target: Sada je mogue onemoguiti pojedinane dodatke u Upravitelju dodataka. (#3090)

segment.source: Additional key assignments have been added for ALVA BC640/680 series braille displays. (#5206)
segment.target: Dodane su dodatne dodjele tipki za zaslone za brajicu serije ALVA BC640/680. (#5206)

segment.source: There is now a command to move the braille display to the current focus. Currently, only the ALVA BC640/680 series has a key assigned to this command, but it can be assigned manually for other displays in the Input Gestures dialog if desired. (#5250)
segment.target: Sada postoji naredba za premjetanje brajinog zaslona na trenutni fokus. Trenutno samo ALVA serija BC640/680 ima tipku dodijeljenu ovoj naredbi, ali se po elji moe runo dodijeliti za druge zaslone u dijalokom okviru Input Gestures. (#5250)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, you can now interact with form fields. You move to form fields using the Elements List or single letter navigation in browse mode. (#4953)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel sada moete komunicirati s poljima obrazaca. Na polja obrasca prelazite pomou popisa elemenata ili navigacije jednim slovom u nainu pregledavanja. (#4953)

segment.source: You can now assign an input gesture to toggle simple review mode using the Input Gestures dialog. (#6173)
segment.target: Sada moete dodijeliti gestu unosa za prebacivanje jednostavnog naina pregleda pomou dijalokog okvira Geste unosa. (#6173)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: NVDA now reports colors using a basic well-understood set of 9 color hues and 3 shades, with brightness and paleness variations. This is rather than using more subjective and less understood color names. (#6029)
segment.target: NVDA sada izvjetava o bojama koristei osnovni dobro shvaeni skup od 9 nijansi boja i 3 nijanse, s varijacijama svjetline i blijedosti. Ovo je umjesto koritenja subjektivnijih i manje razumljivih naziva boja. (#6029)

segment.source: The existing NVDA+F9 then NVDA+F10 behavior has been modified to select text on the first press of F10. When F10 is pressed twice (in quick succession) the text is copied to the clipboard. (#4636)
segment.target: Postojee ponaanje NVDA+F9, a zatim NVDA+F10 je izmijenjeno tako da odabire tekst pri prvom pritisku na F10. Kada se F10 pritisne dvaput (u brzom slijedu), tekst se kopira u meuspremnik. (#4636)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak NG to version Master 11b1a7b (22 June 2016). (#6037)
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak NG na verziju Master 11b1a7b (22. lipnja 2016.). (#6037)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Word, copying to the clipboard now preserves formatting. (#5956)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u programu Microsoft Word, kopiranje u meuspremnik sada uva oblikovanje. (#5956)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now reports appropriately when using Word's own table navigation commands (alt+home, alt+end, alt+pageUp and alt+pageDown) and table selection commands (shift added to the navigation commands). (#5961)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu, NVDA sada izvjetava na odgovarajui nain kada koristi Wordove vlastite naredbe za navigaciju tablicom (alt+home, alt+end, alt+pageUp i alt+pageDown) i naredbe za odabir tablice (shift dodan navigacijskim naredbama). (#5961)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word dialog boxes, NVDA's object navigation has been greatly improved. (#6036)
segment.target: U dijalokim okvirima Microsoft Worda, NVDA navigacija objektima je znatno poboljana. (#6036)

segment.source: In some applications such as Visual Studio 2015, shortcut keys (e.g. control+c for Copy) are now reported as expected. (#6021)
segment.target: U nekim aplikacijama, kao to je Visual Studio 2015, tipke preaca (npr. kontrola+c za kopiranje) sada se prijavljuju prema oekivanjima. (#6021)

segment.source: Fixed a rare issue when scanning for serial ports on some systems which made some braille display drivers unusable. (#6015)
segment.target: Rijeen je rijedak problem prilikom skeniranja serijskih prikljuaka na nekim sustavima zbog kojeg su neki upravljaki programi za Brailleovo pismo bili neupotrebljivi. (#6015)

segment.source: Reporting colors in Microsoft Word is now more accurate as changes in Microsoft Office Themes are now taken into account. (#5997)
segment.target: Boje izvjeivanja u programu Microsoft Word sada su tonije jer se sada uzimaju u obzir promjene u temama sustava Microsoft Office. (#5997)

segment.source: Browse mode for Microsoft Edge and support for Start Menu search suggestions is again available on Windows 10 builds after April 2016. (#5955)
segment.target: Nain pregledavanja za Microsoft Edge i podrka za prijedloge pretraivanja izbornika Start ponovno su dostupni u meuverzijama sustava Windows 10 nakon travnja 2016. (#5955)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, automatic table header reading works better when dealing with merged cells. (#5926)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word automatsko itanje zaglavlja tablice bolje funkcionira kada se radi o spojenim elijama. (#5926)

segment.source: In the Windows 10 Mail app, NVDA no longer fails to read the content of messages. (#5635)
segment.target: U aplikaciji Windows 10 Mail NVDA vie ne uspijeva itati sadraj poruka. (#5635)

segment.source: When speak command keys is on, lock keys such as caps lock are no longer announced twice. (#5490)
segment.target: Kada je tipka za izgovaranje naredbi ukljuena, tipke za zakljuavanje kao to je Caps Lock vie se ne najavljuju dvaput. (#5490)

segment.source: Windows User Account Control dialogs are again read correctly in the Windows 10 Anniversary update. (#5942)
segment.target: Dijaloki okviri za kontrolu korisnikog rauna sustava Windows ponovno se ispravno itaju u auriranju Windows 10 Anniversary (#5942)

segment.source: In the Web Conference Plugin (such as used on out-of-sight.net) NVDA no longer beeps and speaks progress bar updates related to microphone input. (#5888)
segment.target: U dodatku za web konferencije (kao to je koriten na out-of-sight.net) NVDA vie ne oglaava zvune signale i ne izgovara auriranja trake napretka koja se odnose na ulaz mikrofona. (#5888)

segment.source: Performing a Find Next or Find Previous command in Browse Mode will now correctly do a case sensitive search if the original Find was case sensitive. (#5522)
segment.target: Izvoenje naredbe Pronai sljedee ili Pronai prethodno u nainu pregledavanja sada e ispravno izvriti pretraivanje s razlikom od velikih i malih slova ako je izvorni Pronalaenje razlikovalo velika i mala slova. (#5522)

segment.source: When editing dictionary entries, feedback is now given for invalid regular expressions. NVDA no longer crashes if a dictionary file contains an invalid regular expression. (#4834)
segment.target: Prilikom ureivanja unosa u rjeniku, sada se daju povratne informacije za nevaee regularne izraze. NVDA se vie ne rui ako datoteka rjenika sadri nevaei regularni izraz. (#4834)

segment.source: If NVDA is unable to communicate with a braille display (e.g. because it has been disconnected), it will automatically disable use of the display. (#1555)
segment.target: Ako NVDA ne moe komunicirati s Brailleovim pismom (npr. jer je iskljuen), automatski e onemoguiti koritenje zaslona. (#1555)

segment.source: Slightly improved performance of filtering in the Browse Mode Elements List in some cases. (#6126)
segment.target: Malo su poboljane performanse filtriranja na popisu elemenata naina pregledavanja u nekim sluajevima. (#6126)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the background pattern names reported by NVDA now match those used by Excel. (#6092)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel, nazivi pozadinskih uzoraka koje je prijavio NVDA sada odgovaraju onima koje koristi Excel. (#6092)

segment.source: Improved support for the Windows 10 logon screen, including announcement of alerts and activating of the password field with touch. (#6010)
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za zaslon za prijavu u sustav Windows 10, ukljuujui najavu upozorenja i aktiviranje polja za lozinku dodirom. (#6010)

segment.source: NVDA now correctly detects the secondary routing buttons on ALVA BC640/680 series braille displays. (#5206)
segment.target: NVDA sada ispravno prepoznaje sekundarne tipke za usmjeravanje na zaslonima za brajicu serije ALVA BC640/680. (#5206)

segment.source: NVDA can again report Windows Toast notifications in recent builds of Windows 10. (#6096)
segment.target: NVDA ponovno moe prijaviti Windows Toast obavijesti u nedavnim verzijama sustava Windows 10. (#6096)

segment.source: NVDA no longer occasionally stops recognising key presses on Baum compatible and HumanWare Brailliant B braille displays. (#6035)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne prestaje povremeno prepoznavati pritiske tipki na Baum kompatibilnim i HumanWare Brailliant B Braille zaslonima. (#6035)

segment.source: If reporting of line numbers is enabled in NVDA's Document Formatting preferences, line numbers are now shown on a braille display. (#5941)
segment.target: Ako je prijavljivanje brojeva redaka omogueno u NVDA postavkama formatiranja dokumenta, brojevi redaka sada se prikazuju na Brailleovom pismu. (#5941)

segment.source: When speech mode is off, reporting objects (such as pressing NVDA+tab to report the focus) now appears in the Speech Viewer as expected. (#6049)
segment.target: Kada je govorni mod iskljuen, objekti za prijavljivanje (kao to je pritiskanje NVDA+tab za prijavu fokusa) sada se pojavljuju u Pregledniku govora prema oekivanjima. (#6049)

segment.source: In the Outlook 2016 message list, associated draft information is no longer reported. (#6219)
segment.target: Na popisu poruka programa Outlook 2016 vie se ne prijavljuju povezane skice. (#6219)

segment.source: In Google Chrome and Chrome-based browsers in a language other than English, browse mode no longer fails to work in many documents. (#6249)
segment.target: U pregledniku Google Chrome i preglednicima temeljenim na Chromeu na jeziku koji nije engleski, nain pregledavanja vie ne funkcionira u mnogim dokumentima. (#6249)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Logging information directly from a property no longer results in the property being called recursively over and over again. (#6122)
segment.target: Zapisivanje podataka izravno iz svojstva vie ne rezultira rekurzivnim pozivanjem svojstva iznova i iznova. (#6122)

segment.source: This release fixes crashes in Microsoft Word:
segment.target: Ovo izdanje popravlja ruenja u programu Microsoft Word:

segment.source: NVDA no longer causes Microsoft Word to crash immediately after it starts in Windows XP. (#6033)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne uzrokuje ruenje Microsoft Worda odmah nakon pokretanja u sustavu Windows XP. (#6033)

segment.source: Removed reporting of grammar errors, as this causes crashes in Microsoft Word. (#5954, #5877)
segment.target: Uklonjeno je izvjeivanje o gramatikim pogrekama jer to uzrokuje ruenje u programu Microsoft Word. (#5954, #5877)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include the ability to indicate spelling errors while typing; support for reporting grammar errors in Microsoft Word; and improvements and fixes to Microsoft Office support.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju mogunost oznaavanja pravopisnih pogreaka tijekom tipkanja; podrka za prijavljivanje gramatikih pogreaka u programu Microsoft Word; te poboljanja i popravci podrke za Microsoft Office.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: In browse mode in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, using first letter navigation to move by annotation (a and shift+a) now moves to inserted and deleted text. (#5691)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama, koritenje navigacije prvim slovom za pomicanje napomenom (a i shift+a) sada se premjeta na umetnuti i izbrisani tekst. (#5691)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, NVDA now reports the level of a group of cells, as well as whether it is collapsed or expanded. (#5690)
segment.target: U Microsoft Excelu, NVDA sada izvjetava o razini grupe elija, kao i o tome je li saeta ili proirena. (#5690)

segment.source: Pressing the Report text formatting command (NVDA+f) twice presents the information in browse mode so it can be reviewed. (#4908)
segment.target: Dvaput pritiskom na naredbu Oblikovanje teksta izvjea (NVDA+f) prikazuju se informacije u nainu pregledavanja kako bi ih se moglo pregledati. (#4908)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel 2010 and later, cell shading and gradient fill is now reported. Automatic reporting is controlled by the Report colors option in NVDA's Document Formatting preferences. (#3683)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel 2010 i novijim verzijama sada se izvjeuje o sjenanju elija i ispuni gradijenta. Automatskim izvjetavanjem upravlja opcija Boje izvjea u NVDA postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta. (#3683)

segment.source: New braille translation table: Koine Greek. (#5393)
segment.target: Nova tablica za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: Koine grki. (#5393)

segment.source: In the Log Viewer, you can now save the log using the shortcut key control+s. (#4532)
segment.target: U pregledniku dnevnika sada moete spremiti zapisnik pomou tipke preaca control+s. (#4532)

segment.source: If reporting of spelling errors is enabled and supported in the focused control, NVDA will play a sound to alert you of a spelling error made while typing. This can be disabled using the new "Play sound for spelling errors while typing" option in NVDA's Keyboard Settings dialog. (#2024)
segment.target: Ako je prijavljivanje pravopisnih pogreaka omogueno i podrano u fokusiranoj kontroli, NVDA e reproducirati zvuk koji e vas upozoriti na pravopisnu pogreku napravljenu tijekom tipkanja. To se moe onemoguiti pomou nove opcije "Reproduciraj zvuk za pravopisne pogreke tijekom tipkanja" u NVDA dijalokom okviru Postavke tipkovnice. (#2024)

segment.source: Grammar errors are now reported in Microsoft Word. This can be disabled using the new "Report grammar errors" option in NVDA's Document Formatting preferences dialog. (#5877)
segment.target: Gramatike pogreke sada se prijavljuju u programu Microsoft Word. To se moe onemoguiti pomou nove opcije "Prijavi gramatike pogreke" u NVDA dijalokom okviru postavki oblikovanja dokumenta. (#5877)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: In browse mode and editable text fields, NVDA now treats numpadEnter the same as the main enter key. (#5385)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja i tekstualnim poljima koja se mogu ureivati, NVDA sada tretira numpad Enter isto kao i glavnu tipku za unos. (#5385)

segment.source: NVDA has switched to the eSpeak NG speech synthesizer. (#5651)
segment.target: NVDA je preao na eSpeak NG sintetizator govora. (#5651)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, NVDA no longer ignores a column header for a cell when there is a blank row between the cell and the header. (#5396)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel NVDA vie ne zanemaruje zaglavlje stupca za eliju kada postoji prazan redak izmeu elije i zaglavlja. (#5396)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, coordinates are now announced before headers to eliminate ambiguity between headers and content. (#5396)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel koordinate se sada najavljuju prije zaglavlja kako bi se uklonila dvosmislenost izmeu zaglavlja i sadraja. (#5396)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: In browse mode, when attempting to use single letter navigation to move to an element which isn't supported for the document, NVDA reports that this isn't supported rather than reporting that there is no element in that direction. (#5691)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, kada pokuavate koristiti navigaciju jednim slovom za prelazak na element koji nije podran za dokument, NVDA izvjetava da to nije podrano umjesto da izvjetava da nema elementa u tom smjeru. (#5691)

segment.source: When listing sheets in the Elements List in Microsoft Excel, sheets containing only charts are now included. (#5698)
segment.target: Prilikom navoenja listova na popisu elemenata u programu Microsoft Excel sada su ukljueni listovi koji sadre samo grafikone. (#5698)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports extraneous information when switching windows in a Java application with multiple windows such as IntelliJ or Android Studio. (#5732)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izvjetava o suvinim informacijama prilikom prebacivanja prozora u Java aplikaciji s vie prozora kao to su IntelliJ ili Android Studio. (#5732)

segment.source: In Scintilla based editors such as Notepad++, braille is now updated correctly when moving the cursor using a braille display. (#5678)
segment.target: U ureivaima temeljenim na Scintilli, kao to je Notepad++, Brailleovo pismo se sada ispravno aurira prilikom pomicanja kursora pomou zaslona brajice. (#5678)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes crashes when enabling braille output. (#4457)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ponekad ne rui prilikom omoguavanja Brailleovog izlaza. (#4457)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, paragraph indentation is now always reported in the measurement unit chosen by the user (e.g. centimeters or inches). (#5804)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word uvlaenje odlomka sada se uvijek prijavljuje u mjernoj jedinici koju je odabrao korisnik (npr. centimetri ili ini). (#5804)

segment.source: When using a braille display, many NVDA messages that were previously only spoken are now brailled as well. (#5557)
segment.target: Kada koristite Brailleov zaslon, mnoge NVDA poruke koje su se prije samo izgovarale sada se takoer brailliraju. (#5557)

segment.source: In accessible Java applications, the level of tree view items is now reported. (#5766)
segment.target: U pristupanim Java aplikacijama sada se izvjetava o razini stavki prikaza stabla. (#5766)

segment.source: Fixed crashes in Adobe Flash in Mozilla Firefox in some cases. (#5367)
segment.target: Ispravljena ruenja u Adobe Flashu u Mozilla Firefoxu u nekim sluajevima. (#5367)

segment.source: In Google Chrome and Chrome-based browsers, documents within dialogs or applications can now be read in browse mode. (#5818)
segment.target: U preglednikima Google Chrome i Chrome, dokumenti unutar dijalokih okvira ili aplikacija sada se mogu itati u nainu pregledavanja. (#5818)

segment.source: In Google Chrome and Chrome-based browsers, you can now force NVDA to switch to browse mode in web dialogs or applications. (#5818)
segment.target: U Google Chromeu i preglednicima koji se temelje na Chromeu, sada moete prisiliti NVDA da se prebaci u nain pregledavanja u web dijalokim okvirima ili aplikacijama. (#5818)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, moving focus to certain controls (specifically, where aria-activedescendant is used) no longer incorrectly switches to browse mode. This occurred, for example, when moving to suggestions in address fields when composing a message in Gmail. (#5676)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama premjetanje fokusa na odreene kontrole (konkretno, gdje se koristi aria-activedescendant) vie se ne prebacuje pogreno u nain pregledavanja. To se dogodilo, na primjer, prilikom prelaska na prijedloge u adresnim poljima prilikom sastavljanja poruke na Gmailu. (#5676)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA no longer freezes in large tables when reporting of table row/column headers is enabled. (#5878)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu, NVDA se vie ne zamrzava u velikim tablicama kada je omogueno izvjetavanje o zaglavljima redaka/stupaca tablice. (#5878)

segment.source: In Microsoft word, NVDA no longer incorrectly reports text with an outline level (but not a built-in heading style) as a heading. (#5186)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu, NVDA vie ne izvjetava pogreno o tekstu s razinom obrisa (ali ne i ugraenim stilom naslova) kao naslovom. (#5186)

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Word, the Move past end/to start of container commands (comma and shift+comma) now work for tables. (#5883)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u programu Microsoft Word, naredbe Premjesti preko kraja/na poetak spremnika (zarez i shift+zarez) sada rade za tablice. (#5883)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: NVDA's C++ components are now built with Microsoft Visual Studio 2015. (#5592)
segment.target: NVDA C++ komponente sada su izgraene s Microsoft Visual Studio 2015. (#5592)

segment.source: You can now present a text or HTML message to the user in browse mode using ui.browseableMessage. (#4908)
segment.target: Sada moete predstaviti tekstualnu ili HTML poruku korisniku u nainu pregledavanja pomou ui.browseableMessage. (#4908)

segment.source: In the User Guide, when a <!-- KC:setting command is used for a setting which has a common key for all layouts, the key may now be placed after a full-width colon () as well as the regular colon (:). (#5739) -->
segment.target: In the User Guide, when a <!-- KC:setting command is used for a setting which has a common key for all layouts, the key may now be placed after a full-width colon () as well as the regular colon (:). (#5739) -->

segment.source: Highlights of this release include the ability to optionally lower the volume of other sounds; improvements to braille output and braille display support; several significant fixes to Microsoft Office support; and fixes to browse mode in iTunes.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja ukljuuju mogunost opcionalnog smanjenja glasnoe drugih zvukova; poboljanja Brailleovog izlaza i podrke za Brailleovo pismo; nekoliko znaajnih popravaka podrke za Microsoft Office; i popravke naina pregledavanja u iTunesu.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Polish 8 dot computer braille, Mongolian. (#5537, #5574)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: poljska raunalna brajica s 8 toaka, mongolska. (#5537, #5574)

segment.source: You can turn off the braille cursor and change its shape using the new Show cursor and Cursor shape options in the Braille Settings dialog. (#5198)
segment.target: Moete iskljuiti pokaziva brajice i promijeniti njegov oblik pomou novih opcija Prikai pokaziva i Oblik kursora u dijalokom okviru Postavke brajice. (#5198)

segment.source: NVDA can now connect to a HIMS Smart Beetle braille display via Bluetooth. (#5607)
segment.target: NVDA se sada moe povezati s HIMS Smart Beetle Brailleovim pismom putem Bluetootha. (#5607)

segment.source: NVDA can optionally lower the volume of other sounds when installed on Windows 8 and later. This can be configured using the Audio ducking mode option in the NVDA Synthesizer dialog or by pressing NVDA+shift+d. (#3830, #5575)
segment.target: NVDA moe po elji smanjiti glasnou drugih zvukova kada je instaliran na Windows 8 i novijim verzijama. To se moe konfigurirati pomou opcije Nain priguivanja zvuka u dijalokom okviru NVDA sintisajzera ili pritiskom na NVDA+shift+d. (#3830, #5575)

segment.source: Support for the APH Refreshabraille in HID mode and the Baum VarioUltra and Pronto! when connected via USB. (#5609)
segment.target: Podrka za APH Refreshabraille u HID nainu rada i Baum VarioUltra i Pronto! kada je spojen putem USB-a. (#5609)

segment.source: Support for HumanWare Brailliant BI/B braille displays when the protocol is set to OpenBraille. (#5612)
segment.target: Podrka za HumanWare Brailliant BI/B Brailleovo pismo prikazuje se kada je protokol postavljen na OpenBraille. (#5612)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Reporting of emphasis is now disabled by default. (#4920)
segment.target: Izvjeivanje o naglasku sada je onemogueno prema zadanim postavkama. (#4920)

segment.source: In the Elements List dialog in Microsoft Excel, the shortcut for Formulas has been changed to alt+r so that it is different to the shortcut for the Filter field. (#5527)
segment.target: U dijalokom okviru Popis elemenata u programu Microsoft Excel preac za formule promijenjen je u alt+are tako da se razlikuje od preaca za polje Filtar. (#5527)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.6.5. (#5574)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajevog pisma liblouis na 2.6.5. (#5574)

segment.source: The word "text" is no longer reported when moving the focus or review cursor to text objects. (#5452)
segment.target: Rije "tekst" vie se ne prijavljuje prilikom premjetanja fokusa ili pregleda kursora na tekstualne objekte. (#5452)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: In iTunes 12, browse mode now updates correctly when a new page loads in the iTunes Store. (#5191)
segment.target: U aplikaciji iTunes 12 nain pretraivanja sada se ispravno aurira kada se nova stranica uita u trgovini iTunes Store. (#5191)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, moving to specific heading levels with single letter navigation now behaves as expected when the level of a heading is overridden for accessibility purposes (specifically, when aria-level overrides the level of an h tag). (#5434)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama prelazak na odreene razine naslova s navigacijom jednim slovom sada se ponaa kao to se oekuje kada je razina naslova nadjaana u svrhu pristupanosti (tonije, kada razina arije nadjaava razinu oznake h). (#5434)

segment.source: In Spotify, focus no longer frequently lands on "unknown" objects. (#5439)
segment.target: U Spotifyju fokus vie ne pada esto na "nepoznate" objekte. (#5439)

segment.source: Focus is now restored correctly when returning to Spotify from another application. (#5439)
segment.target: Fokus se sada ispravno vraa prilikom povratka na Spotify iz druge aplikacije. (#5439)

segment.source: When toggling between browse mode and focus mode, the mode is reported in braille as well as speech. (#5239)
segment.target: Prilikom prebacivanja izmeu naina pregledavanja i naina fokusiranja, nain rada se izvjetava na Brailleovom pismu i govoru. (#5239)

segment.source: The Start buttn on the Taskbar is no longer reported as a list and/or as selected in some versions of Windows. (#5178)
segment.target: Pokreni stranjicu na programskoj traci vie se ne prijavljuje kao popis i/ili kao odabrano u nekim verzijama sustava Windows. (#5178)

segment.source: Messages such as "inserted" are no longer reported when composing messages in Microsoft Outlook. (#5486)
segment.target: Poruke kao to je "umetnuto" vie se ne prijavljuju prilikom sastavljanja poruka u programu Microsoft Outlook. (#5486)

segment.source: When using a braille display and text is selected on the current line (e.g. when searching in a text editor for text which occurs on the same line), the braille display will be scrolled if appropriate. (#5410)
segment.target: Kada se upotrebljava prikaz brajice i odabire se tekst u trenutnom retku (npr. kada u ureivau teksta pretraujete tekst koji se nalazi u istom retku), prikaz brajice pomie se prema potrebi. (#5410)

segment.source: NVDA no longer silently exits when closing a Windows command console with alt+f4 in Windows 10. (#5343)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izlazi tiho prilikom zatvaranja Windows naredbene konzole s alt+f4 u sustavu Windows 10. (#5343)

segment.source: In the Elements List in browse mode, when you change the type of element, the Filter by field is now cleared. (#5511)
segment.target: Na popisu elemenata u nainu pregledavanja, kada promijenite vrstu elementa, polje Filtriraj po sada je obrisano. (#5511)

segment.source: In editable text in Mozilla applications, moving the mouse again reads the appropriate line, word, etc. as expected instead of the entire content. (#5535)
segment.target: U tekstu koji se moe ureivati u Mozillinim aplikacijama, ponovnim pomicanjem mia ita se odgovarajui redak, rije itd. kako se oekuje umjesto cijelog sadraja. (#5535)

segment.source: When moving the mouse in editable text in Mozilla applications, reading no longer stops at elements such as links within the word or line being read. (#2160, #5535)
segment.target: Prilikom pomicanja mia u tekstu koji se moe ureivati u Mozillinim aplikacijama, itanje se vie ne zaustavlja na elementima kao to su poveznice unutar rijei ili retka koji se ita. (#2160, #5535)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, the shoprite.com website can now be read in browse mode instead of reporting as blank. (Specifically, malformed lang attributes are now handled gracefully.) (#5569)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer web-mjesto shoprite.com sada se moe itati u nainu pregledavanja umjesto da se prijavljuje kao prazno. (Konkretno, neispravni atributi langa sada se obrauju graciozno.) (#5569)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, tracked changes such as "inserted" are no longer reported when track changes markup is not displayed. (#5566)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word evidentirane promjene kao to je "umetnute" vie se ne prijavljuju kada se ne prikae oznaka praenja promjena. (#5566)

segment.source: When a toggle button is focused, NVDA now reports when it is changed from pressed to not pressed. (#5441)
segment.target: Kada je preklopna tipka fokusirana, NVDA sada izvjetava kada je promijenjena iz pritisnute u nepritisnutu. (#5441)

segment.source: Reporting of mouse shape changes again works as expected. (#5595)
segment.target: Izvjeivanje o promjenama oblika mia ponovno funkcionira prema oekivanjima. (#5595)

segment.source: When speaking line indentation, non-breaking spaces are now treated as normal spaces. Previously, this could cause announcements such as "space space space" instead of "3 space". (#5610)
segment.target: Kada izgovarate uvlaenje redaka, razmaci bez loma sada se tretiraju kao normalni razmaci. Ranije je to moglo uzrokovati najave kao to je "svemirski prostor" umjesto "3 prostora". (#5610)

segment.source: When closing a modern Microsoft input method candidate list, focus is correctly restored to either the input composition or the underlying document. (#4145)
segment.target: Prilikom zatvaranja popisa kandidata za modernu Microsoftovu metodu unosa, fokus se ispravno vraa na sastav unosa ili temeljni dokument. (#4145)

segment.source: In Microsoft Office 2013 and later, when the ribbon is set to show only tabs, items in the ribbon are again reported as expected when a tab is activated. (#5504)
segment.target: U sustavu Microsoft Office 2013 i novijim verzijama, kada je vrpca postavljena na prikaz samo kartica, stavke na vrpci ponovno se prijavljuju prema oekivanjima kada se kartica aktivira. (#5504)

segment.source: Fixes and improvements to touch screen gesture detection and binding. (#5652)
segment.target: Popravci i poboljanja prepoznavanja i povezivanja gesta na dodirnom zaslonu. (#5652)

segment.source: Touch screen hovers are no longer reported in input help. (#5652)
segment.target: Lebdenja dodirnog zaslona vie se ne prijavljuju u pomoi za unos. (#5652)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to list comments in the Elements List for Microsoft Excel if a comment is on a merged cell. (#5704)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne uspijeva navesti komentare na popisu elemenata za Microsoft Excel ako je komentar na spojenoj eliji. (#5704)

segment.source: In a very rare case, NVDA no longer fails to read sheet content in Microsoft Excel with reporting of row and column headers enabled. (#5705)
segment.target: U vrlo rijetkim sluajevima, NVDA vie ne uspijeva itati sadraj lista u Microsoft Excelu s omoguenim izvjetavanjem o zaglavljima redaka i stupaca. (#5705)

segment.source: In Google Chrome, navigating within an Input composition when entering east Asian characters now works as expected. (#4080)
segment.target: U pregledniku Google Chrome navigacija unutar ulazne kompozicije prilikom unosa istonoazijskih znakova sada funkcionira prema oekivanjima. (#4080)

segment.source: When searching Apple Music in iTunes, browse mode for the search results document is now updated as expected. (#5659)
segment.target: Prilikom pretraivanja Apple Musica u iTunesu, nain pregledavanja dokumenta s rezultatima pretraivanja sada se aurira prema oekivanjima. (#5659)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, pressing shift+f11 to create a new sheet now reports your new position instead of reporting nothing. (#5689)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel pritiskom na shift+f11 za stvaranje novog lista sada se izvjetava o novoj poziciji umjesto da se nita ne prijavljuje. (#5689)

segment.source: Fixed problems with braille display output when entering Korean characters. (#5640)
segment.target: Rijeeni su problemi s izlazom na Brailleovom pismu prilikom unosa korejskih znakova. (#5640)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: The new audioDucking.AudioDucker class allows code which outputs audio to indicate when background audio should be ducked. (#3830)
segment.target: Nova klasa audioDucking.AudioDucker omoguuje kod koji izlazi zvuk kako bi naznaio kada pozadinski zvuk treba sakriti. (#3830)

segment.source: nvwave.WavePlayer's constructor now has a wantDucking keyword argument which specifies whether background audio should be ducked while audio is playing. (#3830)
segment.target: nvwave. Konstruktor WavePlayera sada ima argument kljune rijei wantDucking koji odreuje treba li se pozadinski zvuk sakriti tijekom reprodukcije zvuka. (#3830)

segment.source: When this is enabled (which is the default), it is essential that WavePlayer.idle be called when appropriate.
segment.target: Kada je to omogueno (to je zadano), bitno je da se WavePlayer.idle pozove kada je to prikladno.

segment.source: Enhanced I/O for braille displays: (#5609)
segment.target: Poboljani I/O za Brailleove zaslone: (#5609)

segment.source: Thread-safe braille display drivers can declare themselves as such using the BrailleDisplayDriver.isThreadSafe attribute. A driver must be thread-safe to benefit from the following features.
segment.target: Upravljaki programi Brailleovog zaslona koji su sigurni za nit mogu se proglasiti takvim pomou atributa BrailleDisplayDriver.isThreadSafe. Upravljaki program mora biti siguran za nit kako bi imao koristi od sljedeih znaajki.

segment.source: Data is written to thread-safe braille display drivers in the background, thus improving performance.
segment.target: Podaci se zapisuju na upravljake programe Brailleovog pisma koji su sigurni za nit u pozadini, ime se poboljavaju performanse.

segment.source: hwIo.Serial extends pyserial to call a callable when data is received instead of drivers having to poll.
segment.target: hwIo.Serial proiruje pyserial da pozove poziv kada se primi podatak umjesto da vozai moraju anketirati.

segment.source: hwIo.Hid provides support for braille displays communicating via USB HID.
segment.target: hwIo.Hid prua podrku za Brailleove zaslone koji komuniciraju putem USB HID-a.

segment.source: hwPortUtils and hwIo can optionally provide detailed debug logging, including devices found and all data sent and received.
segment.target: hwPortUtils i hwIo po elji mogu pruiti detaljno biljeenje otklanjanja pogreaka, ukljuujui pronaene ureaje i sve poslane i primljene podatke.

segment.source: There are several new properties accessible from touch screen gestures: (#5652)
segment.target: Postoji nekoliko novih svojstava dostupnih putem gesta na zaslonu osjetljivom na dodir: (#5652)

segment.source: MultitouchTracker objects now contain a childTrackers property which contains the MultiTouchTrackers the tracker was composed of. For example, 2 finger double tap has child trackers for two 2-finger taps. The 2-finger taps themselves have child trackers for two taps.
segment.target: MultitouchTracker objekti sada sadre svojstvo childTrackers koje sadri MultiTouchTrackers od kojeg se sastojao. Na primjer, dvostruki dodir s 2 prsta ima praenje djece za dva dodira s 2 prsta. Sami dodiri s 2 prsta imaju praenje djece za dva dodira.

segment.source: MultiTouchTracker objects now also contain a rawSingleTouchTracker property if the tracker was the result of one single finger doing a tap, flick or hover. The SingleTouchTracker allows access to the underlying ID assigned to the finger by the operating system and whether or not the finger is still in contact at the current time.
segment.target: Objekti MultiTouchTracker sada sadre i svojstvo rawSingleTouchTracker ako je traga rezultat dodira, pomicanja prsta ili lebdenja jednim prstom. SingleTouchTracker omoguuje pristup temeljnom ID-u koji je dodijelio prstu operativni sustav i je li prst jo uvijek u kontaktu u trenutnom trenutku.

segment.source: TouchInputGestures now have x and y properties, removing the need to access the tracker for trivial cases.
segment.target: TouchInputGestures sada imaju svojstva x i y, uklanjajui potrebu za pristupom trackeru za trivijalne sluajeve.

segment.source: TouchInputGesturs now contain a preheldTracker property, which is a MultitouchTracker object representing the other fingers held while this action was being performed.
segment.target: TouchInputGesturs sada sadre svojstvo preheldTracker, to je MultitouchTracker objekt koji predstavlja ostale prste koje se dre tijekom izvoenja ove akcije.

segment.source: Two new touch screen gestures can be emitted: (#5652)
segment.target: Mogu se emitirati dvije nove geste na zaslonu osjetljivom na dodir: (#5652)

segment.source: Plural tap and holds (e.g. double tap and hold)
segment.target: Dodir i zadravanje u mnoini (npr. dvostruki dodir i dranje)

segment.source: A generalized identifier with finger count removed for holds (e.g. hold+hover for 1finger_hold+hover).
segment.target: Generalizirani identifikator s uklonjenim brojem prstiju za zadravanja (npr. dranje+lebdenje za 1finger_hold+lebdei).

segment.source: Highlights of this release include performance improvements in Windows 10; inclusion in the Ease of Access Center in Windows 8 and later; enhancements for Microsoft Excel, including listing and renaming of sheets and access to locked cells in protected sheets; and support for editing of rich text in Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome and Mozilla Thunderbird.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju poboljanja performansi u sustavu Windows 10; ukljuivanje u centar za olakani pristup u sustavu Windows 8 i novijim verzijama; poboljanja za Microsoft Excel, ukljuujui popis i preimenovanje listova te pristup zakljuanim elijama u zatienim listovima; i podrka za ureivanje obogaenog teksta u Mozilla Firefoxu, Google Chromeu i Mozilla Thunderbirdu.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: NVDA now appears in the Ease of Access Center in Windows 8 and later. (#308)
segment.target: NVDA se sada pojavljuje u Centru za olakani pristup u sustavu Windows 8 i novijim verzijama. (#308)

segment.source: When moving around cells in Excel, formatting changes are now automatically reported if the appropriate options are turned on in NVDA's Document Formatting Settings dialog. (#4878)
segment.target: Prilikom kretanja po elijama u Excelu, promjene formatiranja sada se automatski prijavljuju ako su odgovarajue opcije ukljuene u NVDA dijalokom okviru Postavke oblikovanja dokumenta. (#4878)
