segment.source: A Report Emphasis option has been added to NVDA's Document formatting settings dialog. On by default, this option allows NVDA to automatically report the existence of emphasised text in documents. So far, this is only supported for em and strong tags in Browse Mode for Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls. (#4920)
segment.target: Opcija Naglasak izvjea dodana je u NVDA dijaloki okvir Postavke oblikovanja dokumenta. Ukljueno prema zadanim postavkama, ova opcija omoguuje NVDA da automatski prijavi postojanje naglaenog teksta u dokumentima. Zasad je to podrano samo za em i jake oznake u nainu pregledavanja za Internet Explorer i druge MSHTML kontrole. (#4920)

segment.source: The existence of inserted and deleted text is now reported in Browse Mode for Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls if NVDA's Report Editor Revisions option is enabled. (#4920)
segment.target: Postojanje umetnutog i obrisanog teksta sada se prijavljuje u nainu pregledavanja za Internet Explorer i druge MSHTML kontrole ako je NVDA opcija Revizije ureivaa izvjea omoguena. (#4920)

segment.source: When viewing track changes in NVDA's Elements List for Microsoft Word, more information such as what formatting properties were changed is now displayed. (#4920)
segment.target: Kada pregledavate promjene zapisa na NVDA popisu elemenata za Microsoft Word, sada se prikazuje vie informacija kao to su svojstva oblikovanja koja su promijenjena. (#4920)

segment.source: Microsoft Excel: listing and renaming of sheets is now possible from NVDA's Elements List (NVDA+f7). (#4630, #4414)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel: popis i preimenovanje listova sada je mogue iz NVDA popisa elemenata (NVDA+f7). (#4630, #4414)

segment.source: It is now possible to configure whether actual symbols are sent to speech synthesizers (e.g. to cause a pause or change in inflection) in the Symbol Pronunciation dialog. (#5234)
segment.target: Sada je mogue konfigurirati alju li se stvarni simboli sintetizatorima govora (npr. da izazovu pauzu ili promjenu fleksije) u dijalokom okviru Izgovor simbola. (#5234)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, NVDA now reports any input messages set by the sheet author on cells. (#5051)
segment.target: U Microsoft Excelu, NVDA sada izvjetava o svim ulaznim porukama koje je autor lista postavio na elije. (#5051)

segment.source: Support for the Baum Pronto! V4 and VarioUltra braille displays when connected via Bluetooth. (#3717)
segment.target: Podrka za Baum Pronto! Prikazi brajice V4 i VarioUltra kada su povezani putem Bluetootha. (#3717)

segment.source: Support for editing of rich text in Mozilla applications such as Google Docs with braille support enabled in Mozilla Firefox and HTML composition in Mozilla Thunderbird. (#1668)
segment.target: Podrka za ureivanje obogaenog teksta u Mozilla aplikacijama kao to su Google dokumenti s omoguenom podrkom za brajicu u Mozilla Firefoxu i HTML kompozicijom u Mozilla Thunderbirdu. (#1668)

segment.source: Support for editing of rich text in Google Chrome and Chrome-based browsers such as Google Docs with braille support enabled. (#2634)
segment.target: Podrka za ureivanje obogaenog teksta u Google Chromeu i preglednicima koji se temelje na Chromeu kao to su Google dokumenti s omoguenom podrkom za Brailleovo pismo. (#2634)

segment.source: This requires Chrome version 47 or later.
segment.target: Za to je potrebna verzija Chromea 47 ili novija.

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Excel, you can navigate to locked cells in protected sheets. (#4952)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u programu Microsoft Excel moete se kretati do zakljuanih elija u zatienim listovima. (#4952)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The Report Editor Revisions option in NVDA's Document formatting settings dialog is now turned on by default. (#4920)
segment.target: Opcija Revizije ureivaa izvjea u NVDA dijalokom okviru Postavke oblikovanja dokumenta sada je ukljuena prema zadanim postavkama. (#4920)

segment.source: When moving by character in Microsoft Word with NVDA's Report Editor Revisions option enabled, less information is now reported for track changes, which makes navigation more efficient. To view the extra information, use the Elements List. (#4920)
segment.target: Kada se pomiete po znakovima u Microsoft Wordu s ukljuenom NVDA opcijom Revizije ureivaa izvjea, sada se prijavljuje manje informacija o promjenama zapisa, to navigaciju ini uinkovitijom. Da biste vidjeli dodatne informacije, upotrijebite popis elemenata. (#4920)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.6.4. (#5341)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na 2.6.4. (#5341)

segment.source: Several symbols (including basic mathematical symbols) have been moved to level some so that they are spoken by default. (#3799)
segment.target: Nekoliko simbola (ukljuujui osnovne matematike simbole) premjeteno je na razinu tako da se prema zadanim postavkama izgovaraju. (#3799)

segment.source: If the synthesizer supports it, speech should now pause for parentheses and the en dash (). (#3799)
segment.target: Ako sintisajzer to podrava, govor bi sada trebao pauzirati za zagrade i crticu (). (#3799)

segment.source: When selecting text, the text is reported before the indication of selection instead of after. (#1707)
segment.target: Prilikom odabira teksta, tekst se prijavljuje prije naznake odabira, a ne poslije. (#1707)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Major performance improvements when navigating the Outlook 2010/2013 message list. (#5268)
segment.target: Velika poboljanja performansi prilikom navigacije popisom poruka programa Outlook 2010/2013. (#5268)

segment.source: In a chart in Microsoft Excel, navigating with certain keys (such as changing sheets with control+pageUp and control+pageDown) now works correctly. (#5336)
segment.target: U grafikonu u programu Microsoft Excel navigacija odreenim tipkama (kao to je promjena listova pomou control+pageUp i control+pageDown) sada ispravno funkcionira. (#5336)

segment.source: Fixed the visual appearance of the buttons in the warning dialog which is displayed when you attempt to downgrade NVDA. (#5325)
segment.target: Popravljen je vizualni izgled gumba u dijalokom okviru upozorenja koji se prikazuje kada pokuate smanjiti NVDA. (#5325)

segment.source: In Windows 8 and later, NVDA now starts a lot earlier when configured to start after logging on to Windows. (#308)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 8 i novijim verzijama, NVDA se sada pokree puno ranije kada je konfiguriran za pokretanje nakon prijave u Windows. (#308)

segment.source: If you enabled this using a previous version of NVDA, you will need to disable it and enable it again in order for the change to take effect. Follow this procedure:
segment.target: Ako ste to omoguili pomou prethodne verzije NVDA-a, morat ete je onemoguiti i ponovno omoguiti kako bi promjena stupila na snagu. Slijedite ovaj postupak:

segment.source: Open the General Settings dialog.
segment.target: Otvorite dijaloki okvir Ope postavke.

segment.source: Uncheck the Automatically start NVDA after I log on to Windows checkbox.
segment.target: Ponitite potvrdni okvir Automatski pokreni NVDA nakon to se prijavim na Windows.

segment.source: Press the OK button.
segment.target: Pritisnite gumb OK.

segment.source: Open the General Settings dialog again.
segment.target: Ponovno otvorite dijaloki okvir Ope postavke.

segment.source: Check the Automatically start NVDA after I log on to Windows checkbox.
segment.target: Oznaite potvrdni okvir Automatski pokreni NVDA nakon to se prijavim na Windows.

segment.source: Press the OK button.
segment.target: Pritisnite gumb OK.

segment.source: Performance enhancements for UI Automation including File Explorer and Task Viewer. (#5293)
segment.target: Poboljanja performansi za automatizaciju korisnikog suelja, ukljuujui File Explorer i Preglednik zadataka. (#5293)

segment.source: NVDA now correctly switches to focus mode when tabbing to read-only ARIA grid controls in Browse Mode for Mozilla Firefox and other Gecko-based controls. (#5118)
segment.target: NVDA se sada ispravno prebacuje u nain fokusiranja kada prelazite na ARIA kontrole mree samo za itanje u nainu pregledavanja za Mozilla Firefox i druge kontrole temeljene na Gecku. (#5118)

segment.source: NVDA now correctly reports "no previous" instead of "no next" when there are no more objects when flicking left on a touch screen.
segment.target: NVDA sada ispravno izvjetava "nema prethodnog" umjesto "nema sljedeeg" kada vie nema objekata prilikom pomicanja ulijevo na zaslonu osjetljivom na dodir.

segment.source: Fixed problems when typing multiple words into the filter field in the Input Gestures dialog. (#5426)
segment.target: Rijeeni su problemi prilikom upisivanja vie rijei u polje filtra u dijalokom okviru Geste unosa. (#5426)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes in some cases when reconnecting to a HumanWare Brailliant BI/B series display via USB. (#5406)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne zamrzava u nekim sluajevima prilikom ponovnog povezivanja sa zaslonom serije HumanWare Brailliant BI/B putem USB-a. (#5406)

segment.source: In languages with conjunct characters, character descriptions now work as expected for upper case English characters. (#5375)
segment.target: U jezicima s konjunkcijskim znakovima opisi znakova sada funkcioniraju kao to se oekuje za velike engleske znakove. (#5375)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer occasionally freeze when bringing up the Start Menu in Windows 10. (#5417)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne bi trebao povremeno zamrzavati prilikom otvaranja izbornika Start u sustavu Windows 10. (#5417)

segment.source: In Skype for Desktop, notifications which are displayed before a previous notification disappears are now reported. (#4841)
segment.target: U Skypeu za stolna raunala sada se prijavljuju obavijesti koje se prikazuju prije nestanka prethodne obavijesti. (#4841)

segment.source: Notifications are now reported correctly in Skype for Desktop 7.12 and later. (#5405)
segment.target: Obavijesti se sada ispravno prijavljuju u Skypeu za stolna raunala 7.12 i novijim verzijama. (#5405)

segment.source: NVDA now correctly reports the focus when dismissing a context menu in some applications such as Jart. (#5302)
segment.target: NVDA sada ispravno izvjetava o fokusu prilikom odbacivanja kontekstnog izbornika u nekim aplikacijama kao to je Jart. (#5302)

segment.source: In Windows 7 and later, Color is again reported in certain applications such as Wordpad. (#5352)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 7 i novijim verzijama, boja se ponovno prijavljuje u odreenim aplikacijama kao to je Wordpad. (#5352)

segment.source: When editing in Microsoft PowerPoint, pressing enter now reports automatically entered text such as a bullet or number. (#5360)
segment.target: Prilikom ureivanja u programu Microsoft PowerPoint, pritiskom na Enter sada se automatski unosi tekst kao to je grafika oznaka ili broj. (#5360)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include initial support for Windows 10; the ability to disable single letter navigation in browse mode (useful for some web apps); improvements in Internet Explorer; and fixes for garbled text when typing in certain applications with braille enabled.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju poetnu podrku za Windows 10; mogunost onemoguavanja navigacije jednim slovom u nainu pregledavanja (korisno za neke web aplikacije); poboljanja u pregledniku Internet Explorer; i popravci iskrivljenog teksta prilikom tipkanja u odreenim aplikacijama s omoguenom brajicom.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: The existence of spelling errors is announced in editable fields for Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls. (#4174)
segment.target: Postojanje pravopisnih pogreaka najavljuje se u poljima koja se mogu ureivati za Internet Explorer i druge MSHTML kontrole. (#4174)

segment.source: Many more Unicode math symbols are now spoken when they appear in text. (#3805)
segment.target: Sada se izgovara mnogo vie Unicode matematikih simbola kada se pojave u tekstu. (#3805)

segment.source: Search suggestions in the Windows 10 start screen are automatically reported. (#5049)
segment.target: Prijedlozi za pretraivanje na poetnom zaslonu sustava Windows 10 automatski se prijavljuju. (#5049)

segment.source: Support for the EcoBraille 20, EcoBraille 40, EcoBraille 80 and EcoBraille Plus braille displays. (#4078)
segment.target: Podrka za zaslone za brajice EcoBraille 20, EcoBraille 40, EcoBraille 80 i EcoBraille Plus. (#4078)

segment.source: In browse mode, you can now toggle single letter navigation on and off by pressing NVDA+shift+space. When off, single letter keys are passed to the application, which is useful for some web applications such as Gmail, Twitter and Facebook. (#3203)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja sada moete ukljuiti i iskljuiti navigaciju jednim slovom pritiskom na NVDA+shift+razmak. Kada su iskljueni, jednoslovni kljuevi prosljeuju se aplikaciji, to je korisno za neke web aplikacije kao to su Gmail, Twitter i Facebook. (#3203)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Finnish 6 dot, Irish grade 1, Irish grade 2, Korean grade 1 (2006), Korean grade 2 (2006). (#5137, #5074, #5097)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: finski 6 toaka, irski razred 1, irski razred 2, korejski razred 1 (2006), korejski razred 2 (2006). (#5137, #5074, #5097)

segment.source: The QWERTY keyboard on the Papenmeier BRAILLEX Live Plus braille display is now supported. (#5181)
segment.target: Sada je podrana QWERTY tipkovnica na Brajinom pismu Papenmeier BRAILLEX Live Plus. (#5181)

segment.source: Experimental support for the Microsoft Edge web browser and browsing engine in Windows 10. (#5212)
segment.target: Eksperimentalna podrka za web-preglednik Microsoft Edge i mehanizam za pregledavanje u sustavu Windows 10. (#5212)

segment.source: New language: Kannada.
segment.target: Novi jezik: Kannada.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.6.3. (#5137)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajevog pisma na 2.6.3. (#5137)

segment.source: When attempting to install an earlier version of NVDA than is currently installed, you will now be warned that this is not recommended and that NVDA should be completely uninstalled before proceeding. (#5037)
segment.target: Kada pokuavate instalirati stariju verziju NVDA od trenutno instalirane, sada ete biti upozoreni da se to ne preporuuje i da NVDA treba potpuno deinstalirati prije nego to nastavite. (#5037)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: In browse mode for Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, quick navigation by form field no longer incorrectly includes presentational list items. (#4204)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja za Internet Explorer i druge MSHTML kontrole brza navigacija po polju obrasca vie ne ukljuuje pogreno stavke prezentacijskog popisa. (#4204)

segment.source: In Firefox, NVDA no longer inappropriately reports the content of an ARIA tab panel when focus moves inside it. (#4638)
segment.target: U Firefoxu, NVDA vie ne prijavljuje neprimjereno sadraj ARIA kartice kada se fokus pomakne unutar nje. (#4638)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, tabbing into sections, articles or dialogs no longer inappropriately reports all content in the container. (#5021, #5025)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama tabulatorom u odjeljke, lanke ili dijaloke okvire vie se ne prijavljuje neprimjereno sav sadraj u spremniku. (#5021, #5025)

segment.source: When using Baum/HumanWare/APH braille displays with a braille keyboard, braille input no longer stops functioning after pressing another type of key on the display. (#3541)
segment.target: Kada koristite Baum/HumanWare/APH brajeve zaslone s brajinom tipkovnicom, unos brajice vie ne prestaje funkcionirati nakon pritiska na drugu vrstu tipke na zaslonu. (#3541)

segment.source: In Windows 10, extraneous information is no longer reported when pressing alt+tab or alt+shift+tab to switch between applications. (#5116)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 10 suvine informacije vie se ne prijavljuju kada pritisnete alt+tab ili alt+shift+tab za prebacivanje izmeu aplikacija. (#5116)

segment.source: Typed text is no longer garbled when using certain applications such as Microsoft Outlook with a braille display. (#2953)
segment.target: Upisani tekst vie se ne iskrivljuje kada koristite odreene aplikacije kao to je Microsoft Outlook sa zaslonom brajice. (#2953)

segment.source: In browse mode in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, the correct content is now reported when an element appears or changes and is immediately focused. (#5040)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama sada se prijavljuje ispravan sadraj kada se element pojavi ili promijeni i odmah se fokusira. (#5040)

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Word, single letter navigation now updates the braille display and the review cursor as expected. (#4968)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u programu Microsoft Word, navigacija jednim slovom sada aurira Brailleov prikaz i kursor za pregled prema oekivanjima. (#4968)

segment.source: In braille, extraneous spaces are no longer displayed between or after indicators for controls and formatting. (#5043)
segment.target: Na Brailleovom pismu suvini razmaci vie se ne prikazuju izmeu ili poslije indikatora za kontrole i oblikovanje. (#5043)

segment.source: When an application is responding slowly and you switch away from that application, NVDA is now much more responsive in other applications in most cases. (#3831)
segment.target: Kada aplikacija sporo reagira i vi se prebacite s te aplikacije, NVDA sada u veini sluajeva puno bolje reagira u drugim aplikacijama. (#3831)

segment.source: Windows 10 Toast notifications are now reported as expected. (#5136)
segment.target: Windows 10 Toast obavijesti sada se prijavljuju prema oekivanjima. (#5136)

segment.source: The value is now reported as it changes in certain (UI Automation) combo boxes where this was not working previously.
segment.target: Vrijednost se sada izvjetava kako se mijenja u odreenim kombiniranim okvirima (automatizacija korisnikog suelja) u kojima to prije nije funkcioniralo.

segment.source: In browse mode in web browsers, tabbing now behaves as expected after tabbing to a frame document. (#5227)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u web-preglednicima, tabulatori se sada ponaaju prema oekivanjima nakon ulaganja tabulatora u dokument okvira. (#5227)

segment.source: The Windows 10 lock screen can now be dismissed using a touch screen. (#5220)
segment.target: Zakljuani zaslon sustava Windows 10 sada se moe odbaciti pomou zaslona osjetljivog na dodir. (#5220)

segment.source: In Windows 7 and later, text is no longer garbled when typing in certain applications such as Wordpad and Skype with a braille display. (#4291)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 7 i novijim verzijama tekst se vie ne iskrivljuje prilikom upisivanja u odreenim aplikacijama kao to su Wordpad i Skype sa zaslonom za brajicu. (#4291)

segment.source: On the Windows 10 lock screen, it is no longer possible to read the clipboard, access running applications with the review cursor, change NVDA configuration, etc. (#5269)
segment.target: Na zakljuanom zaslonu sustava Windows 10 vie nije mogue itati meuspremnik, pristupati pokrenutim aplikacijama pomou kursora za pregled, mijenjati NVDA konfiguraciju itd. (#5269)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: You can now inject raw input from a system keyboard that is not handled natively by Windows (e.g. a QWERTY keyboard on a braille display) using the new keyboardHandler.injectRawKeyboardInput function. (#4576)
segment.target: Sada moete ubaciti neobraeni unos sa sistemske tipkovnice kojom Windows ne upravlja izvorno (npr. QWERTY tipkovnica na Brailleovom pismu) pomou nove funkcije keyboardHandler.injectRawKeyboardInput. (#4576)

segment.source: eventHandler.requestEvents has been added to request particular events that are blocked by default; e.g. show events from a specific control or certain events even when in the background. (#3831)
segment.target: eventHandler.requestEvents dodan je za zahtjev za odreene dogaaje koji su blokirani prema zadanim postavkama; npr. prikazati dogaaje iz odreene kontrole ili odreene dogaaje ak i kada su u pozadini. (#3831)

segment.source: Rather than a single i18nName attribute, synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting now has separate displayNameWithAccelerator and displayName attributes to avoid reporting of the accelerator in the synth settings ring in some languages.
segment.target: Umjesto jednog atributa i18nName, synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting sada ima odvojene atribute displayNameWithAccelerator i displayName kako bi se izbjeglo izvjetavanje o akceleratoru u prstenu postavki sintisajzera na nekim jezicima.

segment.source: For backwards compatibility, in the constructor, displayName is optional and will be derived from displayNameWithAccelerator if not provided. However, if you intend to have an accelerator for a setting, both should be provided.
segment.target: Za kompatibilnost s prethodnim verzijama, u konstruktoru, displayName nije obavezan i bit e izveden iz displayNameWithAccelerator ako nije naveden. Meutim, ako namjeravate imati akcelerator za postavku, treba osigurati oboje.

segment.source: The i18nName attribute is deprecated and may be removed in a future release.
segment.target: Atribut i18nName je zastario i moe se ukloniti u buduem izdanju.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include the ability to read charts in Microsoft Excel and support for reading and interactive navigation of mathematical content.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju mogunost itanja grafikona u programu Microsoft Excel i podrku za itanje i interaktivnu navigaciju matematikim sadrajem.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Moving forward and backward by sentence in Microsoft Word and Outlook is now possible with alt+downArrow and alt+upArrow respectively. (#3288)
segment.target: Pomicanje naprijed i natrag po reenicama u Microsoft Wordu i Outlooku sada je mogue uz alt+downArrow i alt+upArrow. (#3288)

segment.source: New braille translation tables for several Indian languages. (#4778)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma za nekoliko indijskih jezika. (#4778)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, NVDA now reports when a cell has overflowing or cropped content. (#3040)
segment.target: U Microsoft Excelu NVDA sada izvjetava kada elija ima prepun ili izrezan sadraj. (#3040)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, you can now use the Elements List (NVDA+f7) to allow listing of charts, comments and formulas. (#1987)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel sada moete koristiti popis elemenata (NVDA+f7) kako biste omoguili popis grafikona, komentara i formula. (#1987)

segment.source: Support for reading charts in Microsoft Excel. To use this, select the chart using the Elements List (NVDA+f7) and then use the arrow keys to move between the data points. (#1987)
segment.target: Podrka za itanje grafikona u programu Microsoft Excel. Da biste to koristili, odaberite grafikon pomou popisa elemenata (NVDA+f7), a zatim koristite tipke sa strelicama za pomicanje izmeu podatkovnih toaka. (#1987)

segment.source: Using MathPlayer 4 from Design Science, NVDA can now read and interactively navigate mathematical content in web browsers and in Microsoft Word and PowerPoint. See the "Reading Mathematical Content" section in the User Guide for details. (#4673)
segment.target: Koristei MathPlayer 4 iz Design Sciencea, NVDA sada moe itati i interaktivno navigirati matematikim sadrajem u web preglednicima te u Microsoft Wordu i PowerPointu. Za detalje pogledajte odjeljak "itanje matematikog sadraja" u Korisnikom priruniku. (#4673)

segment.source: It is now possible to assign input gestures (keyboard commands, touch gestures, etc.) for all NVDA preferences dialogs and document formatting options using the Input Gestures dialog. (#4898)
segment.target: Sada je mogue dodijeliti geste unosa (tipkovnike naredbe, dodirne geste, itd.) za sve dijaloke okvire NVDA postavki i opcije oblikovanja dokumenta pomou dijalokog okvira Ulazne geste. (#4898)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: In NVDA's Document Formatting dialog, the keyboard shortcuts for Report lists, Report links, Report line numbers and Report font name have been changed. (#4650)
segment.target: U NVDA dijalokom okviru Oblikovanje dokumenta, promijenjeni su tipkovni preaci za popise izvjea, veze na izvjea, brojeve redaka izvjea i naziv fonta izvjea. (#4650)

segment.source: In NVDA's Mouse Settings dialog, keyboard shortcuts have been added for play audio coordinates when mouse moves and brightness controls audio coordinates volume. (#4916)
segment.target: U NVDA dijalokom okviru Postavke mia, dodani su tipkovniki preaci za reprodukciju audio koordinata kada se mi pomie, a svjetlina kontrolira glasnou audio koordinata. (#4916)

segment.source: Significantly improved reporting of color names. (#4984)
segment.target: Znaajno poboljano izvjetavanje o nazivima boja. (#4984)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.6.2. (#4777)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na 2.6.2. (#4777)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Character descriptions are now handled correctly for conjunct characters in certain Indian languages. (#4582)
segment.target: Opisi znakova sada se ispravno obrauju za konjunkcijske znakove u odreenim indijskim jezicima. (#4582)

segment.source: If the "Trust voice's language when processing characters and symbols" option is enabled, the Punctuation/Symbol pronunciation dialog now correctly uses the voice language. Also, the language for which pronunciation is being edited is shown in the dialog's title. (#4930)
segment.target: Ako je omoguena opcija "Vjeruj jeziku glasa prilikom obrade znakova i simbola", dijaloki okvir Interpunkcija/izgovor simbola sada ispravno koristi jezik glasa. Takoer, jezik za koji se izgovor ureuje prikazan je u naslovu dijalokog okvira. (#4930)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, typed characters are no longer inappropriately announced in editable combo boxes such as the Google search field on the Google home page. (#4976)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama upisani znakovi vie se ne objavljuju neprimjereno u kombiniranim okvirima koji se mogu ureivati, kao to je polje za Google pretraivanje na Googleovoj poetnoj stranici. (#4976)

segment.source: When selecting colors in Microsoft Office applications, color names are now reported. (#3045)
segment.target: Prilikom odabira boja u aplikacijama sustava Microsoft Office sada se prijavljuju nazivi boja. (#3045)

segment.source: Danish braille output now works again. (#4986)
segment.target: Danski Brailleov izlaz sada ponovno funkcionira. (#4986)

segment.source: PageUp/pageDown can again be used to change slides within a PowerPoint slide show. (#4850)
segment.target: PageUp/pageDown ponovno se moe koristiti za promjenu slajdova unutar dijaprojekcije programa PowerPoint. (#4850)

segment.source: In Skype for Desktop 7.2 and later, typing notifications are now reported and problems immediately after moving focus out of a conversation have been fixed. (#4972)
segment.target: U Skypeu za stolna raunala 7.2 i novijim verzijama sada se prijavljuju obavijesti o tipkanju i rijeeni su problemi odmah nakon premjetanja fokusa iz razgovora. (#4972)

segment.source: Fixed problems when typing certain punctuation/symbols such as brackets into the filter field in the Input Gestures dialog. (#5060)
segment.target: Rijeeni su problemi prilikom upisivanja odreenih interpunkcijskih znakova/simbola kao to su zagrade u polje filtra u dijalokom okviru Geste unosa. (#5060)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, pressing g or shift+g to navigate to graphics now includes elements marked as images for accessibility purposes (i.e. ARIA role img). (#5062)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama pritiskom na g ili shift+g za navigaciju do grafike sada se nalaze elementi oznaeni kao slike u svrhu pristupanosti (npr. ARIA uloga img). (#5062)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: brailleInput.handler.sendChars(mychar) will no longer filter out a character if it is equal to the previous character by ensuring that the key sent is correctly released. (#4139)
segment.target: brailleInput.handler.sendChars(mychar) vie nee filtrirati znak ako je jednak prethodnom znaku tako to e osigurati da je poslani klju ispravno otputen. (#4139)

segment.source: Scripts for changing touch modes will now honor new labeles added to touchHandler.touchModeLabels. (#4699)
segment.target: Skripte za promjenu naina dodira sada e potovati nove oznake dodane u touchHandler.touchModeLabels. (#4699)

segment.source: Add-ons can provide their own math presentation implementations. See the mathPres package for details. (#4509)
segment.target: Dodaci mogu pruiti vlastite implementacije matematike prezentacije. Za detalje pogledajte mathPres paket. (#4509)

segment.source: Speech commands have been implemented to insert a break between words and to change the pitch, volume and rate. See BreakCommand, PitchCommand, VolumeCommand and RateCommand in the speech module. (#4674)
segment.target: Implementirane su govorne naredbe za umetanje pauze izmeu rijei i promjenu visine, glasnoe i brzine. Pogledajte BreakCommand, PitchCommand, VolumeCommand i RateCommand u govornom modulu. (#4674)

segment.source: There is also speech.PhonemeCommand to insert specific pronunciation, but the current implementations only support a very limited number of phonemes.
segment.target: Tu je i govor. PhonemeNaredba za umetanje odreenog izgovora, ali trenutne implementacije podravaju samo vrlo ogranien broj fonema.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include browse mode for documents in Microsoft Word and Outlook; major enhancements to support for Skype for Desktop; and significant fixes for Microsoft Internet Explorer.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju nain pregledavanja dokumenata u programima Microsoft Word i Outlook; velika poboljanja podrke za Skype za stolna raunala; i znaajne popravke za Microsoft Internet Explorer.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: You can now add new symbols in the Symbol Pronunciation dialog. (#4354)
segment.target: Sada moete dodati nove simbole u dijalokom okviru Izgovor simbola. (#4354)

segment.source: In the Input Gestures dialog, you can use the new "Filter by" field to show only gestures containing specific words. (#4458)
segment.target: U dijalokom okviru Ulazne geste moete koristiti novo polje "Filtriraj prema" za prikaz samo gesta koje sadre odreene rijei. (#4458)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports new text in mintty. (#4588)
segment.target: NVDA sada automatski izvjetava o novom tekstu u mintty. (#4588)

segment.source: In the browse mode Find dialog, there is now an option to perform a case sensitive search. (#4584)
segment.target: U dijalokom okviru Pronai nain pregledavanja sada postoji mogunost pretraivanja osjetljivog na velika i mala slova. (#4584)

segment.source: Quick navigation (pressing h to move by heading, etc.) and Elements List (NVDA+f7) are now available in Microsoft Word documents by turning on browse mode with NVDA+space. (#2975)
segment.target: Brza navigacija (pritiskom na h za pomicanje po naslovu itd.) i Popis elemenata (NVDA+f7) sada su dostupni u Microsoft Word dokumentima ukljuivanjem naina pregledavanja s NVDA+razmak. (#2975)

segment.source: Reading HTML messages in Microsoft Outlook 2007 and later has been majorly improved as Browse mode is automatically enabled for these messages. If browse mode is not enabled in some rare situations, you can force it on with NVDA+space. (#2975)
segment.target: itanje HTML poruka u programu Microsoft Outlook 2007 i novijim verzijama znatno je poboljano jer je nain pregledavanja automatski omoguen za te poruke. Ako nain pregledavanja nije omoguen u nekim rijetkim situacijama, moete ga prisilno ukljuiti pomou NVDA+razmaka. (#2975)

segment.source: Table column headers in Microsoft word are automatically reported for tables where a header row has been explicitly specified by the author via Microsoft word's table properties. (#4510)
segment.target: Zaglavlja stupaca tablice u Microsoft Wordu automatski se prijavljuju za tablice u kojima je autor izriito odredio redak zaglavlja putem svojstava tablice Microsoft Worda. (#4510)

segment.source: However, For tables where rows have been merged, this will not work automatically. In this situation, you can still set column headers manually in NVDA with NVDA+shift+c.
segment.target: Meutim, za tablice u kojima su spojeni reci to nee funkcionirati automatski. U tom sluaju i dalje moete runo postaviti zaglavlja stupaca u NVDA ureaju s NVDA+shift+c.

segment.source: In Skype for Desktop, notifications are now reported. (#4741)
segment.target: U Skypeu za stolna raunala sada se prijavljuju obavijesti. (#4741)

segment.source: In Skype for Desktop, you can now report and review recent messages using NVDA+control+1 through NVDA+control+0; e.g. NVDA+control+1 for the most recent message and NVDA+control+0 for the tenth most recent. (#3210)
segment.target: U Skypeu za stolna raunala sada moete prijaviti i pregledati nedavne poruke koristei NVDA+control+1 do NVDA+control+0; npr. NVDA+control+1 za najnoviju poruku i NVDA+control+0 za desetu najnoviju. (#3210)

segment.source: In a conversation in Skype for Desktop, NVDA now reports when a contact is typing. (#3506)
segment.target: U razgovoru u Skypeu za stolna raunala, NVDA sada izvjetava kada kontakt tipka. (#3506)

segment.source: NVDA can now be installed silently via the command line without starting the installed copy after installation. To do this, use the --install-silent option. (#4206)
segment.target: NVDA se sada moe tiho instalirati putem naredbenog retka bez pokretanja instalirane kopije nakon instalacije. Da biste to uinili, upotrijebite opciju --install-silent. (#4206)

segment.source: Support for the Papenmeier BRAILLEX Live 20, BRAILLEX Live and BRAILLEX Live Plus braille displays. (#4614)
segment.target: Podrka za brajice Papenmeier BRAILLEX Live 20, BRAILLEX Live i BRAILLEX Live Plus. (#4614)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: In NVDA's Document Formatting settings dialog, the option to report spelling errors now has a shortcut key (alt+r). (#793)
segment.target: U NVDA dijalokom okviru postavki oblikovanja dokumenta, opcija za prijavu pravopisnih pogreaka sada ima tipku preaca (alt+r). (#793)

segment.source: NVDA will now use the synthesizer/voice's language for character and symbol processing (including punctuation/symbol names), regardless of whether automatic language switching is turned on. To turn off this feature so that NVDA again uses its interface language, uncheck the new option in Voice settings called Trust Voice's language when processing characters and symbols. (#4210)
segment.target: NVDA e sada koristiti jezik sintisajzera/glasa za obradu znakova i simbola (ukljuujui nazive interpunkcijskih znakova/simbola), bez obzira na to je li ukljuena automatska promjena jezika. Da biste iskljuili ovu znaajku kako bi NVDA ponovno koristio jezik suelja, ponitite novu opciju u postavkama Glasa pod nazivom Vjeruj jeziku Glasa prilikom obrade znakova i simbola. (#4210)

segment.source: Support for the Newfon synthesizer has been removed. Newfon is now available as an NVDA add-on. (#3184)
segment.target: Podrka za Newfon sintisajzer je uklonjena. Newfon je sada dostupan kao NVDA dodatak. (#3184)

segment.source: Skype for Desktop 7 or later is now required for use with NVDA; earlier versions are not supported. (#4218)
segment.target: Skype za stolna raunala 7 ili noviji sada je potreban za koritenje s NVDA; Starije verzije nisu podrane. (#4218)

segment.source: Downloading of NVDA updates is now more secure. (Specifically, the update information is retrieved via https and the hash of the file is verified after it is downloaded.) (#4716)
segment.target: Preuzimanje NVDA auriranja sada je sigurnije. (Tonije, podaci o auriranju dohvaaju se putem https-a, a hash datoteke provjerava se nakon preuzimanja.) (#4716)

segment.source: eSpeak has been upgraded to version 1.48.04 (#4325)
segment.target: eSpeak je nadograen na verziju 1.48.04 (#4325)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, merged row and column header cells are now handled correctly. For example, if A1 and B1 are merged, then B2 will now have A1 and B1 reported as its column header rather than nothing at all. (#4617)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel spojene elije zaglavlja retka i stupca sada se ispravno obrauju. Na primjer, ako su A1 i B1 spojeni, tada e B2 sada imati A1 i B1 prijavljene kao zaglavlje stupca, a ne nita. (#4617)

segment.source: When editing the content of a text box in Microsoft PowerPoint 2003, NVDA will correctly report the content of each line. Previously, in each paragraph, lines would increasingly be off by one character. (#4619)
segment.target: Prilikom ureivanja sadraja tekstualnog okvira u programu Microsoft PowerPoint 2003, NVDA e ispravno izvijestiti o sadraju svakog retka. Prije toga, u svakom odlomku, retci bi sve vie bili pomaknuti za jedan znak. (#4619)

segment.source: All of NVDA's dialogs are now centred on the screen, improving visual presentation and usability. (#3148)
segment.target: Svi NVDA dijalozi sada su usredotoeni na zaslon, poboljavajui vizualnu prezentaciju i upotrebljivost. (#3148)

segment.source: In Skype for desktop, when entering an introductory message to add a contact, entering and moving through the text now works correctly. (#3661)
segment.target: U Skypeu za stolna raunala, prilikom unosa uvodne poruke za dodavanje kontakta, unos i pomicanje teksta sada ispravno funkcionira. (#3661)

segment.source: When focus moves to a new item in tree views in the Eclipse IDE, if the previously focused item is a check box, it is no longer incorrectly announced. (#4586)
segment.target: Kada se fokus premjesti na novu stavku u prikazima stabla u Eclipse IDE-u, ako je prethodno fokusirana stavka potvrdni okvir, vie se ne objavljuje pogreno. (#4586)

segment.source: In the Microsoft Word spell check dialog, the next error will be automatically reported when the last one has been changed or ignored using respective shortcut keys. (#1938)
segment.target: U dijalokom okviru za provjeru pravopisa programa Microsoft Word, sljedea e se pogreka automatski prijaviti kada je posljednja promijenjena ili zanemarena pomou odgovarajuih tipki preaca. (#1938)

segment.source: Text can again be read correctly in places such as Tera Term Pro's terminal window and documents in Balabolka. (#4229)
segment.target: Tekst se opet moe ispravno proitati na mjestima kao to su prozor terminala Tera Term Pro i dokumenti u Balabolki. (#4229)

segment.source: Focus now correctly returns to the document being edited When finishing input composition of text in Korean and other east Asian languages while editing within a frame in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML documents. (#4045)
segment.target: Fokus se sada ispravno vraa na dokument koji se ureuje Kada dovravate sastavljanje teksta na korejskom i drugim istonoazijskim jezicima tijekom ureivanja unutar okvira u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML dokumentima. (#4045)

segment.source: In the Input Gestures dialog, when selecting a keyboard layout for a keyboard gesture being added, pressing escape now closes the menu as expected instead of closing the dialog. (#3617)
segment.target: U dijalokom okviru Ulazne geste, prilikom odabira rasporeda tipkovnice za dodanu tipkovnicu, pritiskom na escape sada se zatvara izbornik prema oekivanjima umjesto zatvaranja dijalokog okvira. (#3617)

segment.source: When removing an add-on, the add-on directory is now correctly deleted after restarting NVDA. Previously, you had to restart twice. (#3461)
segment.target: Prilikom uklanjanja dodatka, direktorij dodataka sada se ispravno brie nakon ponovnog pokretanja NVDA-e. Prije ste morali ponovno pokrenuti dva puta. (#3461)

segment.source: Major problems have been fixed when using Skype for Desktop 7. (#4218)
segment.target: Rijeeni su glavni problemi pri koritenju Skypea za stolna raunala 7. (#4218)

segment.source: When you send a message in Skype for Desktop, it is no longer read twice. (#3616)
segment.target: Kada poaljete poruku u Skypeu za stolna raunala, ona se vie ne ita dvaput. (#3616)

segment.source: In Skype for Desktop, NVDA should no longer occasionally spuriously read a large flood of messages (perhaps even an entire conversation). (#4644)
segment.target: U Skypeu za stolna raunala, NVDA vie ne bi trebao povremeno lano itati veliku poplavu poruka (moda ak i cijeli razgovor). (#4644)

segment.source: fixed a problem where NVDA's Report date/time command did not honor the regional settings specified by the user in some cases. (#2987)
segment.target: rijeen je problem zbog kojeg NVDA-ina naredba za prijavu datuma/vremena nije potovala regionalne postavke koje je odredio korisnik u nekim sluajevima. (#2987)

segment.source: In browse mode, nonsensical text (sometimes spanning several lines) is no longer presented for certain graphics such as found on Google Groups. (Specifically, this occurred with base64 encoded images.) (#4793)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja besmisleni tekst (ponekad se protee nekoliko redaka) vie se ne prikazuje za odreene grafike kao to su one koje se nalaze u Google grupama. (Konkretno, to se dogodilo sa slikama kodiranim base64.) (#4793)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer freeze after a few seconds when moving focus away from a Windows Store app as it becomes suspended. (#4572)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne bi trebao zamrzavati nakon nekoliko sekundi kada se fokus odmakne od aplikacije iz Windows trgovine jer se obustavlja. (#4572)

segment.source: The aria-atomic attribute on live regions in Mozilla Firefox is now honored even when the atomic element itself changes. Previously, it only affected descendant elements. (#4794)
segment.target: Atribut aria-atom na ivim podrujima u Mozilla Firefoxu sada se potuje ak i kada se sam atomski element promijeni. Prije je to utjecalo samo na elemente potomaka. (#4794)

segment.source: Browse mode will reflect updates, and live regions will be announced, for browse mode documents within ARIA applications embedded in a document in Internet Explorer or other MSHTML controls. (#4798)
segment.target: Nain pregledavanja odraavat e auriranja i najavit e se iva podruja za dokumente naina pregledavanja unutar ARIA aplikacija ugraenih u dokument u pregledniku Internet Explorer ili drugim MSHTML kontrolama. (#4798)

segment.source: When text is changed or added in live regions in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls where the author has specified that text is relevant, only the changed or added text is announced, rather than all of the text in the containing element. (#4800)
segment.target: Kada se tekst promijeni ili doda u aktivnim podrujima u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama gdje je autor naveo da je tekst relevantan, najavljuje se samo promijenjeni ili dodani tekst, a ne sav tekst u elementu koji sadri. (#4800)

segment.source: Content indicated by the aria-labelledby attribute on elements in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls correctly replaces the original content where it is appropriate to do so. (#4575)
segment.target: Sadraj oznaen atributom aria-labelledby na elementima u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama ispravno zamjenjuje izvorni sadraj tamo gdje je to prikladno. (#4575)

segment.source: When checking spelling in Microsoft Outlook 2013, the misspelled word is now announced. (#4848)
segment.target: Prilikom provjere pravopisa u programu Microsoft Outlook 2013 sada se objavljuje pogreno napisana rije. (#4848)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, content inside elements hidden with visibility:hidden is no longer inappropriately presented in browse mode. (#4839, #3776)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama sadraj unutar elemenata skrivenih pomou visibility:hidden vie nije neprikladno prikazan u nainu pregledavanja. (#4839, #3776)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, the title attribute on form controls no longer inappropriately takes preference over other label associations. (#4491)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama atribut title na kontrolama obrasca vie ne ima neprikladnu prednost u odnosu na druge asocijacije oznaka. (#4491)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, NVDA no longer ignores focusing of elements due to the aria-activedescendant attribute. (#4667)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama, NVDA vie ne zanemaruje fokusiranje elemenata zbog atributa aria-activedescendant. (#4667)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Updated wxPython to 3.0.2.0. (#3763)
segment.target: Auriran wxPython na 3.0.2.0. (#3763)

segment.source: Updated Python to 2.7.9. (#4715)
segment.target: Auriran Python na 2.7.9. (#4715)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when restarting after removing or updating an add-on which imports speechDictHandler in its installTasks module. (#4496)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne rui prilikom ponovnog pokretanja nakon uklanjanja ili auriranja dodatka koji uvozi speechDictHandler u svoj modul installTasks. (#4496)

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: New languages: Colombian Spanish, Punjabi.
segment.target: Novi jezici: kolumbijski panjolski, pandapski.

segment.source: It is now possible to restart NVDA or restart NVDA with add-ons disabled from NVDA's exit dialog. (#4057)
segment.target: Sada je mogue ponovno pokrenuti NVDA ili ponovno pokrenuti NVDA s deaktiviranim dodacima iz izlaznog dijalokog okvira NVDA-e. (#4057)

segment.source: NVDA can also be started with add-ons disabled by using the --disable-addons command line option.
segment.target: NVDA se takoer moe pokrenuti s onemoguenim dodacima pomou opcije naredbenog retka --disable-addons.

segment.source: In speech dictionaries, it is now possible to specify that a pattern should only match if it is a whole word; i.e. it does not occur as part of a larger word. (#1704)
segment.target: U govornim rjenicima sada je mogue odrediti da se uzorak treba podudarati samo ako se radi o cijeloj rijei; tj. ne pojavljuje se kao dio vee rijei. (#1704)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: If an object you have moved to with object navigation is inside a browse mode document, but the object you were on previously was not, the review mode is automatically set to document. Previously, this only happened if the navigator object was moved due to the focus changing. (#4369)
segment.target: Ako se objekt na koji ste se premjestili pomou navigacije objektom nalazi unutar dokumenta naina pregledavanja, ali objekt na kojem ste prethodno bili nije, nain pregleda automatski se postavlja na dokument. Prije se to dogaalo samo ako je objekt navigatora pomaknut zbog promjene fokusa. (#4369)

segment.source: The Braille display and Synthesizer lists in the respective settings dialogs are now alphabetically sorted except for No braille/No speech, which are now at the bottom. (#2724)
segment.target: Popisi Brailleovog pisma i sintisajzera u odgovarajuim dijalokim okvirima postavki sada su abecednim redom poredani osim Bez brajice/Bez govora, koji su sada na dnu. (#2724)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.6.0. (#4434, #3835)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajevog pisma liblouis na 2.6.0. (#4434, #3835)

segment.source: In browse mode, pressing e and shift+e to navigate to edit fields now includes editable combo boxes. This includes the search box in the latest version of Google Search. (#4436)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, pritiskom na e i shift+e za navigaciju do polja za ureivanje sada se nalaze kombinirani okviri koji se mogu ureivati. To ukljuuje okvir za pretraivanje u najnovijoj verziji Google pretraivanja. (#4436)

segment.source: Clicking the NVDA icon in the Notification Area with the left mouse button now opens the NVDA menu instead of doing nothing. (#4459)
segment.target: Klikom na ikonu NVDA u podruju obavijesti lijevom tipkom mia sada se otvara NVDA izbornik umjesto da ne radite nita. (#4459)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: When moving focus back to a browse mode document (e.g. alt+tabbing to an already opened web page), the review cursor is properly positioned at the virtual caret, rather than the focused control (e.g. a nearby link). (#4369)
segment.target: Prilikom premjetanja fokusa natrag na dokument naina pregledavanja (npr. alt+tabulator na ve otvorenu web-stranicu), pokaziva pregleda ispravno je postavljen na virtualni kursor, a ne na fokusiranu kontrolu (npr. oblinja veza). (#4369)

segment.source: In PowerPoint slide shows, the review cursor correctly follows the virtual caret. (#4370)
segment.target: U dijaprojekcijama programa PowerPoint pokaziva pregleda ispravno slijedi virtualni kursor. (#4370)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and other Gecko-based browsers, new content within a live region will be announced even if the new content has a usable ARIA live type different to the parent live region; e.g. when content marked as assertive is added to a live region marked as polite. (#4169)
segment.target: U Mozilla Firefoxu i drugim preglednicima koji se temelje na Gecku, novi sadraj unutar ive regije bit e najavljen ak i ako novi sadraj ima upotrebljivu ARIA live vrstu razliitu od nadreene ive regije; npr. kada se sadraj oznaen kao asertivan doda u ivu regiju oznaenu kao pristojna. (#4169)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, some cases where a document is contained within another document no longer prevent the user from accessing some of the content (specifically, framesets inside framesets). (#4418)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama neki sluajevi u kojima je dokument sadran u drugom dokumentu vie ne sprjeavaju korisnika da pristupi nekom sadraju (tonije, skupovima okvira unutar skupova okvira). (#4418)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when attempting to use a Handy Tech braille display in some cases. (#3709)
segment.target: NVDA se u nekim sluajevima vie ne rui prilikom pokuaja koritenja zaslona za brajicu Handy Tech. (#3709)

segment.source: In Windows Vista, a spurious "Entry Point Not Found" dialog is no longer displayed in several cases such as when starting NVDA from the Desktop shortcut or via the shortcut key. (#4235)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows Vista, lani dijaloki okvir "Ulazna toka nije pronaena" vie se ne prikazuje u nekoliko sluajeva, kao to je pokretanje NVDA iz preaca na radnoj povrini ili putem tipke preaca. (#4235)

segment.source: Serious problems with editable text controls in dialogs in recent versions of Eclipse have been fixed. (#3872)
segment.target: Ozbiljni problemi s kontrolama teksta koje se mogu ureivati u dijalozima u novijim verzijama Eclipsea su rijeeni. (#3872)

segment.source: In Outlook 2010, moving the caret now works as expected in the location field of appointments and meeting requests. (#4126)
segment.target: U programu Outlook 2010 premjetanje kursora sada funkcionira prema oekivanjima u polju mjesta obveza i zahtjeva za sastanak. (#4126)

segment.source: Inside a live region, content which is marked as not being live (e.g. aria-live="off") is now correctly ignored. (#4405)
segment.target: Unutar ivog podruja, sadraj koji je oznaen kao neaktivan (npr. aria-live="off") sada se ispravno zanemaruje. (#4405)

segment.source: When reporting the text of a status bar that has a name, the name is now correctly separated from the first word of the status bar text. (#4430)
segment.target: Prilikom prijavljivanja teksta statusne trake koja ima naziv, naziv je sada ispravno odvojen od prve rijei teksta statusne trake. (#4430)

segment.source: In password entry fields with speaking of typed words enabled, multiple asterisks are no longer pointlessly reported when beginning new words. (#4402)
segment.target: U poljima za unos lozinke s omoguenim govorom o upisanim rijeima, vie zvjezdica vie se ne prijavljuje besmisleno kada zapoinju nove rijei. (#4402)

segment.source: In the Microsoft Outlook message list, items are no longer pointlessly announced as Data Items. (#4439)
segment.target: Na popisu poruka programa Microsoft Outlook stavke se vie ne objavljuju besmisleno kao podatkovne stavke. (#4439)

segment.source: When selecting text in the code editing control in the Eclipse IDE, the entire selection is no longer announced every time the selection changes. (#2314)
segment.target: Prilikom odabira teksta u kontroli za ureivanje koda u Eclipse IDE-u, cijeli odabir vie se ne najavljuje svaki put kada se odabir promijeni. (#2314)

segment.source: Various versions of Eclipse, such as Spring Tool Suite and the version included in the Android Developer Tools bundle, are now recognised as Eclipse and handled appropriately. (#4360, #4454)
segment.target: Razliite verzije Eclipsea, kao to su Spring Tool Suite i verzija ukljuena u paket Android Developer Tools, sada su prepoznate kao Eclipse i s njima se postupa na odgovarajui nain. (#4360, #4454)

segment.source: Mouse tracking and touch exploration in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls (including many Windows 8 applications) is now much more accurate on high DPI displays or when document zoom is changed. (#3494)
segment.target: Praenje mia i istraivanje dodirom u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama (ukljuujui mnoge aplikacije sustava Windows 8) sada su mnogo precizniji na zaslonima s visokim razluivou ili kada se promijeni zumiranje dokumenta. (#3494)

segment.source: Mouse tracking and touch exploration in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls will now announce the label of more buttons. (#4173)
segment.target: Praenje mia i istraivanje dodira u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama sada e najaviti oznaku vie gumba. (#4173)

segment.source: When using a Papenmeier BRAILLEX braille display with BrxCom, keys on the display now work as expected. (#4614)
segment.target: Kada koristite Papenmeier BRAILLEX brajiin zaslon s BrxComom, tipke na zaslonu sada rade prema oekivanjima. (#4614)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: For executables which host many different apps (e.g. javaw.exe), code can now be provided to load specific app modules for each app instead of loading the same app module for all hosted apps. (#4360)
segment.target: Za izvrne datoteke koje hostiraju mnogo razliitih aplikacija (npr. javaw.exe), sada se moe pruiti kod za uitavanje odreenih modula aplikacije za svaku aplikaciju umjesto uitavanja istog modula aplikacije za sve hostirane aplikacije. (#4360)

segment.source: See the code documentation for appModuleHandler.AppModule for details.
segment.target: Pojedinosti potraite u dokumentaciji koda za appModuleHandler.AppModule.

segment.source: Support for javaw.exe is implemented.
segment.target: Implementirana je podrka za javaw.exe.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: The sounds played when NVDA starts and exits can be disabled via a new option in the General Settings dialog. (#834)
segment.target: Zvukovi koji se reproduciraju prilikom pokretanja i izlaska NVDA mogu se onemoguiti putem nove opcije u dijalokom okviru Ope postavke. (#834)

segment.source: Help for add-ons can be accessed from the Add-ons Manager for add-ons which support this. (#2694)
segment.target: Pomoi za dodatke moe se pristupiti iz Upravitelja dodataka za dodatke koji to podravaju. (#2694)

segment.source: Support for the Calendar in Microsoft Outlook 2007 and above (#2943) including:
segment.target: Podrka za kalendar u programu Microsoft Outlook 2007 i novijim verzijama (#2943), ukljuujui:

segment.source: Announcement of the current time when moving around with the arrow keys.
segment.target: Najava trenutnog vremena pri kretanju pomou tipki sa strelicama.

segment.source: Indication if the selected time is within any appointments.
segment.target: Naznaka je li odabrano vrijeme unutar bilo kojeg termina.

segment.source: announcement of the selected appointment when pressing tab.
segment.target: Najava odabrane obveze pritiskom na karticu.

segment.source: Smart filtering of the date so as to only announce the date if the new selected time or appointment is on a different day to the last.
segment.target: Pametno filtriranje datuma tako da se datum najavljuje samo ako je novo odabrano vrijeme ili sastanak na drugi dan od prethodnog.

segment.source: Enhanced support for the Inbox and other message lists in Microsoft Outlook 2010 and above (#3834) including:
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za ulaznu potu i druge popise poruka u programu Microsoft Outlook 2010 i novijim verzijama (#3834), ukljuujui:

segment.source: The ability to silence column headers (from, subject, etc.) by turning off the Report Table row and column headers option in Document Formatting settings.
segment.target: Mogunost utiavanja zaglavlja stupaca (od, predmet itd.) iskljuivanjem mogunosti zaglavlja redaka i stupaca tablice izvjea u postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta.

segment.source: The ability to use table navigation commands (control + alt + arrows) to move through the individual columns.
segment.target: Mogunost koritenja naredbi za navigaciju tablicom (kontrola + alt + strelice) za kretanje kroz pojedinane stupce.

segment.source: Microsoft word: If an inline image has no alternative text set, NVDA will instead report the title of the image if the author has provided one. (#4193)
segment.target: Microsoft word: Ako umetnuta slika nema postavljen alternativni tekst, NVDA e umjesto toga prijaviti naslov slike ako ga je autor naveo. (#4193)

segment.source: Microsoft Word: NVDA can now report paragraph indenting with the report formatting command (NVDA+f). It can also be reported automatically when the new Report Paragraph indenting option is enabled in Document Formatting settings. (#4165)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: NVDA sada moe prijaviti uvlaenje odlomaka pomou naredbe za oblikovanje izvjea (NVDA+f). Takoer se moe automatski prijaviti kada je nova mogunost uvlaenja odlomka izvjea omoguena u postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta. (#4165)

segment.source: Report automatically inserted text such as a new bullet, number or tab indent when pressing enter in editable documents and text fields. (#4185)
segment.target: Prijavite automatski umetnuti tekst, kao to je nova grafika oznaka, broj ili uvlaka tabulatora pritiskom na Enter u dokumentima i tekstnim poljima koja se mogu ureivati. (#4185)

segment.source: Microsoft word: Pressing NVDA+alt+c will report the text of a comment if the cursor is within one. (#3528)
segment.target: Microsoft word: Pritiskom na NVDA+alt+c prijavit e se tekst komentara ako je pokaziva unutar njega. (#3528)

segment.source: Improved support for automatic column and row header reading in Microsoft Excel (#3568) including:
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za automatsko itanje zaglavlja stupaca i redaka u programu Microsoft Excel (#3568), ukljuujui:

segment.source: Support of Excel defined name ranges to identify header cells (compatible with Jaws screen reader) .
segment.target: Podrka za Excel definirane raspone naziva za identifikaciju elija zaglavlja (kompatibilno s itaem zaslona Jaws).

segment.source: The set column header (NVDA+shift+c) and set row header (NVDA+shift+r) commands now store the settings in the worksheet so that they are available the next time the sheet is opened, and will be available to other screen readers that support the defined name range scheme.
segment.target: Naredbe postavi zaglavlje stupca (NVDA+shift+c) i postavi zaglavlje retka (NVDA+shift+r) sada pohranjuju postavke na radnom listu tako da budu dostupne prilikom sljedeeg otvaranja lista, a bit e dostupne i drugim itaima zaslona koji podravaju definiranu shemu raspona naziva.

segment.source: These commands can also now be used multiple times per sheet to set different headers for different regions.
segment.target: Ove se naredbe sada mogu koristiti i vie puta po listu za postavljanje razliitih zaglavlja za razliite regije.

segment.source: Support for automatic column and row header reading in Microsoft Word (#3110) including:
segment.target: Podrka za automatsko itanje zaglavlja stupaca i redaka u programu Microsoft Word (#3110), ukljuujui:

segment.source: Support of Microsoft Word bookmarks to identify header cells (compatible with Jaws screen reader).
segment.target: Podrka za Microsoft Word oznake za prepoznavanje elija zaglavlja (kompatibilno s itaem zaslona Jaws).

segment.source: - set column header (NVDA+shift+c) and set row header (NVDA+shift+r) commands while on the first header cell in a table allow you to tell NVDA that these headers should be reported automatically. Settings are stored in the document so that they are available the next time the document is opened, and will be available to other screen readers that support the bookmark scheme.
segment.target: - naredbe za postavljanje zaglavlja stupca (NVDA+shift+c) i postavljanje zaglavlja retka (NVDA+shift+r) dok se nalazi u prvoj eliji zaglavlja u tablici omoguuju vam da obavijestite NVDA da se ta zaglavlja trebaju automatski prijaviti. Postavke se pohranjuju u dokument tako da su dostupne prilikom sljedeeg otvaranja dokumenta, a bit e dostupne i drugim itaima zaslona koji podravaju shemu knjinih oznaka.

segment.source: Microsoft Word: Report the distance from the left edge of the page when the tab key is pressed. (#1353)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: Prijavite udaljenost od lijevog ruba stranice kada se pritisne tipka Tab. (#1353)

segment.source: Microsoft Word: provide feedback in speech and braille for most available formatting shortcut keys (bold, italic, underline, alignment, outline level, superscript, subscript and font size). (#1353)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: pruite povratne informacije u govoru i brajici za veinu dostupnih tipki preaca za oblikovanje (podebljano, kurziv, podcrtano, poravnanje, razina strukture, eksponent, indeks i veliina fonta). (#1353)

segment.source: Microsoft Excel: If the selected cell contains comments, they can be now reported by pressing NVDA+alt+c. (#2920)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel: Ako odabrana elija sadri komentare, oni se sada mogu prijaviti pritiskom na NVDA+alt+c. (#2920)

segment.source: Microsoft Excel: Provide an NVDA-specific dialog to edit the comments on the currently selected cell when pressing Excel's shift+f2 command to enter comment editing mode. (#2920)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel: Omoguite dijaloki okvir specifian za NVDA za ureivanje komentara na trenutno odabranoj eliji kada pritisnete Excelovu naredbu shift+f2 za ulazak u nain ureivanja komentara. (#2920)

segment.source: Microsoft Excel: speech and braille feedback for many more selection movement shortcuts (#4211) including:
segment.target: Microsoft Excel: povratne informacije o govoru i Brailleovom pismu za mnoge druge preace kretanja odabira (#4211), ukljuujui:

segment.source: Vertical page movement (pageUp and pageDown);
segment.target: Okomito pomicanje stranice (pageUp i pageDown);

segment.source: Horizontal page movement (alt+pageUp and alt+pageDown);
segment.target: Vodoravno pomicanje stranice (alt+pageUp i alt+pageDown);

segment.source: Extend selection (the above keys with Shift added); and
segment.target: Proirite odabir (gornje tipke s dodanim Shiftom); i

segment.source: Selecting the current region (control+shift+8).
segment.target: Odabir trenutane regije (control+shift+8).

segment.source: Microsoft Excel: The vertical and horizontal alignment for cells can now be reported with the report formatting command (NVDA+f). It can also be reported automatically if the Report alignment option in Document Formatting settings is enabled. (#4212)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel: Okomito i vodoravno poravnanje elija sada se moe prijaviti pomou naredbe za oblikovanje izvjea (NVDA+f). Takoer se moe automatski prijaviti ako je omoguena mogunost poravnanja izvjea u postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta. (#4212)

segment.source: Microsoft Excel: The style of a cell can now be reported with the report formatting command (NVDA+f). It can also be reported automatically if the Report Style option in Document formatting settings is enabled. (#4213)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel: Stil elije sada se moe prijaviti pomou naredbe za oblikovanje izvjea (NVDA+f). Takoer se moe automatski prijaviti ako je omoguena mogunost Stil izvjea u postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta. (#4213)

segment.source: Microsoft PowerPoint: when moving shapes around a slide with the arrow keys, the shape's current location is now reported (#4214) including:
segment.target: Microsoft PowerPoint: prilikom premjetanja oblika po slajdu pomou tipki sa strelicama sada se prijavljuje trenutna lokacija oblika (#4214), ukljuujui:

segment.source: The distance between the shape and each of the slide edges is reported.
segment.target: Prikazuje se udaljenost izmeu oblika i svakog od rubova klizaa.

segment.source: If the shape covers or is covered by another shape, then the distance overlapped and the overlapped shape are reported.
segment.target: Ako oblik prekriva ili je prekriven drugim oblikom, tada se izvjetava o preklapajuoj udaljenosti i preklapajuem obliku.

segment.source: To report this information at any time without moving a shape, press the report location command (NVDA+delete).
segment.target: Da biste prijavili ove informacije u bilo kojem trenutku bez pomicanja oblika, pritisnite naredbu Prijavi lokaciju (NVDA+brisanje).

segment.source: When selecting a shape, if it is covered by another shape, NVDA will report that it is obscured.
segment.target: Prilikom odabira oblika, ako je prekriven drugim oblikom, NVDA e prijaviti da je zaklonjen.

segment.source: The report location command (NVDA+delete) is more context specific in some situations. (#4219)
segment.target: Naredba za lokaciju izvjea (NVDA+delete) u nekim je situacijama vie specifina za kontekst. (#4219)

segment.source: In standard edit fields and browse mode, the cursor position as a percentage through the content and its screen coordinates are reported.
segment.target: U standardnim poljima za ureivanje i nainu pregledavanja izvjetava se o poloaju pokazivaa kao postotak kroz sadraj i njegove koordinate zaslona.

segment.source: On shapes in PowerPoint Presentations, position of the shape relative to the slide and other shapes is reported.
segment.target: Na oblicima u prezentacijama programa PowerPoint izvjeuje se o poloaju oblika u odnosu na slajd i druge oblike.

segment.source: Pressing this command twice will produce the previous behaviour of reporting the location information for the entire control.
segment.target: Dvaput pritiskom na ovu naredbu proizvest e se prethodno ponaanje izvjeivanja o informacijama o lokaciji za cijelu kontrolu.

segment.source: New language: Catalan.
segment.target: Novi jezik: katalonski.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.5.4. (#4103)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajevog pisma na 2.5.4. (#4103)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: In Google Chrome and Chrome-based browsers, certain chunks of text (such as those with emphasis) are no longer repeated when reporting the text of an alert or dialog. (#4066)
segment.target: U Google Chromeu i preglednicima koji se temelje na Chromeu odreeni dijelovi teksta (kao to su oni s naglaskom) vie se ne ponavljaju prilikom prijavljivanja teksta upozorenja ili dijalokog okvira. (#4066)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla applications, pressing enter on a button, etc. no longer fails to activate it (or activates the wrong control) in certain cases such as the buttons at the top of Facebook. (#4106)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u Mozillinim aplikacijama, pritiskom na enter na gumbu itd. vie se ne uspijeva aktivirati (ili aktivira pogrena kontrola) u odreenim sluajevima kao to su gumbi na vrhu Facebooka. (#4106)

segment.source: Useless information is no longer announced when tabbing in iTunes. (#4128)
segment.target: Beskorisne informacije vie se ne objavljuju prilikom kartica u iTunesu. (#4128)

segment.source: In certain lists in iTunes such as the Music list, moving to the next item using object navigation now works correctly. (#4129)
segment.target: Na odreenim popisima u iTunesu, kao to je popis Glazba, prelazak na sljedeu stavku pomou navigacije objektima sada ispravno funkcionira. (#4129)

segment.source: HTML elements considered headings because of WAI ARIA markup are now included in the Browse mode Elements list and quick navigation for Internet Explorer documents. (#4140)
segment.target: HTML elementi koji se smatraju naslovima zbog oznake WAI ARIA sada su ukljueni u popis elemenata naina pregledavanja i brzu navigaciju za dokumente preglednika Internet Explorer. (#4140)

segment.source: Following same-page links in recent versions of Internet Explorer now correctly moves to and reports the destination position in browse mode documents. (#4134)
segment.target: Praenje veza na istoj stranici u novijim verzijama preglednika Internet Explorer sada se ispravno premjeta na odredini poloaj i izvjetava o njemu u dokumentima naina pregledavanja. (#4134)

segment.source: Microsoft Outlook 2010 and above: Overall access to secure dialogs such as the New profiles and mail setup dialogs has been improved. (#4090, #4091, #4095)
segment.target: Microsoft Outlook 2010 i novije verzije: Poboljan je ukupni pristup sigurnim dijalokim okvirima kao to su Novi profili i dijaloki okviri za postavljanje pote. (#4090, #4091, #4095)

segment.source: Microsoft Outlook: Useless verbosity has been decreased in command toolbars when navigating through certain dialogs. (#4096, #3407)
segment.target: Microsoft Outlook: Beskorisna opirnost smanjena je u naredbenim alatnim trakama prilikom navigacije kroz odreene dijaloke okvire. (#4096, #3407)

segment.source: Microsoft word: Tabbing to a blank cell in a table no longer incorrectly announces exiting the table. (#4151)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: Prelazak tabulatora u praznu eliju u tablici vie ne oznaava pogreno izlazak iz tablice. (#4151)

segment.source: Microsoft Word: The first character past the end of a table (including a new blank line) is no longer incorrectly considered to be inside the table. (#4152)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: prvi znak iza kraja tablice (ukljuujui novi prazan redak) vie se ne smatra pogreno unutar tablice. (#4152)

segment.source: Microsoft Word 2010 spell check dialog: The actual misspelled word is reported rather than inappropriately reporting just the first bold word. (#3431)
segment.target: Dijaloki okvir za provjeru pravopisa programa Microsoft Word 2010: Prijavljuje se stvarna pogreno napisana rije, a ne neprimjereno prijavljuje samo prvu podebljanu rije. (#3431)

segment.source: In browse mode in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, tabbing or using single letter navigation to move to form fields again reports the label in many cases where it didn't (specifically, where HTML label elements are used). (#4170)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama, tabulatorima ili navigacijom jednim slovom za ponovno premjetanje na polja obrasca izvjetava o natpisu u mnogim sluajevima kada se to nije dogodilo (konkretno, kada se koriste elementi HTML oznake). (#4170)

segment.source: Microsoft Word: Reporting the existence and placement of comments is more accurate. (#3528)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: Izvjeivanje o postojanju i postavljanju komentara je tonije. (#3528)

segment.source: Navigation of certain dialogs in MS Office products such as Word, Excel and Outlook has been improved by no longer reporting particular control container toolbars which are not useful to the user. (#4198)
segment.target: Navigacija odreenim dijalokim okvirima u MS Office proizvodima kao to su Word, Excel i Outlook poboljana je tako to vie ne prijavljuje odreene alatne trake kontrolnih spremnika koje nisu korisne korisniku. (#4198)

segment.source: Task panes such as clipboard manager or File recovery no longer accidentilly seem to gain focus when opening an application such as Microsoft Word or Excel, which was sometimes causing the user to have to switch away from and back to the application to use the document or spreadsheet. (#4199)
segment.target: ini se da okna zadataka kao to su upravitelj meuspremnika ili Oporavak datoteke vie sluajno ne dobivaju fokus prilikom otvaranja aplikacije kao to je Microsoft Word ili Excel, to je ponekad uzrokovalo da se korisnik mora prebaciti s aplikacije i natrag na nju kako bi koristio dokument ili proraunsku tablicu. (#4199)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to run on recent Windows Operating Systems if the user's Windows language is set to Serbian (Latin). (#4203)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne pokree na novijim Windows operativnim sustavima ako je korisnikov Windows jezik postavljen na srpski (latinica). (#4203)

segment.source: Pressing numlock while in input help mode now correctly toggles numlock, rather than causing the keyboard and the Operating System to become out of sync in regards to the state of this key. (#4226)
segment.target: Pritiskom na numlock dok ste u nainu pomoi za unos sada ispravno prebacujete numlock, umjesto da tipkovnica i operativni sustav postanu nesinkronizirani u odnosu na stanje ove tipke. (#4226)

segment.source: In Google Chrome, the title of the document is again reported when switching tabs. In NVDA 2014.2, this did not occur in some cases. (#4222)
segment.target: U pregledniku Google Chrome naslov dokumenta ponovno se prijavljuje prilikom prebacivanja kartica. U NVDA 2014.2 to se nije dogodilo u nekim sluajevima. (#4222)

segment.source: In Google Chrome and Chrome-based browsers, the URL of the document is no longer reported when reporting the document. (#4223)
segment.target: U Google Chromeu i preglednicima koji se temelje na Chromeu URL dokumenta vie se ne prijavljuje prilikom prijavljivanja dokumenta. (#4223)

segment.source: When running say all with the No speech synthesizer selected (useful for automated testing), say all will now complete instead of stopping after the first few lines. (#4225)
segment.target: Kada se pokrene reci sve s odabranim sintisajzerom govora bez govora (korisno za automatizirano testiranje), recite da e se sve sada dovriti umjesto da se zaustavi nakon prvih nekoliko redaka. (#4225)

segment.source: Microsoft Outlook's Signature dialog: The Signature editing field is now accessible, allowing for full cursor tracking and format detection. (#3833)
segment.target: Dijaloki okvir Potpis programa Microsoft Outlook: Polje za ureivanje potpisa sada je dostupno, to omoguuje potpuno praenje kursora i otkrivanje oblika. (#3833)

segment.source: Microsoft Word: When reading the last line of a table cell, the entire table cell is no longer read. (#3421)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: Prilikom itanja posljednjeg retka elije tablice vie se ne ita cijela elija tablice. (#3421)

segment.source: Microsoft Word: When reading the first or last line of a table of contents, the entire table of contents is no longer read. (#3421)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: Prilikom itanja prvog ili posljednjeg retka tablice sadraja vie se ne ita cijela tablica sadraja. (#3421)

segment.source: When speaking typed words and in some other cases, words are no longer incorrectly broken at marks such as vowel signs and virama in Indic languages. (#4254)
segment.target: Kada izgovarate tipkane rijei i u nekim drugim sluajevima, rijei se vie ne lome pogreno na oznakama kao to su samoglasniki znakovi i virama u indijskim jezicima. (#4254)

segment.source: Numeric editable text fields in GoldWave are now handled correctly. (#670)
segment.target: Numerika tekstualna polja koja se mogu ureivati u GoldWaveu sada se ispravno obrauju. (#670)

segment.source: Microsoft Word: when moving by paragraph with control+downArrow / control+upArrow, it is no longer necessary to press them twice if moving through bulleted or numbered lists. (#3290)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: kada se kreete po odlomku s control+downArrow / control+upArrow, vie ih nije potrebno dvaput pritisnuti ako se kreete kroz popise s grafikim oznakama ili numerirane. (#3290)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: NVDA now has unified support for add-on documentation. See the Add-on Documentation section of the Developer Guide for details. (#2694)
segment.target: NVDA sada ima jedinstvenu podrku za dodatnu dokumentaciju. Pojedinosti potraite u odjeljku Dokumentacija o dodatku u Vodiu za razvojne inenjere. (#2694)

segment.source: When providing gesture bindings on a ScriptableObject via __gestures, it is now possible to provide the None keyword as the script. This unbinds the gesture in any base classes. (#4240)
segment.target: Prilikom pruanja povezivanja gesta na ScriptableObject putem __gestures, sada je mogue navesti kljunu rije None kao skriptu. Time se gesta odvezuje u svim osnovnim klasama. (#4240)

segment.source: It is now possible to change the shortcut key used to start NVDA for locales where the normal shortcut causes problems. (#2209)
segment.target: Sada je mogue promijeniti tipku preaca koja se koristi za pokretanje NVDA za lokalizacije gdje normalni preac uzrokuje probleme. (#2209)

segment.source: This is done via gettext.
segment.target: To se radi putem gettexta.

segment.source: Note that the text for the Create desktop shortcut option in the Install NVDA dialog, as well as the shortcut key in the User Guide, must also be updated.
segment.target: Imajte na umu da se tekst za opciju Stvori preac na radnoj povrini u dijalokom okviru Instaliraj NVDA, kao i tipka preaca u Korisnikom priruniku, takoer moraju aurirati.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Announcement of text selection is now possible in some custom edit fields where display information is used. (#770)
segment.target: Najava odabira teksta sada je mogua u nekim prilagoenim poljima za ureivanje u kojima se koriste informacije za prikaz. (#770)

segment.source: In accessible Java applications, position information is now announced for radio buttons and other controls that expose group information. (#3754)
