segment.target: U pristupanim Java aplikacijama sada se najavljuju informacije o poloaju za izborne tipke i druge kontrole koje otkrivaju informacije o grupi. (#3754)

segment.source: In accessible Java applications, keyboard shortcuts are now announced for controls that have them. (#3881)
segment.target: U pristupanim Java aplikacijama sada se najavljuju tipkovniki preaci za kontrole koje ih imaju. (#3881)

segment.source: In browse mode, labels on landmarks are now reported. They are also included in the Elements List dialog. (#1195)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja sada se prijavljuju oznake na orijentirima. Takoer su ukljueni u dijaloki okvir Popis elemenata. (#1195)

segment.source: In browse mode, labelled regions are now treated as landmarks. (#3741)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja oznaene regije sada se tretiraju kao orijentiri. (#3741)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer documents and applications, Live Regions (part of the W3c ARIA standard) are now supported, thus allowing web authors to mark particular content to be automatically spoken as it changes. (#1846)
segment.target: U dokumentima i aplikacijama preglednika Internet Explorer sada su podrane ive regije (dio standarda W3c ARIA), to omoguuje autorima weba da oznae odreeni sadraj koji e se automatski izgovarati kako se mijenja. (#1846)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: When exiting a dialog or application within a browse mode document, the browse mode document's name and type is no longer announced. (#4069)
segment.target: Prilikom izlaska iz dijalokog okvira ili aplikacije unutar dokumenta naina pregledavanja, naziv i vrsta dokumenta naina pregledavanja vie se ne objavljuju. (#4069)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: The standard Windows System menu is no longer accidentally silenced in Java applications. (#3882)
segment.target: Standardni izbornik sustava Windows vie nije sluajno utian u Java aplikacijama. (#3882)

segment.source: When copying text from screen review, line breaks are no longer ignored. (#3900)
segment.target: Prilikom kopiranja teksta s pregleda zaslona, prijelomi redaka vie se ne zanemaruju. (#3900)

segment.source: Pointless whitespace objects are no longer reported in some applications when the focus changes or when using object navigation with simple review enabled. (#3839)
segment.target: Besmisleni objekti razmaka vie se ne prijavljuju u nekim aplikacijama kada se fokus promijeni ili kada se koristi navigacija objektima s omoguenim jednostavnim pregledom. (#3839)

segment.source: Message boxes and other dialogs produced by NVDA again cause previous speech to be canceled before announcing the dialog.
segment.target: Okviri s porukama i drugi dijaloki okviri koje proizvodi NVDA ponovno uzrokuju otkazivanje prethodnog govora prije najave dijalokog okvira.

segment.source: In browse mode, the labels of controls such as links and buttons are now rendered correctly where the label has been overridden by the author for accessibility purposes (specifically, using aria-label or aria-labelledby). (#1354)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, oznake kontrola kao to su veze i gumbi sada se ispravno prikazuju tamo gdje je autor nadjaao oznaku u svrhu pristupanosti (tonije, pomou aria-label ili aria-labelledby). (#1354)

segment.source: In Browse mode in Internet Explorer, text contained within an element marked as presentational (ARIA role="presentation") is no longer inappropriately ignored. (#4031)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u pregledniku Internet Explorer tekst sadran u elementu oznaenom kao prezentacijski (ARIA role="presentation") vie se ne zanemaruje neprimjereno. (#4031)

segment.source: It is now again possible to type Vietnamese text using the Unikey software. To do this, uncheck the new Handle keys from other applications checkbox in NVDA's Keyboard settings dialog. (#4043)
segment.target: Sada je ponovno mogue upisivati vijetnamski tekst pomou softvera Unikey. Da biste to uinili, ponitite potvrdni okvir Ruka tipki iz drugih aplikacija u NVDA dijalokom okviru Postavke tipkovnice. (#4043)

segment.source: In browse mode, radio and check menu items are reported as controls instead of just clickable text. (#4092)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, stavke izbornika za radio i potvrdu prijavljuju se kao kontrole, a ne samo kao tekst na koji se moe kliknuti. (#4092)

segment.source: NVDA no longer incorrectly switches from focus mode to browse mode when a radio or check menu item is focused. (#4092)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne prebacuje pogreno iz fokusa u nain pregledavanja kada je fokusirana stavka izbornika za provjeru radija ili provjere. (#4092)

segment.source: In Microsoft PowerPoint with speaking of typed words enabled, characters erased with backspace are no longer announced as part of the typed word. (#3231)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft PowerPoint s omoguenim govorom o upisanim rijeima, znakovi izbrisani s backspaceom vie se ne najavljuju kao dio upisane rijei. (#3231)

segment.source: In Microsoft Office 2010 Options dialogs, the labels of combo boxes are reported correctly. (#4056)
segment.target: U dijalokim okvirima Mogunosti sustava Microsoft Office 2010 oznake kombiniranih okvira ispravno se prijavljuju. (#4056)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla applications, using quick navigation commands to move to the next or previous button or form field now includes toggle buttons as expected. (#4098)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u Mozillinim aplikacijama, koritenje naredbi za brzu navigaciju za prelazak na sljedei ili prethodni gumb ili polje obrasca sada ukljuuje preklopne gumbe prema oekivanjima. (#4098)

segment.source: The content of alerts in Mozilla applications is no longer reported twice. (#3481)
segment.target: Sadraj upozorenja u Mozillinim aplikacijama vie se ne prijavljuje dva puta. (#3481)

segment.source: In browse mode, containers and landmarks are no longer inappropriately repeated while navigating within them at the same time as page content is changing (e.g. navigating the Facebook and Twitter websites). (#2199)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, spremnici i oriti vie se ne ponavljaju neprimjereno dok se kreete unutar njih u isto vrijeme kada se mijenja sadraj stranice (npr. navigacija web stranicama Facebook i Twitter). (#2199)

segment.source: NVDA recovers in more cases when switching away from applications that stop responding. (#3825)
segment.target: NVDA se oporavlja u vie sluajeva kada se prebacuje s aplikacija koje prestaju reagirati. (#3825)

segment.source: The caret (insertion point) again correctly updates when doing a sayAll command while in editable text drawn directly to the screen. (#4125)
segment.target: Kursor (toka umetanja) ponovno se ispravno aurira prilikom izvoenja naredbe sayAll dok je u tekstu koji se moe ureivati nacrtanom izravno na zaslon. (#4125)

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Support for Microsoft PowerPoint 2013. Note that protected view is not supported. (#3578)
segment.target: Podrka za Microsoft PowerPoint 2013. Imajte na umu da zatieni prikaz nije podran. (#3578)

segment.source: In Microsoft word and Excel, NVDA can now read the selected symbol when choosing symbols using the Insert Symbols dialog. (#3538)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu i Excelu, NVDA sada moe proitati odabrani simbol prilikom odabira simbola pomou dijalokog okvira Umetni simbole. (#3538)

segment.source: It is now possible to choose if content in documents should be identified as clickable via a new option in the Document Formatting settings dialog. This option is on by default in accordance with the previous behavior. (#3556)
segment.target: Sada je mogue odabrati hoe li se sadraj u dokumentima identificirati kao klikljiv putem nove opcije u dijalokom okviru postavki oblikovanja dokumenta. Ova je opcija ukljuena prema zadanim postavkama u skladu s prethodnim ponaanjem. (#3556)

segment.source: Support for braille displays connected via Bluetooth on a computer running the Widcomm Bluetooth Software. (#2418)
segment.target: Podrka za Brailleove zaslone povezane putem Bluetootha na raunalu sa softverom Widcomm Bluetooth. (#2418)

segment.source: When editing text in PowerPoint, hyperlinks are now reported. (#3416)
segment.target: Prilikom ureivanja teksta u programu PowerPoint sada se izvjeuju o hipervezama. (#3416)

segment.source: When in ARIA applications or dialogs on the web, it is now possible to force NVDA to switch to browse mode with NVDA+space allowing document-style navigation of the application or dialog. (#2023)
segment.target: Kada se nalazite u ARIA aplikacijama ili dijalokim okvirima na webu, sada je mogue prisiliti NVDA da se prebaci u nain pregledavanja s NVDA+razmak koji omoguuje navigaciju aplikacijom ili dijalokim okvirom u stilu dokumenta. (#2023)

segment.source: In Outlook Express / Windows Mail / Windows Live Mail, NVDA now reports if a message has an attachment or is flagged. (#1594)
segment.target: U Outlook Expressu / Windows Mailu / Windows Live Mailu, NVDA sada izvjetava ima li poruka privitak ili je oznaena zastavicom. (#1594)

segment.source: When navigating tables in accessible Java applications, row and column coordinates are now reported, including column and row headers if they exist. (#3756)
segment.target: Prilikom navigacije tablicama u pristupanim Java aplikacijama, sada se izvjetavaju koordinate redaka i stupaca, ukljuujui zaglavlja stupaca i redaka ako postoje. (#3756)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: For Papenmeier braille displays, the move to flat review/focus command has been removed. Users can assign their own keys using the Input Gestures dialog. (#3652)
segment.target: Za Papenmeierove brajice uklonjena je naredba za pomicanje na ploni pregled/fokus. Korisnici mogu dodijeliti vlastite tipke pomou dijalokog okvira Ulazne geste. (#3652)

segment.source: NVDA now relies on the Microsoft VC runtime version 11, which means it can no longer be run on Operating systems older than Windows XP Service Pack 2 or Windows Server 2003 Service Pack 1.
segment.target: NVDA se sada oslanja na Microsoft VC runtime verziju 11, to znai da se vie ne moe pokrenuti na operativnim sustavima starijim od Windows XP Service Pack 2 ili Windows Server 2003 Service Pack 1.

segment.source: Punctuation level Some will now speak star (*) and plus (+) characters. (#3614)
segment.target: Razina interpunkcije Neki e sada izgovarati znakove zvjezdice (*) i plus (+). (#3614)

segment.source: Upgraded eSpeak to version 1.48.04 which includes many language fixes and fixes several crashes. (#3842, #3739, #3860)
segment.target: Nadograen eSpeak na verziju 1.48.04 koja ukljuuje mnoge jezine popravke i ispravlja nekoliko ruenja. (#3842, #3739, #3860)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: When moving around or selecting cells in Microsoft Excel, NVDA should no longer inappropriately announce the old cell rather than the new cell when Microsoft Excel is slow to move the selection. (#3558)
segment.target: Prilikom premjetanja ili odabira elija u Microsoft Excelu, NVDA vie ne bi trebao neprimjereno najavljivati staru eliju umjesto nove elije kada Microsoft Excel sporo pomie odabir. (#3558)

segment.source: NVDA properly handles opening a dropdown list for a cell in Microsoft Excel via the context menu. (#3586)
segment.target: NVDA ispravno upravlja otvaranjem padajueg popisa za eliju u Microsoft Excelu putem kontekstnog izbornika. (#3586)

segment.source: New page content in iTunes 11 store pages is now shown properly in browse mode when following a link in the store or when opening the store initially. (#3625)
segment.target: Novi sadraj stranice na stranicama iTunes 11 trgovine sada se ispravno prikazuje u nainu pretraivanja kada slijedite vezu u trgovini ili kada otvorite trgovinu. (#3625)

segment.source: Buttons for previewing songs in the iTunes 11 store now show their label in browse mode. (#3638)
segment.target: Gumbi za pregled pjesama u iTunes 11 trgovini sada prikazuju svoju oznaku u nainu pregledavanja. (#3638)

segment.source: In browse mode in Google Chrome, the labels of check boxes and radio buttons are now rendered correctly. (#1562)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u pregledniku Google Chrome oznake potvrdnih okvira i izbornih gumba sada se ispravno prikazuju. (#1562)

segment.source: In Instantbird, NVDA no longer reports useless information every time you move to a contact in the Contacts list. (#2667)
segment.target: U Instantbirdu, NVDA vie ne prijavljuje beskorisne informacije svaki put kada prijeete na kontakt na popisu kontakata. (#2667)

segment.source: In browse mode in Adobe Reader, the correct text is now rendered for buttons, etc. where the label has been overridden using a tooltip or other means. (#3640)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u programu Adobe Reader, ispravan tekst sada se prikazuje za gumbe itd. gdje je oznaka nadjaana pomou opisa alata ili na drugi nain. (#3640)

segment.source: In browse mode in Adobe Reader, extraneous graphics containing the text "mc-ref" will no longer be rendered. (#3645)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u programu Adobe Reader, suvine grafike koje sadre tekst "mc-ref" vie se nee prikazivati. (#3645)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports all cells in Microsoft Excel as underlined in their formatting information. (#3669)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izvjetava o svim elijama u Microsoft Excelu kao to je podcrtano u njihovim informacijama o formatiranju. (#3669)

segment.source: No longer show meaningless characters in browse mode documents such as those found in the Unicode private usage range. In some cases these were stopping more useful labels from being shown. (#2963)
segment.target: Vie ne prikazuju besmislene znakove u dokumentima naina pregledavanja kao to su oni koji se nalaze u rasponu privatne upotrebe Unicode. U nekim sluajevima to je sprjeavalo prikazivanje korisnijih oznaka. (#2963)

segment.source: Input composition for entering east-asian characters no longer fails in PuTTY. (#3432)
segment.target: Ulazna kompozicija za unos istonoazijskih znakova vie ne uspijeva u PuTTY-u. (#3432)

segment.source: Navigating in a document after a canceled say all no longer results in NVDA sometimes incorrectly announcing that you have left a field (such as a table) lower in the document that the say all never actually spoke. (#3688)
segment.target: Navigacija u dokumentu nakon otkazanog izgovaranja vie ne rezultira time da NVDA ponekad pogreno objavi da ste ostavili polje (kao to je tablica) nie u dokumentu koje se zapravo nikada nije izgovorilo. (#3688)

segment.source: When using browse mode quick navigation commands while in say all with skim reading enabled, NVDA more accurately announces the new field; e.g. it now says a heading is a heading, rather than just its text. (#3689)
segment.target: Kada koristite naredbe za brzu navigaciju u nainu pregledavanja, a recimo sve s omoguenim preletnim itanjem, NVDA tonije najavljuje novo polje; npr. sada pie da je naslov naslov, a ne samo njegov tekst. (#3689)

segment.source: The jump to end or start of container quick navigation commands now honor the skim reading during say all setting; i.e. they will no longer cancel the current say all. (#3675)
segment.target: Naredbe za brzu navigaciju spremnika od skoka do kraja ili poetka spremnika sada potuju obraeno oitanje tijekom postavke recimo sve; tj. vie nee otkazivati trenutnu opciju "reci sve". (#3675)

segment.source: Touch gesture names listed in NVDA's Input Gestures dialog are now friendly and localized. (#3624)
segment.target: Nazivi pokreta dodirom navedeni u NVDA dijalokom okviru Ulazne geste sada su prijateljski i lokalizirani. (#3624)

segment.source: NVDA no longer causes certain programs to crash when moving the mouse over their rich edit (TRichEdit) controls. Programs include Jarte 5.1 and BRfcil. (#3693, #3603, #3581)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne uzrokuje ruenje odreenih programa prilikom pomicanja mia preko njihovih kontrola za obogaeno ureivanje (TRichEdit). Programi ukljuuju Jarte 5.1 i BRfcil. (#3693, #3603, #3581)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, containers such as tables marked as presentation by ARIA are no longer reported to the user. (#3713)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama spremnici kao to su tablice koje je ARIA oznaila kao prezentaciju vie se ne prijavljuju korisniku. (#3713)

segment.source: in Microsoft Word, NVDA no longer inappropriately repeats table row and column information for a cell on a braille display multiple times. (#3702)
segment.target: u programu Microsoft Word NVDA vie ne ponavlja informacije o recima i stupcima tablice za eliju na zaslonu brajice vie puta. (#3702)

segment.source: In languages which use a space as a digit group/thousands separator such as French and German, numbers from separate chunks of text are no longer pronounced as a single number. This was particularly problematic for table cells containing numbers. (#3698)
segment.target: U jezicima koji koriste razmak kao grupu znamenki/razdjelnik tisua, kao to su francuski i njemaki, brojevi iz zasebnih dijelova teksta vie se ne izgovaraju kao jedan broj. To je bilo posebno problematino za elije tablice koje sadre brojeve. (#3698)

segment.source: Braille no longer sometimes fails to update when the system caret is moved in Microsoft Word 2013. (#3784)
segment.target: Brailleovo pismo vie se ponekad ne aurira kada se kursor sustava premjesti u programu Microsoft Word 2013. (#3784)

segment.source: When positioned on the first character of a heading in Microsoft Word, the text communicating it is a heading (including the level) no longer disappears off a braille display. (#3701)
segment.target: Kada se postavi na prvi znak naslova u programu Microsoft Word, tekst koji komunicira da je naslov (ukljuujui razinu) vie ne nestaje s brajinog zaslona. (#3701)

segment.source: When a configuration profile is triggered for an application and that application is exited, NVDA no longer sometimes fails to deactivate the profile. (#3732)
segment.target: Kada se pokrene konfiguracijski profil za aplikaciju i ta aplikacija izae, NVDA vie ponekad ne uspijeva deaktivirati profil. (#3732)

segment.source: When entering Asian input into a control within NVDA itself (e.g. the browse mode Find dialog), "NVDA" is no longer incorrectly reported in place of the candidate. (#3726)
segment.target: Prilikom unosa azijskog unosa u kontrolu unutar samog NVDA (npr. dijaloki okvir za pronalaenje naina pregledavanja), "NVDA" se vie ne prijavljuje pogreno umjesto kandidata. (#3726)

segment.source: The tabs in the Outlook 2013 options dialog are now reported. (#3826)
segment.target: Kartice u dijalokom okviru mogunosti programa Outlook 2013 sada se prijavljuju. (#3826)

segment.source: Improved support for ARIA live regions in Firefox and other Mozilla Gecko applications:
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za ARIA live regije u Firefoxu i drugim Mozilla Gecko aplikacijama:

segment.source: Support for aria-atomic updates and filtering of aria-busy updates. (#2640)
segment.target: Podrka za aria-atomic auriranja i filtriranje aria-busy auriranja. (#2640)

segment.source: Alternative text (such as alt attribute or aria-label) is included if there is no other useful text. (#3329)
segment.target: Alternativni tekst (kao to je alt atribut ili aria-label) ukljuen je ako nema drugog korisnog teksta. (#3329)

segment.source: Live region updates are no longer silenced if they occur at the same time as the focus moves. (#3777)
segment.target: Auriranja podruja uivo vie se ne utiavaju ako se dogode u isto vrijeme kada se fokus pomie. (#3777)

segment.source: Certain presentation elements in Firefox and other Mozilla Gecko applications are no longer inappropriately shown in browse mode (specifically, when the element is marked with aria-presentation but it is also focusable). (#3781)
segment.target: Odreeni elementi prezentacije u Firefoxu i drugim Mozilla Gecko aplikacijama vie nisu neprikladno prikazani u nainu pregledavanja (tonije, kada je element oznaen aria-prezentacijom, ali je takoer fokusiran). (#3781)

segment.source: A performance improvement when navigating a document in Microsoft Word with spelling errors enabled. (#3785)
segment.target: Poboljanje performansi prilikom navigacije dokumentom u programu Microsoft Word s omoguenim pravopisnim pogrekama. (#3785)

segment.source: Several fixes to the support for accessible Java applications:
segment.target: Nekoliko popravaka podrke za pristupane Java aplikacije:

segment.source: The initially focused control in a frame or dialog no longer fails to be reported when the frame or dialog comes to the foreground. (#3753)
segment.target: Inicijalno fokusirana kontrola u okviru ili dijalokom okviru vie se ne prijavljuje kada okvir ili dijaloki okvir dou u prvi plan. (#3753)

segment.source: Unuseful position information is no longer announced for radio buttons (e.g. 1 of 1). (#3754)
segment.target: Nekorisne informacije o poloaju vie se ne objavljuju za radio tipke (npr. 1 od 1). (#3754)

segment.source: Better reporting of JComboBox controls (html no longer reported, better reporting of expanded and collapsed states). (#3755)
segment.target: Bolje izvjetavanje o JComboBox kontrolama (html se vie ne izvjetava, bolje izvjetavanje o proirenim i sruenim stanjima). (#3755)

segment.source: When reporting the text of dialogs, some text that was previously missing is now included. (#3757)
segment.target: Prilikom prijavljivanja teksta dijalokih okvira sada je ukljuen neki tekst koji je prije nedostajao. (#3757)

segment.source: Changes to the name, value or description of the focused control is now reported more accurately. (#3770)
segment.target: Promjene naziva, vrijednosti ili opisa fokusirane kontrole sada se izvjeuju tonije. (#3770)

segment.source: Fix a crash in NVDA seen in Windows 8 when focusing on certain RichEdit controls containing large amounts of text (e.g. NVDA's log viewer, windbg). (#3867)
segment.target: Ispravljanje ruenja NVDA u sustavu Windows 8 kada se fokusirate na odreene RichEdit kontrole koje sadre velike koliine teksta (npr. NVDA-ov preglednik dnevnika, windbg). (#3867)

segment.source: On systems with a high DPI display setting (which occurs by default for many modern screens), NVDA no longer routes the mouse to the wrong location in some applications. (#3758, #3703)
segment.target: Na sustavima s visokom postavkom DPI zaslona (koja se prema zadanim postavkama javlja na mnogim modernim zaslonima), NVDA vie ne usmjerava mi na pogreno mjesto u nekim aplikacijama. (#3758, #3703)

segment.source: Fixed an occasional problem when browsing the web where NVDA would stop working correctly until restarted, even though it didn't crash or freeze. (#3804)
segment.target: Rijeen je povremeni problem prilikom pregledavanja weba gdje bi NVDA prestao ispravno raditi do ponovnog pokretanja, iako se nije ruio ili zamrzavao. (#3804)

segment.source: A Papenmeier braille display can now be used even if a Papenmeier display has never been connected via USB. (#3712)
segment.target: Papenmeierov brajini zaslon sada se moe koristiti ak i ako Papenmeierov zaslon nikada nije bio spojen putem USB-a. (#3712)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes when the Papenmeier BRAILLEX older models braille display is selected without a display connected.
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne zamrzava kada se odabere Papenmeier BRAILLEX Brailleov zaslon starijih modela bez prikljuenog zaslona.

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: AppModules now contain productName and productVersion properties. This info is also now included in Developer Info (NVDA+f1). (#1625)
segment.target: AppModules sada sadre svojstva productName i productVersion. Te su informacije sada ukljuene i u Informacije za razvojne programere (NVDA+f1). (#1625)

segment.source: In the Python Console, you can now press the tab key to complete the current identifier. (#433)
segment.target: U Python konzoli sada moete pritisnuti tipku tab da biste dovrili trenutni identifikator. (#433)

segment.source: If there are multiple possibilities, you can press tab a second time to choose from a list.
segment.target: Ako postoji vie mogunosti, moete pritisnuti tabulatora drugi put da biste odabrali s popisa.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Form fields are now reported in Microsoft word documents. (#2295)
segment.target: Polja obrasca sada se prijavljuju u Microsoft Word dokumentima. (#2295)

segment.source: NVDA can now announce revision information in Microsoft Word when Track Changes is enabled. Note that Report editor revisions in NVDA's document settings dialog (off by default) must be enabled also for them to be announced. (#1670)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe objaviti informacije o izmjenama u Microsoft Wordu kada je omoguena opcija Praenje promjena. Imajte na umu da revizije ureivaa izvjea u NVDA dijalokom okviru postavki dokumenta (iskljueno prema zadanim postavkama) moraju biti omoguene i da bi bile najavljene. (#1670)

segment.source: Dropdown lists in Microsoft Excel 2003 through 2010 are now announced when opened and navigated around. (#3382)
segment.target: Padajui popisi u programu Microsoft Excel 2003 do 2010 sada se najavljuju prilikom otvaranja i navigacije. (#3382)

segment.source: a new 'Allow Skim Reading in Say All' option in the Keyboard settings dialog allows navigating through a document with browse mode quick navigation and line / paragraph movement commands, while remaining in say all. This option is off by default. (#2766)
segment.target: nova opcija 'Dopusti preletno itanje u Say All' u dijalokom okviru postavki tipkovnice omoguuje navigaciju kroz dokument s brzom navigacijom u nainu pregledavanja i naredbama za pomicanje redaka / odlomka, dok ostajete u Reci sve. Ova je opcija prema zadanim postavkama iskljuena. (#2766)

segment.source: There is now an Input Gestures dialog to allow simpler customization of the input gestures (such as keys on the keyboard) for NVDA commands. (#1532)
segment.target: Sada postoji dijaloki okvir Ulazne geste koji omoguuje jednostavniju prilagodbu ulaznih gesta (kao to su tipke na tipkovnici) za NVDA naredbe. (#1532)

segment.source: You can now have different settings for different situations using configuration profiles. Profiles can be activated manually or automatically (e.g. for a particular application). (#87, #667, #1913)
segment.target: Sada moete imati razliite postavke za razliite situacije pomou konfiguracijskih profila. Profili se mogu aktivirati runo ili automatski (npr. za odreenu primjenu). (#87, #667, #1913)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, cells that are links are now announced as links. (#3042)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel elije koje su veze sada se najavljuju kao veze. (#3042)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the existence of comments on a cell is now reported to the user. (#2921)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel, postojanje komentara na eliji sada se prijavljuje korisniku. (#2921)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Zend Studio now functions the same as Eclipse. (#3420)
segment.target: Zend Studio sada funkcionira isto kao i Eclipse. (#3420)

segment.source: The changed state of certain checkboxes in the Microsoft Outlook 2010 message rules dialog are now reported automatically. (#3063)
segment.target: Promijenjeno stanje odreenih potvrdnih okvira u dijalokom okviru pravila poruka programa Microsoft Outlook 2010 sada se automatski prijavljuje. (#3063)

segment.source: NVDA will now report the pinned state for pinned controls such as tabs in Mozilla Firefox. (#3372)
segment.target: NVDA e sada izvjetavati o stanju prikvaenosti za prikvaene kontrole kao to su kartice u pregledniku Mozilla Firefox. (#3372)

segment.source: It is now possible to bind scripts to keyboard gestures containing Alt and/or Windows keys as modifiers. Previously, if this was done, performing the script would cause the Start Menu or menu bar to be activated. (#3472)
segment.target: Sada je mogue povezati skripte s tipkama na tipkovnici koje sadre Alt i/ili Windows tipke kao modifikatore. Prije toga, ako je to uinjeno, izvoenje skripte uzrokovalo bi aktiviranje izbornika Start ili trake izbornika. (#3472)

segment.source: Selecting text in browse mode documents (e.g. using control+shift+end) no longer causes the keyboard layout to be switched on systems with multiple keyboard layouts installed. (#3472)
segment.target: Odabir teksta u dokumentima naina pregledavanja (npr. pomou control+shift+end) vie ne uzrokuje ukljuivanje rasporeda tipkovnice na sustavima s instaliranim vie rasporeda tipkovnice. (#3472)

segment.source: Internet Explorer should no longer crash or become unusable when closing NVDA. (#3397)
segment.target: Internet Explorer se vie ne bi trebao ruiti ili postati neupotrebljiv prilikom zatvaranja NVDA-a. (#3397)

segment.source: Physical movement and other events on some newer computers are no longer treated as inappropriate key presses. Previously, this silenced speech and sometimes triggered NVDA commands. (#3468)
segment.target: Fiziko kretanje i drugi dogaaji na nekim novijim raunalima vie se ne tretiraju kao neprikladni pritisci tipki. Prije je to utiavalo govor i ponekad aktiviralo NVDA naredbe. (#3468)

segment.source: NVDA now behaves as expected in Poedit 1.5.7. Users using earlier versions will need to update. (#3485)
segment.target: NVDA se sada ponaa kao to se oekuje u Poeditu 1.5.7. Korisnici koji koriste starije verzije morat e aurirati. (#3485)

segment.source: NVDA can now read protected documents in Microsoft Word 2010, no longer causing Microsoft Word to crash. (#1686)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe itati zatiene dokumente u programu Microsoft Word 2010 i vie ne uzrokuje ruenje programa Microsoft Word. (#1686)

segment.source: If an unknown command line switch is given when launching the NVDA distribution package, it no longer causes an endless loop of error message dialogs. (#3463)
segment.target: Ako se prilikom pokretanja NVDA distribucijskog paketa navede nepoznati prekida naredbenog retka, on vie ne uzrokuje beskrajnu petlju dijalokih okvira s pogrekama. (#3463)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to report alt text of graphics and objects in Microsoft Word if the alt text contains quotes or other non-standard characters. (#3579)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izvjetava o zamjenskom tekstu grafika i objekata u Microsoft Wordu ako zamjenski tekst sadri navodnike ili druge nestandardne znakove. (#3579)

segment.source: The number of items for certain horizontal lists in Browse mode is now correct. Previously it may have been double the actual amount. (#2151)
segment.target: Broj stavki za odreene vodoravne popise u nainu pregledavanja sada je toan. Prije je to mogao biti dvostruko vei od stvarnog iznosa. (#2151)

segment.source: When pressing control+a in a Microsoft Excel worksheet, the updated selection will now be reported. (#3043)
segment.target: Kada pritisnete control+a na radnom listu programa Microsoft Excel, sada e se prijaviti aurirani odabir. (#3043)

segment.source: NVDA can now correctly read XHTML documents in Microsoft Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls. (#3542)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe ispravno itati XHTML dokumente u Microsoft Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama. (#3542)

segment.source: Keyboard settings dialog: if no key has been chosen to be used as the NVDA key, an error is presented to the user when dismissing the dialog. At least one key must be chosen for proper usage of NVDA. (#2871)
segment.target: Dijaloki okvir postavki tipkovnice: ako nijedna tipka nije odabrana za koritenje kao NVDA tipka, korisniku se prikazuje pogreka prilikom odbacivanja dijalokog okvira. Za pravilno koritenje NVDA ureaja mora se odabrati barem jedan klju. (#2871)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, NVDA now announces merged cells differently to multiple selected cells. (#3567)
segment.target: U Microsoft Excelu, NVDA sada najavljuje spojene elije drugaije od vie odabranih elija. (#3567)

segment.source: The browse mode cursor is no longer positioned incorrectly when leaving a dialog or application inside the document. (#3145)
segment.target: Pokaziva naina pregledavanja vie nije pogreno postavljen prilikom naputanja dijalokog okvira ili aplikacije unutar dokumenta. (#3145)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where the HumanWare Brailliant BI/B series braille display driver wasn't presented as an option in the Braille Settings dialog on some systems, even though such a display was connected via USB.
segment.target: Rijeen je problem zbog kojeg upravljaki program za Brailliant BI/B seriju nije bio prikazan kao opcija u dijalokom okviru Postavke Brailleovog pisma na nekim sustavima, iako je takav zaslon bio povezan putem USB-a.

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to switch to screen review when the navigator object has no actual screen location. In this case the review cursor is now placed at the top of the screen. (#3454)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne uspijeva prebaciti na pregled zaslona kada objekt navigatora nema stvarnu lokaciju zaslona. U tom je sluaju pokaziva pregleda sada postavljen na vrh zaslona. (#3454)

segment.source: Fixed an issue which caused the Freedom Scientific braille display driver to fail when the port was set to USB in some circumstances. (#3509, #3662)
segment.target: Rijeen je problem koji je u nekim okolnostima uzrokovao neuspjeh upravljakog programa Brailleovog pisma Freedom Scientific kada je prikljuak postavljen na USB. (#3509, #3662)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where keys on Freedom Scientific braille displays weren't detected in some circumstances. (#3401, #3662)
segment.target: Rijeen je problem zbog kojeg tipke na Brailleovom pismu Freedom Scientific nisu otkrivene u nekim okolnostima. (#3401, #3662)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: You can specify the category to be displayed to the user for scripts using the scriptCategory attribute on ScriptableObject classes and the category attribute on script methods. See the documentation for baseObject.ScriptableObject for more details. (#1532)
segment.target: Moete odrediti kategoriju koja e se prikazati korisniku za skripte pomou atributa scriptCategory na klasama ScriptableObject i atributa category na metodama skripte. Dodatne pojedinosti potraite u dokumentaciji za baseObject.ScriptableObject. (#1532)

segment.source: config.save is deprecated and may be removed in a future release. Use config.conf.save instead. (#667)
segment.target: config.save je zastario i moe se ukloniti u buduem izdanju. Umjesto toga koristite config.conf.save. (#667)

segment.source: config.validateConfig is deprecated and may be removed in a future release. Add-ons which need this should provide their own implementation. (#667, #3632)
segment.target: config.validateConfig je zastario i moe se ukloniti u buduem izdanju. Dodaci kojima je to potrebno trebali bi osigurati vlastitu implementaciju. (#667, #3632)

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Support for the Chromium Embedded Framework, which is a web browser control used in several applications. (#3108)
segment.target: Podrka za Chromium Embedded Framework, koji je kontrola web preglednika koja se koristi u nekoliko aplikacija. (#3108)

segment.source: New eSpeak voice variant: Iven3.
segment.target: Nova eSpeak glasovna varijanta: Iven3.

segment.source: In Skype, new chat messages are reported automatically while the conversation is focused. (#2298)
segment.target: U Skypeu se nove poruke avrljanja automatski prijavljuju dok je razgovor usredotoen. (#2298)

segment.source: Support for Tween, including reporting of tab names and less verbosity when reading tweets.
segment.target: Podrka za Tween, ukljuujui izvjetavanje o nazivima kartica i manje opirnosti prilikom itanja tweetova.

segment.source: You can now disable displaying of NVDA messages on a braille display by setting the message timeout to 0 in the Braille Settings dialog. (#2482)
segment.target: Sada moete onemoguiti prikaz NVDA poruka na Brailleovom pismu tako da postavite vremensko ogranienje poruke na 0 u dijalokom okviru Postavke brajice. (#2482)

segment.source: In the Add-ons Manager, there is now a Get Add-ons button to open the NVDA Add-ons web site where you can browse and download available add-ons. (#3209)
segment.target: U Upravitelju dodataka sada se nalazi gumb Dohvati dodatke za otvaranje web stranice NVDA dodataka na kojoj moete pregledavati i preuzimati dostupne dodatke. (#3209)

segment.source: In the NVDA Welcome dialog which always appears the first time you run NVDA, you can now specify whether NVDA starts automatically after you log on to Windows. (#2234)
segment.target: U dijalokom okviru dobrodolice NVDA koji se uvijek pojavljuje prilikom prvog pokretanja NVDA-e, sada moete odrediti hoe li se NVDA automatski pokrenuti nakon to se prijavite u Windows. (#2234)

segment.source: Sleep mode is automatically enabled when using Dolphin Cicero. (#2055)
segment.target: Nain mirovanja automatski je omoguen kada koristite Dolphin Cicero. (#2055)

segment.source: The Windows x64 version of Miranda IM/Miranda NG is now supported. (#3296)
segment.target: Sada je podrana Windows x64 verzija Miranda IM/Miranda NG. (#3296)

segment.source: Search suggestions in the Windows 8.1 Start Screen are automatically reported. (#3322)
segment.target: Prijedlozi za pretraivanje na poetnom zaslonu sustava Windows8.1 automatski se prijavljuju. (#3322)

segment.source: Support for navigating and editing spreadsheets in Microsoft Excel 2013. (#3360)
segment.target: Podrka za navigaciju i ureivanje proraunskih tablica u programu Microsoft Excel 2013. (#3360)

segment.source: The Freedom Scientific Focus 14 Blue and Focus 80 Blue braille displays, as well as the Focus 40 Blue in certain configurations that weren't supported previously, are now supported when connected via Bluetooth. (#3307)
segment.target: Brajevi zasloni Freedom Scientific Focus 14 Blue i Focus 80 Blue, kao i Focus 40 Blue u odreenim konfiguracijama koje prije nisu bile podrane, sada su podrani kada su povezani putem Bluetootha. (#3307)

segment.source: Auto complete suggestions are now reported in Outlook 2010. (#2816)
segment.target: Prijedlozi automatskog dovretka sada se prijavljuju u programu Outlook 2010. (#2816)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: English (U.K.) computer braille, Korean grade 2, Russian braille for computer code.
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: engleska (UK) raunalna brajica, korejski razred 2, ruski Brailleovo pismo za raunalni kod.

segment.source: New language: Farsi. (#1427)
segment.target: Novi jezik: farsi. (#1427)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: On a touch screen, performing a single finger flick left or right when in object mode now moves previous or next through all objects, not just those in the current container. Use 2-finger flick left or right to perform the original action of moving to the previous or next object in the current container.
segment.target: Na dodirnom zaslonu, izvoenje pomicanja jednim prstom ulijevo ili udesno u nainu rada objekta sada se pomie prethodni ili sljedei kroz sve objekte, a ne samo one u trenutnom spremniku. Upotrijebite pomicanje prsta ulijevo ili udesno s 2 prsta za izvoenje izvorne radnje premjetanja na prethodni ili sljedei objekt u trenutnom spremniku.

segment.source: the Report layout tables checkbox found in the Browse Mode settings dialog has now been renamed to Include layout tables to reflect that quick navigation also will not locate them if the checkbox is unchecked. (#3140)
segment.target: potvrdni okvir tablice izgleda izvjea koji se nalazi u dijalokom okviru postavki naina pregledavanja sada je preimenovan u Ukljui tablice izgleda kako bi se odrazilo da ih brza navigacija takoer nee locirati ako potvrdni okvir nije oznaen. (#3140)

segment.source: Flat review has been replaced with object, document and screen review modes. (#2996)
segment.target: Ploni pregled zamijenjen je nainima pregleda objekata, dokumenata i zaslona. (#2996)

segment.source: Object review reviews text just within the navigator object, document review reviews all text in a browse mode document (if any) and screen review reviews text on the screen for the current application.
segment.target: Pregled objekata pregledava tekst samo unutar objekta navigatora, pregled dokumenta pregledava sav tekst u dokumentu naina pregledavanja (ako postoji) i pregled zaslona pregledava tekst na zaslonu za trenutnu aplikaciju.

segment.source: The commands that previously move to/from flat review now toggle between these new review modes.
segment.target: Naredbe koje su se prethodno premjetale na/iz ravnog pregleda sada se prebacuju izmeu ovih novih naina pregleda.

segment.source: The navigator object automatically follows the review cursor such that it remains the deepest object at the position of the review cursor when in document or screen review modes.
segment.target: Objekt navigatora automatski slijedi kursor pregleda tako da ostaje najdublji objekt na poloaju kursora pregleda kada je u nainu pregleda dokumenta ili zaslona.

segment.source: After switching to screen review mode, NVDA will stay in this mode until you explicitly switch back to document or object review mode.
segment.target: Nakon prelaska u nain pregleda zaslona, NVDA e ostati u ovom nainu rada sve dok se izriito ne vratite u nain pregleda dokumenta ili objekta.

segment.source: When in document or object review mode, NVDA may automatically switch between these two modes depending on whether you are moving around a browse mode document or not.
segment.target: Kada je u nainu pregleda dokumenta ili objekta, NVDA se moe automatski prebacivati izmeu ova dva naina rada ovisno o tome kreete li se po dokumentu ili ne.

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.5.3. (#3371)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na 2.5.3. (#3371)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Activating an object now announces the action before the activation, rather than the action after the activation (e.g. expand when expanding rather than collapse). (#2982)
segment.target: Aktiviranje objekta sada najavljuje radnju prije aktivacije, a ne radnju nakon aktivacije (npr. proiri prilikom proirenja, a ne saim). (#2982)

segment.source: More accurate reading and cursor tracking in various input fields for recent versions of Skype, such as chat and search fields. (#1601, #3036)
segment.target: Preciznije itanje i praenje kursora u raznim poljima za unos za novije verzije Skypea, kao to su polja za chat i pretraivanje. (#1601, #3036)

segment.source: In the Skype recent conversations list, the number of new events is now read for each conversation if relevant. (#1446)
segment.target: Na popisu nedavnih razgovora putem Skypea sada se ita broj novih dogaaja za svaki razgovor, ako je relevantno. (#1446)

segment.source: Improvements to cursor tracking and reading order for right-to-left text written to the screen; e.g. editing Arabic text in Microsoft Excel. (#1601)
segment.target: Poboljanja praenja kursora i redoslijeda itanja teksta koji se pie zdesna nalijevo na zaslon; npr. ureivanje arapskog teksta u programu Microsoft Excel. (#1601)

segment.source: Quick navigation to buttons and form fields will now locate links marked as buttons for accessibility purposes in Internet Explorer. (#2750)
segment.target: Brza navigacija do gumba i polja obrazaca sada e pronai veze oznaene kao gumbi za potrebe pristupanosti u pregledniku Internet Explorer. (#2750)

segment.source: In browse mode, the content inside tree views is no longer rendered, as a flattened representation isn't useful. You can press enter on a tree view to interact with it in focus mode. (#3023)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja sadraj unutar prikaza stabla vie se ne prikazuje jer spljoteni prikaz nije koristan. Moete pritisnuti enter u prikazu stabla za interakciju s njim u nainu fokusiranja. (#3023)

segment.source: Pressing alt+downArrow or alt+upArrow to expand a combo box while in focus mode no longer incorrectly switches to browse mode. (#2340)
segment.target: Pritiskom na alt+strelica prema dolje ili alt+strelica prema gore da biste proirili kombinirani okvir dok ste u nainu fokusiranja vie se neispravno ne prebacuje u nain pregledavanja. (#2340)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer 10, table cells no longer activate focus mode, unless they have been explicitly made focusable by the web author. (#3248)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer 10 elije tablice vie ne aktiviraju nain fokusiranja, osim ako ih je autor weba izriito izotrio. (#3248)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to start if the system time is earlier than the last check for an update. (#3260)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne pokree ako je vrijeme sustava ranije od posljednje provjere auriranja. (#3260)

segment.source: If a progress bar is shown on a braille display, the braille display is updated when the progress bar changes. (#3258)
segment.target: Ako je na brajinom zaslonu prikazana traka napretka, brajiin prikaz aurira se kada se promijeni traka napretka. (#3258)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla applications, table captions are no longer rendered twice. In addition, the summary is rendered when there is also a caption. (#3196)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u Mozillinim aplikacijama, opisi tablica vie se ne prikazuju dvaput. Osim toga, saetak se prikazuje kada postoji i naslov. (#3196)

segment.source: When changing input languages in Windows 8, NVDA now speaks the correct language rather than the previous one.
segment.target: Prilikom promjene jezika unosa u sustavu Windows 8, NVDA sada govori ispravan jezik, a ne prethodni.

segment.source: NVDA now announces IME conversion mode changes in Windows 8.
segment.target: NVDA sada najavljuje promjene naina pretvorbe IME-a u sustavu Windows 8.

segment.source: NVDA no longer announces garbage on the Desktop when the Google Japanese or Atok IME input methods are in use. (#3234)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne objavljuje smee na radnoj povrini kada se koriste Google japanski ili Atok IME naini unosa. (#3234)

segment.source: In Windows 7 and above, NVDA no longer inappropriately announces speech recognition or touch input as a keyboard language change.
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 7 i novijim verzijama, NVDA vie ne najavljuje neprimjereno prepoznavanje govora ili unos dodirom kao promjenu jezika tipkovnice.

segment.source: NVDA no longer announces a particular special character (0x7f) when pressing control+backspace in some editors when speak typed characters is enabled. (#3315)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne najavljuje odreeni poseban znak (0x7f) kada pritisnete control+backspace u nekim ureivaima kada je omogueno izgovaranje upisanih znakova. (#3315)

segment.source: eSpeak no longer inappropriately changes in pitch, volume, etc. when NVDA reads text containing certain control characters or XML. (#3334) (regression of #437)
segment.target: eSpeak vie ne mijenja neprimjereno visinu tona, glasnou itd. kada NVDA ita tekst koji sadri odreene kontrolne znakove ili XML. (#3334) (regresija #437)

segment.source: In Java applications, changes to the label or value of the focused control are now announced automatically, and are reflected when subsequently querying the control. (#3119)
segment.target: U Java aplikacijama promjene oznake ili vrijednosti fokusirane kontrole sada se automatski najavljuju i odraavaju se prilikom naknadnog postavljanja upita kontroli. (#3119)

segment.source: In Scintilla controls, lines are now reported correctly when word wrap is enabled. (#885)
segment.target: U kontrolama Scintilla redovi se sada ispravno prijavljuju kada je omogueno prelamanje rijei. (#885)

segment.source: In Mozilla applications, the name of read-only list items is now correctly reported; e.g. when navigating tweets in focus mode on twitter.com. (#3327)
segment.target: U Mozillinim aplikacijama, nazivi stavki popisa samo za itanje sada se ispravno prijavljuju; Npr. prilikom navigacije tweetovima u nainu rada fokusa na twitter.com. (#3327)

segment.source: Confirmation dialogs in Microsoft Office 2013 now have their content automatically read when they appear.
segment.target: Dijaloki okviri za potvrdu u sustavu Microsoft Office 2013 sada se automatski itaju kada se pojave.

segment.source: Performance improvements when navigating certain tables in Microsoft Word. (#3326)
segment.target: Poboljanja performansi prilikom navigacije odreenim tablicama u programu Microsoft Word. (#3326)

segment.source: NVDA's table navigation commands (control+alt+arrows) function better in certain Microsoft Word tables where a cell spans multiple rows.
segment.target: NVDA naredbe za navigaciju tablicom (control+alt+strelice) bolje funkcioniraju u odreenim Microsoft Word tablicama gdje se elija protee kroz vie redaka.

segment.source: If the Add-ons Manager is already open, activating it again (either from the Tools menu or by opening an add-on file) no longer fails or makes it impossible to close the Add-ons Manager. (#3351)
segment.target: Ako je Upravitelj dodataka ve otvoren, njegovo ponovno aktiviranje (bilo iz izbornika Alati ili otvaranjem datoteke dodataka) vie ne uspijeva ili onemoguuje zatvaranje Upravitelja dodataka. (#3351)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes in certain dialogs when Japanese or Chinese Office 2010 IME is in use. (#3064)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne zamrzava u odreenim dijalokim okvirima kada se koristi japanski ili kineski Office 2010 IME. (#3064)

segment.source: Multiple spaces are no longer compressed to just one space on braille displays. (#1366)
segment.target: Vie razmaka vie se ne komprimira u samo jedan prostor na Brajevom pismu. (#1366)

segment.source: Zend Eclipse PHP Developer Tools now functions the same as Eclipse. (#3353)
segment.target: Zend Eclipse PHP Developer Tools sada funkcionira isto kao i Eclipse. (#3353)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, It is again not necessary to press tab to interact with an embedded object (such as Flash content) after pressing enter on it. (#3364)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru, Opet nije potrebno pritisnuti tabulator za interakciju s ugraenim objektom (kao to je Flash sadraj) nakon to pritisnete enter na njemu. (#3364)

segment.source: When editing text in Microsoft PowerPoint, the last line is no longer reported as the line above, if the final line is blank. (#3403)
segment.target: Prilikom ureivanja teksta u programu Microsoft PowerPoint, zadnji redak vie se ne prijavljuje kao redak iznad, ako je posljednji redak prazan. (#3403)

segment.source: In Microsoft PowerPoint, objects are no longer sometimes spoken twice when you select them or choose to edit them. (#3394)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft PowerPoint objekti se vie ne izgovaraju dvaput kada ih odaberete ili uredite. (#3394)

segment.source: NVDA no longer causes Adobe Reader to crash or freeze for certain badly formed PDF documents containing rows outside of tables. (#3399)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne uzrokuje pad ili zamrzavanje Adobe Readera za odreene loe oblikovane PDF dokumente koji sadre retke izvan tablica. (#3399)

segment.source: NVDA now correctly detects the next slide with focus when deleting a slide in Microsoft PowerPoint's thumbnails view. (#3415)
segment.target: NVDA sada ispravno detektira sljedei slajd s fokusom prilikom brisanja slajda u prikazu sliica programa Microsoft PowerPoint. (#3415)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: windowUtils.findDescendantWindow has been added to search for a descendant window (HWND) matching the specified visibility, control ID and/or class name.
segment.target: windowUtils.findDescendantWindow dodan je za traenje prozora potomka (HWND) koji odgovara navedenoj vidljivosti, ID-u kontrole i/ili nazivu klase.

segment.source: The remote Python console no longer times out after 10 seconds while waiting for input. (#3126)
segment.target: Udaljena Python konzola vie ne istjee nakon 10 sekundi dok eka unos. (#3126)

segment.source: Inclusion of the bisect module in binary builds is deprecated and may be removed in a future release. (#3368)
segment.target: Ukljuivanje bisect modula u binarne verzije je zastarjelo i moe se ukloniti u buduem izdanju. (#3368)

segment.source: Add-ons which depend on bisect (including the urllib2 module) should be updated to include this module.
segment.target: Dodatke koji ovise o bisectu (ukljuujui urllib2 modul) treba aurirati kako bi ukljuili ovaj modul.

segment.source: This release fixes the problem where NVDA crashed when started if configured to use the Irish language, as well as including updates to translations and some other bug fixes.
segment.target: Ovo izdanje rjeava problem zbog kojeg se NVDA sruio prilikom pokretanja ako je konfiguriran za koritenje irskog jezika, kao i auriranja prijevoda i neke druge ispravke greaka.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Correct characters are produced when typing in NVDA's own user interface while using a Korean or Japanese input method while it is the default method. (#2909)
segment.target: Ispravni znakovi se proizvode prilikom tipkanja u NVDA vlastitom korisnikom suelju dok koristite korejsku ili japansku metodu unosa dok je to zadana metoda. (#2909)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, fields marked as containing an invalid entry are now handled correctly. (#3256)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama polja koja su oznaena kao da sadre nevaei unos sada se ispravno obrauju. (#3256)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when started if it is configured to use the Irish language.
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne rui kada se pokrene ako je konfiguriran za koritenje irskog jezika.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include a more intuitive and consistent laptop keyboard layout; basic support for Microsoft PowerPoint; support for long descriptions in web browsers; and support for input of computer braille for braille displays which have a braille keyboard.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju intuitivniji i dosljedniji raspored tipkovnice prijenosnog raunala; osnovna podrka za Microsoft PowerPoint; podrka za duge opise u web preglednicima; i podrka za unos raunalne brajice za brajice koji imaju brajinu tipkovnicu.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Vano

segment.source: New Laptop Keyboard Layout
segment.target: Novi raspored tipkovnice prijenosnog raunala

segment.source: The laptop keyboard layout has been completely redesigned in order to make it more intuitive and consistent.
segment.target: Raspored tipkovnice prijenosnog raunala potpuno je redizajniran kako bi bio intuitivniji i dosljedniji.

segment.source: The new layout uses the arrow keys in combination with the NVDA key and other modifiers for review commands.
segment.target: Novi izgled koristi tipke sa strelicama u kombinaciji s NVDA tipkom i drugim modifikatorima za naredbe za pregled.

segment.source: Please note the following changes to commonly used commands:
segment.target: Obratite panju na sljedee promjene u esto koritenim naredbama:

segment.source: Name |Key
segment.target: Ime |Klju

segment.source: Say all |NVDA+a
segment.target: Reci sve |NVDA+a

segment.source: Read current line |NVDA+l
segment.target: Proitajte trenutni redak |NVDA+l

segment.source: Read current text selection |NVDA+shift+s
segment.target: itanje trenutnog odabira teksta |NVDA+shift+s

segment.source: Report status bar |NVDA+shift+end
segment.target: Traka stanja izvjea |NVDA+shift+kraj

segment.source: In addition, among other changes, all of the object navigation, text review, mouse click and synth settings ring commands have changed.
segment.target: Osim toga, izmeu ostalih promjena, promijenjene su sve naredbe prstena za navigaciju objektima, pregled teksta, klik miem i sintisajzerske postavke.

segment.source: Please see the [Commands Quick Reference](keyCommands.html) document for the new keys.
segment.target: Za nove tipke pogledajte dokument [Commands Quick Reference](keyCommands.html).

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Basic support for editing and reading Microsoft PowerPoint presentations. (#501)
segment.target: Osnovna podrka za ureivanje i itanje Microsoft PowerPoint prezentacija. (#501)

segment.source: Basic support for reading and writing messages in Lotus Notes 8.5. (#543)
segment.target: Osnovna podrka za itanje i pisanje poruka u programu Lotus Notes 8.5. (#543)

segment.source: Support for automatic language switching when reading documents in Microsoft Word. (#2047)
segment.target: Podrka za automatsko prebacivanje jezika prilikom itanja dokumenata u programu Microsoft Word. (#2047)

segment.source: In Browse mode for MSHTML (e.g. Internet Explorer) and Gecko (e.g. Firefox), the existence of long descriptions are now announced. It's also possible to open the long description in a new window by pressing NVDA+d. (#809)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja za MSHTML (npr. Internet Explorer) i Gecko (npr. Firefox), sada je najavljeno postojanje dugih opisa. Takoer je mogue otvoriti dugi opis u novom prozoru pritiskom na NVDA+d. (#809)

segment.source: Notifications in Internet Explorer 9 and above are now spoken (such as content blocking or file downloads). (#2343)
segment.target: Obavijesti u pregledniku Internet Explorer 9 i novijim verzijama sada se izgovaraju (kao to su blokiranje sadraja ili preuzimanja datoteka). (#2343)

segment.source: Automatic reporting of table row and column headers is now supported for browse mode documents in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls. (#778)
segment.target: Automatsko izvjeivanje o zaglavljima redaka i stupaca tablice sada je podrano za dokumente naina pregledavanja u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama. (#778)

segment.source: New language: Aragonese, Irish
segment.target: Novi jezik: aragonski, irski

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Danish grade 2, Korean grade 1. (#2737)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: danski razred 2, korejski razred 1. (#2737)

segment.source: Support for braille displays connected via bluetooth on a computer running the Bluetooth Stack for Windows by Toshiba. (#2419)
segment.target: Podrka za Brailleove zaslone povezane putem bluetootha na raunalu s kojim je pokrenut Bluetooth Stack za Windows tvrtke Toshiba. (#2419)

segment.source: Support for port selection when using Freedom Scientific displays (Automatic, USB or Bluetooth).
segment.target: Podrka za odabir prikljuaka pri koritenju zaslona Freedom Scientific (automatski, USB ili Bluetooth).

segment.source: Support for the BrailleNote family of notetakers from HumanWare when acting as a braille terminal for a screen reader. (#2012)
segment.target: Podrka za BrailleNote obitelj biljenika iz programa HumanWare kada djeluje kao Brailleov terminal za ita zaslona. (#2012)

segment.source: Support for older models of Papenmeier BRAILLEX braille displays. (#2679)
segment.target: Podrka za starije modele Papenmeier BRAILLEX brajevih zaslona. (#2679)

segment.source: Support for input of computer braille for braille displays which have a braille keyboard. (#808)
segment.target: Podrka za unos raunalne brajice za brajice koji imaju brajinu tipkovnicu. (#808)

segment.source: New keyboard settings that allow the choice for whether NVDA should interrupt speech for typed characters and/or the Enter key. (#698)
segment.target: Nove postavke tipkovnice koje omoguuju odabir hoe li NVDA prekinuti govor za upisane znakove i/ili tipku Enter. (#698)

segment.source: Support for several browsers based on Google Chrome: Rockmelt, BlackHawk, Comodo Dragon and SRWare Iron. (#2236, #2813, #2814, #2815)
segment.target: Podrka za nekoliko preglednika temeljenih na Google Chromeu: Rockmelt, BlackHawk, Comodo Dragon i SRWare Iron. (#2236, #2813, #2814, #2815)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.5.2. (#2737)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajevog pisma liblouis na 2.5.2. (#2737)

segment.source: The laptop keyboard layout has been completely redesigned in order to make it more intuitive and consistent. (#804)
segment.target: Raspored tipkovnice prijenosnog raunala potpuno je redizajniran kako bi bio intuitivniji i dosljedniji. (#804)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak speech synthesizer to 1.47.11. (#2680, #3124, #3132, #3141, #3143, #3172)
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak sintisajzer govora na 1.47.11. (#2680, #3124, #3132, #3141, #3143, #3172)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: The quick navigation keys for jumping to the next or previous separator in Browse Mode now work in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls. (#2781)
segment.target: Tipke za brzu navigaciju za prelazak na sljedei ili prethodni razdjelnik u nainu pregledavanja sada funkcioniraju u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama. (#2781)

segment.source: If NVDA falls back to eSpeak or no speech due to the configured speech synthesizer failing when NVDA starts, the configured choice is no longer automatically set to the fallback synthesizer. This means that now, the original synthesizer will be tried again next time NVDA starts. (#2589)
segment.target: Ako se NVDA vrati na eSpeak ili nema govora zbog neuspjeha konfiguriranog sintisajzera govora kada se NVDA pokrene, konfigurirani izbor vie se ne postavlja automatski na rezervni sintisajzer. To znai da e se sada originalni sintisajzer ponovno isprobati sljedei put kada NVDA pokrene. (#2589)

segment.source: If NVDA falls back to no braille due to the configured braille display failing when NVDA starts, the configured display is no longer automatically set to no braille. This means that now, the original display will be tried again next time NVDA starts. (#2264)
segment.target: Ako NVDA padne na brak brajice zbog neuspjeha konfiguriranog prikaza brajice kada se NVDA pokrene, konfigurirani zaslon vie nije automatski postavljen na bez brajice. To znai da e se sada originalni zaslon ponovno pokuati sljedei put kada NVDA pokrene. (#2264)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla applications, updates to tables are now rendered correctly. For example, in updated cells, row and column coordinates are reported and table navigation works as it should. (#2784)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u Mozillinim aplikacijama, auriranja tablica sada se ispravno prikazuju. Na primjer, u auriranim elijama izvjetavaju se koordinate redaka i stupaca, a navigacija tablicom funkcionira kako treba. (#2784)

segment.source: In browse mode in web browsers, certain clickable unlabelled graphics which weren't previously rendered are now rendered correctly. (#2838)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u web-preglednicima, odreene neoznaene grafike koje se mogu kliknuti, a koje prethodno nisu bile prikazane, sada se ispravno prikazuju. (#2838)

segment.source: Earlier and newer versions of SecureCRT are now supported. (#2800)
segment.target: Sada su podrane starije i novije verzije SecureCRT-a. (#2800)

segment.source: For input methods such as Easy Dots IME under XP, the reading string is now correctly reported.
segment.target: Za metode unosa kao to je Easy Dots IME pod XP-om, niz za itanje sada se ispravno prijavljuje.

segment.source: The candidate list in the Chinese Simplified Microsoft Pinyin input method under Windows 7 is now correctly read when changing pages with left and right arrow, and when first opening it with Home.
segment.target: Popis kandidata u kineskoj pojednostavljenoj metodi unosa Microsoft Pinyin u sustavu Windows 7 sada se ispravno ita prilikom mijenjanja stranica strelicom lijevo i desno te prilikom prvog otvaranja pomou poetne stranice.

segment.source: When custom symbol pronunciation information is saved, the advanced "preserve" field is no longer removed. (#2852)
segment.target: Kada se spremaju podaci o izgovoru prilagoenih simbola, napredno polje "sauvaj" vie se ne uklanja. (#2852)

segment.source: When disabling automatic checking for updates, NVDA no longer has to be restarted in order for the change to fully take effect.
segment.target: Kada onemoguite automatsku provjeru auriranja, NVDA se vie ne mora ponovno pokretati kako bi promjena u potpunosti stupila na snagu.

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to start if an add-on cannot be removed due to its directory currently being in use by another application. (#2860)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne pokree ako se dodatak ne moe ukloniti jer njegov direktorij trenutno koristi druga aplikacija. (#2860)

segment.source: Tab labels in DropBox's preferences dialog can now be seen with Flat Review.
segment.target: Oznake kartica u dijalokom okviru postavki DropBoxa sada se mogu vidjeti s ravnim pregledom.

segment.source: If the input language is changed to something other than the default, NVDA now detects keys correctly for commands and input help mode.
segment.target: Ako se jezik unosa promijeni u neto drugo osim zadanog, NVDA sada ispravno detektira tipke za naredbe i nain pomoi za unos.

segment.source: For languages such as German where the + (plus) sign is a single key on the keyboard, it is now possible to bind commands to it by using the word "plus". (#2898)
segment.target: Za jezike kao to je njemaki gdje je znak + (plus) jedna tipka na tipkovnici, sada je mogue povezati naredbe s njim pomou rijei "plus". (#2898)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, block quotes are now reported where appropriate. (#2888)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama blokirani navodnici sada se prijavljuju gdje je to prikladno. (#2888)

segment.source: The HumanWare Brailliant BI/B series braille display driver can now be selected when the display is connected via Bluetooth but has never been connected via USB.
segment.target: Upravljaki program za brajicu serije HumanWare Brailliant BI/B sada se moe odabrati kada je zaslon povezan putem Bluetootha, ali nikada nije bio povezan putem USB-a.

segment.source: Filtering elements in the Browse Mode Elements list with uppercase filter text now returns case-insensitive results just like lowercase rather than nothing at all. (#2951)
segment.target: Filtriranje elemenata na popisu elemenata naina pregledavanja s velikim slovima tekstom filtra sada vraa rezultate bez razlikovanja velikih i malih slova, kao i malih slova, a ne nita. (#2951)

segment.source: In Mozilla browsers, browse mode can again be used when Flash content is focused. (#2546)
segment.target: U Mozillinim preglednicima, nain pregledavanja moe se ponovno koristiti kada je Flash sadraj fokusiran. (#2546)

segment.source: When using a contracted braille table and expand to computer braille for the word at the cursor is enabled, the braille cursor is now positioned correctly when located after a word wherein a character is represented by multiple braille cells (e.g. capital sign, letter sign, number sign, etc.). (#2947)
segment.target: Kada koristite skraenu tablicu brajice i proirite na raunalnu brajicu za rije na pokazivau, pokaziva brajice sada je ispravno postavljen kada se nalazi iza rijei u kojoj je znak predstavljen s vie elija brajice (npr. velikim znakom, slovnim znakom, brojanim znakom itd.). (#2947)

segment.source: Text selection is now correctly shown on a braille display in applications such as Microsoft word 2003 and Internet Explorer edit controls.
segment.target: Odabir teksta sada se ispravno prikazuje na brajicinom jeziku u aplikacijama kao to su Microsoft Word 2003 i kontrole za ureivanje preglednika Internet Explorer.

segment.source: It is again possible to select text in a backward direction in Microsoft Word while Braille is enabled.
segment.target: Ponovno je mogue odabrati tekst u smjeru unatrag u programu Microsoft Word dok je Brailleovo pismo omogueno.

segment.source: When reviewing, backspacing or deleting characters In Scintilla edit controls, NVDA correctly announces multibyte characters. (#2855)
segment.target: Prilikom pregleda, razmaka ili brisanja znakova U kontrolama za ureivanje Scintilla, NVDA ispravno najavljuje viebajtne znakove. (#2855)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to install when the user's profile path contains certain multibyte characters. (#2729)
segment.target: NVDA se vie nee uspjeti instalirati ako put korisnikog profila sadri odreene viebajtne znakove. (#2729)

segment.source: Reporting of groups for List View controls (SysListview32) in 64-bit applications no longer causes an error.
segment.target: Izvjeivanje o grupama za kontrole prikaza popisa (SysListview32) u 64-bitnim aplikacijama vie ne uzrokuje pogreku.

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla applications, text content is no longer incorrectly treated as editable in some rare cases. (#2959)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u Mozillinim aplikacijama, tekstualni sadraj se u nekim rijetkim sluajevima vie ne tretira pogreno kao da se moe ureivati. (#2959)

segment.source: In IBM Lotus Symphony and OpenOffice, moving the caret now moves the review cursor if appropriate.
segment.target: U IBM Lotus Symphony i OpenOffice, pomicanje kursora sada pomie kursor pregleda ako je prikladno.

segment.source: Adobe Flash content is now accessible in Internet Explorer in Windows 8. (#2454)
segment.target: Adobe Flash sadraj sada je dostupan u pregledniku Internet Explorer u sustavu Windows 8. (#2454)

segment.source: Fixed Bluetooth support for Papenmeier Braillex Trio. (#2995)
segment.target: Fiksna Bluetooth podrka za Papenmeier Braillex Trio. (#2995)

segment.source: Fixed inability to use certain Microsoft Speech API version 5 voices such as Koba Speech 2 voices. (#2629)
segment.target: Ispravljena je nemogunost koritenja odreenih glasova Microsoft Speech API-ja verzije 5 kao to su glasovi Koba Speech 2. (#2629)

segment.source: In applications using the Java Access Bridge, braille displays are now updated correctly when the caret moves in editable text fields . (#3107)
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste Java Access Bridge, brajievi se zasloni sada ispravno auriraju kada se kursor pomie u tekstnim poljima koja se mogu ureivati. (#3107)

segment.source: Support the form landmark in browse mode documents that support landmarks. (#2997)
segment.target: Podravajte orijentir obrasca u dokumentima naina pregledavanja koji podravaju orijentir. (#2997)

segment.source: The eSpeak synthesizer driver now handles reading by character more appropriately (e.g. announcing a foreign letter's name or value rather than just its sound or generic name). (#3106)
segment.target: Upravljaki program eSpeak sintesajzera sada prikladnije obrauje itanje po znakovima (npr. najavljuje naziv ili vrijednost stranog slova, a ne samo njegov zvuk ili generiki naziv). (#3106)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to copy user settings for use on logon and other secure screens when the user's profile path contains non-ASCII characters. (#3092)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne uspijeva kopirati korisnike postavke za koritenje na zaslonima za prijavu i drugim sigurnim zaslonima kada put korisnikog profila sadri znakove koji nisu ASCII. (#3092)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes when using Asian character input in some .NET applications. (#3005)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne zamrzava kada se koristi unos azijskih znakova u nekim .NET aplikacijama. (#3005)

segment.source: it is now possible to use browse mode for pages in Internet Explorer 10 when in standards mode; e.g. [www.gmail.com](http://www.gmail.com) login page. (#3151)
segment.target: sada je mogue koristiti nain pregledavanja za stranice u pregledniku Internet Explorer 10 kada je u standardnom nainu rada; npr. [www.gmail.com](http://www.gmail.com) stranica za prijavu. (#3151)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Braille display drivers can now support manual port selection. (#426)
segment.target: Upravljaki programi Brailleovog zaslona sada mogu podravati runi odabir porta. (#426)

segment.source: This is most useful for braille displays which support connection via a legacy serial port.
segment.target: Ovo je najkorisnije za Brailleove zaslone koji podravaju povezivanje putem naslijeenog serijskog prikljuka.

segment.source: This is done using the getPossiblePorts class method on the BrailleDisplayDriver class.
segment.target: To se radi pomou metode klase getPossiblePorts na klasi BrailleDisplayDriver.

segment.source: Braille input from braille keyboards is now supported. (#808)
segment.target: Sada je podran unos brajice s tipkovnica za brajicu. (#808)

segment.source: Braille input is encompassed by the brailleInput.BrailleInputGesture class or a subclass thereof.
segment.target: Brailleov unos obuhvaen je klasom brailleInput.BrailleInputGesture ili njezinom podklasom.

segment.source: Subclasses of braille.BrailleDisplayGesture (as implemented in braille display drivers) can also inherit from brailleInput.BrailleInputGesture. This allows display commands and braille input to be handled by the same gesture class.
segment.target: Podklase Brailleovog pisma. BrailleDisplayGesture (kao to je implementirano u upravljakim programima za Brailleov zaslon) takoer moe naslijediti od brailleInput.BrailleInputGesture. To omoguuje da naredbe za prikaz i unos brajice upravlja istom klasom gesta.

segment.source: You can now use comHelper.getActiveObject to get an active COM object from a normal process when NVDA is running with the UIAccess privilege. (#2483)
segment.target: Sada moete koristiti comHelper.getActiveObject za dobivanje aktivnog COM objekta iz normalnog procesa kada je NVDA pokrenut s privilegijom UIAccess. (#2483)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for Asian character input; experimental support for touch screens on Windows 8; reporting of page numbers and improved support for tables in Adobe Reader; table navigation commands in focused table rows and Windows list-view controls; support for several more braille displays; and reporting of row and column headers in Microsoft Excel.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja ukljuuju podrku za unos azijskih znakova; eksperimentalna podrka za zaslone osjetljive na dodir u sustavu Windows 8; izvjetavanje o brojevima stranica i poboljana podrka za tablice u Adobe Readeru; naredbe za navigaciju tablicom u fokusiranim retcima tablice i kontrolama prikaza popisa u sustavu Windows; podrka za jo nekoliko Brailleovih zaslona; i izvjeivanje o zaglavljima redaka i stupaca u programu Microsoft Excel.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: NVDA can now support Asian character input using IME and text service input methods in all applications, Including:
segment.target: NVDA sada moe podravati unos azijskih znakova pomou IME-a i metoda unosa tekstualnih usluga u svim aplikacijama, ukljuujui:

segment.source: Reporting and navigation of candidate lists;
segment.target: Izvjeivanje i navigacija popisima predloenih kandidata;

segment.source: Reporting and navigation of composition strings; and
segment.target: Izvjeivanje i navigacija nizovima sastava; i

segment.source: Reporting of reading strings.
segment.target: Izvjetavanje o itanju nizova.

segment.source: The presence of underline and strikethrough is now reported in Adobe Reader documents. (#2410)
segment.target: Prisutnost podcrtavanja i precrtavanja sada je prijavljena u dokumentima Adobe Readera. (#2410)

segment.source: When the Windows Sticky Keys function is enabled, the NVDA modifier key will now behave like other modifier keys. This allows you to use the NVDA modifier key without needing to hold it down while you press other keys. (#230)
segment.target: Kada je omoguena funkcija Windows Sticky Keys, NVDA modifikacijska tipka sada e se ponaati kao i druge modifikacijske tipke. To vam omoguuje koritenje NVDA modifikatorske tipke bez potrebe da je drite pritisnutom dok pritiete druge tipke. (#230)

segment.source: Automatic reporting of column and row headers is now supported in Microsoft Excel. Press NVDA+shift+c to set the row containing column headers and NVDA+shift+r to set the column containing row headers. Press either command twice in quick succession to clear the setting. (#1519)
segment.target: Automatsko izvjeivanje o zaglavljima stupaca i redaka sada je podrano u programu Microsoft Excel. Pritisnite NVDA+shift+c za postavljanje retka koji sadri zaglavlja stupaca i NVDA+shift+r za postavljanje stupca koji sadri zaglavlja redaka. Pritisnite bilo koju naredbu dva puta uzastopno da biste izbrisali postavku. (#1519)

segment.source: Support for HIMS Braille Sense, Braille EDGE and SyncBraille braille displays. (#1266, #1267)
segment.target: Podrka za HIMS Braille Sense, Braille EDGE i SyncBraille Braille zaslone. (#1266, #1267)

segment.source: When Windows 8 Toast notifications appear, NVDA will report them if reporting of help balloons is enabled. (#2143)
segment.target: Kada se pojave obavijesti o zdravlju sustava Windows 8, NVDA e ih prijaviti ako je omogueno izvjetavanje o baloniima pomoi. (#2143)

segment.source: Experimental support for Touch screens on Windows 8, including:
segment.target: Eksperimentalna podrka za zaslone osjetljive na dodir u sustavu Windows 8, ukljuujui:

segment.source: Reading text directly under your finger while moving it around
segment.target: itanje teksta izravno ispod prsta dok ga pomiete

segment.source: Many gestures for performing object navigation, text review, and other NVDA commands.
segment.target: Mnoge geste za navigaciju objektima, pregled teksta i druge NVDA naredbe.

segment.source: Support for VIP Mud. (#1728)
segment.target: Podrka za VIP Mud. (#1728)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, if a table has a summary, it is now presented. (#2465)
segment.target: U programu Adobe Reader, ako tablica ima saetak, on se sada prikazuje. (#2465)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, table row and column headers can now be reported. (#2193, #2527, #2528)
segment.target: U programu Adobe Reader sada se mogu prijaviti zaglavlja redaka i stupaca tablice. (#2193, #2527, #2528)

segment.source: New languages: Amharic, Korean, Nepali, Slovenian.
segment.target: Novi jezici: amharski, korejski, nepalski, slovenski.

segment.source: NVDA can now read auto complete suggestions when entering email addresses in Microsoft Outlook 2007. (#689)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe itati prijedloge za automatsko dovravanje prilikom unosa e-mail adresa u Microsoft Outlook 2007. (#689)

segment.source: New eSpeak voice variants: Gene, Gene2. (#2512)
segment.target: Nove eSpeak glasovne varijante: Gene, Gene2. (#2512)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, page numbers can now be reported. (#2534)
segment.target: U programu Adobe Reader sada se mogu prijaviti brojevi stranica. (#2534)

segment.source: In Reader XI, page labels are reported where present, reflecting changes to page numbering in different sections, etc. In earlier versions, this is not possible and only sequential page numbers are reported.
