segment.target: U Readeru XI, oznake stranica se prijavljuju tamo gdje postoje, odraavajui promjene u numeriranju stranica u razliitim odjeljcima itd. U ranijim verzijama to nije bilo mogue i prijavljuju se samo uzastopni brojevi stranica.

segment.source: It is now possible to reset NVDA's configuration to factory defaults either by pressing NVDA+control+r three times quickly or by choosing Reset to Factory Defaults from the NVDA menu. (#2086)
segment.target: Sada je mogue vratiti NVDA konfiguraciju na tvornike postavke ili brzim pritiskom na NVDA+control+r tri puta ili odabirom Vrati na tvornike postavke iz NVDA izbornika. (#2086)

segment.source: Support for the Seika Version 3, 4 and 5 and Seika80 braille displays from Nippon Telesoft. (#2452)
segment.target: Podrka za Seika verzije 3, 4 i 5 i Seika80 brajice iz Nippon Telesofta. (#2452)

segment.source: The first and last top routing buttons on Freedom Scientific PAC Mate and Focus Braille displays can now be used to scroll backward and forward. (#2556)
segment.target: Prvi i posljednji gornji gumbi za usmjeravanje na Freedom Scientific PAC Mate i Focus Brailleovom pismu sada se mogu koristiti za pomicanje unatrag i natrag. (#2556)

segment.source: Many more features are supported on Freedom Scientific Focus Braille displays such as advance bars, rocker bars and certain dot combinations for common actions. (#2516)
segment.target: Na zaslonima brajice Freedom Scientific Focus podrane su mnoge druge znaajke, kao to su napredne trake, preklopne trake i odreene kombinacije toaka za uobiajene radnje. (#2516)

segment.source: In applications using IAccessible2 such as Mozilla applications, table row and column headers can now be reported outside of browse mode. (#926)
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste IAccessible2, kao to su Mozilline aplikacije, zaglavlja redaka i stupaca tablice sada se mogu prijaviti izvan naina pregledavanja. (#926)

segment.source: Preliminary support for the document control in Microsoft Word 2013. (#2543)
segment.target: Preliminarna podrka za kontrolu dokumenata u programu Microsoft Word 2013. (#2543)

segment.source: Text alignment can now be reported in applications using IAccessible2 such as Mozilla applications. (#2612)
segment.target: Poravnanje teksta sada se moe prijaviti u aplikacijama koje koriste IAccessible2 kao to su Mozilla aplikacije. (#2612)

segment.source: When a table row or standard Windows list-view control with multiple columns is focused, you can now use the table navigation commands to access individual cells. (#828)
segment.target: Kada je redak tablice ili standardna kontrola prikaza popisa sustava Windows s vie stupaca usredotoena, sada moete koristiti naredbe za navigaciju tablicom za pristup pojedinanim elijama. (#828)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Estonian grade 0, Portuguese 8 dot computer braille, Italian 6 dot computer braille. (#2319, #2662)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: estonski razred 0, portugalski raunalni braille s 8 toaka, talijanski raunalni braille sa 6 toaka. (#2319, #2662)

segment.source: If NVDA is installed on the system, directly opening an NVDA add-on package (e.g. from Windows Explorer or after downloading in a web browser) will install it into NVDA. (#2306)
segment.target: Ako je NVDA instaliran na sustavu, izravno otvaranje NVDA dodatnog paketa (npr. iz Windows Explorera ili nakon preuzimanja u web pregledniku) instalirat e ga u NVDA. (#2306)

segment.source: Support for newer models of Papenmeier BRAILLEX braille displays. (#1265)
segment.target: Podrka za novije modele Papenmeier BRAILLEX brajevih zaslona. (#1265)

segment.source: Position information (e.g. 1 of 4) is now reported for Windows Explorer list items on Windows 7 and above. This also includes any UIAutomation controls that support the itemIndex and itemCount custom properties. (#2643)
segment.target: Informacije o poloaju (npr. 1 od 4) sada se prijavljuju za stavke popisa Windows Explorera u sustavu Windows 7 i novijim verzijama. To takoer ukljuuje sve kontrole UIAutomation koje podravaju prilagoena svojstva itemIndex i itemCount. (#2643)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: In the NVDA Review Cursor preferences dialog, the Follow keyboard focus option has been renamed to Follow system focus for consistency with terminology used elsewhere in NVDA.
segment.target: U dijalokom okviru Postavke NVDA pregleda kursor, opcija Prati fokus tipkovnice preimenovana je u Prati fokus sustava radi dosljednosti s terminologijom koja se koristi drugdje u NVDA.

segment.source: When braille is tethered to review and the cursor is on an object which is not a text object (e.g. an editable text field), cursor routing keys will now activate the object. (#2386)
segment.target: Kada je brajica vezana za pregled, a pokaziva je na objektu koji nije tekstni objekt (npr. tekstno polje koje se moe ureivati), tipke za usmjeravanje pokazivaa sada e aktivirati objekt. (#2386)

segment.source: The Save Settings On Exit option is now on by default for new configurations.
segment.target: Opcija Spremi postavke pri izlasku sada je ukljuena prema zadanim postavkama za nove konfiguracije.

segment.source: When updating a previously installed copy of NVDA, the desktop shortcut key is no longer forced back to control+alt+n if it was manually changed to something different by the user. (#2572)
segment.target: Prilikom auriranja prethodno instalirane kopije NVDA-a, tipka preaca na radnoj povrini vie se ne vraa na control+alt+n ako ju je korisnik runo promijenio u neto drugo. (#2572)

segment.source: The add-ons list in the Add-ons Manager now shows the package name before its status. (#2548)
segment.target: Popis dodataka u Upravitelju dodataka sada prikazuje naziv paketa prije njegovog statusa. (#2548)

segment.source: If installing the same or another version of a currently installed add-on, NVDA will ask if you wish to update the add-on, rather than just showing an error and aborting installation. (#2501)
segment.target: Ako instalirate istu ili drugu verziju trenutno instaliranog dodatka, NVDA e vas pitati elite li aurirati dodatak, umjesto da samo prikae pogreku i prekine instalaciju. (#2501)

segment.source: Object navigation commands (except the report current object command) now report with less verbosity. You can still obtain the extra information by using the report current object command. (#2560)
segment.target: Naredbe za navigaciju objektima (osim naredbe za prijavu trenutnog objekta) sada izvjeuju s manje opirnosti. Dodatne informacije i dalje moete dobiti pomou naredbe za prijavu trenutnog objekta. (#2560)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.5.1. (#2319, #2480, #2662, #2672)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajevog pisma liblouis na 2.5.1. (#2319, #2480, #2662, #2672)

segment.source: The NVDA Key Commands Quick Reference document has been renamed to Commands Quick Reference, as it now includes touch commands as well as keyboard commands.
segment.target: Dokument Brza referenca NVDA naredbi za tipke preimenovan je u Brza referenca naredbi jer sada ukljuuje naredbe na dodir i tipkovnice.

segment.source: The Elements list in Browse mode will now remember the last element type shown (e.g. links, headings or landmarks) each time the dialog is shown within the same session of NVDA. (#365)
segment.target: Popis elemenata u nainu pregledavanja sada e zapamtiti posljednju prikazanu vrstu elementa (npr. poveznice, naslove ili orijentire) svaki put kada se dijaloki okvir prikae unutar iste NVDA sesije. (#365)

segment.source: Most Metro apps in Windows 8 (e.g. Mail, Calendar) no longer activate Browse Mode for the entire app.
segment.target: Veina Metro aplikacija u sustavu Windows 8 (npr. Pota, Kalendar) vie ne aktivira nain pregledavanja za cijelu aplikaciju.

segment.source: Updated Handy Tech BrailleDriver COM-Server to 1.4.2.0.
segment.target: Auriran Handy Tech BrailleDriver COM-Server na 1.4.2.0.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: In Windows Vista and later, NVDA no longer incorrectly treats the Windows key as being held down when unlocking Windows after locking it by pressing Windows+l. (#1856)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows Vista i novijim verzijama, NVDA vie ne tretira pogreno tipku Windows kao pritisnutu prilikom otkljuavanja sustava Windows nakon to je zakljua pritiskom na Windows+l. (#1856)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, row headers are now correctly recognised as table cells; i.e. coordinates are reported and they can be accessed using table navigation commands. (#2444)
segment.target: U programu Adobe Reader zaglavlja redaka sada se ispravno prepoznaju kao elije tablice; tj. koordinate se prijavljuju i moe im se pristupiti pomou naredbi za navigaciju u tablici. (#2444)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, table cells spanning more than one column and/or row are now handled correctly. (#2437, #2438, #2450)
segment.target: U programu Adobe Reader, elije tablice koje obuhvaaju vie od jednog stupca i/ili retka sada se obrauju ispravno. (#2437, #2438, #2450)

segment.source: The NVDA distribution package now checks its integrity before executing. (#2475)
segment.target: NVDA distribucijski paket sada provjerava svoj integritet prije izvoenja. (#2475)

segment.source: Temporary download files are now removed if downloading of an NVDA update fails. (#2477)
segment.target: Privremene datoteke za preuzimanje sada se uklanjaju ako preuzimanje NVDA auriranja ne uspije. (#2477)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer freeze when it is running as an administrator while copying the user configuration to the system configuration (for use on Windows logon and other secure screens). (#2485)
segment.target: NVDA se vie nee zamrzavati kada je pokrenut kao administrator dok kopira korisniku konfiguraciju u konfiguraciju sustava (za koritenje na Windows logiranju i drugim sigurnim zaslonima). (#2485)

segment.source: Tiles on the Windows 8 Start Screen are now presented better in speech and braille. The name is no longer repeated, unselected is no longer reported on all tiles, and live status information is presented as the description of the tile (e.g. current temperature for the Weather tile).
segment.target: Ploice na poetnom zaslonu sustava Windows 8 sada su bolje prikazane u govoru i Brailleovom pismu. Naziv se vie ne ponavlja, neodabrano se vie ne prijavljuje na svim ploicama, a informacije o statusu uivo prikazuju se kao opis ploice (npr. trenutna temperatura za ploicu Vrijeme).

segment.source: Passwords are no longer announced when reading password fields in Microsoft Outlook and other standard edit controls that are marked as protected. (#2021)
segment.target: Lozinke se vie ne najavljuju prilikom itanja polja lozinki u programu Microsoft Outlook i drugim standardnim kontrolama za ureivanje koje su oznaene kao zatiene. (#2021)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, changes to form fields are now correctly reflected in browse mode. (#2529)
segment.target: U programu Adobe Reader promjene polja obrasca sada se ispravno odraavaju u nainu pregledavanja. (#2529)

segment.source: Improvements to support for the Microsoft Word Spell Checker, including more accurate reading of the current spelling error, and the ability to support the spell checker when running an Installed copy of NVDA on Windows Vista or higher.
segment.target: Poboljanja podrke za Microsoft Word provjeru pravopisa, ukljuujui tonije itanje trenutne pravopisne pogreke i mogunost podrke za provjeru pravopisa prilikom pokretanja instalirane kopije NVDA ureaja u sustavu Windows Vista ili novijim.

segment.source: Add-ons which include files containing non-English characters can now be installed correctly in most cases. (#2505)
segment.target: Dodaci koji sadre datoteke koje sadre znakove koji nisu na engleskom jeziku sada se mogu ispravno instalirati u veini sluajeva. (#2505)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, the language of text is no longer lost when it is updated or scrolled to. (#2544)
segment.target: U programu Adobe Reader jezik teksta vie se ne gubi kada se aurira ili pomie u. (#2544)

segment.source: When installing an add-on, the confirmation dialog now correctly shows the localized name of the add-on if available. (#2422)
segment.target: Prilikom instaliranja dodatka, dijaloki okvir za potvrdu sada ispravno prikazuje lokalizirani naziv dodatka ako je dostupan. (#2422)

segment.source: In applications using UI Automation (such as .net and Silverlight applications), the calculation of numeric values for controls such as sliders has been corrected. (#2417)
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste automatizaciju korisnikog suelja (kao to su .net i Silverlight aplikacije) ispravljen je izraun numerikih vrijednosti za kontrole kao to su klizai. (#2417)

segment.source: The configuration for reporting of progress bars is now honoured for the indeterminate progress bars displayed by NVDA when installing, creating a portable copy, etc. (#2574)
segment.target: Konfiguracija za izvjetavanje o trakama napretka sada se potuje za neodreene trake napretka koje NVDA prikazuje prilikom instalacije, stvaranja prijenosne kopije itd. (#2574)

segment.source: NVDA commands can no longer be executed from a braille display while a secure Windows screen (such as the Lock screen) is active. (#2449)
segment.target: NVDA naredbe vie se ne mogu izvravati s Brailleovog pisma dok je aktivan siguran zaslon sustava Windows (kao to je zakljuani zaslon). (#2449)

segment.source: In browse mode, braille is now updated if the text being displayed changes. (#2074)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, Brailleovo pismo se sada aurira ako se tekst koji se prikazuje promijeni. (#2074)

segment.source: When on a secure Windows screen such as the Lock screen, messages from applications speaking or displaying braille directly via NVDA are now ignored.
segment.target: Kada su na sigurnom Windows zaslonu kao to je zakljuani zaslon, poruke iz aplikacija koje govore ili prikazuju Brailleovo pismo izravno putem NVDA sada se zanemaruju.

segment.source: In Browse mode, it is no longer possible to fall off the bottom of the document with the right arrow key when on the final character, or by jumping to the end of a container when that container is the last item in the document. (#2463)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja vie nije mogue pasti s dna dokumenta tipkom sa strelicom udesno kada ste na zavrnom znaku ili skokom na kraj spremnika kada je taj spremnik posljednja stavka u dokumentu. (#2463)

segment.source: Extraneous content is no longer incorrectly included when reporting the text of dialogs in web applications (specifically, ARIA dialogs with no aria-describedby attribute). (#2390)
segment.target: Vanjski sadraj vie nije pogreno ukljuen prilikom prijavljivanja teksta dijalokih okvira u web aplikacijama (tonije, ARIA dijalozi bez atributa aria-describedby). (#2390)

segment.source: NVDA no longer incorrectly reports or locates certain edit fields in MSHTML documents (e.g. Internet Explorer), specifically where an explicit ARIA role has been used by the web page author. (#2435)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izvjetava ili locira odreena polja za ureivanje u MSHTML dokumentima (npr. Internet Explorer), posebno tamo gdje je autor web stranice koristio eksplicitnu ARIA ulogu. (#2435)

segment.source: The backspace key is now handled correctly when speaking typed words in Windows command consoles. (#2586)
segment.target: Tipka backspace sada se ispravno obrauje prilikom izgovaranja upisanih rijei u naredbenim konzolama sustava Windows. (#2586)

segment.source: Cell coordinates in Microsoft Excel are now shown again in Braille.
segment.target: Koordinate elija u programu Microsoft Excel sada se ponovno prikazuju na Brailleovom pismu.

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA no longer leaves you stuck on a paragraph with list formatting when trying to navigate out over a bullet or number with left arrow or control + left arrow. (#2402)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word NVDA vas vie ne ostavlja zaglavljenim na odlomku s oblikovanjem popisa kada pokuavate prijei preko grafike oznake ili broja sa strelicom ulijevo ili kontrolom + strelicom ulijevo. (#2402)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla applications, the items in certain list boxes (specifically, ARIA list boxes) are no longer incorrectly rendered.
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u Mozillinim aplikacijama, stavke u odreenim okvirima popisa (tonije, ARIA okviri popisa) vie se ne prikazuju pogreno.

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla applications, certain controls that were rendered with an incorrect label or just whitespace are now rendered with the correct label.
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u Mozillinim aplikacijama, odreene kontrole koje su prikazane s netonom oznakom ili samo razmakom sada se prikazuju s ispravnom oznakom.

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla applications, some extraneous whitespace has been eliminated.
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u Mozillinim aplikacijama, uklonjen je neki suvini razmak.

segment.source: In browse mode in web browsers, certain graphics that are explicitly marked as presentational (specifically, with an alt="" attribute) are now correctly ignored.
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u web preglednicima, odreene grafike koje su eksplicitno oznaene kao prezentacijske (tonije, s atributom alt="") sada se ispravno zanemaruju.

segment.source: In web browsers, NVDA now hides content which is marked as hidden from screen readers (specifically, using the aria-hidden attribute). (#2117)
segment.target: U web preglednicima, NVDA sada skriva sadraj koji je oznaen kao skriven od itaa zaslona (tonije, koristei atribut aria-hidhid). (#2117)

segment.source: Negative currency amounts (e.g. -$123) are now correctly spoken as negative, regardless of symbol level. (#2625)
segment.target: Negativni iznosi valute (npr. -123 USD) sada se ispravno izgovaraju kao negativni, bez obzira na razinu simbola. (#2625)

segment.source: During say all, NVDA will no longer incorrectly revert to the default language where a line does not end a sentence. (#2630)
segment.target: Tijekom reci sve, NVDA se vie nee pogreno vraati na zadani jezik gdje redak ne zavrava reenicu. (#2630)

segment.source: Font information is now correctly detected in Adobe Reader 10.1 and later. (#2175)
segment.target: Informacije o fontu sada su ispravno otkrivene u programu Adobe Reader 10.1 i novijim verzijama. (#2175)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, if alternate text is provided, only that text will be rendered. Previously, extraneous text was sometimes included. (#2174)
segment.target: U programu Adobe Reader, ako je dostupan zamjenski tekst, prikazat e se samo taj tekst. Prije je ponekad bio ukljuen strani tekst. (#2174)

segment.source: Where a document contains an application, the content of the application is no longer included in browse mode. This prevents unexpectedly moving inside the application when navigating. You can interact with the application in the same way as for embedded objects. (#990)
segment.target: Ako dokument sadri aplikaciju, sadraj aplikacije vie nije ukljuen u nain pregledavanja. To sprjeava neoekivano kretanje unutar aplikacije tijekom navigacije. S aplikacijom moete komunicirati na isti nain kao i s ugraenim objektima. (#990)

segment.source: In Mozilla applications, the value of spin buttons is now correctly reported when it changes. (#2653)
segment.target: U Mozillinim aplikacijama, vrijednost gumba za okretanje sada se ispravno izvjetava kada se promijeni. (#2653)

segment.source: Updated support for Adobe Digital Editions so that it works in version 2.0. (#2688)
segment.target: Aurirana podrka za Adobe Digital Editions tako da radi u verziji 2.0. (#2688)

segment.source: Pressing NVDA+upArrow while on a combo box in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML documents will no longer incorrectly read all items. Rather, just the active item will be read. (#2337)
segment.target: Pritiskom na NVDA+strelica prema gore dok ste na kombiniranom okviru u Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML dokumentima vie neete pogreno itati sve stavke. Umjesto toga, proitat e se samo aktivna stavka. (#2337)

segment.source: Speech dictionaries will now properly save when using a number (#) sign within the pattern or replacement fields. (#961)
segment.target: Govorni rjenici sada e se ispravno spremati kada se koristi znak broja (#) unutar uzorka ili zamjenskih polja. (#961)

segment.source: Browse mode for MSHTML documents (e.g. Internet Explorer) now correctly displays visible content contained within hidden content (specifically, elements with a style of visibility:visible inside an element with style visibility:hidden). (#2097)
segment.target: Nain pregledavanja za MSHTML dokumente (npr. Internet Explorer) sada ispravno prikazuje vidljivi sadraj sadran u skrivenom sadraju (tonije, elemente sa stilom vidljivost:vidljivo unutar elementa sa stilom vidljivost:skriveno). (#2097)

segment.source: Links in Windows XP's Security Center no longer report random junk after their names. (#1331)
segment.target: Veze u centru za sigurnost sustava Windows XP vie ne prijavljuju nasumino neeljeno izdanje iza imena. (#1331)

segment.source: UI Automation text controls (e.g. the search field in the Windows 7 Start Menu) are now correctly announced when moving the mouse over them rather than staying silent.
segment.target: Kontrole teksta za automatizaciju korisnikog suelja (npr. polje za pretraivanje u izborniku Start sustava Windows 7) sada su ispravno najavljeni kada pomaknete mi preko njih, umjesto da utite.

segment.source: Keyboard layout changes are no longer reported during say all, which was particularly problematic for multilingual documents including Arabic text. (#1676)
segment.target: Promjene rasporeda tipkovnice vie se ne prijavljuju tijekom recimo sve, to je bilo posebno problematino za viejezine dokumente koji ukljuuju arapski tekst. (#1676)

segment.source: The entire content of some UI Automation editable text controls (e.g. the Search Box in the Windows 7/8 Start Menu) is no longer announced every time it changes.
segment.target: Cijeli sadraj nekih tekstualnih kontrola koje se mogu ureivati automatizacijom korisnikog suelja (npr. okvir za pretraivanje u izborniku Start sustava Windows 7/8) vie se ne objavljuje svaki put kada se promijeni.

segment.source: When moving between groups on the Windows 8 start screen, unlabeled groups no longer announce their first tile as the name of the group. (#2658)
segment.target: Prilikom kretanja izmeu grupa na poetnom zaslonu sustava Windows 8 neoznaene grupe vie ne objavljuju svoju prvu ploicu kao naziv grupe. (#2658)

segment.source: When opening the Windows 8 start screen, the focus is correctly placed on the first tile, rather than jumping to the root of the start screen which can confuse navigation. (#2720)
segment.target: Prilikom otvaranja poetnog zaslona sustava Windows 8, fokus je ispravno postavljen na prvu ploicu, umjesto da skoite na korijen poetnog zaslona to moe zbuniti navigaciju. (#2720)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to start when the user's profile path contains certain multibyte characters. (#2729)
segment.target: NVDA se vie nee uspjeti pokrenuti kada put korisnikovog profila sadri odreene viebajtne znakove. (#2729)

segment.source: In browse mode in Google Chrome, the text of tabs is now rendered correctly.
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u pregledniku Google Chrome tekst kartica sada se ispravno prikazuje.

segment.source: In browse mode, menu buttons are now reported correctly.
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, gumbi izbornika sada se ispravno prijavljuju.

segment.source: In OpenOffice.org/LibreOffice Calc, reading spreadsheet cells now works correctly. (#2765)
segment.target: U OpenOffice.org/LibreOffice Calcu itanje elija proraunske tablice sada radi ispravno. (#2765)

segment.source: NVDA can again function in the Yahoo! Mail message list when used from Internet Explorer. (#2780)
segment.target: NVDA ponovno moe funkcionirati na popisu poruka Yahoo! Maila kada se koristi iz Internet Explorera. (#2780)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Previous log file is now copied to nvda-old.log on NVDA initialization. Therefore, if NVDA crashes or is restarted, logging information from that session is still accessible for inspection. (#916)
segment.target: Prethodna datoteka dnevnika sada se kopira u nvda-old.log prilikom NVDA inicijalizacije. Stoga, ako se NVDA srui ili ponovno pokrene, zapisivanje podataka iz te sesije i dalje je dostupno za pregled. (#916)

segment.source: Fetching the role property in chooseNVDAObjectOverlayClasses no longer causes the role to be incorrect and thus not reported on focus for certain objects such as Windows command consoles and Scintilla controls. (#2569)
segment.target: Dohvaanje svojstva role u chooseNVDAObjectOverlayClasses vie ne uzrokuje da uloga bude netona i stoga se ne prijavljuje u fokusu za odreene objekte kao to su Windows naredbene konzole i Scintilla kontrole. (#2569)

segment.source: The NVDA Preferences, Tools and Help menus are now accessible as attributes on gui.mainFrame.sysTrayIcon named preferencesMenu, toolsMenu and helpMenu, respectively. This allows plugins to more easily add items to these menus.
segment.target: NVDA izbornici Preferences, Tools i Help sada su dostupni kao atributi na gui.mainFrame.sysTrayIcon pod nazivom preferencesMenu, toolsMenu i helpMenu, respektivno. To omoguuje dodacima da lake dodaju stavke u ove izbornike.

segment.source: The navigatorObject_doDefaultAction script in globalCommands has been renamed to review_activate.
segment.target: Skripta navigatorObject_doDefaultAction u globalCommands preimenovana je u review_activate.

segment.source: Gettext message contexts are now supported. This allows multiple translations to be defined for a single English message depending on the context. (#1524)
segment.target: Sada su podrani konteksti za dobivanje tekstualne poruke. To omoguuje definiranje vie prijevoda za jednu englesku poruku ovisno o kontekstu. (#1524)

segment.source: This is done using the pgettext(context, message) function.
segment.target: To se radi pomou funkcije pgettext(context, message).

segment.source: This is supported for both NVDA itself and add-ons.
segment.target: Ovo je podrano i za sam NVDA i za dodatke.

segment.source: xgettext and msgfmt from GNU gettext must be used to create any PO and MO files. The Python tools do not support message contexts.
segment.target: xgettext i msgfmt iz GNU gettext-a moraju se koristiti za stvaranje bilo koje PO i MO datoteke. Python alati ne podravaju kontekste poruka.

segment.source: For xgettext, pass the --keyword=pgettext:1c,2 command line argument to enable inclusion of message contexts.
segment.target: Za xgettext proslijedite argument naredbenog retka --keyword=pgettext:1c,2 da biste omoguili ukljuivanje konteksta poruka.

segment.source: See http://www.gnu.org/software/gettext/manual/html_node/Contexts.html#Contexts for more information.
segment.target: Pogledajte http://www.gnu.org/software/gettext/manual/html_node/Contexts.html#Contexts za vie informacija.

segment.source: It is now possible to access built-in NVDA modules where they have been overridden by third party modules. See the nvdaBuiltin module for details.
segment.target: Sada je mogue pristupiti ugraenim NVDA modulima gdje su ih nadjaali moduli treih strana. Za detalje pogledajte modul nvdaBuiltin.

segment.source: Add-on translation support can now be used within the add-on installTasks module. (#2715)
segment.target: Podrka za prijevod dodataka sada se moe koristiti unutar modula installTasks dodatka. (#2715)

segment.source: This release addresses several potential security issues (by upgrading Python to 2.7.3).
segment.target: Ovo izdanje rjeava nekoliko potencijalnih sigurnosnih problema (nadogradnjom Pythona na 2.7.3).

segment.source: Highlights of this release include an in-built installer and portable creation feature, automatic updates, easy management of new NVDA add-ons, announcement of graphics in Microsoft Word, support for Windows 8 Metro style apps, and several important bug fixes.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja ukljuuju ugraeni instalacijski program i znaajku stvaranja prijenosnih podataka, automatska auriranja, jednostavno upravljanje novim NVDA dodacima, najavu grafike u Microsoft Wordu, podrku za aplikacije u stilu Windows 8 Metro i nekoliko vanih ispravaka greaka.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: NVDA can now automatically check for, download and install updates. (#73)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe automatski provjeravati, preuzimati i instalirati auriranja. (#73)

segment.source: Extending NVDA's functionality has been made easier with the addition of an Add-ons Manager (found under Tools in the NVDA menu) allowing you to install and uninstall new NVDA add-on packages (.nvda-addon files) containing plugins and drivers. Note the Add-on manager does not show older custom plugins and drivers manually copied in to your configuration directory. (#213)
segment.target: Proirenje NVDA funkcionalnosti olakano je dodavanjem Upravitelja dodataka (koji se nalazi pod Alati u NVDA izborniku) koji vam omoguuje instaliranje i deinstaliranje novih NVDA paketa dodataka (.nvda-addon datoteke) koji sadre dodatke i upravljake programe. Imajte na umu da upravitelj dodataka ne prikazuje starije prilagoene dodatke i upravljake programe runo kopirane u va konfiguracijski direktorij. (#213)

segment.source: Many more common NVDA features now work in Windows 8 Metro style apps when using an installed release of NVDA, including speaking of typed characters, and browse mode for web documents (includes support for metro version of Internet Explorer 10). Portable copies of NVDA cannot access metro style apps. (#1801)
segment.target: Mnoge druge uobiajene NVDA znaajke sada rade u aplikacijama u stilu Windows 8 Metro kada se koristi instalirano izdanje NVDA-a, ukljuujui govor o upisanim znakovima i nain pregledavanja web dokumenata (ukljuuje podrku za Metro verziju Internet Explorera 10). Prijenosne kopije NVDA ne mogu pristupiti aplikacijama u stilu metroa. (#1801)

segment.source: In browse mode documents (Internet Explorer, Firefox, etc.), you can now jump to the start and past the end of certain containing elements (such as lists and tables) with shift+, and , respectively. (#123)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja dokumenata (Internet Explorer, Firefox, itd.) sada moete skoiti na poetak i kraj odreenih elemenata koji sadre (kao to su popisi i tablice) pomou shift+, odnosno , respektivno. (#123)

segment.source: New language: Greek.
segment.target: Novi jezik: grki.

segment.source: Graphics and alt text are now reported in Microsoft Word Documents. (#2282, #1541)
segment.target: Grafika i zamjenski tekst sada se prijavljuju u dokumentima programa Microsoft Word. (#2282, #1541)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Announcement of cell coordinates in Microsoft Excel is now after the content rather than before, and is now only included if the report tables and report table cell coordinates settings are enabled in the Document formatting settings dialog. (#320)
segment.target: Najava koordinata elija u programu Microsoft Excel sada je nakon sadraja, a ne prije, a sada je ukljuena samo ako su postavke tablica izvjea i koordinata elija tablice izvjea omoguene u dijalokom okviru Postavke oblikovanja dokumenta. (#320)

segment.source: NVDA is now distributed in one package. Rather than separate portable and installer versions, there is now just one file that, when run, will start a temporary copy of NVDA and will allow you to install or generate a portable distribution. (#1715)
segment.target: NVDA se sada distribuira u jednom paketu. Umjesto odvojenih prijenosnih i instalacijskih verzija, sada postoji samo jedna datoteka koja e, kada se pokrene, pokrenuti privremenu kopiju NVDA i omoguiti vam da instalirate ili generirate prijenosnu distribuciju. (#1715)

segment.source: NVDA is now always installed in to Program Files on all systems. Updating a previous install will also automatically move it if it was not previously installed there.
segment.target: NVDA je sada uvijek instaliran u programskim datotekama na svim sustavima. Auriranje prethodne instalacije takoer e je automatski premjestiti ako prethodno nije bila tamo instalirana.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: With auto language switching enabled, Content such as alt text for graphics and labels for other certain controls in Mozilla Gecko (e.g. Firefox) are now reported in the correct language if marked up appropriately.
segment.target: S omoguenom automatskom promjenom jezika, sadraj kao to je zamjenski tekst za grafiku i oznake za druge odreene kontrole u Mozilla Gecku (npr. Firefox) sada se prijavljuje na ispravnom jeziku ako je oznaen na odgovarajui nain.

segment.source: SayAll in BibleSeeker (and other TRxRichEdit controls) no longer stops in the middle of a passage.
segment.target: SayAll u BibleSeekeru (i drugim TRxRichEdit kontrolama) vie se ne zaustavlja usred odlomka.

segment.source: Lists found in the Windows 8 Explorer file properties (permitions tab) and in Windows 8 Windows Update now read correctly.
segment.target: Popisi koji se nalaze u svojstvima datoteke programa Windows 8 Explorer (kartica doputenja) i na servisu Windows Update sustava Windows Update sada se ispravno itaju.

segment.source: Fixed possible freezes in MS Word which would result when it took more than 2 seconds to fetch text from a document (extremely long lines or tables of contents). (#2191)
segment.target: Ispravljena mogua zamrzavanja u MS Wordu koja bi nastala kada bi trebalo vie od 2 sekunde za dohvaanje teksta iz dokumenta (iznimno dugi redovi ili sadraji). (#2191)

segment.source: Detection of word breaks now works correctly where whitespace is followed by certain punctuation. (#1656)
segment.target: Otkrivanje prijeloma rijei sada ispravno funkcionira tamo gdje nakon razmaka slijede odreeni interpunkcijski znakovi. (#1656)

segment.source: In browse mode in Adobe Reader, it is now possible to navigate to headings without a level using quick navigation and the Elements List. (#2181)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u programu Adobe Reader sada je mogue navigirati do naslova bez razine pomou brze navigacije i popisa elemenata. (#2181)

segment.source: In Winamp, braille is now correctly updated when you move to a different item in the Playlist Editor. (#1912)
segment.target: U Winampu se brajica sada ispravno aurira kada prijeete na drugu stavku u ureivau reprodukcijske liste. (#1912)

segment.source: The tree in the Elements List (available for browse mode documents) is now properly sized to show the text of each element. (#2276)
segment.target: Stablo na popisu elemenata (dostupno za dokumente u nainu pregledavanja) sada je odgovarajue veliine za prikaz teksta svakog elementa. (#2276)

segment.source: In applications using the Java Access Bridge, editable text fields are now presented correctly in braille. (#2284)
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste Java Access Bridge, tekstna polja koja se mogu ureivati sada su ispravno prikazana na Brailleovom pismu. (#2284)

segment.source: In applications using the java Access Bridge, editable text fields no longer report strange characters in certain circumstances. (#1892)
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste java Access Bridge, tekstualna polja koja se mogu ureivati vie ne prijavljuju udne znakove u odreenim okolnostima. (#1892)

segment.source: In applications using the Java Access Bridge, when at the end of an editable text field, the current line is now reported correctly. (#1892)
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste Java Access Bridge, kada je na kraju tekstnog polja koje se moe ureivati, trenutni redak sada se ispravno prijavljuje. (#1892)

segment.source: In browse mode in applications using Mozilla Gecko 14 and later (e.g. Firefox 14), quick navigation now works for block quotes and embedded objects. (#2287)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u aplikacijama koje koriste Mozilla Gecko 14 i novije (npr. Firefox 14), brza navigacija sada radi za blokovske navodnike i ugraene objekte. (#2287)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer 9, NVDA no longer reads unwanted content when focus moves inside certain landmarks or focusable elements (specifically, a div element which is focusable or has an ARIA landmark role).
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru 9, NVDA vie ne ita neeljeni sadraj kada se fokus pomakne unutar odreenih orijentira ili elemenata koji se mogu fokusirati (tonije, div element koji se moe fokusirati ili ima ulogu ARIA orijentira).

segment.source: The NVDA icon for the NVDA Desktop and Start Menu shortcuts is now displayed correctly on 64 bit editions of Windows. (#354)
segment.target: NVDA ikona za NVDA preace za radnu povrinu i izbornik Start sada se ispravno prikazuje u 64-bitnim izdanjima sustava Windows. (#354)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Due to the replacement of the previous NSIS installer for NVDA with a built-in installer in Python, it is no longer necessary for translaters to maintain a langstrings.txt file for the installer. All localization strings are now managed by gettext po files.
segment.target: Zbog zamjene prethodnog NSIS instalacijskog programa za NVDA ugraenim instalacijskim programom u Pythonu, prevoditelji vie ne moraju odravati langstrings.txt datoteku za instalacijski program. Svim nizovima lokalizacije sada upravljaju gettext po datoteke.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include features for more fluent reading of braille; indication of document formatting in braille; access to much more formatting information and improved performance in Microsoft Word; and support for the iTunes Store.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju znaajke za tenije itanje Brailleovog pisma; naznaka oblikovanja dokumenta na Brailleovom pismu; pristup mnogo vie informacija o oblikovanju i poboljane performanse u programu Microsoft Word; i podrka za iTunes Store.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: NVDA can announce the number of leading tabs and spaces of the current line in the order that they are entered. This can be enabled by selecting report line indentation in the document formatting dialogue. (#373)
segment.target: NVDA moe objaviti broj poetnih kartica i razmaka trenutnog retka redoslijedom kojim su uneseni. To se moe omoguiti odabirom uvlaenja retka izvjea u dijalokom okviru za oblikovanje dokumenta. (#373)

segment.source: NVDA can now detect key presses generated from alternative keyboard input emulation such as on-screen keyboards and speech recognition software.
segment.target: NVDA sada moe detektirati pritiske tipki generirane alternativnom emulacijom unosa tipkovnice kao to su zaslonske tipkovnice i softver za prepoznavanje govora.

segment.source: NVDA can now detect colors in Windows command consoles.
segment.target: NVDA sada moe detektirati boje u Windows naredbenim konzolama.

segment.source: Bold, italic and underline are now indicated in braille using signs appropriate to the configured translation table. (#538)
segment.target: Podebljano, kurziv i podcrtano sada su oznaeni na Brailleovom pismu pomou znakova koji odgovaraju konfiguriranoj tablici prijevoda. (#538)

segment.source: Much more information is now reported in Microsoft Word documents, including:
segment.target: Mnogo vie informacija sada se izvjetava u dokumentima programa Microsoft Word, ukljuujui:

segment.source: Inline information such as footnote and endnote numbers, heading levels, the existence of comments, table nesting levels, links, and text color;
segment.target: Umetnute informacije kao to su brojevi fusnota i krajnjih biljeki, razine naslova, postojanje komentara, razine ugnijeenja tablice, veze i boja teksta;

segment.source: Reporting when entering document sections such as the comments story, footnotes and endnotes stories, and header and footer stories.
segment.target: Izvjeivanje prilikom unosa odjeljaka dokumenta, kao to su lanci komentara, biljeke i biljeke te lanci zaglavlja i podnoja.

segment.source: Braille now indicates selected text using dots 7 and 8. (#889)
segment.target: Brajica sada oznaava odabrani tekst pomou toaka 7 i 8. (#889)

segment.source: Braille now reports information about controls within documents such as links, buttons and headings. (#202)
segment.target: Brailleovo pismo sada izvjetava o kontrolama unutar dokumenata kao to su veze, gumbi i naslovi. (#202)

segment.source: Support for the hedo ProfiLine and MobilLine USB braille displays. (#1863, #1897)
segment.target: Podrka za hedo ProfiLine i MobilLine USB brajevo pismo. (#1863, #1897)

segment.source: NVDA now avoids splitting words in braille when possible by default. This can be disabled in the Braille Settings dialog. (#1890, #1946)
segment.target: NVDA sada izbjegava dijeljenje rijei na Brailleovom pismu kada je to mogue prema zadanim postavkama. To se moe onemoguiti u dijalokom okviru Postavke Brailleovog pisma. (#1890, #1946)

segment.source: It is now possible to have braille displayed by paragraphs instead of lines, which may allow for more fluent reading of large amounts of text. This is configurable using the Read by paragraphs option in the Braille Settings dialog. (#1891)
segment.target: Sada je mogue prikazati Brailleovo pismo u odlomcima umjesto u redovima, to moe omoguiti tenije itanje velikih koliina teksta. To se moe konfigurirati pomou mogunosti itanje po odlomcima u dijalokom okviru Postavke brajice. (#1891)

segment.source: In browse mode, you can activate the object under the cursor using a braille display. This is done by pressing the cursor routing key where the cursor is located (which means pressing it twice if the cursor is not already there). (#1893)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja moete aktivirati objekt ispod pokazivaa pomou brajinog zaslona. To se postie pritiskom na tipku za usmjeravanje kursora na mjestu gdje se kursor nalazi (to znai da ga dvaput pritisnete ako kursor ve nije tamo). (#1893)

segment.source: Basic support for web areas in iTunes such as the Store. Other applications using WebKit 1 may also be supported. (#734)
segment.target: Osnovna podrka za web-podruja u programu iTunes kao to je trgovina. Druge aplikacije koje koriste WebKit 1 takoer mogu biti podrane. (#734)

segment.source: In books in Adobe Digital Editions 1.8.1 and later, pages are now turned automatically when using say all. (#1978)
segment.target: U knjigama u Adobe Digital Editions 1.8.1 i novijim verzijama, stranice se sada automatski okreu kada se koristi Reci sve. (#1978)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Portuguese grade 2, Icelandic 8 dot computer braille, Tamil grade 1, Spanish 8 dot computer braille, Farsi grade 1. (#2014)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: portugalski razred 2, islandski raunalni braille s 8 toaka, tamilski stupanj 1, panjolski raunalni braille s 8 toaka, farsi razred 1. (#2014)

segment.source: You can now configure whether frames in documents are reported from the Document Formatting preferences dialog. (#1900)
segment.target: Sada moete konfigurirati hoe li se okviri u dokumentima izvjetavati iz dijalokog okvira preferenci oblikovanja dokumenta. (#1900)

segment.source: Sleep mode is automatically enabled when using OpenBook. (#1209)
segment.target: Stanje mirovanja automatski se omoguuje kada koristite OpenBook. (#1209)

segment.source: In Poedit, translators can now read translator added and automatically extracted comments. Messages that are untranslated or fuzzy are marked with a star and a beep is heard when you navigate onto them. (#1811)
segment.target: U Poeditu prevoditelji sada mogu itati dodane i automatski izdvojene komentare prevoditelja. Poruke koje nisu prevedene ili nejasne oznaene su zvjezdicom i uje se zvuni signal kada prijeete na njih. (#1811)

segment.source: Support for the HumanWare Brailliant BI and B series displays. (#1990)
segment.target: Podrka za zaslone serije HumanWare Brailliant BI i B. (#1990)

segment.source: New languages: Norwegian Bokml, Traditional Chinese (Hong Kong).
segment.target: Novi jezici: norveki bokml, tradicionalni kineski (Hong Kong).

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Commands to describe the current character or to spell the current word or line now will spell in the appropriate language according to the text, if auto language switching is turned on and the appropriate language information is available.
segment.target: Naredbe za opisivanje trenutnog znaka ili za sricanje trenutne rijei ili retka sada e se pisati na odgovarajuem jeziku u skladu s tekstom, ako je ukljueno automatsko prebacivanje jezika i dostupne su odgovarajue informacije o jeziku.

segment.source: Updated eSpeak speech synthesizer to 1.46.02.
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak sintetizator govora na 1.46.02.

segment.source: NVDA will now truncate extremely long (30 characters or greater) names guessed from graphic and link URLs as they are most likely garbage that gets in the way of reading. (#1989)
segment.target: NVDA e sada skratiti iznimno dugaka (30 znakova ili vie) imena pogodena iz grafikih URL-ova i URL-ova poveznica jer su to najvjerojatnije smee koje smeta itanju. (#1989)

segment.source: Some information displayed in braille has been abbreviated. (#1955, #2043)
segment.target: Neke informacije prikazane na Brailleovom pismu skraene su. (#1955, #2043)

segment.source: When the caret or review cursor moves, braille is now scrolled in the same way as when it is manually scrolled. This makes it more appropriate when braille is configured to read by paragraphs and/or avoid splitting words. (#1996)
segment.target: Kada se kursor za kursor ili kursor za pregled pomie, Brailleovo pismo se sada pomie na isti nain kao i kada se runo pomie. Zbog toga je prikladnija kada je Brailleovo pismo konfigurirano za itanje po odlomcima i/ili izbjegavanje razdvajanja rijei. (#1996)

segment.source: Updated to new Spanish grade 1 braille translation table.
segment.target: Aurirano na novu tablicu za prijevod panjolskog Brailleovog pisma 1. razreda.

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.4.1.
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na 2.4.1.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: In Windows 8, focus is no longer incorrectly moved away from the Windows Explorer search field, which was not allowing NVDA to interact with it.
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 8 fokus se vie ne pomie pogreno od polja za pretraivanje Windows Explorera, to nije doputalo NVDA-u interakciju s njim.

segment.source: Major performance improvements when reading and navigating Microsoft Word documents while automatic reporting of formatting is enabled, thus now making it quite comfortable to proof read formatting etc. Performance may be also improved over all for some users.
segment.target: Velika poboljanja performansi pri itanju i navigaciji Microsoft Word dokumentima dok je omogueno automatsko izvjeivanje o oblikovanju, to sada ini prilino ugodnim za provjeru itanja, formatiranje itd. Performanse takoer mogu biti poboljane za neke korisnike.

segment.source: Browse mode is now used for full screen Adobe Flash content.
segment.target: Nain pregledavanja sada se koristi za Adobe Flash sadraj preko cijelog zaslona.

segment.source: Fixed poor audio quality in some cases when using Microsoft Speech API version 5 voices with the audio output device set to something other than the default (Microsoft Sound Mapper). (#749)
segment.target: Ispravljena je loa kvaliteta zvuka u nekim sluajevima kada se koriste glasovi Microsoft Speech API-ja verzije 5 s izlaznim audio ureajem postavljenim na neto drugo osim zadanog (Microsoft Sound Mapper). (#749)

segment.source: Again allow NVDA to be used with the "no speech" synthesizer, relying purely on braille or the speech viewer. (#1963)
segment.target: Opet dopustite koritenje NVDA sa sintisajzerom "bez govora", oslanjajui se iskljuivo na Brailleovo pismo ili preglednik govora. (#1963)

segment.source: Object navigation commands no longer report "No children" and "No parents", but instead report messages consistent with the documentation.
segment.target: Naredbe za navigaciju objektima vie ne prijavljuju "Nema djece" i "Nema roditelja", ve umjesto toga izvjetavaju o porukama u skladu s dokumentacijom.

segment.source: When NVDA is configured to use a language other than English, the name of the tab key is now reported in the correct language.
segment.target: Kada je NVDA konfiguriran za koritenje jezika koji nije engleski, naziv tipke tabulatora sada se prijavljuje na ispravnom jeziku.

segment.source: In Mozilla Gecko (e.g. Firefox), NVDA no longer intermittently switches to browse mode while navigating menus in documents. (#2025)
segment.target: U Mozilla Gecko (npr. Firefox), NVDA se vie ne prebacuje povremeno u nain pregledavanja tijekom navigacije izbornicima u dokumentima. (#2025)

segment.source: In Calculator, the backspace key now reports the updated result instead of reporting nothing. (#2030)
segment.target: U Kalkulatoru tipka za povratni prostor sada izvjetava o auriranom rezultatu umjesto da ne prijavljuje nita. (#2030)

segment.source: In browse mode, the move mouse to current navigator object command now routes to the center of the object at the review cursor instead of the top left, making it more accurate it some cases. (#2029)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, naredba za pomicanje mia na trenutni objekt navigatora sada usmjerava do sredita objekta na kursoru za pregled umjesto u gornjem lijevom kutu, to je ini preciznijom u nekim sluajevima. (#2029)

segment.source: In browse mode with automatic focus mode for focus changes enabled, focusing on a toolbar will now switch to focus mode. (#1339)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja s omoguenim automatskim nainom fokusiranja za promjene fokusa, fokusiranje na alatnoj traci sada e se prebaciti u nain fokusiranja. (#1339)

segment.source: The report title command works correctly again in Adobe Reader.
segment.target: Naredba naslova izvjea ponovno ispravno funkcionira u programu Adobe Reader.

segment.source: With automatic focus mode for focus changes enabled, focus mode is now correctly used for focused table cells; e.g. in ARIA grids. (#1763)
segment.target: S omoguenim automatskim nainom fokusiranja za promjene fokusa, nain fokusiranja sada se ispravno koristi za fokusirane elije tablice; npr. u mreama ARIA-e. (#1763)

segment.source: In iTunes, position information in certain lists is now reported correctly.
segment.target: U programu iTunes informacije o poloaju na odreenim popisima sada se ispravno prijavljuju.

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, some links are no longer treated as containing read-only editable text fields.
segment.target: U programu Adobe Reader neke se veze vie ne tretiraju kao da sadre tekstualna polja koja se mogu ureivati samo za itanje.

segment.source: The labels of some editable text fields are no longer incorrectly included when reporting the text of a dialog. (#1960)
segment.target: Oznake nekih tekstnih polja koja se mogu ureivati vie nisu pogreno ukljuene prilikom izvjeivanja o tekstu dijalokog okvira. (#1960)

segment.source: The description of groupings is once again reported if reporting of object descriptions is enabled.
segment.target: Opis grupiranja ponovno se prijavljuje ako je omogueno izvjeivanje o opisima objekata.

segment.source: The human readable sizes are now included in the text of the Windows Explorer drive properties dialog.
segment.target: Veliine itljive ljudima sada su ukljuene u tekst dijalokog okvira svojstava pogona programa Windows Explorer.

segment.source: Double reporting of property page text has been suppressed in some cases. (#218)
segment.target: Dvostruko izvjeivanje o tekstu stranice entiteta u nekim je sluajevima potisnuto. (#218)

segment.source: Improved tracking of the caret in editable text fields which rely on text written to the screen. In particular, this improves editing in the Microsoft Excel cell editor and the Eudora message editor. (#1658)
segment.target: Poboljano praenje kursora u tekstnim poljima koja se mogu ureivati i koja se oslanjaju na tekst napisan na zaslonu. To posebno poboljava ureivanje u ureivau elija Microsoft Excel i ureivau poruka Eudora. (#1658)

segment.source: In Firefox 11, the move to containing virtual buffer command (NVDA+control+space) now works as it should to escape embedded objects such as Flash content.
segment.target: U Firefoxu 11, prelazak na naredbu za sadravanje virtualnog meuspremnika (NVDA+kontrola+razmak) sada radi kako bi trebao pobjei od ugraenih objekata kao to je Flash sadraj.

segment.source: NVDA now restarts itself correctly (e.g. after changing the configured language) when it is located in a directory which contains non-ASCII characters. (#2079)
segment.target: NVDA se sada ispravno ponovno pokree (npr. nakon promjene konfiguriranog jezika) kada se nalazi u direktoriju koji sadri znakove koji nisu ASCII. (#2079)

segment.source: Braille correctly respects the settings for reporting of object shortcut keys, position information and descriptions.
segment.target: Brailleovo pismo ispravno potuje postavke za izvjeivanje o tipkama preaca objekata, informacijama o poloaju i opisima.

segment.source: In Mozilla applications, switching between browse and focus modes is no longer slow with braille enabled. (#2095)
segment.target: U Mozillinim aplikacijama prebacivanje izmeu naina pregledavanja i fokusiranja vie nije sporo s omoguenom Brailleovom icom. (#2095)

segment.source: Routing the cursor to the space at the end of the line/paragraph using braille cursor routing keys in some editable text fields now works correctly instead of routing to the start of the text. (#2096)
segment.target: Usmjeravanje kursora na razmak na kraju retka/odlomka pomou tipki za usmjeravanje kursora na Brailleovom pismu u nekim tekstnim poljima koja se mogu ureivati sada ispravno funkcionira umjesto usmjeravanja na poetak teksta. (#2096)

segment.source: NVDA again works correctly with the Audiologic Tts3 synthesizer. (#2109)
segment.target: NVDA ponovno radi ispravno s Audiologic Tts3 sintisajzerom. (#2109)

segment.source: Microsoft Word documents are correctly treated as multi-line. This causes braille to behave more appropriately when a document is focused.
segment.target: Microsoft Word dokumenti ispravno se tretiraju kao vieredni. To uzrokuje da se Brailleovo pismo ponaa prikladnije kada je dokument fokusiran.

segment.source: In Microsoft Internet Explorer, errors no longer occur when focusing on certain rare controls. (#2121)
segment.target: U pregledniku Microsoft Internet Explorer pogreke se vie ne pojavljuju kada se usredotoite na odreene rijetke kontrole. (#2121)

segment.source: Changing the pronunciation of punctuation/symbols by the user will now take effect straight away, rather than requiring NVDA to be restarted or auto language switching to be disabled.
segment.target: Promjena izgovora interpunkcijskih znakova od strane korisnika sada e odmah stupiti na snagu, umjesto da se zahtijeva ponovno pokretanje NVDA-a ili onemoguavanje automatske promjene jezika.

segment.source: When using eSpeak, speech no longer goes silent in some cases in the Save As dialog of the NVDA Log Viewer. (#2145)
segment.target: Kada koristite eSpeak, govor vie ne utiava u nekim sluajevima u dijalokom okviru Spremi kao NVDA preglednika dnevnika. (#2145)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: There is now a remote Python console for situations where remote debugging is useful. See the Developer Guide for details.
segment.target: Sada postoji udaljena Python konzola za situacije u kojima je daljinsko otklanjanje pogreaka korisno. Pojedinosti potraite u Vodiu za razvojne programere.

segment.source: The base path of NVDA's code is now stripped from tracebacks in the log to improve readability. (#1880)
segment.target: Osnovni put NVDA-inog koda sada je uklonjen iz tragova u dnevniku kako bi se poboljala itljivost. (#1880)

segment.source: TextInfo objects now have an activate() method to activate the position represented by the TextInfo.
segment.target: Objekti TextInfo sada imaju metodu activate() za aktiviranje poloaja koji predstavlja TextInfo.

segment.source: This is used by braille to activate the position using cursor routing keys on a braille display. However, there may be other callers in future.
segment.target: To koristi Brailleovo pismo za aktiviranje poloaja pomou tipki za usmjeravanje kursora na Brailleovom pismu. Meutim, u budunosti bi moglo biti i drugih pozivatelja.

segment.source: TreeInterceptors and NVDAObjects which only expose one page of text at a time can support automatic page turns during say all by using the textInfos.DocumentWithPageTurns mix-in. (#1978)
segment.target: TreeInterceptors i NVDAObjects koji istovremeno izlau samo jednu stranicu teksta mogu podravati automatsko okretanje stranica tijekom recimo svega pomou mijeanja textInfos.DocumentWithPageTurns. (#1978)

segment.source: Several control and output constants have been renamed or moved. (#228)
segment.target: Nekoliko kontrolnih i izlaznih konstanti preimenovano je ili premjeteno. (#228)

segment.source: speech.REASON_* constants have been moved to controlTypes.
segment.target: govor. REASON_* konstante premjetene su u controlTypes.

segment.source: In controlTypes, speechRoleLabels and speechStateLabels have been renamed to just roleLabels and stateLabels, respectively.
segment.target: U controlTypes, speechRoleLabels i speechStateLabels preimenovani su samo u roleLabels i stateLabels.

segment.source: Braille output is now logged at level input/output. First, the untranslated text of all regions is logged, followed by the braille cells of the window being displayed. (#2102)
segment.target: Izlaz Brailleovog pisma sada se biljei na razini ulaza/izlaza. Prvo se biljei neprevedeni tekst svih regija, a zatim se prikazuju elije brajice prozora. (#2102)

segment.source: subclasses of the sapi5 synthDriver can now override _getVoiceTokens and extend init to support custom voice tokens such as with sapi.spObjectTokenCategory to get tokens from a custom registry location.
segment.target: podklase sapi5 synthDriver sada mogu nadjaati _getVoiceTokens i proiriti init kako bi podrali prilagoene glasovne tokene kao to je sapi.spObjectTokenCategory za dobivanje tokena s prilagoene lokacije registra.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include automatic speech language switching when reading documents with appropriate language information; support for 64 bit Java Runtime Environments; reporting of text formatting in browse mode in Mozilla applications; better handling of application crashes and freezes; and initial fixes for Windows 8.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja ukljuuju automatsko prebacivanje jezika govora prilikom itanja dokumenata s odgovarajuim jezinim informacijama; podrka za 64-bitna Java Runtime okruenja; izvjetavanje o oblikovanju teksta u nainu pregledavanja u Mozillinim aplikacijama; bolje rukovanje padovima i zamrzavanjem aplikacija; i poetni popravci za Windows 8.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: NVDA can now change the eSpeak synthesizer language on the fly when reading certain web/pdf documents with appropriate language information. Automatic language/dialect switching can be toggled on and off from the Voice Settings dialog. (#845)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe mijenjati jezik eSpeak sintisajzera u hodu prilikom itanja odreenih web/pdf dokumenata s odgovarajuim jezinim informacijama. Automatsko prebacivanje jezika/dijalekta moe se ukljuiti i iskljuiti iz dijalokog okvira Glasovne postavke. (#845)

segment.source: Java Access Bridge 2.0.2 is now supported, which includes support for 64 bit Java Runtime Environments.
segment.target: Sada je podran Java Access Bridge 2.0.2, koji ukljuuje podrku za 64-bitna Java Runtime okruenja.

segment.source: In Mozilla Gecko (e.g. Firefox) Heading levels are now announced when using object navigation.
segment.target: U Mozilla Gecku (npr. Firefoxu) razine naslova sada se najavljuju kada se koristi navigacija objektima.

segment.source: Text formatting can now be reported when using browse mode in Mozilla Gecko (e.g. Firefox and Thunderbird). (#394)
segment.target: Formatiranje teksta sada se moe prijaviti kada koristite nain pregledavanja u Mozilla Gecko (npr. Firefox i Thunderbird). (#394)

segment.source: Text with underline and/or strikethrough can now be detected and reported in standard IAccessible2 text controls such as in Mozilla applications.
segment.target: Tekst s podcrtavanjem i/ili precrtavanjem sada se moe otkriti i prijaviti u standardnim kontrolama teksta IAccessible2, kao to su Mozilla aplikacije.

segment.source: In browse mode in Adobe Reader, table row and column counts are now reported.
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u programu Adobe Reader sada se izvjeuje o broju redaka i stupaca tablice.

segment.source: Added support for the Microsoft Speech Platform synthesizer. (#1735)
segment.target: Dodana je podrka za sintetizator Microsoft Speech Platform. (#1735)

segment.source: Page and line numbers are now reported for the caret in IBM Lotus Symphony. (#1632)
segment.target: Brojevi stranica i redaka sada su prijavljeni za kursor u IBM Lotus Symphony. (#1632)

segment.source: The percentage of how much the pitch changes when speaking a capital letter is now configurable from the voice settings dialog. However, this does replace the older raise pitch for capitals checkbox (therefore to turn off this feature set the percentage to 0). (#255)
segment.target: Postotak promjene visine tona prilikom izgovaranja velikog slova sada se moe konfigurirati iz dijalokog okvira postavki glasa. Meutim, ovo zamjenjuje stariji potvrdni okvir za poveanje visine za velika slova (stoga za iskljuivanje ove znaajke postavite postotak na 0). (#255)

segment.source: Text and background color is now included in the reporting of formatting for cells in Microsoft Excel. (#1655)
segment.target: Boja teksta i pozadine sada su ukljueni u izvjeivanje o oblikovanju elija u programu Microsoft Excel. (#1655)

segment.source: In applications using the Java Access Bridge, the activate current navigator object command now works on controls where appropriate. (#1744)
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste Java Access Bridge, naredba aktiviraj trenutni objekt navigatora sada radi na kontrolama gdje je to prikladno. (#1744)

segment.source: New language: Tamil.
segment.target: Novi jezik: tamilski.

segment.source: Basic support for Design Science MathPlayer.
segment.target: Osnovna podrka za Design Science MathPlayer.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: NVDA will now restart itself if it crashes.
segment.target: NVDA e se sada ponovno pokrenuti ako se srui.

segment.source: Some information displayed in braille has been abbreviated. (#1288)
segment.target: Neke informacije prikazane na Brailleovom pismu skraene su. (#1288)

segment.source: the Read active window script (NVDA+b) has been improved to filter out unuseful controls and also is now much more easy to silence. (#1499)
segment.target: skripta za itanje aktivnog prozora (NVDA+b) je poboljana kako bi se filtrirale nekorisne kontrole, a sada je i mnogo lake utiati. (#1499)

segment.source: Automatic say all when a browse mode document loads is now optional via a setting in the Browse Mode settings dialog. (#414)
segment.target: Automatsko izgovaranje svih prilikom uitavanja dokumenta u nainu pregledavanja sada je opcionalno putem postavke u dijalokom okviru postavki naina pregledavanja. (#414)

segment.source: When trying to read the status bar (Desktop NVDA+end), If a real status bar object cannot be located, NVDA will instead resort to using the bottom line of text written to the display for the active application. (#649)
segment.target: Prilikom pokuaja itanja statusne trake (Desktop NVDA+end), ako se stvarni objekt statusne trake ne moe locirati, NVDA e umjesto toga pribjei koritenju donjeg retka teksta zapisanog na zaslonu aktivne aplikacije. (#649)

segment.source: When reading with say all in browse mode documents, NVDA will now pause at the end of headings and other block-level elements, rather than speaking the text together with the next lot of text as one long sentence.
segment.target: Kada itate s recimo sve u dokumentima u nainu pregledavanja, NVDA e sada pauzirati na kraju naslova i drugih elemenata na razini bloka, umjesto da izgovara tekst zajedno sa sljedeom serijom teksta kao jednu dugu reenicu.

segment.source: In browse mode, pressing enter or space on a tab now activates it instead of switching to focus mode. (#1760)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, pritiskom na enter ili razmak na kartici sada se aktivira umjesto prebacivanja u nain fokusiranja. (#1760)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak speech synthesizer to 1.45.47.
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak sintetizator govora na 1.45.47.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: NVDA no longer shows bullets or numbering for lists in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls when the author has indicated that these should not be shown (i.e. the list style is "none"). (#1671)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne prikazuje grafike oznake ili numeriranje popisa u Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama kada je autor naznaio da se one ne smiju prikazivati (npr. stil popisa je "none"). (#1671)

segment.source: Restarting NVDA when it has frozen (e.g. by pressing control+alt+n) no longer exits the previous copy without starting a new one.
segment.target: Ponovno pokretanje NVDA kada se zamrzne (npr. pritiskom na control+alt+n) vie ne izlazi iz prethodne kopije bez pokretanja nove.

segment.source: Pressing backspace or arrow keys in a Windows command console no longer causes strange results in some cases. (#1612)
segment.target: Pritiskanje backspacea ili tipki sa strelicama u naredbenoj konzoli sustava Windows u nekim sluajevima vie ne uzrokuje udne rezultate. (#1612)

segment.source: The selected item in WPF combo boxes (and possibly some other combo boxes exposed using UI Automation) which do not allow text editing is now reported correctly.
segment.target: Odabrana stavka u WPF kombiniranim okvirima (i moda nekim drugim kombiniranim okvirima izloenim pomou automatizacije korisnikog suelja) koja ne doputa ureivanje teksta sada se ispravno prijavljuje.

segment.source: In browse mode in Adobe Reader, it is now always possible to move to the next row from the header row and vice versa using the move to next row and move to previous row commands. Also, the header row is no longer reported as row 0. (#1731)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u Adobe Readeru sada je uvijek mogue prijei na sljedei redak iz retka zaglavlja i obrnuto pomou naredbi za premjetanje na sljedei redak i prelazak na prethodni redak. Takoer, redak zaglavlja vie se ne prijavljuje kao redak 0. (#1731)

segment.source: In browse mode in Adobe Reader, it is now possible to move to (and therefore past) empty cells in a table.
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u programu Adobe Reader sada je mogue premjestiti se u prazne elije u tablici (a time i prijei).

segment.source: Pointless position information (e.g. 0 of 0 level 0) is no longer reported in braille.
segment.target: Besmislene informacije o poloaju (npr. 0 od 0, razina 0) vie se ne prikazuju na Brailleovom pismu.

segment.source: When braille is tethered to review, it is now able to show content in flat review. (#1711)
segment.target: Kada je Brailleovo pismo vezano za pregled, sada moe prikazati sadraj u plonom pregledu. (#1711)

segment.source: A text control's text is no longer presented twice on a braille display in some cases, e.g. scrolling back from the start of Wordpad documents.
segment.target: Tekst kontrole teksta vie se ne prikazuje dvaput na Brailleovom pismu u nekim sluajevima, npr. pomicanje unatrag od poetka dokumenata programa Wordpad.

segment.source: In browse mode in Internet Explorer, pressing enter on a file upload button now correctly presents the dialog to choose a file to upload instead of switching to focus mode. (#1720)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u pregledniku Internet Explorer pritiskom na enter na gumbu za prijenos datoteke sada se ispravno prikazuje dijaloki okvir za odabir datoteke za prijenos umjesto prebacivanja u nain fokusiranja. (#1720)

segment.source: Dynamic content changes such as in Dos consoles are no longer announced if sleep mode for that application is currently on. (#1662)
segment.target: Promjene dinamikog sadraja, kao to su Dos konzole, vie se ne najavljuju ako je trenutno ukljuen nain mirovanja za tu aplikaciju. (#1662)

segment.source: In browse mode, the behaviour of alt+upArrow and alt+downArrow to collapse and expand combo boxes has been improved. (#1630)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja poboljano je ponaanje alt+strelica prema gore i alt+strelica prema dolje za saimanje i proirenje kombiniranih okvira. (#1630)

segment.source: NVDA now recovers from many more situations such as applications that stop responding which previously caused it to freeze completely. (#1408)
segment.target: NVDA se sada oporavlja od mnogo vie situacija kao to su aplikacije koje prestaju reagirati to je prethodno uzrokovalo potpuno zamrzavanje. (#1408)

segment.source: For Mozilla Gecko (Firefox etc) browse mode documents NVDA will no longer fail to render text in a very specific situation where an element is styled as display:table. (#1373)
segment.target: Za Mozilla Gecko (Firefox itd.) dokumente u nainu pregledavanja, NVDA vie nee uspjeti prikazati tekst u vrlo specifinoj situaciji kada je element stiliziran kao display:table. (#1373)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce label controls when focus moves inside of them. Stops double announcements of labels for some form fields in Firefox (Gecko) and Internet Explorer (MSHTML). (#1650)
segment.target: NVDA vie nee najavljivati kontrole naljepnica kada se fokus pomakne unutar njih. Zaustavlja dvostruke najave oznaka za neka polja obrazaca u Firefoxu (Gecko) i Internet Exploreru (MSHTML). (#1650)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to read a cell in Microsoft Excel after pasting in to it with control+v. (#1781)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne uspijeva itati eliju u Microsoft Excelu nakon to je zalijepi u nju pomou control+v. (#1781)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, extraneous information about the document is no longer announced when moving to a control on a different page in focus mode. (#1659)
segment.target: U programu Adobe Reader suvine informacije o dokumentu vie se ne objavljuju prilikom prelaska na kontrolu na drugoj stranici u nainu rada fokusa. (#1659)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla Gecko applications (e.g. Firefox), toggle buttons are now detected and reported correctly. (#1757)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u aplikacijama Mozilla Gecko (npr. Firefox), preklopni gumbi sada se otkrivaju i ispravno prijavljuju. (#1757)

segment.source: NVDA can now correctly read the Windows Explorer Address Bar in Windows 8 developer preview.
segment.target: NVDA sada moe ispravno itati adresnu traku Windows Explorera u Windows 8 Developer Previewu.

segment.source: NVDA will no longer crash apps such as winver and wordpad in Windows 8 developer preview due to bad glyph translations.
segment.target: NVDA vie nee ruiti aplikacije kao to su winver i wordpad u Windows 8 Developer Preview zbog loih prijevoda glifa.

segment.source: In browse mode in applications using Mozilla Gecko 10 and later (e.g. Firefox 10), the cursor is more often positioned correctly when loading a page with a target anchor. (#360)
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u aplikacijama koje koriste Mozilla Gecko 10 i novije (npr. Firefox 10), kursor se ee ispravno postavlja prilikom uitavanja stranice s ciljnim sidrom. (#360)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla Gecko applications (e.g. Firefox), labels for image maps are now rendered.
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja u aplikacijama Mozilla Gecko (npr. Firefox), oznake za slikovne karte sada se prikazuju.

segment.source: With mouse tracking enabled, moving the mouse over certain editable text fields (such as in Synaptics Pointing Device Settings and SpeechLab SpeakText) no longer causes the application to crash. (#672)
segment.target: Kada je omogueno praenje mia, pomicanje mia preko odreenih tekstnih polja koja se mogu ureivati (kao to su postavke ureaja za pokazivanje Synaptics i SpeechLab SpeakText) vie ne uzrokuje ruenje aplikacije. (#672)

segment.source: NVDA now functions correctly in several about dialogs in applications distributed with Windows XP, including the About dialog in Notepad and the About Windows dialog. (#1853, #1855)
segment.target: NVDA sada ispravno funkcionira u nekoliko dijalokih okvira u aplikacijama koje se distribuiraju sa sustavom Windows XP, ukljuujui dijaloki okvir O nama u Notepadu i dijaloki okvir O sustavu Windows. (#1853, #1855)

segment.source: Fixed reviewing by word in Windows Edit controls. (#1877)
segment.target: Rijeeno pregledavanje rijei u kontrolama ureivanja sustava Windows. (#1877)

segment.source: Moving out of an editable text field with leftArrow, upArrow or pageUp while in focus mode now correctly switches to browse mode when automatic focus mode for caret movement is enabled. (#1733)
segment.target: Izlazak iz tekstualnog polja koje se moe ureivati pomou lijeve strelice, strelice prema gore ili pageUp u nainu rada fokusa sada se ispravno prebacuje u nain pregledavanja kada je omoguen automatski nain fokusiranja za pomicanje kursora. (#1733)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: NVDA can now instruct speech synthesizers to switch languages for particular sections of speech.
segment.target: NVDA sada moe uputiti sintisajzere govora da promijene jezike za odreene dijelove govora.

segment.source: To support this, drivers must handle speech.LangChangeCommand in sequences past to SynthDriver.speak().
segment.target: Da bi to podrali, vozai moraju upravljati govorom. LangChangeCommand u sekvencama koje su prole do SynthDriver.speak().

segment.source: SynthDriver objects should also provide the language argument to VoiceInfo objects (or override the language attribute to retrieve the current language). Otherwise, NVDA's user interface language will be used.
segment.target: Objekti SynthDriver takoer bi trebali pruiti argument jezika objektima VoiceInfo (ili nadjaati atribut jezika za dohvaanje trenutnog jezika). U suprotnom e se koristiti jezik korisnikog suelja NVDA.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include major improvements concerning punctuation and symbols, including configurable levels, custom labelling and character descriptions; no pauses at the end of lines during say all; improved support for ARIA in Internet Explorer; better support for XFA/LiveCycle PDF documents in Adobe Reader; access to text written to the screen in more applications; and access to formatting and color information for text written to the screen.
segment.target: Istaknute znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju velika poboljanja u vezi s interpunkcijom i simbolima, ukljuujui podesive razine, prilagoene oznake i opise znakova; nema pauza na kraju redaka tijekom reci sve; poboljana podrka za ARIA u Internet Exploreru; bolja podrka za XFA/LiveCycle PDF dokumente u Adobe Readeru; pristup tekstu napisanom na zaslonu u vie aplikacija; i pristup formatiranju i informacijama o boji za tekst upisan na zaslon.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: It is now possible to hear the description for any given character by pressing the review current character script twice in quick succession. For English characters this is the standard English phonetic alphabet. For pictographic languages such as traditional Chinese, one or more example phrases using the given symbol are provided. Also pressing review current word or review current line three times will spell the word/line using the first of these descriptions. (#55)
segment.target: Sada je mogue uti opis za bilo koji lik pritiskom na skriptu pregleda trenutnog lika dva puta u brzom slijedu. Za engleske znakove ovo je standardna engleska fonetska abeceda. Za piktografske jezike kao to je tradicionalni kineski naveden je jedan ili vie primjera fraza koje koriste zadani simbol. Takoer pritiskom na pregled trenutne rijei ili pregled trenutnog retka tri puta napisat e rije/redak koristei prvi od ovih opisa. (#55)

segment.source: More text can be seen in flat review for applications such as Mozilla Thunderbird that write their text directly to the display as glyphs.
segment.target: Vie teksta moe se vidjeti u ravnom pregledu za aplikacije kao to je Mozilla Thunderbird koje svoj tekst piu izravno na zaslon kao glifi.

segment.source: It is now possible to choose from several levels of punctuation and symbol announcement. (#332)
segment.target: Sada je mogue birati izmeu nekoliko razina interpunkcije i najave simbola. (#332)

segment.source: When punctuation or other symbols are repeated more than four times, the number of repetitions is now announced instead of speaking the repeated symbols. (#43)
segment.target: Kada se interpunkcijski znakovi ili drugi simboli ponavljaju vie od etiri puta, sada se najavljuje broj ponavljanja umjesto izgovaranja ponavljajuih simbola. (#43)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Norwegian 8 dot computer braille, Ethiopic grade 1, Slovene grade 1, Serbian grade 1. (#1456)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prevoenje Brailleovog pisma: Norveki raunalni Braille s 8 toaka, etiopski razred 1, slovenski razred 1, srpski razred 1. (#1456)

segment.source: Speech no longer unnaturally pauses at the end of each line when using the say all command. (#149)
segment.target: Govor vie ne pauzira neprirodno na kraju svakog retka kada koristite naredbu say all. (#149)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce whether something is sorted (according to the aria-sort property) in web browsers. (#1500)
segment.target: NVDA e sada objaviti je li neto sortirano (prema svojstvu aria-sort) u web preglednicima. (#1500)

segment.source: Unicode Braille Patterns are now displayed correctly on braille displays. (#1505)
segment.target: Unicode Brailleovi uzorci sada se ispravno prikazuju na Brailleovim pismima. (#1505)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls when focus moves inside a group of controls (surrounded by a fieldset), NVDA will now announce the name of the group (the legend). (#535)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama kada se fokus pomakne unutar grupe kontrola (okruenih skupom polja), NVDA e sada objaviti naziv grupe (legendu). (#535)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, the aria-labelledBy and aria-describedBy properties are now honoured.
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama sada se potuju svojstva aria-labelledBy i aria-describedBy.
