segment.source: in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, support for ARIA list, gridcell, slider and progressbar controls has been improved.
segment.target: u Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama poboljana je podrka za ARIA popis, gridcell, kliza i kontrole trake napretka.

segment.source: Users can now change the pronunciation of punctuation and other symbols, as well as the symbol level at which they are spoken. (#271, #1516)
segment.target: Korisnici sada mogu promijeniti izgovor interpunkcijskih znakova i drugih simbola, kao i razinu simbola na kojoj se izgovaraju. (#271, #1516)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the name of the active sheet is now reported when switching sheets with control+pageUp or control+pageDown. (#760)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel naziv aktivnog lista sada se prijavljuje prilikom prebacivanja listova pomou control+pageUp ili control+pageDown. (#760)

segment.source: When navigating a table in Microsoft Word with the tab key NVDA will now announce the current cell as you move. (#159)
segment.target: Kada se kreete po tablici u Microsoft Wordu pomou tipke tabulatora, NVDA e sada najaviti trenutnu eliju dok se kreete. (#159)

segment.source: You can now configure whether table cell coordinates are reported from the Document Formatting preferences dialog. (#719)
segment.target: Sada moete konfigurirati hoe li se koordinate elija tablice izvjetavati u dijalokom okviru Preference oblikovanja dokumenta. (#719)

segment.source: NVDA can now detect formatting and color for text written to the screen.
segment.target: NVDA sada moe detektirati formatiranje i boju teksta upisanog na zaslon.

segment.source: In the Outlook Express/Windows Mail/Windows Live Mail message list, NVDA will now announce the fact that a message is unread and also if it's expanded or collapsed in the case of conversation threads. (#868)
segment.target: Na popisu poruka Outlook Express/Windows Mail/Windows Live Mail, NVDA e sada objaviti injenicu da je poruka neproitana i je li proirena ili saeta u sluaju niza razgovora. (#868)

segment.source: eSpeak now has a rate boost setting which triples the speaking rate.
segment.target: eSpeak sada ima postavku poveanja brzine koja utrostruuje brzinu govora.

segment.source: Support for the calendar control found in the Date and Time Information dialog accessed from the Windows 7 clock. (#1637)
segment.target: Podrka za kontrolu kalendara koja se nalazi u dijalokom okviru Informacije o datumu i vremenu kojem se pristupa sa sata sustava Windows 7. (#1637)

segment.source: Additional key bindings have been added for the MDV Lilli braille display. (#241)
segment.target: Dodana su dodatna povezivanja tipki za MDV Lilli Brailleov redak. (#241)

segment.source: New languages: Bulgarian, Albanian.
segment.target: Novi jezici: bugarski, albanski.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: To move the caret to the review cursor, now press the move focus to navigator object script (desktop NVDA+shift+numpadMinus, laptop NVDA+shift+backspace) twice in quick succession. This frees up more keys on the keyboard. (#837)
segment.target: Da biste premjestili kursor za pregled, sada pritisnite fokus za premjetanje fokusa na skriptu objekta navigatora (desktop NVDA+shift+numpadMinus, laptop NVDA+shift+backspace) dva puta u brzom slijedu. Time se oslobaa vie tipki na tipkovnici. (#837)

segment.source: To hear the decimal and hexadecimal representation of the character under the review cursor, now press review current character three times rather than twice, as twice now speaks the character description.
segment.target: Da biste uli decimalni i heksadecimalni prikaz znaka ispod kursora za pregled, sada pritisnite pregled trenutnog znaka tri puta, a ne dvaput, jer dva puta sada izgovara opis znaka.

segment.source: Updated eSpeak speech synthesiser to 1.45.03. (#1465)
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak sintetizator govora na 1.45.03. (#1465)

segment.source: Layout tables are no longer announced in Mozilla Gecko applications while moving the focus when in focus mode or outside of a document.
segment.target: Tablice izgleda vie se ne najavljuju u aplikacijama Mozilla Gecko dok pomiete fokus u nainu fokusiranja ili izvan dokumenta.

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, browse mode now works for documents inside ARIA applications. (#1452)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama, nain pregledavanja sada radi za dokumente unutar ARIA aplikacija. (#1452)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.3.0.
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajevog pisma na 2.3.0.

segment.source: When in browse mode and jumping to a control with quicknav or focus, the description of the control is now announced if it has one.
segment.target: Kada ste u nainu pregledavanja i prijeete na kontrolu s brzom navigacijom ili fokusom, sada se najavljuje opis kontrole ako je ima.

segment.source: Progress bars are now announced in brows mode.
segment.target: Trake napretka sada se najavljuju u nainu rada obrva.

segment.source: Nodes marked with an ARIA role of presentation in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls are now filtered out of simple review and the focus ancestry.
segment.target: vorovi oznaeni ARIA ulogom prezentacije u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama sada se filtriraju iz jednostavnog pregleda i podrijetla fokusa.

segment.source: NVDA's user interface and documentation now refer to virtual buffers as browse mode, as the term "virtual buffer" is rather meaningless to most users. (#1509)
segment.target: NVDA-ino korisniko suelje i dokumentacija sada se odnose na virtualne meuspremnike kao nain pregledavanja, jer je izraz "virtualni meuspremnik" prilino besmislen za veinu korisnika. (#1509)

segment.source: When the user wishes to copy their user settings to the system profile for use on the logon screen, etc., and their settings contain custom plugins, they are now warned that this could be a security risk. (#1426)
segment.target: Kada korisnik eli kopirati svoje korisnike postavke u profil sustava za koritenje na zaslonu za prijavu itd., a njegove postavke sadre prilagoene dodatke, sada je upozoren da bi to mogao predstavljati sigurnosni rizik. (#1426)

segment.source: The NVDA service no longer starts and stops NVDA on user input desktops.
segment.target: NVDA usluga vie ne pokree i ne zaustavlja NVDA na radnim povrinama s korisnikim unosom.

segment.source: On Windows XP and Windows Vista, NVDA no longer makes use of UI Automation even if it is available via the platform update. Although using UI Automation can improve the accessibility of some modern applications, on XP and Vista there were too many freezes, crashes and over all performance loss while using it. (#1437)
segment.target: U sustavima Windows XP i Windows Vista, NVDA vie ne koristi automatizaciju korisnikog suelja ak i ako je dostupna putem auriranja platforme. Iako koritenje automatizacije korisnikog suelja moe poboljati pristupanost nekih modernih aplikacija, na XP-u i Visti bilo je previe zamrzavanja, padova i gubitka performansi tijekom koritenja. (#1437)

segment.source: In applications using Mozilla Gecko 2 and later (such as Firefox 4 and later), a document can now be read in browse mode before it is fully finished loading.
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste Mozilla Gecko 2 i novije (kao to su Firefox 4 i noviji), dokument se sada moe itati u nainu pregledavanja prije nego to se u potpunosti zavri s uitavanjem.

segment.source: NVDA now announces the state of a container when focus moves to a control inside it (e.g. if focus moves inside a document that is still loading it will report it as busy).
segment.target: NVDA sada objavljuje stanje spremnika kada se fokus pomakne na kontrolu unutar njega (npr. ako se fokus pomakne unutar dokumenta koji se jo uvijek uitava, prijavit e ga kao zauzet).

segment.source: NVDA's user interface and documentation no longer use the terms "first child" and "parent" with respect to object navigation, as these terms are confusing for many users.
segment.target: NVDA-ino korisniko suelje i dokumentacija vie ne koriste izraze "prvi potomak" i "roditelj" u odnosu na navigaciju objektima, jer su ti pojmovi zbunjujui za mnoge korisnike.

segment.source: Collapsed is no longer reported for some menu items which have sub-menus.
segment.target: Saeto se vie ne prijavljuje za neke stavke izbornika koje imaju podizbornike.

segment.source: The reportCurrentFormatting script (NVDA+f) now reports the formatting at the position of the review cursor rather than the system caret / focus. As by default the review cursor follows the caret, most people should not notice a difference. However this now enables the user to find out the formatting when moving the review cursor, such as in flat review.
segment.target: Skripta reportCurrentFormatting (NVDA+f) sada izvjetava o oblikovanju na poloaju kursora pregleda, a ne na kursoru / fokusu sustava. Budui da prema zadanim postavkama kursor pregleda slijedi kursor, veina ljudi ne bi trebala primijetiti razliku. Meutim, to sada omoguuje korisniku da sazna oblikovanje prilikom pomicanja kursora pregleda, kao to je u ravnom pregledu.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: Collapsing combo boxes in browse mode documents when focus mode has been forced with NVDA+space no longer auto-switches back to browse mode. (#1386)
segment.target: Slaganje kombiniranih okvira u dokumentima u nainu pregledavanja kada je nain fokusiranja forsiran s NVDA+razmakom vie se ne prebacuje automatski natrag u nain pregledavanja. (#1386)

segment.source: In Gecko (e.g. Firefox) and MSHTML (e.g. Internet Explorer) documents, NVDA now correctly renders certain text on the same line which was previously rendered on separate lines. (#1378)
segment.target: U Gecko (npr. Firefox) i MSHTML (npr. Internet Explorer) dokumentima, NVDA sada ispravno renderira odreeni tekst u istom retku koji je prethodno bio prikazan u zasebnim redovima. (#1378)

segment.source: When Braille is tethered to review and the navigator object is moved to a browse mode document, either manually or due to a focus change, braille will appropriately show the browse mode content. (#1406, #1407)
segment.target: Kada je Brailleovo pismo vezano za pregled, a objekt navigatora premjeten u dokument naina pregledavanja, bilo runo ili zbog promjene fokusa, Brailleovo pismo e na odgovarajui nain prikazati sadraj naina pregledavanja. (#1406, #1407)

segment.source: When speaking of punctuation is disabled, certain punctuation is no longer incorrectly spoken when using some synthesisers. (#332)
segment.target: Kada je interpunkcija onemoguena, odreena interpunkcija vie nije pogreno izgovorena kada se koriste neki sintetizatori. (#332)

segment.source: Problems no longer occur when loading configuration for synthesisers which do not support the voice setting such as Audiologic Tts3. (#1347)
segment.target: Problemi se vie ne javljaju prilikom uitavanja konfiguracije za sintetizatore koji ne podravaju glasovnu postavku, kao to je Audiologic Tts3. (#1347)

segment.source: The Skype Extras menu is now read correctly. (#648)
segment.target: Izbornik Skype Extras sada se ispravno ita. (#648)

segment.source: Checking the Brightness controls volume checkbox in the Mouse Settings dialog should no longer cause a major lag for beeps when moving the mouse around the screen on Windows Vista/Windows 7 with Aero enabled. (#1183)
segment.target: Potvrdivanje okvira Glasnoa kontrola svjetline u dijalokom okviru Postavke mia vie ne bi trebalo uzrokovati veliko kanjenje zvunih signala prilikom pomicanja mia po zaslonu u sustavu Windows Vista/Windows 7 s omoguenom znaajkom Aero. (#1183)

segment.source: When NVDA is configured to use the laptop keyboard layout, NVDA+delete now works as documented to report the dimensions of the current navigator object. (#1498)
segment.target: Kada je NVDA konfiguriran za koritenje rasporeda tipkovnice prijenosnog raunala, NVDA+delete sada radi kao to je dokumentirano za izvjetavanje o dimenzijama trenutnog objekta navigatora. (#1498)

segment.source: NVDA now Appropriately honours the aria-selected attribute in Internet Explorer documents.
segment.target: NVDA sada prikladno potuje atribut koji je odabrao aria u dokumentima Internet Explorera.

segment.source: When NVDA automatically switches to focus mode in browse mode documents, it now announces information about the context of the focus. For example, if a list box item receives focus, the list box will be announced first. (#1491)
segment.target: Kada se NVDA automatski prebaci u nain fokusiranja u dokumentima u nainu pregledavanja, sada objavljuje informacije o kontekstu fokusa. Na primjer, ako stavka okvira s popisom dobije fokus, okvir s popisom bit e najavljen prvi. (#1491)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, ARIA listbox controls are now treeted as lists, rather than list items.
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama ARIA kontrole okvira s popisom sada se postavljaju kao popisi, a ne kao stavke popisa.

segment.source: When a read-only editable text control receives focus, NVDA now reports that it is read-only. (#1436)
segment.target: Kada kontrola teksta koja se moe ureivati samo za itanje dobije fokus, NVDA sada izvjetava da je samo za itanje. (#1436)

segment.source: In browse mode, NVDA now behaves correctly with respect to read-only editable text fields.
segment.target: U nainu pregledavanja, NVDA se sada ispravno ponaa u odnosu na tekstualna polja koja se mogu ureivati samo za itanje.

segment.source: In browse mode documents, NVDA no longer incorrectly switches out of focus mode when aria-activedescendant is set; e.g. when the completion list appeared in some auto complete controls.
segment.target: U dokumentima u nainu pregledavanja, NVDA se vie ne prebacuje pogreno iz fokusa kada je podeena aria-activedescendant; npr. kada se popis dovretka pojavio u nekim kontrolama automatskog dovravanja.

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, the name of controls is now reported when moving focus or using quick navigation in browse mode.
segment.target: U programu Adobe Reader, nazivi kontrola sada se prijavljuju prilikom pomicanja fokusa ili koritenja brze navigacije u nainu pregledavanja.

segment.source: In XFA PDF documents in Adobe Reader, buttons, links and graphics are now rendered correctly.
segment.target: U XFA PDF dokumentima u programu Adobe Reader, gumbi, veze i grafike sada se ispravno prikazuju.

segment.source: In XFA PDF documents in Adobe Reader, all elements are now rendered on separate lines. This change was made because large sections (sometimes even the entire document) were being rendered without breaks due to the general lack of structure in these documents.
segment.target: U XFA PDF dokumentima u Adobe Readeru svi se elementi sada prikazuju u zasebnim linijama. Ova promjena je napravljena jer su se veliki dijelovi (ponekad ak i cijeli dokument) prikazivali bez prekida zbog opeg nedostatka strukture u tim dokumentima.

segment.source: Fixed problems when moving focus to or away from editable text fields in XFA PDF documents in Adobe Reader.
segment.target: Rijeeni su problemi pri premjetanju fokusa na ili s tekstualnih polja koja se mogu ureivati u XFA PDF dokumentima u programu Adobe Reader.

segment.source: In XFA PDF documents in Adobe Reader, changes to the value of a focused combo box will now be reported.
segment.target: U XFA PDF dokumentima u programu Adobe Reader sada e se izvjetavati o promjenama vrijednosti fokusiranog kombiniranog okvira.

segment.source: Owner-drawn Combo boxes such as the ones to choose colors in Outlook Express are now accessible with NVDA. (#1340)
segment.target: Kombinirani okviri koje su nacrtali vlasnici, kao to su oni za odabir boja u programu Outlook Express, sada su dostupni uz NVDA. (#1340)

segment.source: In languages which use a space as a digit group/thousands separator such as French and German, numbers from separate chunks of text are no longer pronounced as a single number. This was particularly problematic for table cells containing numbers. (#555)
segment.target: U jezicima koji koriste razmak kao grupu znamenki/razdjelnik tisua, kao to su francuski i njemaki, brojevi iz zasebnih dijelova teksta vie se ne izgovaraju kao jedan broj. To je bilo posebno problematino za elije tablice koje sadre brojeve. (#555)

segment.source: nodes with an ARIA role of description in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls now are classed as static text, not edit fields.
segment.target: vorovi s ARIA ulogom opisa u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama sada se klasificiraju kao statini tekst, a ne polja za ureivanje.

segment.source: Fixed various issues when pressing tab while focus is on a document in browse mode (e.g. tab inappropriately moving to the address bar in Internet Explorer). (#720, #1367)
segment.target: Rijeeni su razni problemi prilikom pritiskanja tabulatora dok je fokus na dokumentu u nainu pregledavanja (npr. kartica se neprimjereno premjeta u adresnu traku u pregledniku Internet Explorer). (#720, #1367)

segment.source: When entering lists while reading text, NVDA now says, for example, "list with 5 items" instead of "listwith 5 items". (#1515)
segment.target: Prilikom unosa popisa tijekom itanja teksta, NVDA sada kae, na primjer, "popis s 5 stavki" umjesto "popis s 5 stavki". (#1515)

segment.source: In input help mode, gestures are logged even if their scripts bypass input help such as the scroll braille display forward and back commands.
segment.target: U nainu pomoi za unos, geste se biljee ak i ako njihove skripte zaobilaze pomo za unos kao to su naredbe za pomicanje brajice naprijed i natrag.

segment.source: In input help mode, when a modifier is held down on the keyboard, NVDA no longer reports the modifier as if it is modifying itself; e.g. NVDA+NVDA.
segment.target: U nainu pomoi za unos, kada se modifikator dri pritisnutim na tipkovnici, NVDA vie ne izvjetava o modifikatoru kao da se mijenja; npr. NVDA+NVDA.

segment.source: In Adobe Reader documents, pressing c or shift+c to navigate to a combo box now works.
segment.target: U dokumentima programa Adobe Reader sada funkcionira pritisak na c ili shift+c za navigaciju do kombiniranog okvira.

segment.source: The selected state of selectable table rows is now reported the same way it is for list and tree view items.
segment.target: Odabrano stanje redaka tablice koje se mogu odabrati sada se prijavljuje na isti nain kao i za stavke prikaza popisa i stabla.

segment.source: Controls in Firefox and other Gecko applications can now be activated while in browse mode even if their content has been floated off-screen. (#801)
segment.target: Kontrole u Firefoxu i drugim Gecko aplikacijama sada se mogu aktivirati dok su u nainu pregledavanja, ak i ako je njihov sadraj prebaen izvan zaslona. (#801)

segment.source: You can no longer show an NVDA settings dialog while a message dialog is being shown, as the settings dialog was frozen in this case. (#1451)
segment.target: Vie ne moete prikazivati dijaloki okvir NVDA postavki dok se prikazuje dijaloki okvir s porukom, jer je dijaloki okvir postavki u ovom sluaju zamrznut. (#1451)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, there is no longer a lag when holding down or rapidly pressing keys to move between or select cells.
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel vie nema kanjenja prilikom dranja ili brzog pritiskanja tipki za kretanje izmeu elija ili odabir elija.

segment.source: Fixed intermittent crashes of the NVDA service which meant that NVDA stopped running on secure Windows screens.
segment.target: Ispravljeni su povremeni padovi NVDA servisa to je znailo da je NVDA prestao raditi na sigurnim Windows zaslonima.

segment.source: Fixed problems that sometimes occurred with braille displays when a change caused text that was being displayed to disappear. (#1377)
segment.target: Rijeeni su problemi koji su se ponekad pojavljivali na zaslonima brajice kada je promjena uzrokovala nestanak teksta koji se prikazuje. (#1377)

segment.source: The downloads window in Internet Explorer 9 can now be navigated and read with NVDA. (#1280)
segment.target: Prozor za preuzimanje u Internet Exploreru 9 sada se moe kretati i itati pomou NVDA. (#1280)

segment.source: It is no longer possible to accidentally start multiple copies of NVDA at the same time. (#507)
segment.target: Vie nije mogue sluajno pokrenuti vie kopija NVDA ureaja u isto vrijeme. (#507)

segment.source: On slow systems, NVDA no longer inappropriately causes its main window to be shown all the time while running. (#726)
segment.target: Na sporim sustavima, NVDA vie ne uzrokuje neprimjereno prikazivanje glavnog prozora cijelo vrijeme dok radi. (#726)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes on Windows xP when starting a WPF application. (#1437)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne rui u sustavu Windows xP prilikom pokretanja WPF aplikacije. (#1437)

segment.source: Say all and say all with review are now able to work in UI automation text controls that support all required functionality. For example, you can now use say all with review on XPS Viewer documents.
segment.target: Reci sve i reci sve s pregledom sada mogu raditi u tekstualnim kontrolama za automatizaciju korisnikog suelja koje podravaju sve potrebne funkcionalnosti. Na primjer, sada moete koristiti Recimo sve s pregledom na dokumentima XPS Viewer.

segment.source: NVDA no longer inappropriately classes some list items in the Outlook Express / Windows Live Mail message rules Apply Now dialog as being checkboxes. (#576)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne klasificira neke stavke popisa u Outlook Express / Windows Live Mail pravilima za poruke Primijeni sada kao potvrdne okvire. (#576)

segment.source: Combo boxes are no longer reported as having a sub-menu.
segment.target: Kombinirani okviri vie se ne prijavljuju kao da imaju podizbornik.

segment.source: NVDA is now able to read the recipiants in the To, CC and BCC fields in Microsoft Outlook. (#421)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe itati prijemnike u poljima Za, CC i BCC u Microsoft Outlooku. (#421)

segment.source: Fixed the issue in NVDA's Voice Settings dialog where the value of sliders was sometimes not reported when changed. (#1411)
segment.target: Rijeen je problem u NVDA dijalokom okviru Glasovne postavke gdje se vrijednost klizaa ponekad nije prijavljivala kada se mijenja. (#1411)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce the new cell when moving in an Excel spreadsheet after cutting and pasting. (#1567)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne proputa najavljivati novu eliju prilikom premjetanja u Excel proraunskoj tablici nakon izrezivanja i lijepljenja. (#1567)

segment.source: NVDA no longer becomes worse at guessing color names the more colors it announces.
segment.target: NVDA vie ne postaje loiji u pogaanju imena boja to vie boja najavljuje.

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, fixed the inability to read parts of rare pages which contain iframes marked with an ARIA role of presentation. (#1569)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama ispravljena je nemogunost itanja dijelova rijetkih stranica koje sadre iframe oznaene ARIA ulogom prezentacije. (#1569)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, fixed a rare problem where the focus kept bouncing infinitely between the document and a multi-line editable text field in focus mode. (#1566)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama rijeen je rijedak problem zbog kojeg se fokus nastavio beskonano pomicati izmeu dokumenta i tekstnog polja koje se moe ureivati u vie redaka u nainu fokusa. (#1566)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word 2010 NVDA will now automatically read confirmation dialogs. (#1538)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word 2010 NVDA e sada automatski itati dijaloke okvire za potvrdu. (#1538)

segment.source: In multi-line editable text fields in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, selection on lines after the first is now reported correctly. (#1590)
segment.target: U tekstnim poljima koja se mogu ureivati u vie redaka u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama, odabir u recima nakon prvog sada se ispravno prijavljuje. (#1590)

segment.source: Improved moving by word in many cases, including browse mode and Windows Edit controls. (#1580)
segment.target: Poboljano pomicanje po rijei u mnogim sluajevima, ukljuujui nain pregledavanja i kontrole ureivanja sustava Windows. (#1580)

segment.source: The NVDA installer no longer shows garbled text for Hong Kong versions of Windows Vista and Windows 7. (#1596)
segment.target: NVDA instalacijski program vie ne prikazuje iskrivljeni tekst za hongkonke verzije sustava Windows Vista i Windows 7. (#1596)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to load the Microsoft Speech API version 5 synthesizer if the configuration contains settings for that synthesizer but is missing the voice setting. (#1599)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne uspijeva uitati sintisajzer Microsoft Speech API-ja verzije 5 ako konfiguracija sadri postavke za taj sintisajzer, ali nedostaje glasovna postavka. (#1599)

segment.source: In editable text fields in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, NVDA no longer lags or freezes when braille is enabled.
segment.target: U tekstnim poljima koja se mogu ureivati u Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama, NVDA vie ne zaostaje ili se zamrzava kada je omoguena brajica.

segment.source: In firefox brows mode, NVDA no longer refuses to include content that is inside a focusable node with an ARIA role of presentation.
segment.target: U Firefox modu pregleda, NVDA vie ne odbija ukljuiti sadraj koji se nalazi unutar vora koji se moe fokusirati s ARIA ulogom prezentacije.

segment.source: In Microsoft Word with braille enabled, lines on pages after the first page are now reported correctly. (#1603)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word s omoguenom brajicom, redovi na stranicama nakon prve stranice sada se ispravno prijavljuju. (#1603)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word 2003, lines of right-to-left text can once again be read with braille enabled. (#627)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word 2003 redovi teksta koji se piu zdesna nalijevo mogu se ponovno itati s omoguenom Brailleovom pismom. (#627)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, say all now works correctly when the document does not end with a sentence ending.
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word, recimo da sve sada radi ispravno kada dokument ne zavrava zavretkom reenice.

segment.source: When opening a plain text message in Windows Live Mail 2011, NVDA will correctly focus on the message document allowing it to be read.
segment.target: Prilikom otvaranja obine tekstualne poruke u programu Windows Live Mail 2011, NVDA e se ispravno usredotoiti na dokument poruke koji omoguuje itanje.

segment.source: NVDA no longer temporarily freezes or refuses to speak when in the Move to / Copy to dialogs in Windows Live Mail. (#574)
segment.target: NVDA se vie privremeno ne zamrzava ili odbija govoriti u dijalokom okviru Premjesti u / Kopiraj u u Windows Live Mailu. (#574)

segment.source: In Outlook 2010, NVDA will now correctly track the focus in the message list. (#1285)
segment.target: U programu Outlook 2010 NVDA e sada ispravno pratiti fokus na popisu poruka. (#1285)

segment.source: Some USB connection issues have been resolved with the MDV Lilli braille display. (#241)
segment.target: Neki problemi s USB vezom rijeeni su s MDV Lilli brajinim zaslonom. (#241)

segment.source: In Internet explorer and other MSHTML controls, spaces are no longer ignored in browse mode in certain cases (e.g. after a link).
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama razmaci se vie ne zanemaruju u nainu pregledavanja u odreenim sluajevima (npr. nakon veze).

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, some extraneous line breaks have been eliminated in browse mode. specifically, HTML elements with a display style of None no longer force a line break. (#1685)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama uklonjeni su neki suvini prijelomi redaka u nainu pregledavanja. konkretno, HTML elementi sa stilom prikaza None vie ne forsiraju prijelom retka. (#1685)

segment.source: If NVDA is unable to start, failure to play the Windows critical stop sound no longer clobbers the critical error message in the log file.
segment.target: Ako se NVDA ne moe pokrenuti, neuspjeh reprodukcije Windows kritinog zvuka zaustavljanja vie ne ometa kritinu poruku o pogreci u datoteci dnevnika.

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Developer documentation can now be generated using SCons. See readme.txt at the root of the source distribution for details, including associated dependencies.
segment.target: Dokumentacija za razvojne inenjere sada se moe generirati pomou SCons-a. Pojedinosti potraite u readme.txt u korijenu izvorne distribucije, ukljuujui povezane ovisnosti.

segment.source: Locales can now provide descriptions for characters. See the Character Descriptions section of the Developer Guide for details. (#55)
segment.target: Regionalne sheme sada mogu pruati opise znakova. Pojedinosti potraite u odjeljku Opisi znakova u Vodiu za razvojne programere. (#55)

segment.source: Locales can now provide information about the pronunciation of specific punctuation and other symbols. See the Symbol Pronunciation section of the Developer Guide for details. (#332)
segment.target: Regionalne sheme sada mogu pruati informacije o izgovoru odreenih interpunkcijskih znakova i drugih simbola. Pojedinosti potraite u odjeljku Izgovor simbola u Vodiu za razvojne programere. (#332)

segment.source: You can now build NVDAHelper with several debugging options using the nvdaHelperDebugFlags SCons variable. See readme.txt at the root of the source distribution for details. (#1390)
segment.target: Sada moete izgraditi NVDAHelper s nekoliko opcija za otklanjanje pogreaka pomou varijable nvdaHelperDebugFlags SCons. Pojedinosti potraite u readme.txt u korijenu izvorne distribucije. (#1390)

segment.source: Synth drivers are now passed a sequence of text and speech commands to speak, instead of just text and an index.
segment.target: Sintisajzerskim upravljakim programima sada se prosljeuje niz tekstualnih i govornih naredbi za govor, umjesto samo teksta i indeksa.

segment.source: This allows for embedded indexes, parameter changes, etc.
segment.target: To omoguuje ugraene indekse, promjene parametara itd.

segment.source: Drivers should implement SynthDriver.speak() instead of SynthDriver.speakText() and SynthDriver.speakCharacter().
segment.target: Upravljaki programi trebaju implementirati SynthDriver.speak() umjesto SynthDriver.speakText() i SynthDriver.speakCharacter().

segment.source: The old methods will be used if SynthDriver.speak() is not implemented, but they are deprecated and will be removed in a future release.
segment.target: Stare metode e se koristiti ako SynthDriver.speak() nije implementiran, ali su zastarjele i bit e uklonjene u buduem izdanju.

segment.source: gui.execute() has been removed. wx.CallAfter() should be used instead.
segment.target: gui.execute() je uklonjen. wx. Umjesto toga treba koristiti CallAfter().

segment.source: gui.scriptUI has been removed.
segment.target: gui.scriptUI je uklonjen.

segment.source: For message dialogs, use wx.CallAfter(gui.messageBox, ...).
segment.target: Za dijaloke okvire poruka koristite wx. CallAfter(gui.messageBox, ...).

segment.source: For all other dialogs, real wx dialogs should be used instead.
segment.target: Za sve ostale dijaloke okvire umjesto toga treba koristiti prave wx dijaloke okvire.

segment.source: A new gui.runScriptModalDialog() function simplifies using modal dialogs from scripts.
segment.target: Nova funkcija gui.runScriptModalDialog() pojednostavljuje koritenje modalnih dijalokih okvira iz skripti.

segment.source: Synth drivers can now support boolean settings. See SynthDriverHandler.BooleanSynthSetting.
segment.target: Sintisajzerski upravljaki programi sada mogu podravati booleove postavke. Pogledajte SynthDriverHandler.BooleanSynthSetting.

segment.source: SCons now accepts a certTimestampServer variable specifying the URL of a timestamping server to use to timestamp authenticode signatures. (#1644)
segment.target: SCons sada prihvaa varijablu certTimestampServer koja specificira URL posluitelja za vremenske oznake koji e se koristiti za oznaavanje autentinih potpisa vremenskim igovima. (#1644)

segment.source: This release fixes several security and other important issues found in NVDA 2011.1.
segment.target: Ovo izdanje rjeava nekoliko sigurnosnih i drugih vanih problema pronaenih u NVDA 2011.1.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: The Donate item in the NVDA menu is now disabled when running on the logon, lock, UAC and other secure Windows screens, as this is a security risk. (#1419)
segment.target: Stavka Doniraj u NVDA izborniku sada je onemoguena kada se pokree na zaslonu za prijavu, zakljuavanje, UAC i drugim sigurnim Windows zaslonima jer predstavlja sigurnosni rizik. (#1419)

segment.source: It is now impossible to copy or paste within NVDA's user interface while on secure desktops (lock screen, UAC screen and windows logon) as this is a security risk. (#1421)
segment.target: Sada je nemogue kopirati ili zalijepiti unutar NVDA korisnikog suelja dok ste na sigurnim radnim povrinama (zakljuani zaslon, UAC zaslon i prijava u sustav Windows) jer to predstavlja sigurnosni rizik. (#1421)

segment.source: In Firefox 4, the move to containing virtual buffer command (NVDA+control+space) now works as it should to escape embedded objects such as Flash content. (#1429)
segment.target: U Firefoxu 4, prelazak na naredbu za sadravanje virtualnog meuspremnika (NVDA+kontrola+razmak) sada radi kako bi trebao bjeati od ugraenih objekata kao to je Flash sadraj. (#1429)

segment.source: When speaking of command keys is enabled, shifted characters are no longer incorrectly spoken as command keys. (#1422)
segment.target: Kada je omogueno upravljanje naredbenim tipkama, pomaknuti znakovi vie se ne izgovaraju pogreno kao naredbene tipke. (#1422)

segment.source: When speaking of command keys is enabled, pressing space with modifiers other than shift (such as control and alt) is now reported as a command key. (#1424)
segment.target: Kada govorimo o naredbenim tipkama je omogueno, pritiskanje razmaka s modifikatorima koji nisu shift (kao to su control i alt) sada se prijavljuje kao naredbena tipka. (#1424)

segment.source: Logging is now completely disabled when running on the logon, lock, UAC and other secure Windows screens, as this is a security risk. (#1435)
segment.target: Zapisivanje je sada potpuno onemogueno kada se izvodi na zaslonima za prijavu, zakljuavanje, UAC i drugim sigurnim Windows zaslonima, jer je to sigurnosni rizik. (#1435)

segment.source: In input help mode, Gestures are now logged even if they are not bound to a script (in accordance with the user guide). (#1425)
segment.target: U nainu pomoi za unos, geste se sada biljee ak i ako nisu vezane za skriptu (u skladu s korisnikim prirunikom). (#1425)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include automatic reporting of new text output in mIRC, PuTTY, Tera Term and SecureCRT; support for global plugins; announcement of bullets and numbering in Microsoft Word; additional key bindings for braille displays, including keys to move to the next and previous line; support for several Baum, HumanWare and APH braille displays; and reporting of colors for some controls, including IBM Lotus Symphony text controls.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja ukljuuju automatsko izvjetavanje o novom tekstualnom ispisu u mIRC-u, PuTTY-u, Tera Termu i SecureCRT-u; podrka za globalne dodatke; najava grafikih oznaka i numeriranja u programu Microsoft Word; dodatna povezivanja tipki za brajice, ukljuujui tipke za prelazak na sljedei i prethodni redak; podrka za nekoliko Baum, HumanWare i APH Brailleovih zaslona; i izvjetavanje o bojama za neke kontrole, ukljuujui IBM Lotus Symphony tekstualne kontrole.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Colors can now be reported for some controls. Automatic announcement can be configured in the Document Formatting preferences dialog. It can also be reported on demand using the report text formatting command (NVDA+f).
segment.target: Boje se sada mogu prijaviti za neke kontrole. Automatska najava moe se konfigurirati u dijalokom okviru preferenci formatiranja dokumenta. Takoer se moe prijaviti na zahtjev pomou naredbe za oblikovanje teksta izvjea (NVDA+f).

segment.source: Initially, this is supported in standard IAccessible2 editable text controls (such as in Mozilla applications), RichEdit controls (such as in Wordpad) and IBM Lotus Symphony text controls.
segment.target: U poetku, ovo je podrano u standardnim IAccessible2 ureivakim kontrolama teksta (kao to su Mozilla aplikacije), RichEdit kontrolama (kao to je u Wordpadu) i IBM Lotus Symphony tekstualnim kontrolama.

segment.source: In virtual buffers, you can now select by page (using shift+pageDown and shift+pageUp) and paragraph (using shift+control+downArrow and shift+control+upArrow). (#639)
segment.target: U virtualnim meuspremnikima sada moete birati po stranici (koristei shift+pageDown i shift+pageUp) i paragrafu (koristei shift+control+downArrow i shift+control+downArrow). (#639)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports new text output in mIRC, PuTTY, Tera Term and SecureCRT. (#936)
segment.target: NVDA sada automatski izvjetava o novom tekstualnom izlazu u mIRC-u, PuTTY-u, Tera Termu i SecureCRT-u. (#936)

segment.source: Users can now add new key bindings or override existing ones for any script in NVDA by providing a single user input gesture map. (#194)
segment.target: Korisnici sada mogu dodati nove veze tipki ili nadjaati postojee za bilo koju skriptu u NVDA pruajui jednu kartu geste unosa korisnika. (#194)

segment.source: Support for global plugins. Global plugins can add new functionality to NVDA which works across all applications. (#281)
segment.target: Podrka za globalne dodatke. Globalni dodaci mogu dodati nove funkcionalnosti NVDA koja radi u svim aplikacijama. (#281)

segment.source: A small beep is now heard when typing characters with the shift key while capslock is on. This can be turned off by unchecking the related new option in the Keyboard settings dialog. (#663)
segment.target: Sada se uje mali zvuni signal prilikom tipkanja znakova tipkom shift dok je capslock ukljuen. To se moe iskljuiti tako da ponitite odabir povezane nove opcije u dijalokom okviru Postavke tipkovnice. (#663)

segment.source: hard page breaks are now announced when moving by line in Microsoft Word. (#758)
segment.target: tvrdi prijelomi stranica sada se najavljuju prilikom premjetanja po retku u programu Microsoft Word. (#758)

segment.source: Bullets and numbering are now spoken in Microsoft Word when moving by line. (#208)
segment.target: Grafike oznake i numeriranje sada se izgovaraju u programu Microsoft Word prilikom kretanja po liniji. (#208)

segment.source: A command to toggle Sleep mode for the current application (NVDA+shift+s) is now available. Sleep mode (previously known as self voicing mode) disables all screen reading functionality in NVDA for a particular application. Very useful for applications that provide their own speech and or screen reading features. Press this command again to disable Sleep mode.
segment.target: Sada je dostupna naredba za prebacivanje stanja mirovanja za trenutnu aplikaciju (NVDA+shift+s). Stanje mirovanja (ranije poznato kao nain samoizraavanja) onemoguuje sve funkcije itanja zaslona u NVDA za odreenu aplikaciju. Vrlo korisno za aplikacije koje pruaju vlastite znaajke itanja govora i/ili zaslona. Ponovno pritisnite ovu naredbu da biste onemoguili stanje mirovanja.

segment.source: Some additional braille display key bindings have been added. See the Supported Braille Displays section of the User Guide for details. (#209)
segment.target: Dodane su neke dodatne veze s tipkama na Brailleovom pismu. Pojedinosti potraite u odjeljku Podrani brajini zasloni u Korisnikom priruniku. (#209)

segment.source: For the convenience of third party developers, app modules as well as global plugins can now be reloaded without restarting NVDA. Use tools -> Reload plugins in the NVDA menu or NVDA+control+f3. (#544)
segment.target: Radi praktinosti programera treih strana, moduli aplikacije kao i globalni dodaci sada se mogu ponovno uitati bez ponovnog pokretanja NVDA-e. Koristite alati -> Ponovno uitajte dodatke u NVDA izborniku ili NVDA+kontrola+f3. (#544)

segment.source: NVDA now remembers the position you were at when returning to a previously visited web page. This applies until either the browser or NVDA is exited. (#132)
segment.target: NVDA sada pamti poziciju na kojoj ste se nalazili kada ste se vratili na prethodno posjeenu web stranicu. To vrijedi sve dok se ne zatvori preglednik ili NVDA. (#132)

segment.source: Handy Tech braille displays can now be used without installing the Handy Tech universal driver. (#854)
segment.target: Zasloni za brajicu Handy Tech sada se mogu koristiti bez instaliranja univerzalnog upravljakog programa Handy Tech. (#854)

segment.source: Support for several Baum, HumanWare and APH braille displays. (#937)
segment.target: Podrka za nekoliko Baum, HumanWare i APH Brailleovih zaslona. (#937)

segment.source: The status bar in Media Player Classic Home Cinema is now recognised.
segment.target: Traka stanja u programu Media Player Classic Home Cinema sada je prepoznata.

segment.source: The Freedom Scientific Focus 40 Blue braille display can now be used when connected via bluetooth. (#1345)
segment.target: Brajevi zaslon Freedom Scientific Focus 40 Blue sada se moe koristiti kada je povezan putem bluetootha. (#1345)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Position information is no longer reported by default in some cases where it was usually incorrect; e.g. most menus, the Running Applications bar, the Notification Area, etc. However, this can be turned on again by an added option in the Object Presentation settings dialog.
segment.target: Informacije o poziciji vie se ne prijavljuju prema zadanim postavkama u nekim sluajevima kada su obino bile netone; npr. veina izbornika, traka pokrenutih aplikacija, podruje obavijesti itd. Meutim, to se moe ponovno ukljuiti dodanom opcijom u dijalokom okviru postavki Prikaz objekta.

segment.source: Keyboard help has been renamed to input help to reflect that it handles input from sources other than the keyboard.
segment.target: Pomo za tipkovnicu preimenovana je u pomo za unos kako bi odraavala da obrauje unos iz izvora koji nisu tipkovnica.

segment.source: Input Help no longer reports a script's code location via speech and braille as it is cryptic and irrelevant to the user. However, it is now logged for developers and advanced users.
segment.target: Pomo za unos vie ne izvjetava o lokaciji koda skripte putem govora i Brailleovog pisma jer je zagonetna i nebitna za korisnika. Meutim, sada je zabiljeen za programere i napredne korisnike.

segment.source: When NVDA detects that it has frozen, it continues to intercept NVDA modifier keys, even though it passes all other keys through to the system. This prevents the user from unintentionally toggling caps lock, etc. if they press an NVDA modifier key without realising NVDA has frozen. (#939)
segment.target: Kada NVDA otkrije da se zamrznuo, nastavlja presretati NVDA modifikatorske kljueve, iako sve ostale kljueve prosljeuje sustavu. To sprjeava korisnika da nenamjerno ukljui caps lock itd. ako pritisne tipku za modifikaciju NVDA, a da ne shvati da se NVDA zamrznula. (#939)

segment.source: If keys are held down after using the pass next key through command, all keys (including key repeats) are now passed through until the last key is released.
segment.target: Ako se tipke dre pritisnute nakon koritenja naredbe pass next key through, sve tipke (ukljuujui ponavljanja tipki) sada se prosljeuju dok se ne otpusti posljednja tipka.

segment.source: If an NVDA modifier key is pressed twice in quick succession to pass it through and the second press is held down, all key repeats will now be passed through as well.
segment.target: Ako se pritisne NVDA tipka modifikatora dva puta u brzom slijedu kako bi se proslijedila, a drugi pritisak je pritisnut, sada e se proslijediti i sva ponavljanja tipki.

segment.source: The volume up, down and mute keys are now reported in input help. This could be helpful if the user is uncertain as to what these keys are.
segment.target: Tipke za pojaavanje, smanjivanje glasnoe i iskljuivanje zvuka sada se prijavljuju u pomoi za unos. To bi moglo biti korisno ako korisnik nije siguran to su ti kljuevi.

segment.source: The hotkey for the Review Cursor item in the NVDA Preferences menu has been changed from r to c to eliminate the conflict with the Braille Settings item.
segment.target: Preac za stavku Pregled kursora u izborniku NVDA postavki promijenjen je iz r u c kako bi se uklonio sukob sa stavkom Postavke brajice.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: When adding a new speech dictionary entry, the title of the dialog is now "Add dictionary entry" instead of "Edit dictionary entry". (#924)
segment.target: Kada dodajete novi unos govornog rjenika, naslov dijalokog okvira sada je "Dodaj unos u rjenik" umjesto "Uredi unos rjenika". (#924)

segment.source: In speech dictionary dialogs, the content of the Regular expression and Case sensitive columns of the Dictionary entries list is now presented in the configured NVDA language instead of always in English.
segment.target: U dijalokim okvirima govornog rjenika, sadraj stupaca Regularni izraz i Velika i mala slova na popisu unosa rjenika sada se prikazuje na konfiguriranom NVDA jeziku umjesto uvijek na engleskom.

segment.source: In AIM, position information is now announced in tree views.
segment.target: U AIM-u se informacije o poloaju sada objavljuju u prikazima stabla.

segment.source: On sliders in the Voice Settings dialog, up arrow/page up/home now increase the setting and down arrow/page down/end decrease it. Previously, the opposite occurred, which is not logical and is inconsistent with the synth settings ring. (#221)
segment.target: Na klizaima u dijalokom okviru Glasovne postavke, strelica gore/stranica gore/poetna sada poveavaju postavku, a strelica prema dolje/stranica prema dolje/kraj smanjuju. Ranije se dogodilo suprotno, to nije logino i nije u skladu s prstenom za postavke sintisajzera. (#221)

segment.source: In virtual buffers with screen layout disabled, some extraneous blank lines no longer appear.
segment.target: U virtualnim meuspremnicima s onemoguenim rasporedom zaslona neke se suvine prazne linije vie ne pojavljuju.

segment.source: If an NVDA modifier key is pressed twice quickly but there is an intervening key press, the NVDA modifier key is no longer passed through on the second press.
segment.target: Ako se tipka za modifikaciju NVDA pritisne dvaput brzo, ali doe do pritiska tipke, tipka za modifikaciju NVDA vie se ne prosljeuje pri drugom pritisku.

segment.source: Punctuation keys are now spoken in input help even when speaking of punctuation is disabled. (#977)
segment.target: Interpunkcijske tipke sada se izgovaraju u pomoi za unos ak i kada je govor o interpunkciji onemoguen. (#977)

segment.source: In the Keyboard Settings dialog, the keyboard layout names are now presented in the configured NVDA language instead of always in English. (#558)
segment.target: U dijalokom okviru Postavke tipkovnice, nazivi rasporeda tipkovnice sada su prikazani na konfiguriranom NVDA jeziku umjesto uvijek na engleskom. (#558)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where some items were rendered as empty in Adobe Reader documents; e.g. the links in the table of contents of the Apple iPhone IOS 4.1 User Guide.
segment.target: Rijeen je problem zbog kojeg su neke stavke prikazane kao prazne u dokumentima programa Adobe Reader; npr. poveznice u sadraju Korisnikog prirunika za Apple iPhone IOS 4.1.

segment.source: The "Use currently saved settings on the logon and other secure screens" button in NVDA's General Settings dialog now works if used immediately after NVDA is newly installed but before a secure screen has appeared. Previously, NVDA reported that copying was successful, but it actually had no effect. (#1194)
segment.target: Gumb "Koristi trenutno spremljene postavke na zaslonu za prijavu i drugim sigurnim zaslonima" u NVDA dijalokom okviru Ope postavke sada radi ako se koristi odmah nakon nove instalacije NVDA-a, ali prije nego to se pojavi siguran zaslon. Prethodno je NVDA izvijestila da je kopiranje bilo uspjeno, ali zapravo nije imalo uinka. (#1194)

segment.source: It is no longer possible to have two NVDA settings dialogs open simultaneously. This fixes issues where one open dialog depends on another open dialog; e.g. changing the synthesiser while the Voice Settings dialog is open. (#603)
segment.target: Vie nije mogue istovremeno otvoriti dva dijaloka okvira NVDA postavki. Ovo rjeava probleme u kojima jedan otvoreni dijaloki okvir ovisi o drugom otvorenom dijalokom okviru; npr. promjena sintisajzera dok je otvoren dijaloki okvir Glasovne postavke. (#603)

segment.source: On systems with UAC enabled, the "Use currently saved settings on the logon and other secure screens" button in NVDA's General Settings dialog no longer fails after the UAC prompt if the user's account name contains a space. (#918)
segment.target: Na sustavima s omoguenim UAC-om, gumb "Koristi trenutno spremljene postavke na zaslonu za prijavu i drugim sigurnim zaslonima" u NVDA dijalokom okviru Ope postavke vie ne uspijeva nakon upita UAC-a ako naziv korisnikog rauna sadri razmak. (#918)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, NVDA now uses the URL as a last resort to determine the name of a link, rather than presenting empty links. (#633)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama, NVDA sada koristi URL kao posljednje sredstvo za odreivanje naziva veze, umjesto da prikazuje prazne veze. (#633)

segment.source: NVDA no longer ignores the focus in AOL Instant Messenger 7 menus. (#655)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne zanemaruje fokus u AOL Instant Messenger 7 izbornicima. (#655)

segment.source: Announce the correct label for errors in the Microsoft Word Spell Check dialog (e.g. Not in dictionary, Grammar error, punctuation). Previously they were all announced as grammar error. (#883)
segment.target: Najavite ispravnu oznaku za pogreke u dijalokom okviru za provjeru pravopisa u programu Microsoft Word (npr. Nije u rjeniku, gramatika pogreka, interpunkcija). Prethodno su svi bili najavljeni kao gramatika pogreka. (#883)

segment.source: Typing in Microsoft Word while using a braille display should no longer cause garbled text to be typed, and a rare freeze when pressing a braille routing key in Word documents has been fixed. (#1212) However a limitation is that Arabic text can no longer be read in Word 2003 and below, while using a braille display. (#627)
segment.target: Tipkanje u programu Microsoft Word tijekom koritenja brajinog zaslona vie ne bi trebalo uzrokovati upisivanje iskrivljenog teksta, a rijetko zamrzavanje prilikom pritiskanja tipke za usmjeravanje brajice u dokumentima programa Word rijeeno je. (#1212) No ogranienje je da se arapski tekst vie ne moe itati u programu Word 2003 i starijim verzijama dok se koristi zaslon za brajicu. (#627)

segment.source: When pressing the delete key in an edit field, the text/cursor on a braille display should now always be updated appropriately to reflect the change. (#947)
segment.target: Kada pritisnete tipku za brisanje u polju za ureivanje, tekst/pokaziva na Brajevom pismu sada bi se uvijek trebao aurirati na odgovarajui nain kako bi odraavao promjenu. (#947)

segment.source: Changes on dynamic pages in Gecko2 documents (E.g. Firefox 4) while multiple tabs are open are now properly reflected by NVDA. Previously only changes in the first tab were reflected. (Mozilla bug 610985)
segment.target: Promjene na dinamikim stranicama u Gecko2 dokumentima (npr. Firefox 4) dok je otvoreno vie kartica sada se ispravno odraavaju u NVDA. Prije su se odraavale samo promjene na prvoj kartici. (Mozilla bug 610985)

segment.source: NVDA can now properly announce the suggestions for grammar and punctuation errors in Microsoft Word spell check dialog. (#704)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe ispravno najaviti prijedloge za gramatike i interpunkcijske pogreke u dijalokom okviru za provjeru pravopisa u programu Microsoft Word. (#704)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, NVDA no longer presents destination anchors as empty links in its virtual buffer. Instead, these anchors are hidden as they should be. (#1326)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama, NVDA vie ne prikazuje odredina sidra kao prazne veze u svom virtualnom meuspremniku. Umjesto toga, ta su sidra skrivena kako bi trebala biti. (#1326)

segment.source: Object navigation around and within standard groupbox windows is no longer broken and asymmetrical.
segment.target: Navigacija objektima oko i unutar standardnih prozora grupnih okvira vie nije pokvarena i asimetrina.

segment.source: In Firefox and other Gecko-based controls, NVDA will no longer get stuck in a subframe if it finishes loading before the outer document.
segment.target: U Firefoxu i drugim kontrolama temeljenim na Gecku, NVDA vie nee zapeti u podokviru ako zavri s uitavanjem prije vanjskog dokumenta.

segment.source: NVDA now appropriately announces the next character when deleting a character with numpadDelete. (#286)
segment.target: NVDA sada prikladno najavljuje sljedei znak prilikom brisanja znaka pomou numpadDelete. (#286)

segment.source: On the Windows XP logon screen, the user name is once again reported when the selected user is changed.
segment.target: Na zaslonu za prijavu u sustav Windows XP korisniko ime ponovno se prijavljuje kada se odabrani korisnik promijeni.

segment.source: Fixed problems when reading text in Windows command consoles with reporting of line numbers enabled.
segment.target: Rijeeni su problemi pri itanju teksta u naredbenim konzolama sustava Windows s omoguenim izvjeivanjem o brojevima redaka.

segment.source: The Elements List dialog for virtual buffers is now usable by sighted users. All controls are visible on screen. (#1321)
segment.target: Dijaloki okvir Popis elemenata za virtualne meuspremnike sada mogu koristiti korisnici koji vide. Sve kontrole vidljive su na zaslonu. (#1321)

segment.source: The list of entries in the Speech Dictionary dialog is now more readable by sighted users. The list is now large enough to show all of its columns on screen. (#90)
segment.target: Popis unosa u dijalokom okviru Rjenik govora sada je itljiviji korisnicima koji vide. Popis je sada dovoljno velik da prikae sve stupce na zaslonu. (#90)

segment.source: On ALVA BC640/BC680 braille displays, NVDA no longer disregards display keys that are still held down after another key is released.
segment.target: Na ALVA BC640/BC680 brajici, NVDA vie ne zanemaruje tipke zaslona koje se i dalje dre pritisnute nakon otputanja druge tipke.

segment.source: Adobe Reader X no longer crashes after leaving the untagged document options before the processing dialog appears. (#1218)
segment.target: Adobe Reader X vie se ne rui nakon naputanja nestrukturiranih opcija dokumenta prije nego to se pojavi dijaloki okvir za obradu. (#1218)

segment.source: NVDA now switches to the appropriate braille display driver when you revert to saved configuration. (#1346)
segment.target: NVDA se sada prebacuje na odgovarajui upravljaki program brajinog zaslona kada se vratite na spremljenu konfiguraciju. (#1346)

segment.source: The Visual Studio 2008 Project Wizard is read correctly again. (#974)
segment.target: arobnjak za projekt Visual Studio 2008 ponovno se ispravno ita. (#974)

segment.source: NVDA no longer completely fails to work in applications which contain non-ASCII characters in their executable name. (#1352)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne radi u potpunosti u aplikacijama koje sadre ne-ASCII znakove u svom izvrnom nazivu. (#1352)

segment.source: When reading by line in AkelPad with word wrap enabled, NVDA no longer reads the first character of the following line at the end of the current line.
segment.target: Kada itate po retku u AkelPadu s omoguenim prelamanjem rijei, NVDA vie ne ita prvi znak sljedeeg retka na kraju trenutnog retka.

segment.source: In the Visual Studio 2005/2008 code editor, NVDA no longer reads the entire text after every typed character. (#975)
segment.target: U ureivau koda Visual Studio 2005/2008, NVDA vie ne ita cijeli tekst nakon svakog upisanog znaka. (#975)

segment.source: Fixed the issue where some braille displays weren't cleared properly when NVDA was exited or the display was changed.
segment.target: Rijeen je problem zbog kojeg neki Brailleovi zasloni nisu bili ispravno obrisani kada je NVDA izaao ili je zaslon promijenjen.

segment.source: The initial focus is no longer sometimes spoken twice when NVDA starts. (#1359)
segment.target: Poetni fokus se vie ne izgovara dva puta kada se NVDA pokrene. (#1359)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: SCons is now used to prepare the source tree and create binary builds, portable archives, installers, etc. See readme.txt at the root of the source distribution for details.
segment.target: SCons se sada koristi za pripremu izvornog stabla i stvaranje binarnih verzija, prijenosnih arhiva, instalacijskih programa itd. Za detalje pogledajte readme.txt u korijenu izvorne distribucije.

segment.source: The key names used by NVDA (including key maps) have been made more friendly/logical; e.g. upArrow instead of extendedUp and numpadPageUp instead of prior. See the vkCodes module for a list.
segment.target: Nazivi kljueva koje koristi NVDA (ukljuujui karte tipki) postali su prijateljskiji/loginiji; npr. upArrow umjesto extendedUp i numpadPageUp umjesto prior. Pogledajte modul vkCodes za popis.

segment.source: All input from the user is now represented by an inputCore.InputGesture instance. (#601)
segment.target: Sav unos korisnika sada je predstavljen instancom inputCore.InputGesture. (#601)

segment.source: Each source of input subclasses the base InputGesture class.
segment.target: Svaki izvor ulaznih podklasa osnovna je klasa InputGesture.

segment.source: Key presses on the system keyboard are encompassed by the keyboardHandler.KeyboardInputGesture class.
segment.target: Pritiski na tipke na tipkovnici sustava obuhvaeni su klasom keyboardHandler.KeyboardInputGesture.

segment.source: Presses of buttons, wheels and other controls on a braille display are encompassed by subclasses of the braille.BrailleDisplayGesture class. These subclasses are provided by each braille display driver.
segment.target: Pritiske gumba, kotaia i drugih kontrola na Brailleovom pismu obuhvaeni su podrazredima brajice. Klasa BrailleDisplayGesture. Ove podklase prua svaki upravljaki program za Brailleovo pismo.

segment.source: Input gestures are bound to ScriptableObjects using the ScriptableObject.bindGesture() method on an instance or an __gestures dict on the class which maps gesture identifiers to script names. See baseObject.ScriptableObject for details.
segment.target: Ulazne geste vezane su za ScriptableObjects pomou metode ScriptableObject.bindGesture() na instanci ili __gestures dikta na klasi koja mapira identifikatore gesta na nazive skripti. Pojedinosti potraite u lanku baseObject.ScriptableObject.

segment.source: App modules no longer have key map files. All input gesture bindings must be done in the app module itself.
segment.target: Moduli aplikacije vie nemaju datoteke s kartama kljueva. Sva povezivanja gestom unosa moraju se izvriti u samom modulu aplikacije.

segment.source: All scripts now take an InputGesture instance instead of a key press.
segment.target: Sve skripte sada uzimaju instancu InputGesture umjesto pritiska tipke.

segment.source: KeyboardInputGestures can be sent on to the OS using the send() method of the gesture.
segment.target: KeyboardInputGestures moe se poslati u operacijski sustav pomou metode send() geste.

segment.source: To send an arbitrary key press, you must now create a KeyboardInputGesture using KeyboardInputGesture.fromName() and then use its send() method.
segment.target: Da biste poslali proizvoljni pritisak tipke, sada morate stvoriti KeyboardInputGesture pomou KeyboardInputGesture.fromName(), a zatim koristiti njegovu metodu send().

segment.source: Locales may now provide an input gesture map file to add new bindings or override existing bindings for scripts anywhere in NVDA. (#810)
segment.target: Regionalne sheme sada mogu sadravati datoteku karte geste unosa za dodavanje novih veza ili nadjaavanje postojeih veza za skripte bilo gdje u NVDA. (#810)

segment.source: Locale gesture maps should be placed in locale\LANG\gestures.ini, where LANG is the language code.
segment.target: Mape gesti regionalnih shema trebaju biti smjetene u locale\LANG\gestures.ini, gdje je LANG kod jezika.

segment.source: See inputCore.GlobalGestureMap for details of the file format.
segment.target: Pogledajte inputCore.GlobalGestureMap za pojedinosti o formatu datoteke.

segment.source: The new LiveText and Terminal NVDAObject behaviors facilitate automatic reporting of new text. See those classes in NVDAObjects.behaviors for details. (#936)
segment.target: Novi LiveText i Terminal NVDAObject ponaanja olakavaju automatsko izvjetavanje o novom tekstu. Pogledajte te klase u NVDAObjects.behaviors za detalje. (#936)

segment.source: The NVDAObjects.window.DisplayModelLiveText overlay class can be used for objects which must retrieve text written to the display.
segment.target: Klasa preklapanja NVDAObjects.window.DisplayModelLiveText moe se koristiti za objekte koji moraju dohvatiti tekst zapisan na zaslonu.

segment.source: See the mirc and putty app modules for usage examples.
segment.target: Pogledajte module aplikacija mirc i putty za primjere upotrebe.

segment.source: There is no longer an _default app module. App modules should instead subclass appModuleHandler.AppModule (the base AppModule class).
segment.target: Vie ne postoji _default modul aplikacije. Moduli aplikacije trebali bi umjesto toga podklasirati appModuleHandler.AppModule (osnovna klasa AppModule).

segment.source: Support for global plugins which can globally bind scripts, handle NVDAObject events and choose NVDAObject overlay classes. (#281) See globalPluginHandler.GlobalPlugin for details.
segment.target: Podrka za globalne dodatke koji mogu globalno vezati skripte, obraivati NVDAObject dogaaje i odabrati NVDAObject klase preklapanja. (#281) Pojedinosti potraite u globalPluginHandler.GlobalPlugin.

segment.source: On SynthDriver objects, the available* attributes for string settings (e.g. availableVoices and availableVariants) are now OrderedDicts keyed by ID instead of lists.
segment.target: Na objektima SynthDriver, atributi available* za postavke niza (npr. availableVoices i availableVariants) sada su OrderedDicts s tipkom ID-a umjesto popisa.

segment.source: synthDriverHandler.VoiceInfo now takes an optional language argument which specifies the language of the voice.
segment.target: synthDriverHandler.VoiceInfo sada uzima neobavezni argument jezika koji odreuje jezik glasa.

segment.source: SynthDriver objects now provide a language attribute which specifies the language of the current voice.
segment.target: SynthDriver objekti sada pruaju atribut jezika koji odreuje jezik trenutnog glasa.

segment.source: The base implementation uses the language specified on the VoiceInfo objects in availableVoices. This is suitable for most synthesisers which support one language per voice.
segment.target: Osnovna implementacija koristi jezik naveden na VoiceInfo objektima u availableVoices. Ovo je prikladno za veinu sintisajzera koji podravaju jedan jezik po glasu.

segment.source: Braille display drivers have been enhanced to allow buttons, wheels and other controls to be bound to NVDA scripts:
segment.target: Upravljaki programi Brailleovog pisma poboljani su kako bi omoguili povezivanje gumba, kotaia i drugih kontrola s NVDA skriptama:

segment.source: Drivers can provide a global input gesture map to add bindings for scripts anywhere in NVDA.
segment.target: Upravljaki programi mogu pruiti globalnu kartu gesta unosa za dodavanje veza za skripte bilo gdje u NVDA.

segment.source: They can also provide their own scripts to perform display specific functions.
segment.target: Oni takoer mogu pruiti vlastite skripte za izvoenje odreenih funkcija prikaza.

segment.source: See braille.BrailleDisplayDriver for details and existing braille display drivers for examples.
segment.target: Vidi Brailleovo pismo. BrailleDisplayDriver za detalje i postojee upravljake programe za Brailleovo pismo na primjere.

segment.source: The 'selfVoicing' property on AppModule classes has now been renamed to 'sleepMode'.
segment.target: Svojstvo 'selfVoicing' na klasama AppModule sada je preimenovano u 'sleepMode'.

segment.source: The app module events event_appLoseFocus and event_appGainFocus have now been renamed to event_appModule_loseFocus and event_appModule_gainFocus, respectivly, in order to make the naming convention consistent with app modules and tree interceptors.
segment.target: Dogaaji modula aplikacije event_appLoseFocus i event_appGainFocus sada su preimenovani u event_appModule_loseFocus i event_appModule_gainFocus, s potovanjem, kako bi konvencija imenovanja bila u skladu s modulima aplikacije i presretaima stabala.

segment.source: All braille display drivers should now use braille.BrailleDisplayDriver instead of braille.BrailleDisplayDriverWithCursor.
segment.target: Svi upravljaki programi za Brailleovo pismo sada bi trebali koristiti Brailleovo pismo. BrailleDisplayDriver umjesto Brailleovog pisma. BrailleDisplayDriverWithCursor.

segment.source: The cursor is now managed outside of the driver.
segment.target: Pokazivaem se sada upravlja izvan upravljakog programa.

segment.source: Existing drivers need only change their class statement accordingly and rename their _display method to display.
segment.target: Postojei upravljaki programi trebaju samo promijeniti svoju izjavu o klasi u skladu s tim i preimenovati svoju _display metodu za prikaz.

segment.source: Notable features of this release include greatly simplified object navigation; virtual buffers for Adobe Flash content; access to many previously inaccessible controls by retrieving text written to the screen; flat review of screen text; support for IBM Lotus Symphony documents; reporting of table row and column headers in Mozilla Firefox; and significantly improved user documentation.
segment.target: Znaajne znaajke ovog izdanja ukljuuju znatno pojednostavljenu navigaciju objektima; virtualni meuspremniki za Adobe Flash sadraj; pristup mnogim prethodno nedostupnim kontrolama dohvaanjem teksta napisanog na zaslonu; ravan pregled teksta zaslona; podrka za IBM Lotus Symphony dokumente; izvjetavanje o zaglavljima redaka i stupaca tablice u Mozilla Firefoxu; i znaajno poboljana korisnika dokumentacija.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Navigating through objects with the review cursor has been greatly simplified. The review cursor now excludes objects which aren't useful to the user; i.e. objects only used for layout purposes and unavailable objects.
segment.target: Navigacija kroz objekte pomou kursora za pregled uvelike je pojednostavljena. Pokaziva pregleda sada iskljuuje objekte koji nisu korisni korisniku; tj. predmeti koji se koriste samo u svrhu rasporeda i nedostupni objekti.

segment.source: In applications using the Java Access Bridge (including OpenOffice.org), formatting can now be reported in text controls. (#358, #463)
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste Java Access Bridge (ukljuujui OpenOffice.org), oblikovanje se sada moe prijaviti u tekstualnim kontrolama. (#358, #463)

segment.source: When moving the mouse over cells in Microsoft Excel, NVDA will appropriately announce them.
segment.target: Kada pomiete mi preko elija u Microsoft Excelu, NVDA e ih prikladno najaviti.

segment.source: In applications using the Java Access Bridge, the text of a dialog is now reported when the dialog appears. (#554)
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste Java Access Bridge, tekst dijalokog okvira sada se prijavljuje kada se pojavi dijaloki okvir. (#554)

segment.source: A virtualBuffer can now be used to navigate adobe Flash content. Object navigation and interacting with the controls directly (by turning on focus mode) is still supported. (#453)
segment.target: VirtualBuffer se sada moe koristiti za navigaciju Adobe Flash sadrajem. Navigacija objektima i izravna interakcija s kontrolama (ukljuivanjem naina fokusiranja) i dalje su podrani. (#453)

segment.source: Editable text controls in the Eclipse IDE, including the code editor, are now accessible. You must be using Eclipse 3.6 or later. (#256, #641)
segment.target: Kontrole teksta koje se mogu ureivati u Eclipse IDE-u, ukljuujui ureiva koda, sada su dostupne. Morate koristiti Eclipse 3.6 ili noviji. (#256, #641)

segment.source: NVDA can now retrieve most text written to the screen. (#40, #643)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe dohvatiti veinu teksta napisanog na zaslonu. (#40, #643)

segment.source: This allows for reading of controls which do not expose information in more direct/reliable ways.
segment.target: To omoguuje itanje kontrola koje ne izlau informacije na izravniji/pouzdaniji nain.

segment.source: Controls made accessible by this feature include: some menu items which display icons (e.g. the Open With menu on files in Windows XP) (#151), editable text fields in Windows Live applications (#200), the errors list in Outlook Express (#582), the editable text control in TextPad (#605), lists in Eudora, many controls in Australian E-tax and the formula bar in Microsoft Excel.
segment.target: Kontrole koje ova znaajka ini dostupnima ukljuuju: neke stavke izbornika koje prikazuju ikone (npr. izbornik Otvori s na datotekama u sustavu Windows XP) (#151), tekstna polja koja se mogu ureivati u aplikacijama Windows Live (#200), popis pogreaka u programu Outlook Express (#582), kontrolu teksta koja se moe ureivati u TextPadu (#605), popise u Eudori, mnoge kontrole u australskom e-porezu i traku formule u programu Microsoft Excel.

segment.source: Support for the code editor in Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 and 2008. At least Visual Studio Standard is required; this does not work in the Express editions. (#457)
segment.target: Podrka za ureiva koda u Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 i 2008. Potreban je barem Visual Studio Standard; ovo ne funkcionira u Express izdanjima. (#457)

segment.source: Support for IBM Lotus Symphony documents.
segment.target: Podrka za IBM Lotus Symphony dokumente.

segment.source: Early experimental support for Google Chrome. Please note that Chrome's screen reader support is far from complete and additional work may also be required in NVDA. You will need a recent development build of Chrome to try this.
segment.target: Rana eksperimentalna podrka za Google Chrome. Imajte na umu da je podrka za Chromeov ita zaslona daleko od potpune i da e moda biti potreban dodatni rad u NVDA. Trebat e vam nedavna razvojna verzija Chromea da biste to isprobali.

segment.source: The state of toggle keys (caps lock, num lock and scroll lock) is now displayed in braille when they are pressed. (#620)
segment.target: Stanje preklopnih tipki (Caps Lock, Num Lock i Scroll Lock) sada se prikazuje na Brailleovom pismu kada se pritisnu. (#620)

segment.source: Help balloons are now displayed in braille when they appear. (#652)
segment.target: Balonii pomoi sada se prikazuju na Brailleovom pismu kada se pojave. (#652)

segment.source: Added a driver for the MDV Lilli braille display. (#241)
segment.target: Dodan je upravljaki program za MDV Lilli Brailleov zaslon. (#241)

segment.source: When selecting an entire row or column in Microsoft Excel with the shortcut keys shift+space and control+space, the new selection is now reported. (#759)
segment.target: Prilikom odabira cijelog retka ili stupca u programu Microsoft Excel pomou tipki preaca shift+razmak i control+razmak, sada se izvjetava o novom odabiru. (#759)

segment.source: Table row and column headers can now be reported. This is configurable from the Document Formatting preferences dialog.
segment.target: Sada se mogu izvjeivati o zaglavljima redaka i stupaca tablice. To se moe konfigurirati u dijalokom okviru preferenci oblikovanja dokumenta.

segment.source: Currently, this is supported in documents in Mozilla applications such as Firefox (version 3.6.11 and later) and Thunderbird (version 3.1.5 and later). (#361)
segment.target: Trenutno je to podrano u dokumentima u Mozillinim aplikacijama kao to su Firefox (verzija 3.6.11 i novija) i Thunderbird (verzija 3.1.5 i novija). (#361)

segment.source: Introduced commands for flat review: (#58)
segment.target: Uvedene naredbe za ploni pregled: (#58)

segment.source: NVDA+numpad7 switches to flat review, placing the review cursor at the position of the current object, allowing you to review the screen (or a document if within one) with the text review commands.
segment.target: NVDA+numerika tipkovnica7 prebacuje se na ploni pregled, postavljajui kursor za pregled na poloaj trenutnog objekta, omoguujui vam pregled zaslona (ili dokumenta ako je unutar njega) pomou naredbi za pregled teksta.

segment.source: NVDA+numpad1 moves the review cursor into the object represented by the text at the position of the review cursor, allowing you to navigate by object from that point.
segment.target: NVDA+numerika tipkovnica1 pomie kursor za pregled u objekt predstavljen tekstom na poziciji kursora za pregled, omoguujui vam navigaciju po objektu od te toke.

segment.source: Current NVDA user settings can be copied to be used on secure Windows screens such as the logon and UAC screens by pressing a button in the General Settings dialog. (#730)
segment.target: Trenutne NVDA korisnike postavke mogu se kopirati za koritenje na sigurnim Windows zaslonima kao to su zasloni za prijavu i UAC zaslon pritiskom na gumb u dijalokom okviru Ope postavke. (#730)

segment.source: Support for Mozilla Firefox 4.
segment.target: Podrka za Mozilla Firefox 4.

segment.source: Support for Microsoft Internet Explorer 9.
segment.target: Podrka za Microsoft Internet Explorer 9.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The sayAll by Navigator object (NVDA+numpadAdd), navigator object next in flow (NVDA+shift+numpad6) and navigator object previous in flow (NVDA+shift+numpad4) commands have been removed for the time being, due to bugginess and to free up the keys for other possible features.
segment.target: Naredbe sayAll by Navigator objekt (NVDA+numpadAdd), navigator objekt sljedei u toku (NVDA+shift+numpad6) i navigator objekt prethodni u toku (NVDA+shift+numpad4) za sada su uklonjene, zbog greaka i kako bi se oslobodile tipke za druge mogue znaajke.

segment.source: In the NVDA Synthesizer dialog, only the display name of the synthesizer is now listed. Previously, it was prefixed by the driver's name, which is only relevant internally.
segment.target: U dijalokom okviru NVDA sintisajzera sada je naveden samo zaslonski naziv sintisajzera. Prije toga mu je prethodilo ime vozaa, koje je relevantno samo interno.

segment.source: When in embedded applications or virtual buffers inside another virtualBuffer (e.g. Flash), you can now press nvda+control+space to move out of the embedded application or virtual buffer to the containing document. Previously nvda+space was used for this. Now nvda+space is specifically only for toggling brows/focus modes on virtualBuffers.
segment.target: Kada ste u ugraenim aplikacijama ili virtualnim meuspremnikima unutar drugog virtualBuffera (npr. Flash), sada moete pritisnuti nvda+control+razmak da biste izali iz ugraene aplikacije ili virtualnog meuspremnika u dokument koji sadri. Ranije se za to koristio nvda+space. Sada je nvda+space posebno samo za prebacivanje obrva/fokusa na virtualBuffers.

segment.source: If the speech viewer (enabled under the tools menu) is given the focus (e.g. it was clicked in) new text will not appear in the control until focus is moved away. This allows for selecting the text with greater ease (e.g. for copying).
segment.target: Ako se pregledniku govora (omoguenom u izborniku alata) dodijeli fokus (npr. kliknulo se), novi tekst nee se pojaviti u kontroli dok se fokus ne pomakne. To omoguuje laki odabir teksta (npr. za kopiranje).

segment.source: The Log Viewer and Python Console are maximised when activated.
segment.target: Preglednik dnevnika i Python konzola maksimizirani su kada se aktiviraju.

segment.source: When focusing on a worksheet in Microsoft Excel and there is more than one cell selected, the selection range is announced, rather than just the active cell. (#763)
segment.target: Kada se usredotoite na radni list u programu Microsoft Excel i odabrano je vie od jedne elije, najavljuje se raspon odabira, a ne samo aktivna elija. (#763)

segment.source: Saving configuration and changing of particular sensitive options is now disabled when running on the logon, UAC and other secure Windows screens.
segment.target: Spremanje konfiguracije i promjena odreenih osjetljivih opcija sada je onemogueno prilikom pokretanja na zaslonima za prijavu, UAC i drugim sigurnim Windows zaslonima.

segment.source: Updated eSpeak speech synthesiser to 1.44.03.
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak sintetizator govora na 1.44.03.

segment.source: If NVDA is already running, activating the NVDA shortcut on the desktop (which includes pressing control+alt+n) will restart NVDA.
segment.target: Ako je NVDA ve pokrenut, aktiviranje NVDA preaca na radnoj povrini (to ukljuuje pritiskanje control+alt+n) ponovno e pokrenuti NVDA.

segment.source: Removed the report text under the mouse checkbox from the Mouse settings dialog and replaced it with an Enable mouse tracking checkbox, which better matches the toggle mouse tracking script (NVDA+m).
segment.target: Uklonjen je tekst izvjea ispod potvrdnog okvira mia iz dijalokog okvira Postavke mia i zamijenjen potvrdnim okvirom Omogui praenje mia, to bolje odgovara skripti za prebacivanje praenja mia (NVDA+m).

segment.source: Updates to the laptop keyboard layout so that it includes all commands available in the desktop layout and works correctly on non-English keyboards. (#798, #800)
segment.target: Aurira raspored tipkovnice prijenosnog raunala tako da ukljuuje sve naredbe dostupne u rasporedu radne povrine i ispravno radi na tipkovnicama koje nisu engleske. (#798, #800)

segment.source: Significant improvements and updates to the user documentation, including documentation of the laptop keyboard commands and synchronisation of the Keyboard Commands Quick Reference with the User Guide. (#455)
