segment.target: Znaajna poboljanja i auriranja korisnike dokumentacije, ukljuujui dokumentaciju naredbi tipkovnice prijenosnog raunala i sinkronizaciju brzih referenci naredbi tipkovnice s korisnikim prirunikom. (#455)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.1.1. Notably, this fixes some issues related to Chinese braille as well as characters which are undefined in the translation table. (#484, #499)
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na 2.1.1. Naime, ovo rjeava neke probleme povezane s kineskom Brailleovom pismom, kao i znakove koji nisu definirani u tablici prijevoda. (#484, #499)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: In Torrent, the focused item in the torrents list no longer reports repeatedly or steals focus when a menu is open.
segment.target: U Torrentu, fokusirana stavka na popisu torrenta vie ne prijavljuje vie puta ili krade fokus kada je izbornik otvoren.

segment.source: In Torrent, the names of the files in the Torrent Contents list are now reported.
segment.target: U Torrentu se sada prijavljuju nazivi datoteka na popisu sadraja torrenta.

segment.source: In Mozilla applications, focus is now correctly detected when it lands on an empty table or tree.
segment.target: U Mozillinim aplikacijama fokus se sada ispravno detektira kada padne na prazan stol ili stablo.

segment.source: In Mozilla applications, "not checked" is now correctly reported for checkable controls such as checkable table cells. (#571)
segment.target: U Mozillinim aplikacijama, "nije oznaeno" sada se ispravno prijavljuje za provjerljive kontrole, kao to su elije tablice koje se mogu provjeriti. (#571)

segment.source: In Mozilla applications, the text of correctly implemented ARIA dialogs is no longer ignored and will now be reported when the dialog appears. (#630)
segment.target: U Mozillinim aplikacijama, tekst ispravno implementiranih ARIA dijalokih okvira vie se ne zanemaruje i sada e biti prijavljen kada se pojavi dijaloki okvir. (#630)

segment.source: in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, the ARIA level attribute is now honoured correctly.
segment.target: u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama atribut razine ARIA sada se ispravno potuje.

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, the ARIA role is now chosen over other type information to give a much more correct and predictable ARIA experience.
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama sada se odabire uloga ARIA umjesto drugih vrsta informacija da bi se omoguilo mnogo ispravnije i predvidljivije ARIA iskustvo.

segment.source: Stopped a rare crash in Internet Explorer when navigating through frames or iFrames.
segment.target: Zaustavio je rijedak pad u pregledniku Internet Explorer prilikom navigacije kroz okvire ili iFrameove.

segment.source: In Microsoft Word documents, right-to-left lines (such as Arabic text) can be read again. (#627)
segment.target: U dokumentima programa Microsoft Word redovi koji se piu zdesna nalijevo (kao to je arapski tekst) mogu se ponovno proitati. (#627)

segment.source: Greatly reduced lag when large amounts of text are displayed in a Windows command console on 64-bit systems. (#622)
segment.target: Znatno smanjeno kanjenje kada se velike koliine teksta prikazuju u naredbenoj konzoli sustava Windows na 64-bitnim sustavima. (#622)

segment.source: If Skype is already started when NVDA starts, it is no longer necessary to restart Skype to enable accessibility. This may also be true for other applications which check the system screen reader flag.
segment.target: Ako je Skype ve pokrenut kada se NVDA pokrene, vie nije potrebno ponovno pokretati Skype da biste omoguili pristupanost. To moe vrijediti i za druge aplikacije koje provjeravaju zastavicu itaa zaslona sustava.

segment.source: In Microsoft Office applications, NVDA no longer crashes when speak foreground (NVDA+b) is pressed or when navigating some objects on toolbars. (#616)
segment.target: U Microsoft Office aplikacijama NVDA se vie ne rui kada se pritisne govor u prednjem planu (NVDA+b) ili kada se kreete nekim objektima na alatnim trakama. (#616)

segment.source: Fixed incorrect speaking of numbers containing a 0 after a separator; e.g. 1,023. (#593)
segment.target: Ispravljen netoan govor brojeva koji sadre 0 nakon razdjelnika; npr. 1,023. (#593)

segment.source: Adobe Acrobat Pro and Reader 9 no longer crash when closing a file or performing certain other tasks. (#613)
segment.target: Adobe Acrobat Pro i Reader 9 vie se ne rue prilikom zatvaranja datoteke ili izvoenja odreenih drugih zadataka. (#613)

segment.source: The selection is now announced when control+a is pressed to select all text in some editable text controls such as in Microsoft Word. (#761)
segment.target: Odabir se sada najavljuje kada se pritisne control+a da bi se odabrao sav tekst u nekim kontrolama teksta koje se mogu ureivati, kao to je Microsoft Word. (#761)

segment.source: In Scintilla controls (e.g. Notepad++), text is no longer incorrectly selected when NVDA moves the caret such as during say all. (#746)
segment.target: U Scintilla kontrolama (npr. Notepad++), tekst vie nije pogreno odabran kada NVDA pomie kursor, kao to je tijekom reci sve. (#746)

segment.source: It is again possible to review the contents of cells in Microsoft Excel with the review cursor.
segment.target: Ponovno je mogue pregledati sadraj elija u programu Microsoft Excel pomou pokazivaa pregleda.

segment.source: NVDA can again read by line in certain problematic textArea fields in Internet Explorer 8. (#467)
segment.target: NVDA ponovno moe itati po retku u odreenim problematinim poljima textArea u Internet Exploreru 8. (#467)

segment.source: Windows Live Messenger 2009 no longer exits immediately after it is started while NVDA is running. (#677)
segment.target: Windows Live Messenger 2009 vie se ne zatvara odmah nakon pokretanja dok je NVDA pokrenut. (#677)

segment.source: In web browsers, It is no longer necessary to press tab to interact with an embedded object (such as Flash content) after pressing enter on the embedded object or returning from another application. (#775)
segment.target: U web preglednicima, Vie nije potrebno pritisnuti tab za interakciju s ugraenim objektom (kao to je Flash sadraj) nakon pritiska na enter na ugraenom objektu ili povratka iz druge aplikacije. (#775)

segment.source: In Scintilla controls (e.g. Notepad++), the beginning of long lines is no longer truncated when it scrolls off the screen. Also, these long lines will be correctly displayed in braille when they are selected.
segment.target: U kontrolama Scintilla (npr. Notepad++), poetak dugih redaka vie se ne skrauje kada se pomie sa zaslona. Takoer, ove duge crte bit e ispravno prikazane na Brailleovom pismu kada su odabrane.

segment.source: In Loudtalks, it is now possible to access the contact list.
segment.target: U Loudtalksu je sada mogue pristupiti popisu kontakata.

segment.source: The URL of the document and "MSAAHTML Registered Handler" are no longer sometimes spuriously reported in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls. (#811)
segment.target: URL dokumenta i "MSAAHTML registrirani rukovatelj" vie se ponekad ne prijavljuju lano u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama. (#811)

segment.source: In tree views in the Eclipse IDE, the previously focused item is no longer incorrectly announced when focus moves to a new item.
segment.target: U prikazima stabla u Eclipse IDE-u, prethodno fokusirana stavka vie nije pogreno najavljena kada se fokus pomakne na novu stavku.

segment.source: NVDA now functions correctly on a system where the current working directory has been removed from the DLL search path (by setting the CWDIllegalInDllSearch registry entry to 0xFFFFFFFF). Note that this is not relevant to most users. (#907)
segment.target: NVDA sada ispravno funkcionira na sustavu u kojem je trenutni radni direktorij uklonjen iz DLL puta pretraivanja (postavljanjem unosa registra CWDIllegalInDllSearch na 0xFFFFFFFF). Imajte na umu da to nije relevantno za veinu korisnika. (#907)

segment.source: When the table navigation commands are used outside of a table in Microsoft Word, "edge of table" is no longer spoken after "not in table". (#921)
segment.target: Kada se naredbe za navigaciju tablicom koriste izvan tablice u programu Microsoft Word, "rub tablice" vie se ne izgovara nakon "nije u tablici". (#921)

segment.source: When the table navigation commands cannot move due to being at the edge of a table in Microsoft Word, "edge of table" is now spoken in the configured NVDA language rather than always in English. (#921)
segment.target: Kada se naredbe za navigaciju tablicom ne mogu pomicati jer se nalaze na rubu tablice u programu Microsoft Word, "rub tablice" sada se izgovara na konfiguriranom NVDA jeziku, a ne uvijek na engleskom. (#921)

segment.source: In Outlook Express, Windows Mail and Windows Live Mail, the state of the checkboxes in message rules lists is now reported. (#576)
segment.target: U programima Outlook Express, Windows Mail i Windows Live Mail sada se izvjeuje o stanju potvrdnih okvira na popisima pravila za poruke. (#576)

segment.source: The description of message rules can now be read in Windows Live Mail 2010.
segment.target: Opis pravila za poruke sada se moe proitati u programu Windows Live Mail 2010.

segment.source: This release focuses primarily on bug fixes and improvements to the user experience, including some significant stability fixes.
segment.target: Ovo izdanje prvenstveno se fokusira na ispravke greaka i poboljanja korisnikog iskustva, ukljuujui neke znaajne popravke stabilnosti.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to start on a system with no audio output devices. Obviously, a braille display or the Silence synthesiser in conjunction with the Speech Viewer will need to be used for output in this case. (#425)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne uspijeva pokrenuti na sustavu bez audio izlaznih ureaja. Oito je da e se u ovom sluaju za izlaz morati koristiti Brailleov zaslon ili sintetizator tiine u kombinaciji s preglednikom govora. (#425)

segment.source: A report landmarks checkbox has been added to the Document Formatting settings dialog which allows you to configure whether NVDA should announce landmarks in web documents. For compatibility with the previous release, the option is on by default.
segment.target: U dijaloki okvir postavki formatiranja dokumenta dodan je potvrdni okvir za obiljeja izvjea koji vam omoguuje da konfigurirate treba li NVDA najavljivati orijentir u web dokumentima. Radi kompatibilnosti s prethodnim izdanjem, opcija je ukljuena prema zadanim postavkama.

segment.source: If speak command keys is enabled, NVDA will now announce the names of multimedia keys (e.g. play, stop, home page, etc.) on many keyboards when they are pressed. (#472)
segment.target: Ako je omogueno izgovaranje naredbenih tipki, NVDA e sada objaviti nazive multimedijskih tipki (npr. reprodukcija, zaustavljanje, poetna stranica, itd.) na mnogim tipkovnicama kada ih pritisnete. (#472)

segment.source: NVDA now announces the word being deleted when pressing control+backspace in controls that support it. (#491)
segment.target: NVDA sada najavljuje da e se rije izbrisati pritiskom na control+backspace u kontrolama koje je podravaju. (#491)

segment.source: Arrow keys can now be used in the Web formator window to navigate and read the text. (#452)
segment.target: Tipke sa strelicama sada se mogu koristiti u prozoru Web formator za navigaciju i itanje teksta. (#452)

segment.source: The entry list in the Microsoft Office Outlook address book is now supported.
segment.target: Popis unosa u adresaru programa Microsoft Office Outlook sada je podran.

segment.source: NVDA better supports embedded editable (design mode) documents in Internet Explorer. (#402)
segment.target: NVDA bolje podrava ugraene dokumente koji se mogu ureivati (nain dizajna) u Internet Exploreru. (#402)

segment.source: a new script (nvda+shift+numpadMinus) allows you to move the system focus to the current navigator object.
segment.target: nova skripta (nvda+shift+numpadMinus) omoguuje vam premjetanje fokusa sustava na trenutni objekt navigatora.

segment.source: New scripts to lock and unlock the left and right mouse buttons. Useful for performing drag and drop operations. shift+numpadDivide to lock/unlock the left, shift+numpadMultiply to lock/unlock the right.
segment.target: Nove skripte za zakljuavanje i otkljuavanje lijeve i desne tipke mia. Korisno za izvoenje operacija povlaenja i isputanja. shift+numpadPodijeli za zakljuavanje/otkljuavanje lijeve strane, shift+numpadMultiply za zakljuavanje/otkljuavanje desne.

segment.source: New braille translation tables: German 8 dot computer braille, German grade 2, Finnish 8 dot computer braille, Chinese (Hong Kong, Cantonese), Chinese (Taiwan, Manderin). (#344, #369, #415, #450)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: njemaki raunalni braille s 8 toaka, njemaki razred 2, finski raunalni braille s 8 toaka, kineski (Hong Kong, kantonski), kineski (Tajvan, Manderin). (#344, #369, #415, #450)

segment.source: It is now possible to disable the creation of the desktop shortcut (and thus the shortcut key) when installing NVDA. (#518)
segment.target: Sada je mogue onemoguiti stvaranje preaca na radnoj povrini (a time i tipke preaca) prilikom instaliranja NVDA-e. (#518)

segment.source: NVDA can now use IAccessible2 when present in 64 bit applications. (#479)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe koristiti IAccessible2 kada je prisutan u 64-bitnim aplikacijama. (#479)

segment.source: Improved support for live regions in Mozilla applications. (#246)
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za ive regije u Mozillinim aplikacijama. (#246)

segment.source: The NVDA Controller Client API is now provided to allow applications to control NVDA; e.g. to speak text, silence speech, display a message in Braille, etc.
segment.target: Sada je dostupan API klijenta NVDA kontrolera koji aplikacijama omoguuje upravljanje NVDA-om; npr. za izgovaranje teksta, utiavanje govora, prikazivanje poruke na Brailleovom pismu itd.

segment.source: Information and error messages are now read in the logon screen in Windows Vista and Windows 7. (#506)
segment.target: Informacije i poruke o pogrekama sada se itaju na zaslonu za prijavu u sustavima Windows Vista i Windows 7. (#506)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, PDF interactive forms developed with Adobe LiveCycle are now supported. (#475)
segment.target: U programu Adobe Reader sada su podrani PDF interaktivni obrasci razvijeni pomou programa Adobe LiveCycle. (#475)

segment.source: In Miranda IM, NVDA now automatically reads incoming messages in chat windows if reporting of dynamic content changes is enabled. Also, commands have been added to report the three most recent messages (NVDA+control+number). (#546)
segment.target: U Miranda IM-u, NVDA sada automatski ita dolazne poruke u chat prozorima ako je omogueno izvjetavanje o dinamikim promjenama sadraja. Takoer, dodane su naredbe za prijavljivanje tri najnovije poruke (NVDA+kontrola+broj). (#546)

segment.source: Input text fields are now supported in Adobe Flash content. (#461)
segment.target: Ulazna tekstualna polja sada su podrana u Adobe Flash sadraju. (#461)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The extremely verbose keyboard help message in the Windows 7 Start menu is no longer reported.
segment.target: Iznimno opirna poruka pomoi tipkovnice u izborniku Start sustava Windows 7 vie se ne prijavljuje.

segment.source: The Display synth has now been replaced with a new Speech Viewer. To activate it, choose Speech Viewer from the Tools menu. The speech viewer can be used independently of what ever speech synthesizer you are using. (#44)
segment.target: Sintisajzer zaslona sada je zamijenjen novim preglednikom govora. Da biste ga aktivirali, odaberite Preglednik govora na izborniku Alati. Preglednik govora moe se koristiti neovisno o tome koji sintisajzer govora koristite. (#44)

segment.source: Messages on the braille display will automatically be dismissed if the user presses a key that results in a change such as the focus moving. Previously the message would always stay around for its configured time.
segment.target: Poruke na Brailleovom pismu automatski e se odbaciti ako korisnik pritisne tipku koja rezultira promjenom kao to je pomicanje fokusa. Prije bi poruka uvijek ostala na razini konfiguriranog vremena.

segment.source: Setting whether braille should be tethered to the focus or the review cursor (NVDA+control+t) can now be also set from the braille settings dialog, and is also now saved in the user's configuration.
segment.target: Podeavanje treba li Brailleova pisma biti vezana za fokus ili kursor za pregled (NVDA+kontrola+t) sada se takoer moe postaviti iz dijalokog okvira postavki brajice, a sada se sprema i u korisnikovu konfiguraciju.

segment.source: Updated eSpeak speech synthesiser to 1.43.
segment.target: Auriran eSpeak sintetizator govora na 1.43.

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 1.8.0.
segment.target: Auriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na 1.8.0.

segment.source: In virtual buffers, the reporting of elements when moving by character or word has been greatly improved. Previously, a lot of irrelevant information was reported and the reporting was very different to that when moving by line. (#490)
segment.target: U virtualnim meuspremnikima znatno je poboljano izvjetavanje o elementima prilikom kretanja po znaku ili rijei. Ranije je prijavljeno mnogo nebitnih informacija, a izvjetavanje je bilo vrlo razliito od onog pri kretanju po liniji. (#490)

segment.source: The Control key now simply stops speech like other keys, rather than pausing speech. To pause/resume speech, use the shift key.
segment.target: Tipka Control sada jednostavno zaustavlja govor kao i druge tipke, umjesto da pauzira govor. Za pauziranje/nastavak govora koristite tipku Shift.

segment.source: Table row and column counts are no longer announced when reporting focus changes, as this announcement is rather verbose and usually not useful.
segment.target: Broj redaka i stupaca tablice vie se ne objavljuje prilikom izvjeivanja o promjenama fokusa jer je ta objava prilino opirna i obino nije korisna.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to start if UI Automation support appears to be available but fails to initialise for some reason. (#483)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne uspijeva pokrenuti ako se ini da je podrka za automatizaciju korisnikog suelja dostupna, ali se iz nekog razloga ne moe inicijalizirati. (#483)

segment.source: The entire contents of a table row is no longer sometimes reported when moving focus inside a cell in Mozilla applications. (#482)
segment.target: Cijeli sadraj retka tablice vie se ponekad ne prijavljuje prilikom premjetanja fokusa unutar elije u Mozillinim aplikacijama. (#482)

segment.source: NVDA no longer lags for a long time when expanding tree view items that contain a very large amount of sub-items.
segment.target: NVDA vie ne zaostaje dugo vremena kada proiruje stavke prikaza stabla koje sadre vrlo veliku koliinu podstavki.

segment.source: When listing SAPI 5 voices, NVDA now tries to detect buggy voices and excludes them from the Voice Settings dialog and synthesiser settings ring. Previously, when there was just one problematic voice, NVDA's SAPI 5 driver would sometimes fail to start.
segment.target: Prilikom navoenja SAPI 5 glasova, NVDA sada pokuava otkriti glasove s grekama i iskljuuje ih iz dijalokog okvira Glasovne postavke i zvona postavki sintisajzera. Prije, kada je postojao samo jedan problematian glas, NVDA-ov SAPI 5 upravljaki program ponekad se ne bi uspio pokrenuti.

segment.source: Virtual buffers now honour the report object shortcut keys setting found in the Object Presentation dialog. (#486)
segment.target: Virtualni meuspremnici sada potuju postavku tipki preaca objekta izvjea koja se nalazi u dijalokom okviru Prezentacija objekta. (#486)

segment.source: In virtual buffers, row/column coordinates are no longer incorrectly read for row and column headers when reporting of tables is disabled.
segment.target: U virtualnim meuspremnikima koordinate redaka/stupaca vie se ne itaju pogreno za zaglavlja redaka i stupaca kada je izvjeivanje o tablicama onemogueno.

segment.source: In virtual buffers, row/column coordinates are now correctly read when you leave a table and then re-enter the same table cell without visiting another cell first; e.g. pressing upArrow then downArrow on the first cell of a table. (#378)
segment.target: U virtualnim meuspremnikima koordinate redaka/stupaca sada se ispravno itaju kada napustite tablicu i zatim ponovno unesete istu eliju tablice bez prethodnog posjeta drugoj eliji; npr. pritiskom na goreStrelica, a zatim doljeStrelica na prvoj eliji tablice. (#378)

segment.source: Blank lines in Microsoft Word documents and Microsoft HTML edit controls are now shown appropriately on braille displays. Previously NVDA was displaying the current sentence on the display, not the current line for these situations. (#420)
segment.target: Prazni redovi u Microsoft Word dokumentima i Microsoft HTML kontrole za ureivanje sada se na odgovarajui nain prikazuju na brajici. Ranije je NVDA prikazivao trenutnu reenicu na zaslonu, a ne trenutnu liniju za ove situacije. (#420)

segment.source: Multiple security fixes when running NVDA at Windows logon and on other secure desktops. (#515)
segment.target: Viestruki sigurnosni popravci prilikom pokretanja NVDA pri prijavi u Windows i na drugim sigurnim radnim povrinama. (#515)

segment.source: The cursor position (caret) is now correctly updated when performing a Say All that goes off the bottom of the screen, in standard Windows edit fields and Microsoft Word documents. (#418)
segment.target: Poloaj pokazivaa (kursor) sada se ispravno aurira prilikom izvoenja Reci sve koji se nalazi s dna zaslona, u standardnim poljima za ureivanje sustava Windows i dokumentima programa Microsoft Word. (#418)

segment.source: In virtual buffers, text is no longer incorrectly included for images inside links and clickables that are marked as being irrelevant to screen readers. (#423)
segment.target: U virtualnim meuspremnikima tekst vie nije pogreno ukljuen za slike unutar veza i klikova koji su oznaeni kao nevani za itae zaslona. (#423)

segment.source: Fixes to the laptop keyboard layout. (#517)
segment.target: Popravci rasporeda tipkovnice prijenosnog raunala. (#517)

segment.source: When Braille is tethered to review when you focus on a Dos console window, the review cursor can now properly navigate the text in the console.
segment.target: Kada je Brailleovo pismo vezano za pregled kada se usredotoite na prozor Dos konzole, kursor za pregled sada moe ispravno navigirati tekstom u konzoli.

segment.source: While working with TeamTalk3 or TeamTalk4 Classic, the VU meter progress bar in the main window is no longer announced as it updates. Also, special characters can be read properly in the incoming chat window.
segment.target: Tijekom rada s TeamTalk3 ili TeamTalk4 Classic, traka napretka VU mjeraa u glavnom prozoru vie se ne najavljuje dok se aurira. Takoer, posebni znakovi mogu se ispravno proitati u prozoru za dolazni chat.

segment.source: Items are no longer spoken twice in the Windows 7 Start Menu. (#474)
segment.target: Stavke se vie ne izgovaraju dvaput u izborniku Start sustava Windows 7. (#474)

segment.source: Activating same-page links in Firefox 3.6 appropriately moves the cursor in the virtualBuffer to the correct place on the page.
segment.target: Aktiviranje poveznica na istu stranicu u Firefoxu 3.6 na odgovarajui nain pomie kursor u virtualBufferu na ispravno mjesto na stranici.

segment.source: Fixed the issue where some text was not rendered in Adobe Reader in certain PDF documents.
segment.target: Rijeen je problem zbog kojeg neki tekst nije prikazan u programu Adobe Reader u odreenim PDF dokumentima.

segment.source: NVDA no longer incorrectly speaks certain numbers separated by a dash; e.g. 500-1000. (#547)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne izgovara pogreno odreene brojeve odvojene crticom; npr. 500-1000. (#547)

segment.source: In Windows XP, NVDA no longer causes Internet Explorer to freeze when toggling checkboxes in Windows Update. (#477)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows XP NVDA vie ne uzrokuje zamrzavanje Internet Explorera prilikom ukljuivanja potvrdnih okvira na servisu Windows Update. (#477)

segment.source: When using the in-built eSpeak synthesiser, simultaneous speech and beeps no longer intermittently cause freezes on some systems. This was most noticeable, for example, when copying large amounts of data in Windows Explorer.
segment.target: Kada koristite ugraeni eSpeak sintisajzer, simultani govor i zvuni signali vie ne uzrokuju povremeno zamrzavanje na nekim sustavima. To je bilo najuoljivije, na primjer, prilikom kopiranja velikih koliina podataka u Windows Exploreru.

segment.source: NVDA no longer announces that a Firefox document has become busy (e.g. due to an update or refresh) when that document is in the background. This also caused the status bar of the foreground application to be spuriously announced.
segment.target: NVDA vie ne objavljuje da je Firefox dokument zauzet (npr. zbog auriranja ili osvjeavanja) kada je taj dokument u pozadini. To je takoer uzrokovalo lano objavljivanje statusne trake prijave u prvom planu.

segment.source: When switching Windows keyboard layouts (with control+shift or alt+shift), the full name of the layout is reported in both speech and braille. Previously it was only reported in speech, and alternative layouts (e.g. Dvorak) were not reported at all.
segment.target: Prilikom prebacivanja rasporeda tipkovnice sustava Windows (s control+shift ili alt+shift), puni naziv rasporeda biljei se i u govoru i na Brailleovom pismu. Ranije se o tome izvjetavalo samo u govoru, a o alternativnim izgledima (npr. Dvorak) uope se nije izvjetavalo.

segment.source: If reporting of tables is disabled, table information is no longer announced when the focus changes.
segment.target: Ako je izvjeivanje o tablicama onemogueno, informacije o tablici vie se ne objavljuju kada se fokus promijeni.

segment.source: Certain standard tree view controls in 64 bit applications (e.g. the Contents tree view in Microsoft HTML Help) are now accessible. (#473)
segment.target: Sada su dostupne odreene standardne kontrole prikaza stabla u 64-bitnim aplikacijama (npr. prikaz stabla sadraja u Microsoftovoj HTML pomoi). (#473)

segment.source: Fixed some problems with logging of messages containing non-ASCII characters. This could cause spurious errors in some cases on non-English systems. (#581)
segment.target: Rijeeni su neki problemi s zapisivanjem poruka koje sadre znakove koji nisu ASCII. To bi moglo uzrokovati lane pogreke u nekim sluajevima na sustavima koji nisu engleski. (#581)

segment.source: The information in the About NVDA dialog now appears in the user's configured language instead of always appearing in English. (#586)
segment.target: Informacije u dijalokom okviru O NVDA-u sada se prikazuju na korisnikovo konfiguriranom jeziku umjesto da se uvijek prikazuju na engleskom. (#586)

segment.source: Problems are no longer encountered when using the synthesiser settings ring after the voice is changed to one which has less settings than the previous voice.
segment.target: Problemi se vie ne susreu pri koritenju zvona postavki sintisajzera nakon to se glas promijeni u onaj koji ima manje postavki od prethodnog glasa.

segment.source: In Skype 4.2, contact names are no longer spoken twice in the contact list.
segment.target: U Skypeu 4.2 imena kontakata vie se ne izgovaraju dvaput na popisu kontakata.

segment.source: Fixed some potentially major memory leaks in the GUI and in virtual buffers. (#590, #591)
segment.target: Ispravljena su neka potencijalno velika curenja memorije u grafikom suelju i u virtualnim meuspremnikima. (#590, #591)

segment.source: Work around a nasty bug in some SAPI 4 synthesisers which was causing frequent errors and crashes in NVDA. (#597)
segment.target: Zaobiite gadnu greku u nekim SAPI 4 sintisajzerima koja je uzrokovala este pogreke i ruenja u NVDA. (#597)

segment.source: Major highlights of this release include support for 64 bit editions of Windows; greatly improved support for Microsoft Internet Explorer and Adobe Reader documents; support for Windows 7; reading of the Windows logon, control+alt+delete and User Account Control (UAC) screens; and the ability to interact with Adobe Flash and Sun Java content on web pages. There have also been several significant stability fixes and improvements to the general user experience.
segment.target: Glavni naglasci ovog izdanja ukljuuju podrku za 64-bitna izdanja sustava Windows; znatno poboljana podrka za dokumente Microsoft Internet Explorer i Adobe Reader; podrka za Windows 7; itanje zaslona za prijavu u sustav Windows, control+alt+delete i kontrolu korisnikog rauna (UAC); i mogunost interakcije s Adobe Flash i Sun Java sadrajem na web stranicama. Takoer je bilo nekoliko znaajnih popravaka stabilnosti i poboljanja opeg korisnikog iskustva.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: Official support for 64 bit editions of Windows! (#309)
segment.target: Slubena podrka za 64-bitna izdanja sustava Windows! (#309)

segment.source: Added a synthesizer driver for the Newfon synthesizer. Note that this requires a special version of Newfon. (#206)
segment.target: Dodan je upravljaki program sintisajzera za sintisajzer Newfon. Imajte na umu da je za to potrebna posebna verzija Newfona. (#206)

segment.source: In virtual buffers, focus mode and browse mode can now be reported using sounds instead of speech. This is enabled by default. It can be configured from the Virtual buffers dialog. (#244)
segment.target: U virtualnim meuspremnikima, nain fokusiranja i nain pregledavanja sada se mogu prijaviti pomou zvukova umjesto govora. To je omogueno prema zadanim postavkama. Moe se konfigurirati iz dijalokog okvira Virtualni meuspremniki. (#244)

segment.source: NVDA no longer cancels speech when volume control keys are pressed on the keyboard, allowing the user to change the volume and listen to actual results immediately. (#287)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne ponitava govor kada se pritisnu tipke za kontrolu glasnoe na tipkovnici, omoguujui korisniku da odmah promijeni glasnou i preslua stvarne rezultate. (#287)

segment.source: Completely rewritten support for Microsoft Internet Explorer and Adobe Reader documents. This support has been unified with the core support used for Mozilla Gecko, so features such as fast page rendering, extensive quick navigation, links list, text selection, auto focus mode and braille support are now available with these documents.
segment.target: Potpuno prepisana podrka za dokumente Microsoft Internet Explorer i Adobe Reader. Ova je podrka objedinjena s osnovnom podrkom koja se koristi za Mozilla Gecko, tako da su znaajke kao to su brzo prikazivanje stranica, opsena brza navigacija, popis veza, odabir teksta, nain automatskog fokusa i podrka za Brailleovo pismo sada dostupne s ovim dokumentima.

segment.source: Improved support for the date selection control found in the Windows Vista Date / Time properties dialog.
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za kontrolu odabira datuma koja se nalazi u dijalokom okviru svojstava datuma / vremena sustava Windows Vista.

segment.source: improved support for the Modern XP/Vista start menu (specifically the all programs, and places menus). Appropriate level information is now announced.
segment.target: poboljana podrka za poetni izbornik Modern XP/Vista (posebno izbornike svih programa i mjesta). Sada su objavljene informacije o odgovarajuoj razini.

segment.source: The amount of text that is announced when moving the mouse is now configurable from the Mouse settings dialog. A choice of paragraph, line, word or character can be made.
segment.target: Koliina teksta koja se najavljuje prilikom pomicanja mia sada se moe konfigurirati u dijalokom okviru Postavke mia. Moe se napraviti izbor odlomka, retka, rijei ili znaka.

segment.source: announce spelling errors under the cursor in Microsoft Word.
segment.target: najavljuju pravopisne pogreke ispod pokazivaa u programu Microsoft Word.

segment.source: support for the Microsoft Word 2007 spell checker. Partial support may be available for prior Microsoft Word versions.
segment.target: podrka za provjeru pravopisa programa Microsoft Word 2007. Djelomina podrka moe biti dostupna za prethodne verzije programa Microsoft Word.

segment.source: Better support for Windows Live Mail. Plain text messages can now be read and both the plain text and HTML message composers are useable.
segment.target: Bolja podrka za Windows Live Mail. Sada se mogu itati obine tekstualne poruke i mogu se koristiti i obini tekst i HTML poruke.

segment.source: In Windows Vista, if the user moves to the secure desktop (either because a UAC control dialog appeared, or because control+alt+delete was pressed), NVDA will announce the fact that the user is now on the secure desktop.
segment.target: U sustavu Windows Vista, ako se korisnik pomakne na sigurnu radnu povrinu (bilo zato to se pojavio dijaloki okvir UAC kontrole, ili zato to je pritisnut control+alt+delete), NVDA e objaviti injenicu da je korisnik sada na sigurnoj radnoj povrini.

segment.source: NVDA can announce text under the mouse within dos console windows.
segment.target: NVDA moe najavljivati tekst ispod mia unutar prozora dos konzole.

segment.source: Support for UI Automation via the UI Automation client API available in Windows 7, as well as fixes to improve the experience of NVDA in Windows 7.
segment.target: Podrka za automatizaciju korisnikog suelja putem klijentskog API-ja za automatizaciju korisnikog suelja dostupnog u sustavu Windows 7, kao i popravci za poboljanje iskustva NVDA u sustavu Windows 7.

segment.source: NVDA can be configured to start automatically after you log on to Windows. The option is in the General Settings dialog.
segment.target: NVDA se moe konfigurirati da se automatski pokree nakon to se prijavite u Windows. Opcija se nalazi u dijalokom okviru Ope postavke.

segment.source: NVDA can read secure Windows screens such as the Windows logon, control+alt+delete and User Account Control (UAC) screens in Windows XP and above. Reading of the Windows logon screen can be configured from the General Settings dialog. (#97)
segment.target: NVDA moe itati sigurne Windows zaslone kao to su Windows logon, control+alt+delete i zasloni User Account Control (UAC) u Windows XP i novijim verzijama. itanje zaslona za prijavu u sustav Windows moe se konfigurirati iz dijalokog okvira Ope postavke. (#97)

segment.source: Added a driver for the Optelec ALVA BC6 series braille displays.
segment.target: Dodan je upravljaki program za Brajeve retke Optelec ALVA BC6 serije.

segment.source: When browsing web documents, you can now press n and shift+n to skip forward and backward past blocks of links, respectively.
segment.target: Kada pregledavate web dokumente, sada moete pritisnuti n i shift+n za preskakanje unaprijed i natrag pored blokova veza.

segment.source: When browsing web documents, ARIA landmarks are now reported, and you can move forward and backward through them using d and shift+d, respectively. (#192)
segment.target: Prilikom pregledavanja web dokumenata sada se prijavljuju ARIA orijentiri i moete se kretati naprijed i natrag kroz njih koristei d i shift + d. (#192)

segment.source: The Links List dialog available when browsing web documents has now become an Elements List dialog which can list links, headings and landmarks. Headings and landmarks are presented hierarchically. (#363)
segment.target: Dijaloki okvir Popis veza dostupan prilikom pregledavanja web-dokumenata sada je postao dijaloki okvir Popis elemenata u kojem se mogu navesti veze, naslovi i orijentiri. Naslovi i orijentiri prikazani su hijerarhijski. (#363)

segment.source: The new Elements List dialog contains a "Filter by" field which allows you to filter the list to contain only those items including the text that was typed. (#173)
segment.target: Novi dijaloki okvir Popis elemenata sadri polje "Filtriraj prema" koje vam omoguuje filtriranje popisa tako da sadri samo one stavke, ukljuujui tekst koji je upisan. (#173)

segment.source: Portable versions of NVDA now look in the 'userConfig' directory inside the NVDA directory, for the user's configuration. Like for the installer version, this keeps the user's configuration separate from NVDA itself.
segment.target: Prijenosne verzije NVDA sada trae korisnikovu konfiguraciju u direktoriju 'userConfig' unutar NVDA direktorija. Kao i za instalacijsku verziju, ovo dri korisnikovu konfiguraciju odvojenom od samog NVDA-a.

segment.source: Custom app modules, braille display drivers and synth drivers can now be stored in the user's configuration directory. (#337)
segment.target: Prilagoeni moduli aplikacija, upravljaki programi za Brailleovo pismo i upravljaki programi za sintisajzer sada se mogu pohraniti u korisnikov konfiguracijski direktorij. (#337)

segment.source: Virtual buffers are now rendered in the background, allowing the user to interact with the system to some extent during the rendering process. The user will be notified that the document is being rendered if it takes longer than a second.
segment.target: Virtualni meuspremniki sada se prikazuju u pozadini, omoguujui korisniku interakciju sa sustavom u odreenoj mjeri tijekom procesa renderiranja. Korisnik e biti obavijeten da se dokument prikazuje ako traje dulje od sekunde.

segment.source: If NVDA detects that it has frozen for some reason, it will automatically pass all keystrokes through so that the user has a better chance of recovering the system.
segment.target: Ako NVDA otkrije da se iz nekog razloga zamrznuo, automatski e proslijediti sve pritiske tipki kako bi korisnik imao vee anse za oporavak sustava.

segment.source: Support for ARIA drag and drop in Mozilla Gecko. (#239)
segment.target: Podrka za ARIA povlaenje i isputanje u Mozilla Gecku. (#239)

segment.source: The document title and current line or selection is now spoken when you move focus inside a virtual buffer. This makes the behaviour when moving focus into virtual buffers consistent with that for normal document objects. (#210)
segment.target: Naslov dokumenta i trenutani redak ili odabir sada se izgovaraju kada premjestite fokus unutar virtualnog meuspremnika. To ini ponaanje pri premjetanju fokusa u virtualne meuspremnike u skladu s onim za normalne objekte dokumenta. (#210)

segment.source: In virtual buffers, you can now interact with embedded objects (such as Adobe Flash and Sun Java content) by pressing enter on the object. If it is accessible, you can then tab around it like any other application. To return focus to the document, press NVDA+space. (#431)
segment.target: U virtualnim meuspremnikima sada moete komunicirati s ugraenim objektima (kao to su Adobe Flash i Sun Java sadraj) pritiskom na enter na objektu. Ako je dostupan, moete ga zaobii kao i bilo koju drugu aplikaciju. Za vraanje fokusa na dokument pritisnite NVDA+razmaknica. (#431)

segment.source: In virtual buffers, o and shift+o move to the next and previous embedded object, respectively.
segment.target: U virtualnim meuspremnicima, o i Shift+o prelaze na sljedei i prethodni ugraeni objekt.

segment.source: NVDA can now fully access applications running as administrator in Windows Vista and later. You must install an official release of NVDA for this to work. This does not work for portable versions and snapshots. (#397)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe u potpunosti pristupiti aplikacijama koje se pokreu kao administrator u sustavu Windows Vista i novijim verzijama. Da bi ovo funkcioniralo, morate instalirati slubeno izdanje NVDA-a. To ne funkcionira za prijenosne verzije i snimke. (#397)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: NVDA no longer announces "NVDA started" when it starts.
segment.target: NVDA vie ne objavljuje "NVDA je zapoela" kada zapone.

segment.source: The startup and exit sounds are now played using NVDA's configured audio output device instead of the Windows default audio output device. (#164)
segment.target: Zvukovi pokretanja i izlaska sada se reproduciraju pomou NVDA konfiguriranog audio izlaznog ureaja umjesto zadanog Windows audio izlaznog ureaja. (#164)

segment.source: Progress bar reporting has been improved. Most notably you can now configure NVDA to announce via both speech and beeps at the same time.
segment.target: Izvjetavanje o traci napretka je poboljano. Najznaajnije je to to sada moete konfigurirati NVDA tako da istovremeno najavljuje i govorom i zvunim signalom.

segment.source: Some generic roles, such as pane, application and frame, are no longer reported on focus unless the control is unnamed.
segment.target: Neke generike uloge, kao to su okno, aplikacija i okvir, vie se ne prijavljuju u fokusu, osim ako kontrola nije neimenovana.

segment.source: The review copy command (NVDA+f10) copies the text from the start marker up to and including the current review position, rather than excluding the current position. This allows the last character of a line to be copied, which was not previously possible. (#430)
segment.target: Naredba kopiranja pregleda (NVDA+f10) kopira tekst od poetnog markera do i ukljuujui trenutni poloaj pregleda, a ne iskljuuje trenutni poloaj. To omoguuje kopiranje posljednjeg znaka retka, to prije nije bilo mogue. (#430)

segment.source: the navigatorObject_where script (ctrl+NVDA+numpad5) has been removed. This key combination did not work on some keyboards, nore was the script found to be that useful.
segment.target: navigatorObject_where skripta (ctrl+NVDA+numpad5) je uklonjena. Ova kombinacija tipki nije radila na nekim tipkovnicama, nore je otkriveno da je skripta toliko korisna.

segment.source: the navigatorObject_currentDimentions script has been remapped to NVDA+numpadDelete. The old key combination did not work on some keyboards. This script also now reports the width and height of the object instead of the right/bottom coordinates.
segment.target: skripta navigatorObject_currentDimentions preimenovana je u NVDA+numpadDelete. Stara kombinacija tipki nije radila na nekim tipkovnicama. Ova skripta sada takoer izvjeuje o irini i visini objekta umjesto koordinata desno/dno.

segment.source: Improved performance (especially on netbooks) when many beeps occur in quick succession; e.g. fast mouse movement with audio coordinates enabled. (#396)
segment.target: Poboljane performanse (posebno na netbookovima) kada se javljaju mnogi zvuni signali u brzom nizu; npr. brzi pokreti mia s omoguenim audio koordinatama. (#396)

segment.source: The NVDA error sound is no longer played in release candidates and final releases. Note that errors are still logged.
segment.target: Zvuk pogreke NVDA vie se ne reproducira u kandidatima za izdavanje i konanim izdanjima. Imajte na umu da su pogreke i dalje zabiljeene.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: When NVDA is run from an 8.3 dos path, but it is installed in the related long path (e.g. progra~1 verses program files) NVDA will correctly identify that it is an installed copy and properly load the user's settings.
segment.target: Kada se NVDA pokree s 8,3 dos puta, ali je instaliran na povezanom dugom putu (npr. programski ~1 verzija programskih datoteka), NVDA e ispravno identificirati da se radi o instaliranoj kopiji i pravilno uitati korisnike postavke.

segment.source: speaking the title of the current foreground window with nvda+t now works correctly when in menus.
segment.target: izgovaranje naslova trenutnog prozora u prednjem planu s nvda +t sada radi ispravno kada je u izbornicima.

segment.source: braille no longer shows useless information in its focus context such as unlabeled panes.
segment.target: brajica vie ne prikazuje beskorisne informacije u kontekstu fokusa kao to su neoznaena okna.

segment.source: stop announcing some useless information when the focus changes such as root panes, layered panes and scroll panes in Java or Lotus applications.
segment.target: prestanite objavljivati neke beskorisne informacije kada se fokus promijeni, kao to su korijenska okna, slojevita okna i okna za pomicanje u Java ili Lotus aplikacijama.

segment.source: Make the keyword search field in Windows Help (CHM) viewer much more usable. Due to buggyness in that control, the current keyword could not be read as it would be continually changing.
segment.target: Uinite polje za pretraivanje kljunih rijei u pregledniku pomoi za Windows (CHM) mnogo korisnijim. Zbog buggynessa u toj kontroli, trenutna kljuna rije nije se mogla proitati jer bi se kontinuirano mijenjala.

segment.source: report correct page numbers in Microsoft Word if the page numbering has been specifically offset in the document.
segment.target: prijaviti ispravne brojeve stranica u programu Microsoft Word ako je numeriranje stranica posebno pomaknuto u dokumentu.

segment.source: Better support for edit fields found in Microsoft Word dialogs (e.g. the Font dialog). It is now possible to navigate these controls with the arrow keys.
segment.target: Bolja podrka za polja za ureivanje koja se nalaze u dijalokim okvirima programa Microsoft Word (npr. dijaloki okvir Font). Sada je mogue kretati se ovim kontrolama pomou tipki sa strelicama.

segment.source: better support for Dos consoles. specifically: NVDA can now read the content of particular consoles it always used to think were blank. Pressing control+break no longer terminates NVDA.
segment.target: bolja podrka za dos konzole. konkretno: NVDA sada moe itati sadraj pojedinih konzola za koje je uvijek mislio da su prazne. Pritiskom na Control+Break vie se ne prekida NVDA.

segment.source: On Windows Vista and above, the NVDA installer now starts NVDA with normal user privileges when requested to run NVDA on the finish screen.
segment.target: U sustavu Windows Vista i novijem, NVDA instalater sada pokree NVDA s uobiajenim korisnikim ovlastima kada se zatrai pokretanje NVDA na zavrnom zaslonu.

segment.source: Backspace is now handled correctly when speaking typed words. (#306)
segment.target: Backspace se sada ispravno obrauje prilikom izgovaranja upisanih rijei. (#306)

segment.source: Don't incorrectly report "Start menu" for certain context menus in Windows Explorer/the Windows shell. (#257)
segment.target: Nemojte netono prijaviti "izbornik Start" za odreene kontekstne izbornike u programu Windows Explorer/ljusci sustava Windows. (#257)

segment.source: NVDA now correctly handles ARIA labels in Mozilla Gecko when there is no other useful content. (#156)
segment.target: NVDA sada ispravno rukuje ARIA oznakama u Mozilla Gecko kada nema drugog korisnog sadraja. (#156)

segment.source: NVDA no longer incorrectly enables focus mode automatically for editable text fields which update their value when the focus changes; e.g. http://tigerdirect.com/. (#220)
segment.target: NVDA vie ne omoguuje automatski nain fokusiranja za tekstualna polja koja se mogu ureivati i koja auriraju svoju vrijednost kada se fokus promijeni; npr. http://tigerdirect.com/. (#220)

segment.source: NVDA will now attempt to recover from some situations which would previously cause it to freeze completely. It may take up to 10 seconds for NVDA to detect and recover from such a freeze.
segment.target: NVDA e se sada pokuati oporaviti od nekih situacija koje bi prethodno uzrokovale potpuno zamrzavanje. Moe biti potrebno do 10 sekundi da NVDA otkrije i oporavi se od takvog smrzavanja.

segment.source: When the NVDA language is set to "User default", use the user's Windows display language setting instead of the Windows locale setting. (#353)
segment.target: Kad je jezik NVDA podeen na "User default", koristite korisnikovu postavku jezika za Windows umjesto postavke za Windows locale. (#353)

segment.source: NVDA now recognises the existence of controls in AIM 7.
segment.target: NVDA sada priznaje postojanje kontrola u CILJU 7.

segment.source: The pass key through command no longer gets stuck if a key is held down. Previously, NVDA stopped accepting commands if this occurred and had to be restarted. (#413)
segment.target: Naredba za prolaz vie se ne zaglavi ako se tipka dri pritisnutom. Ranije je NVDA prestala prihvaati naredbe ako se to dogodilo i morala se ponovno pokrenuti. (#413)

segment.source: The taskbar is no longer ignored when it receives focus, which often occurs when exiting an application. Previously, NVDA behaved as if the focus had not changed at all.
segment.target: Traka zadataka vie se ne zanemaruje kada primi fokus, to se esto dogaa pri izlasku iz aplikacije. Ranije se NVDA ponaala kao da se fokus uope nije promijenio.

segment.source: When reading text fields in applications which use the Java Access Bridge (including OpenOffice.org), NVDA now functions correctly when reporting of line numbers is enabled.
segment.target: Prilikom itanja tekstualnih polja u aplikacijama koje koriste Java Access Bridge (ukljuujui OpenOffice.org), NVDA sada ispravno funkcionira kada je omogueno izvjeivanje o brojevima redaka.

segment.source: The review copy command (NVDA+f10) gracefully handles the case where it is used on a position before the start marker. Previously, this could cause problems such as crashes in Notepad++.
segment.target: Naredba kopiranja pregleda (NVDA+f10) graciozno obrauje sluaj u kojem se koristi na poloaju prije poetnog markera. Ranije je to moglo uzrokovati probleme kao to su padovi u Notepadu++.

segment.source: A certain control character (0x1) no longer causes strange eSpeak behaviour (such as changes in volume and pitch) when it is encountered in text. (#437)
segment.target: Odreeni kontrolni znak (0x1) vie ne uzrokuje udno ponaanje eSpeaka (kao to su promjene u glasnoi i visini tona) kada se pojavi u tekstu. (#437)

segment.source: The report text selection command (NVDA+shift+upArrow) now gracefully reports that there is no selection in objects which do not support text selection.
segment.target: Naredba za odabir teksta izvjea (NVDA+Shift+ strelica prema gore) sada graciozno izvjeuje da nema odabira u objektima koji ne podravaju odabir teksta.

segment.source: Fixed the issue where pressing the enter key on certain Miranda-IM buttons or links was causing NVDA to freeze. (#440)
segment.target: Rijeen je problem zbog kojeg je pritisak tipke Enter na odreenim tipkama ili poveznicama Miranda-IM uzrokovao zamrzavanje NVDA-e. (#440)

segment.source: The current line or selection is now properly respected when spelling or copying the current navigator object.
segment.target: Trenutani redak ili odabir sada se pravilno potuje prilikom pravopisa ili kopiranja trenutnog objekta navigatora.

segment.source: Worked around a Windows bug which was causing garbage to be spoken after the name of link controls in Windows Explorer and Internet Explorer dialogs. (#451)
segment.target: Radila je oko greke u sustavu Windows koja je uzrokovala izgovaranje smea nakon naziva kontrola veze u dijalozima programa Windows Explorer i Internet Explorer. (#451)

segment.source: Fixed a problem with the report date and time command (NVDA+f12). Previously, date reporting was truncated on some systems. (#471)
segment.target: Rijeen je problem s naredbom datuma i vremena izvjea (NVDA+f12). Prethodno je izvjeivanje o datumima skraeno na nekim sustavima. (#471)

segment.source: Fixed the issue where the system screen reader flag was sometimes inappropriately cleared after interacting with secure Windows screens. This could cause problems in applications which check the screen reader flag, including Skype, Adobe Reader and Jart. (#462)
segment.target: Rijeen je problem u kojem je zastavica itaa zaslona sustava ponekad neprimjereno uklonjena nakon interakcije sa sigurnim zaslonima sustava Windows. To moe uzrokovati probleme u aplikacijama koje provjeravaju zastavicu itaa zaslona, ukljuujui Skype, Adobe Reader i Jart. (#462)

segment.source: In an Internet Explorer 6 combo box, the active item is now reported when it is changed. (#342)
segment.target: U kombiniranom okviru programa Internet Explorer 6 aktivna se stavka sada prijavljuje kada se promijeni. (#342)

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove znaajke

segment.source: As Microsoft Excel's formula bar is inaccessible to NVDA, provide an NVDA specific dialog box for editing when the user presses f2 on a cell.
segment.target: Budui da traka formule programa Microsoft Excel nije dostupna NVDA-u, navedite dijaloki okvir specifian za NVDA za ureivanje kada korisnik pritisne f2 na eliju.

segment.source: Support for formatting in IAccessible2 text controls, including Mozilla applications.
segment.target: Podrka za oblikovanje u IAccessible2 kontrolama teksta, ukljuujui Mozilla aplikacije.

segment.source: Spelling errors can now be reported where possible. This is configurable from the Document Formatting preferences dialog.
segment.target: Pravopisne pogreke sada se mogu prijaviti gdje god je to mogue. To se moe konfigurirati iz dijalokog okvira postavki oblikovanja dokumenta.

segment.source: NVDA can be configured to beep for either all or only visible progress bars. Alternatively, it can be configured to speak progress bar values every 10%.
segment.target: NVDA se moe konfigurirati za zvuni signal za sve ili samo vidljive trake napretka. Alternativno, moe se konfigurirati za izgovaranje vrijednosti trake napretka svakih 10%.

segment.source: Links can now be identified in richedit controls.
segment.target: Poveznice se sada mogu identificirati u richedit kontrolama.

segment.source: The mouse can now be moved to the character under the review cursor in most editable text controls. Previously, the mouse could only be moved to the center of the control.
segment.target: Mi se sada moe premjestiti na znak ispod pokazivaa za pregled u veini tekstualnih kontrola koje se mogu ureivati. Prethodno se mi mogao premjestiti samo u sredite kontrole.

segment.source: In virtual buffers, the review cursor now reviews the text of the buffer, rather than just the internal text of the navigator object (which is often not useful to the user). This means that you can navigate the virtual buffer hierarchically using object navigation and the review cursor will move to that point in the buffer.
segment.target: U virtualnim meuspremnicima, pokaziva pregleda sada pregledava tekst meuspremnika, a ne samo interni tekst objekta navigatora (to esto nije korisno za korisnika). To znai da se hijerarhijski moete kretati virtualnim meuspremnikom pomou navigacije objekta i pokaziva pregleda e se pomaknuti na tu toku u meuspremniku.

segment.source: Handle some additional states on Java controls.
segment.target: Upravljajte nekim dodatnim stanjima na Java kontrolama.

segment.source: If the title command (NVDA+t) is pressed twice, it spells the title. If pressed thrice, it is copied to the clipboard.
segment.target: Ako se naredba title (NVDA+t) pritisne dvaput, izgovara se title. Ako se pritisne tri puta, kopira se u meuspremnik.

segment.source: Keyboard help now reads the names of modifier keys when pressed alone.
segment.target: Pomo na tipkovnici sada ita nazive tipki modifikatora kada se pritisne sama.

segment.source: Key names announced by keyboard help are now translatable.
segment.target: Imena tipki koja je najavila pomo tipkovnice sada se mogu prevesti.

segment.source: Added support for the recognized text field in SiRecognizer. (#198)
segment.target: Dodana podrka za prepoznato tekstualno polje u SiRecognizeru. (#198)

segment.source: Support for braille displays!
segment.target: Podrka za brajeve zaslone!

segment.source: Added a command (NVDA+c) to report the text on the Windows clipboard. (#193)
segment.target: Dodana je naredba (NVDA+c) za prijavu teksta u meuspremnik sustava Windows. (#193)

segment.source: In virtualBuffers, if NVDA automatically switches to focus mode, you can use the escape key to switch back to browse mode. NVDA+space can still also be used.
segment.target: U virtualBuffersu, ako se NVDA automatski prebaci na nain izotravanja, moete upotrijebiti tipku za izlazak kako biste se vratili na nain pregledavanja. NVDA+prostor se takoer moe koristiti.

segment.source: In virtual buffers, when the focus changes or the caret is moved, NVDA can automatically switch to focus mode or browse mode as appropriate for the control under the caret. This is configured from the Virtual Buffers dialog. (#157)
segment.target: U virtualnim meuspremnicima, kada se fokus promijeni ili se karter pomakne, NVDA se moe automatski prebaciti u nain izotravanja ili nain pretraivanja prema potrebi za kontrolu pod karterom. Ovo je konfigurirano iz dijalokog okvira Virtual Buffers. (#157)

segment.source: Rewritten SAPI4 synthesizer driver which replaces the sapi4serotek and sapi4activeVoice drivers and should fix the problems encountered with these drivers.
segment.target: Ponovno napisan upravljaki program sapi4 sintetizatora koji zamjenjuje upravljake programe sapi4serotek i sapi4activeVoice i trebao bi rijeiti probleme s tim upravljakim programima.

segment.source: The NVDA application now includes a manifest, which means that it no longer runs in compatibility mode in Windows Vista.
segment.target: Aplikacija NVDA sada ukljuuje manifest, to znai da se vie ne pokree u nainu kompatibilnosti u sustavu Windows Vista.

segment.source: The configuration file and speech dictionaries are now saved in the user's application data directory if NVDA was installed using the installer. This is necessary for Windows Vista and also allows multiple users to have individual NVDA configurations.
segment.target: Konfiguracijska datoteka i rjenici govora sada se spremaju u korisnikov direktorij podataka aplikacije ako je NVDA instaliran pomou instalacijskog programa. To je potrebno za Windows Vista i takoer omoguuje vie korisnika da imaju pojedinane NVDA konfiguracije.

segment.source: Added support for position information for IAccessible2 controls.
segment.target: Dodana podrka za informacije o poloaju za IAccessible2 kontrole.

segment.source: Added the ability to copy text to the clipboard using the review cursor. NVDA+f9 sets the start marker to the current position of the review cursor. NVDA+f10 retrieves the text between the start marker and the current position of the review cursor and copies it to the clipboard. (#240)
segment.target: Dodana je mogunost kopiranja teksta u meuspremnik pomou kursora za pregled. NVDA+f9 postavlja poetni marker na trenutni poloaj kursora za pregled. NVDA+f10 dohvaa tekst izmeu poetnog markera i trenutnog poloaja kursora za pregled i kopira ga u meuspremnik. (#240)

segment.source: Added support for some edit controls in pinacle tv software.
segment.target: Dodana je podrka za neke kontrole ureivanja u Pinacle TV softveru.

segment.source: When announcing selected text for long selections (512 characters or more), NVDA now speaks the number of selected characters, rather than speaking the entire selection. (#249)
segment.target: Kada najavljuje odabrani tekst za dugi odabir (512 znakova ili vie), NVDA sada govori broj odabranih znakova, umjesto da govori cijeli odabir. (#249)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: If the audio output device is set to use the Windows default device (Microsoft Sound Mapper), NVDA will now switch to the new default device for eSpeak and tones when the default device changes. For example, NVDA will switch to a USB audio device if it automatically becomes the default device when it is connected.
segment.target: Ako je izlazni audio ureaj podeen za upotrebu zadanog ureaja sa sustavom Windows (Microsoft Sound Mapper), NVDA e se sada prebaciti na novi zadani ureaj za eSpeak i tonove kada se zadani ureaj promijeni. Na primjer, NVDA e se prebaciti na USB audio ureaj ako automatski postane zadani ureaj kada je spojen.

segment.source: Improve performance of eSpeak with some Windows Vista audio drivers.
segment.target: Poboljajte performanse eSpeaka s nekim Windows Vista audio upravljakim programima.

segment.source: reporting of links, headings, tables, lists and block quotes can now be configured from the Document Formatting settings dialog. Previously to configure these settings for virtual buffers, the virtual buffer settings dialog would have been used. Now all documents share this configuration.
segment.target: izvjeivanje o vezama, naslovima, tablicama, popisima i skupnim navodnicima sada se moe konfigurirati iz dijalokog okvira postavki oblikovanja dokumenta. Prethodno bi se za konfiguriranje ovih postavki za virtualne meuspremnike koristio dijaloki okvir za postavke virtualnog meuspremnika. Sada svi dokumenti dijele ovu konfiguraciju.

segment.source: Rate is now the default setting in the speech synthesizer settings ring.
segment.target: Stopa je sada zadana postavka u prstenu postavki sintetizatora govora.

segment.source: Improve the loading and unloading of appModules.
segment.target: Poboljajte utovar i istovar appModula.

segment.source: The title command (NVDA+t) now only reports the title instead of the entire object. If the foreground object has no name, the application's process name is used.
segment.target: Naredba title (NVDA+t) sada prijavljuje samo naslov umjesto cijelog objekta. Ako objekt u prednjem planu nema naziv, koristi se naziv procesa aplikacije.

segment.source: Instead of virtual buffer pass through on and off, NVDA now reports focus mode (pass through on) and browse mode (pass through off).
segment.target: Umjesto ukljuivanja i iskljuivanja virtualnog meuspremnika, NVDA sada izvjeuje o nainu izotravanja (ukljuivanje) i nainu pregledavanja (iskljuivanje).

segment.source: Voices are now stored in the configuration file by ID instead of by index. This makes voice settings more reliable across systems and configuration changes. The voice setting will not be preserved in old configurations and an error may be logged the first time a synthesizer is used. (#19)
segment.target: Glasovi se sada pohranjuju u konfiguracijsku datoteku prema ID-u umjesto prema indeksu. To ini glasovne postavke pouzdanijima u svim sustavima i promjenama konfiguracije. Glasovna postavka nee se sauvati u starim konfiguracijama i moe se zabiljeiti pogreka pri prvoj uporabi sintisajzera. (#19)

segment.source: The level of a tree view item is now announced first if it has changed from the previously focused item for all tree views. Previously, this was only occurring for native Windows (SysTreeView32) tree views.
segment.target: Razina stavke prikaza stabla sada se objavljuje prva ako se promijenila u odnosu na prethodno fokusiranu stavku za sve prikaze stabla. Prije se to dogaalo samo za izvorne prikaze stabla sustava Windows (SysTreeView32).

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci greaka

segment.source: The last chunk of audio is no longer cut off when using NVDA with eSpeak on a remote desktop server.
segment.target: Posljednji dio zvuka vie nije odsjeen kada koristite NVDA s eSpeak na udaljenom raunalnom posluitelju.

segment.source: Fix problems with saving speech dictionaries for certain voices.
segment.target: Rijeite probleme s spremanjem govornih rjenika za odreene glasove.

segment.source: Eliminate the lag when moving by units other than character (word, line, etc.) towards the bottom of large plain text documents in Mozilla Gecko virtual buffers. (#155)
segment.target: Uklonite kanjenje prilikom pomicanja jedinica koje nisu znakovi (rije, redak itd.) prema dnu velikih dokumenata s obinim tekstom u virtualnim meuspremnicima Mozilla Gecko. (#155)

segment.source: If speak typed words is enabled, announce the word when enter is pressed.
segment.target: Ako je omogueno izgovaranje upisanih rijei, objavite rije kada pritisnete Enter.

segment.source: Fix some character set issues in richedit documents.
segment.target: Rijeite neke probleme s skupom znakova u richedit dokumentima.

segment.source: The NVDA log viewer now uses richedit instead of just edit to display the log. This improves reading by word with NVDA.
segment.target: NVDA preglednik zapisnika sada koristi richedit umjesto samo ureivanja za prikaz zapisnika. To poboljava itanje po rijei s NVDA-om.

segment.source: Fix some issues related to embedded objects in richedit controls.
segment.target: Rijeite neke probleme povezane s ugraenim objektima u richedit kontrolama.

segment.source: NVDA now reads page numbers in Microsoft Word. (#120)
segment.target: NVDA sada ita brojeve stranica u Microsoft Wordu. (#120)

segment.source: Fix the issue where tabbing to a checked checkbox in a Mozilla Gecko virtual buffer and pressing space would not announce that the checkbox was being unchecked.
segment.target: Rijeite problem kada oznaavanje potvrdnog okvira u virtualnom meuspremniku Mozilla Gecko i pritiskanje razmaka ne bi objavilo da je potvrdni okvir poniten.

segment.source: Correctly report partially checked checkboxes in Mozilla applications.
segment.target: Ispravno prijavite djelomino oznaene potvrdne okvire u Mozilla aplikacijama.

segment.source: If the text selection expands or shrinks in both directions, read the selection as one chunk instead of two.
segment.target: Ako se odabir teksta proiri ili smanji u oba smjera, proitajte odabir kao jedan komad umjesto dva.

segment.source: When reading with the mouse, text in Mozilla Gecko edit fields should now be read.
segment.target: Kada itate miem, tekst u poljima za ureivanje Mozilla Gecko sada bi trebao biti proitan.

segment.source: Say all should no longer cause certain SAPI5 synthesizers to crash.
segment.target: Recimo da svi vie ne bi trebali uzrokovati pad odreenih SAPI5 sintisajzera.

segment.source: Fixed an issue which meant that text selection changes were not being read in Windows standard edit controls before the first focus change after NVDA was started.
segment.target: Rijeen je problem to je znailo da se promjene odabira teksta nisu itale u Windows standardnim kontrolama ureivanja prije prve promjene fokusa nakon pokretanja NVDA.

segment.source: Fix mouse tracking in Java objects. (#185)
segment.target: Popravite praenje mia u Java objektima. (#185)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports Java tree view items with no children as being collapsed.
segment.target: NVDA vie ne prijavljuje stavke prikaza Java stabla bez djece kao saete.

segment.source: Announce the object with focus when a Java window comes to the foreground. Previously, only the top-level Java object was announced.
segment.target: Najavite objekt s fokusom kada se u prvom planu pojavi Java prozor. Prethodno je najavljen samo Java objekt najvie razine.

segment.source: The eSpeak synthesizer driver no longer stops speaking completely after a single error.
segment.target: Upravljaki program sintesajzera eSpeak vie ne prestaje govoriti u potpunosti nakon jedne pogreke.

segment.source: Fix the issue whereby updated voice parameters (rate, pitch, etc.) were not saved when the voice was changed from the synthesizer settings ring.
segment.target: Rijeite problem zbog kojeg aurirani parametri glasa (brzina, visina tona itd.) nisu spremljeni kada je glas promijenjen iz prstena za postavke sintetizatora.

segment.source: Improved the speaking of typed characters and words.
segment.target: Poboljano govorenje upisanih znakova i rijei.

segment.source: Some new text that was previously not spoken in text console applications (such as some text adventure games) is now spoken.
segment.target: Sada se govori neki novi tekst koji ranije nije bio izgovoren u aplikacijama tekstualne konzole (kao to su neke tekstualne avanturistike igre).

segment.source: NVDA now ignores focus changes in background windows. Previously, a background focus change could be treated as if the real focus changed.
segment.target: NVDA sada zanemaruje promjene fokusa u pozadinskim prozorima. Prethodno se promjena fokusa pozadine mogla tretirati kao da se pravi fokus promijenio.

segment.source: Improved the detection of the focus when leaving context menus. Previously, NVDA often didn't react at all when leaving a context menu.
segment.target: Poboljano otkrivanje fokusa prilikom naputanja kontekstnih izbornika. Ranije, NVDA esto uope nije reagirala kada je naputala kontekstni izbornik.

segment.source: NVDA now announces when the context menu is activated in the Start menu.
segment.target: NVDA sada objavljuje kada je kontekstni izbornik aktiviran u izborniku Start.

segment.source: The classic Start menu is now announced as Start menu instead of Application menu.
segment.target: Klasini izbornik Start sada je najavljen kao izbornik Start umjesto izbornika Application.

segment.source: Improved the reading of alerts such as those encountered in Mozilla Firefox. The text should no longer be read multiple times and other extraneous information will no longer be read. (#248)
segment.target: Poboljano itanje upozorenja poput onih koja se pojavljuju u Mozilla Firefoxu. Tekst se vie ne smije itati vie puta i nee se vie itati druge strane informacije. (#248)

segment.source: The text of focusable, read-only edit fields will no longer be included when retrieving the text of dialogs. This fixes, for example, the automatic reading of the entire license agreement in installers.
segment.target: Tekst polja za ureivanje koja se mogu fokusirati i samo za itanje vie nee biti ukljuen prilikom dohvaanja teksta dijaloga. Time se, primjerice, popravlja automatsko itanje cjelokupnog licencnog ugovora u instalaterima.

segment.source: NVDA no longer announces the unselection of text when leaving some edit controls (example: Internet Explorer address bar, Thunderbird 3 email address fields).
segment.target: NVDA vie ne najavljuje ponitavanje odabira teksta prilikom naputanja nekih kontrola za ureivanje (primjer: adresna traka Internet Explorera, polja adrese e-pote Thunderbirda 3).

segment.source: When opening plain text emails in Outlook Express and Windows Mail, focus is correctly placed in the message ready for the user to read it. Previously the user had to press tab or click on the message in order to use cursor keys to read it.
segment.target: Prilikom otvaranja obinih tekstualnih poruka e-pote u programima Outlook Express i Windows Mail, fokus je ispravno postavljen u poruku koja je spremna da je korisnik proita. Prije toga korisnik je morao pritisnuti tabulator ili kliknuti na poruku kako bi je proitao pomou kursorskih tipki.

segment.source: Fixed several major issues with the "Speak command keys" functionality.
segment.target: Rijeeno je nekoliko veih problema s funkcijom "Speak command keys".

segment.source: NVDA can now read text past 65535 characters in standard edit controls (e.g. a large file in Notepad).
segment.target: NVDA sada moe itati tekst iznad 65535 znakova u standardnim kontrolama ureivanja (npr. velika datoteka u Notepadu).

segment.source: Improved line reading in MSHTML edit fields (Outlook Express editable messages and Internet Explorer text input fields).
segment.target: Poboljano itanje redaka u poljima za ureivanje MSHTML-a (poruke koje se mogu ureivati u programu Outlook Express i polja za unos teksta u Internet Explorer).

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes freezes completely when editing text in OpenOffice. (#148, #180)
segment.target: NVDA se ponekad vie ne zamrzava u potpunosti prilikom ureivanja teksta u OpenOfficeu. (#148, #180)

segment.source: Improved the default ESpeak voice in NVDA
segment.target: Poboljan zadani ESpeak glas u NVDA-u

segment.source: Added a laptop keyboard layout. Keyboard layouts can be configured from NVDA's Keyboard settings dialog. (#60)
segment.target: Dodan je raspored tipkovnice prijenosnog raunala. Rasporedi tipkovnice mogu se konfigurirati iz NVDA dijalokog okvira za postavke tipkovnice. (#60)

segment.source: Support for grouping items in SysListView32 controls, mainly found in Windows Vista. (#27)
segment.target: Podrka za grupiranje stavki u kontrolama SysListView32, koje se uglavnom nalaze u sustavu Windows Vista. (#27)

segment.source: Report the checked state of treeview items in SysTreeview32 controls.
segment.target: Prijavite provjereno stanje stavki prikaza stabla u kontrolama SysTreeview32.

segment.source: Added shortcut keys for many of NVDA's configuration dialogs
segment.target: Dodane su tipke preaca za mnoge konfiguracijske dijaloge NVDA-a

segment.source: Support for IAccessible2 enabled applications such as Mozilla Firefox when running NVDA from portable media, with out having to register any special Dll files
segment.target: Podrka za IAccessible2 omoguene aplikacije kao to je Mozilla Firefox prilikom pokretanja NVDA s prijenosnih medija, bez potrebe za registracijom bilo kakvih posebnih Dll datoteka

segment.source: Fix a crash with the virtualBuffers Links List in Gecko applications. (#48)
segment.target: Popravite pad s popisom poveznica VirtualBuffers u Gecko aplikacijama. (#48)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer crash Mozilla Gecko applications such as Firefox and Thunderbird if NVDA is running with higher privilages than the Mozilla Gecko application. E.g. NVDA is running as Administrator.
segment.target: NVDA vie ne bi trebao ruiti aplikacije Mozilla Gecko kao to su Firefox i Thunderbird ako NVDA radi s veim privilegijama od aplikacije Mozilla Gecko. Npr. NVDA radi kao administrator.

segment.source: Speech dictionaries (previously User dictionaries) now can be either case sensitive or insensitive, and the patterns can optionally be regular expressions. (#39)
segment.target: Govorni rjenici (prethodno Korisniki rjenici) sada mogu biti osjetljivi na velika i mala slova ili neosjetljivi, a uzorci mogu opcionalno biti regularni izrazi. (#39)

segment.source: Whether or not NVDA uses a 'screen layout' mode for virtual buffer documents can now be configured from a settings dialog
segment.target: Bez obzira na to koristi li NVDA nain "izgleda zaslona" za dokumente virtualnog meuspremnika, sada se moe konfigurirati iz dijalokog okvira s postavkama

segment.source: No longer report anchor tags with no href in Gecko documents as links. (#47)
segment.target: Vie ne prijavljuje sidrene oznake bez href u Gecko dokumentima kao poveznice. (#47)

segment.source: The NVDA find command now remembers what you last searched for, across all applications. (#53)
segment.target: Naredba NVDA find sada pamti ono to ste zadnji traili, u svim aplikacijama. (#53)

segment.source: Fix issues where the checked state would not be announced for some checkboxes and radio buttons in virtualBuffers
segment.target: Rijeite probleme u kojima oznaeno stanje ne bi bilo najavljeno za neke potvrdne okvire i radio gumbe u virtualBuffersu

segment.source: VirtualBuffer pass-through mode is now specific to each document, rather than NVDA globally. (#33)
segment.target: Nain prijenosa VirtualBuffer sada je specifian za svaki dokument, a ne za NVDA na globalnoj razini. (#33)

segment.source: Fixed some sluggishness with focus changes and incorrect speech interuption which sometimes occured when using NVDA on a system that had been on standby or was rather slow
segment.target: Popravio je neku tromost s promjenama fokusa i netonim prekidima govora koji su se ponekad javljali pri koritenju NVDA-a na sustavu koji je bio u stanju pripravnosti ili je bio prilino spor

segment.source: Improve support for combo boxes in Mozilla Firefox. Specifically when arrowing around them text isn't repeated, and when jumping out of them, ancestor controls are not announced unnecessarily. Also virtualBuffer commands now work when focused on one when you are in a virtualBuffer.
segment.target: Poboljajte podrku za kombinirane okvire u Mozilla Firefoxu. Konkretno, kada se strelice oko njih ne ponavljaju, a kada iskau iz njih, kontrole predaka se ne najavljuju nepotrebno. Takoer, naredbe VirtualBuffer sada rade kada ste usredotoeni na jednu kada ste u VirtualBufferu.

segment.source: Improve accuracy of finding the statusbar in many applications. (#8)
segment.target: Poboljati tonost pronalaenja statusne trake u mnogim aplikacijama. (#8)

segment.source: Added the NVDA interactive Python console tool, to enable developers to look at and manipulate NVDA's internals as it is running
segment.target: Dodan je interaktivni alat konzole NVDA Python kako bi se programerima omoguilo da gledaju i manipuliraju internim podacima NVDA dok je pokrenut

segment.source: sayAll, reportSelection and reportCurrentLine scripts now work properly when in virtualBuffer pass-through mode. (#52)
segment.target: sayAll, reportSelection i reportCurrentLine skripte sada rade ispravno kada su u virtualnomBuffer prolazu. (#52)

segment.source: The increase rate and decrease rate scripts have been removed. Users should use the synth settings ring scripts (control+nvda+arrows) or the Voice settings dialog
segment.target: Skripte za poveanje i smanjenje brzine su uklonjene. Korisnici bi trebali koristiti skripte prstena sintetskih postavki (kontrola+nvda+strelice) ili dijaloki okvir Glasovne postavke

segment.source: Improve the range and scale of the progress bar beeps
segment.target: Poboljajte raspon i skalu zvunih signala trake napretka

segment.source: Added more quick keys to the new virtualBuffers: l for list, i for list item, e for edit field, b for button, x for checkbox, r for radio button, g for graphic, q for blockquote, c for combo box, 1 through 6 for respective heading levels, s for separator, m for frame. (#67, #102, #108)
segment.target: Dodano je vie brzih tipki novim virtualnim baferima: l za popis, i za stavku popisa, e za polje za ureivanje, b za gumb, x za potvrdni okvir, r za radio gumb, g za grafiku, q za blockquote, c za kombinirani okvir, 1 do 6 za odgovarajue razine naslova, s za separator, m za okvir. (#67, #102, #108)

segment.source: Canceling the loading of a new document in Mozilla Firefox now allows the user to keep using the old document's virtualBuffer if the old document hadn't yet really been destroyed. (#63)
segment.target: Otkazivanje uitavanja novog dokumenta u Mozilla Firefox sada omoguuje korisniku da nastavi koristiti virtualni bafer starog dokumenta ako stari dokument jo nije stvarno uniten. (#63)

segment.source: Navigating by words in virtualBuffers is now more accurate as words do not accidentally contain text from more than one field. (#70)
segment.target: Navigacija po rijeima u virtualBuffersu sada je tonija jer rijei ne sadre sluajno tekst iz vie od jednog polja. (#70)

segment.source: Improved accuracy of focus tracking and focus updating when navigating in Mozilla Gecko virtualBuffers.
segment.target: Poboljana tonost praenja fokusa i auriranja fokusa prilikom navigacije u Mozilla Gecko virtualBuffers.

segment.source: Added a findPrevious script (shift+NVDA+f3) for use in new virtualBuffers
segment.target: Dodana je skripta findPrevious (Shift+NVDA+f3) za uporabu u novim virtualnim baferima

segment.source: Improved sluggishness in Mozilla Gecko dialogs (in Firefox and Thunderbird). (#66)
segment.target: Poboljana tromost u dijalozima Mozilla Gecko (u Firefoxu i Thunderbirdu). (#66)

segment.source: Add the ability to view the current log file for NVDA. it can be found in the NVDA menu -> Tools
