segment.target: Dodajte mogunost pregleda trenutne datoteke dnevnika za NVDA. moete ga pronai u NVDA izborniku -> Alati

segment.source: Scripts such as say time and date now take the current language in to account; punctuation and ordering of words now reflects the language
segment.target: Skripte kao to su vrijeme i datum sada uzimaju u obzir trenutni jezik; interpunkcija i redoslijed rijei sada odraavaju jezik

segment.source: The language combo box in NVDA's General settings dialog now shows full language names for ease of use
segment.target: Kombinirani okvir za jezik u dijalokom okviru Ope postavke NVDA-a sada prikazuje pune nazive jezika radi lakeg koritenja

segment.source: When reviewing text in the current navigator object, the text is always up to date if it changes dynamically. E.g. reviewing the text of a list item in Task Manager. (#15)
segment.target: Prilikom pregleda teksta u trenutnom objektu navigatora, tekst je uvijek auran ako se dinamiki mijenja. Npr. pregled teksta stavke popisa u Upravitelju zadacima. (#15)

segment.source: When moving with the mouse, the current paragraph of text under the mouse is now announced, rather than either all the text in that particular object or just the current word. Also audio coordinates, and announcement of object roles is optional, they are turned off by default
segment.target: Kada se kreete miem, sada se najavljuje trenutni odlomak teksta ispod mia, a ne bilo sav tekst u tom odreenom objektu ili samo trenutna rije. Takoer, audio koordinate i najava uloga objekta nisu obavezni, oni su prema zadanim postavkama iskljueni

segment.source: Support for reading text with the mouse in Microsoft Word
segment.target: Podrka za itanje teksta pomou mia u programu Microsoft Word

segment.source: Fixed bug where leaving the menu bar in applications such as Wordpad would cause text selection to not be announced anymore
segment.target: Ispravljena pogreka gdje bi naputanje trake izbornika u aplikacijama kao to je Wordpad uzrokovalo da se odabir teksta vie ne objavljuje

segment.source: In Winamp, the title of the track is no longer announced again and again when switching tracks, or pausing/resuming/stopping playback.
segment.target: U Winampu se naslov pjesme vie ne objavljuje iznova i iznova prilikom prebacivanja pjesama ili pauziranja/nastavljanja/zaustavljanja reprodukcije.

segment.source: In Winamp, Added ability to announce state of the shuffle and repeat controls as they are switched. Works in the main window and in the playlist editor
segment.target: U Winampu je dodana mogunost najave stanja mijeanja i ponavljanja kontrola prilikom prebacivanja. Radi u glavnom prozoru i u ureivau popisa za reprodukciju

segment.source: Improve the ability to activate particular fields in Mozilla Gecko virtualBuffers. May include clickable graphics, links containing paragraphs, and other weird structures
segment.target: Poboljajte mogunost aktiviranja odreenih polja u Mozilla Gecko virtualBuffers. Moe ukljuivati grafike na koje se moe kliknuti, poveznice koje sadre odlomke i druge udne strukture

segment.source: Fixed an initial lag when opening NVDA dialogs on some systems. (#65)
segment.target: Fiksno poetno kanjenje prilikom otvaranja NVDA dijaloga na nekim sustavima. (#65)

segment.source: Add specific support for the Total Commander application
segment.target: Dodajte posebnu podrku za aplikaciju Total Commander

segment.source: Fix bug in the sapi4serotek driver where the pitch could get locked at a particular value, i.e. stays high after reading a capital letter. (#89)
segment.target: Popravite greku u upravljakom programu sapi4serotek gdje bi se visina tona mogla zakljuati na odreenoj vrijednosti, tj. ostati visoka nakon itanja velikog slova. (#89)

segment.source: Announce clickable text and other fields as clickable in Mozilla Gecko VirtualBuffers. e.g. a field which has an onclick HTML attribute. (#91)
segment.target: Najavite tekst koji se moe kliknuti i druga polja kao ona koja se mogu kliknuti u Mozilla Gecko VirtualBuffersu. npr. polje koje ima HTML atribut onclick. (#91)

segment.source: When moving around Mozilla Gecko virtualBuffers, scroll the current field in to view -- useful so sighted peers have an idea of where the user is up to in the document. (#57)
segment.target: Kada se kreete Mozilla Gecko virtualBuffers, pomiite se trenutnim poljem za prikaz -- korisno kako bi vieni vrnjaci imali predodbu o tome gdje se korisnik nalazi u dokumentu. (#57)

segment.source: Add basic support for ARIA live region show events in IAccessible2 enabled applications. Useful in the Chatzilla IRC application, new messages will now be read automatically
segment.target: Dodajte osnovnu podrku za ARIA live region show dogaaje u IAccessible2 omoguenim aplikacijama. Korisno u aplikaciji Chatzilla IRC, nove e se poruke sada automatski itati

segment.source: Some slight improvements to help use ARIA enabled web applications, e.g. Google Docs
segment.target: Neka neznatna poboljanja za pomo u koritenju web-aplikacija s omoguenom aplikacijom ARIA, npr. Google Dokumenti

segment.source: Stop adding extra blank lines to text when copying it from a virtualBuffer
segment.target: Prestani dodavati dodatne prazne retke u tekst prilikom kopiranja iz virtualnog bafera

segment.source: Stop the space key from activating a link in the Links List. Now it can be used like other letters in order to start typing the name of a particular link you wish to go to
segment.target: Zaustavite da razmaknica aktivira poveznicu na Popisu poveznica. Sada se moe koristiti kao i druga slova kako biste poeli upisivati naziv odreene poveznice na koju elite otii

segment.source: The moveMouseToNavigator script (NVDA+numpadSlash) now moves the mouse to the centre of the navigator object, rather than the top left
segment.target: Skripta moveMouseToNavigator (NVDA+ numpadSlash) sada pomie mi u sredite objekta navigatora, a ne gore lijevo

segment.source: Added scripts to click the left and right mouse buttons (numpadSlash and numpadStar respectively)
segment.target: Dodane su skripte za klik lijeve i desne tipke mia (numpadSlash i numpadStar)

segment.source: Improve access to the Windows System Tray. Focus hopefully should no longer seem to keep jumping back to one particular item. Reminder: to get to the System Tray use the Windows command WindowsKey+b. (#10)
segment.target: Poboljajte pristup pretincu sustava Windows. Nadamo se da se fokus vie nee vraati na jednu odreenu stavku. Podsjetnik: za pristup traci sustava koristite Windows naredbu WindowsKey +b. (#10)

segment.source: Improve performance and stop announcing extra text when holding down a cursor key in an edit field and it hits the end
segment.target: Poboljajte performanse i prestanite najavljivati dodatni tekst kada drite tipku pokazivaa u polju za ureivanje i ona doe do kraja

segment.source: Stop the ability for NVDA to make the user wait while particular messages are spoken. Fixes some crashes/freezes with particular speech synthesizers. (#117)
segment.target: Zaustavite mogunost da NVDA natjera korisnika da eka dok se izgovaraju odreene poruke. Popravlja neke padove/zamrzavanja s odreenim sintesajzerima govora. (#117)

segment.source: Added support for the Audiologic Tts3 speech synthesizer, contribution by Gianluca Casalino. (#105)
segment.target: Dodana podrka za sintisajzer govora Audiologic TTS3, doprinos Gianluce Casalina. (#105)

segment.source: Possibly improve performance when navigating around documents in Microsoft Word
segment.target: Mogue poboljanje performansi prilikom navigacije po dokumentima u programu Microsoft Word

segment.source: Improved accuracy when reading text of alerts in Mozilla Gecko applications
segment.target: Poboljana tonost prilikom itanja teksta upozorenja u aplikacijama Mozilla Gecko

segment.source: Stop possible crashes when trying to save configuration on non-English versions of Windows. (#114)
segment.target: Zaustavite mogue padove prilikom pokuaja spremanja konfiguracije na verzijama sustava Windows koje nisu na engleskom jeziku. (#114)

segment.source: Add an NVDA welcome dialog. This dialog is designed to provide essential information for new users and allows CapsLock to be configured as an NVDA modifier key. This dialog will be displayed when NVDA is started by default until it is disabled.
segment.target: Dodajte NVDA dijaloki okvir dobrodolice. Ovaj dijalog osmiljen je kako bi pruio bitne informacije novim korisnicima i omoguuje konfiguriranje CapsLocka kao NVDA modifikacijskog kljua. Ovaj e se dijaloki okvir prikazati kada se NVDA pokrene prema zadanim postavkama dok se ne onemogui.

segment.source: Fix basic support for Adobe Reader so it is possible to read documents in versions 8 and 9
segment.target: Popravite osnovnu podrku za Adobe Reader tako da je mogue itati dokumente u verzijama 8 i 9

segment.source: Fix some errors that may have occured when holding down keys before NVDA is properly initialized
segment.target: Ispravite neke pogreke koje su se mogle pojaviti prilikom dranja tipki prije nego to se NVDA pravilno inicijalizira

segment.source: If the user has configured NVDA to save configuration on exit, make sure the configuration is properly saved when shutting down or logging out of Windows.
segment.target: Ako je korisnik konfigurirao NVDA za spremanje konfiguracije pri izlasku, provjerite je li konfiguracija pravilno spremljena prilikom iskljuivanja ili odjave iz sustava Windows.

segment.source: Added an NVDA logo sound to the beginning of the installer, contributed by Victer Tsaran
segment.target: Poetku instalatera dodan je zvuk logotipa NVDA, koji je pridonio Victer Tsaran

segment.source: NVDA, both running in the installer and otherwise, should properly clean up its system tray icon when it exits
segment.target: NVDA, koji radi u instalacijskom programu i na drugi nain, trebao bi pravilno oistiti ikonu svoje ladice sustava kada izae

segment.source: Labels for standard controls in NVDA's dialogs (such as Ok and cancel buttons) should now show in the language NVDA is set to, rather than just staying in English.
segment.target: Oznake za standardne kontrole u dijalozima NVDA-a (kao to su gumbi U redu i Otkai) sada bi se trebale prikazivati na jeziku na kojem je postavljen NVDA, a ne samo na engleskom jeziku.

segment.source: NVDA's icon should now be used for the NVDA shortcuts in the start menu and on the Desktop, rather than a default application icon.
segment.target: Ikona NVDA sada bi se trebala koristiti za preace NVDA u izborniku Start i na radnoj povrini, a ne zadana ikona aplikacije.

segment.source: Read cells in MS Excel when moving with tab and shift+tab. (#146)
segment.target: itanje elija u MS Excelu prilikom premjetanja pomou kartice i Shift+kartica. (#146)

segment.source: Fix some double speaking in particular lists in Skype.
segment.target: Popravite neke dvostruke govore u odreenim popisima u Skypeu.

segment.source: Improved caret tracking in IAccessible2 and Java applications; e.g. in Open Office and Lotus Symphony, NVDA properly waits for the caret to move in documents rather than accidentally reading the wrong word or line at the end of some paragraphs. (#119)
segment.target: Poboljano praenje kareta u IAccessible2 i Java aplikacijama; npr. u Open Office i Lotus Symphony, NVDA ispravno eka da se karet pomakne u dokumentima, umjesto da sluajno proita pogrenu rije ili redak na kraju nekih odlomaka. (#119)

segment.source: Support for AkelEdit controls found in Akelpad 4.0
segment.target: Podrka za AkelEdit kontrole pronaene u Akelpad 4.0

segment.source: NVDA no longer locks up in Lotus Synphony when moving from the document to the menu bar.
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne zakljuava u Lotus Synphony prilikom prelaska s dokumenta na traku izbornika.

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes in the Windows XP Add/Remove programs applet when launching an uninstaller. (#30)
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne zamrzava u programu za dodavanje/uklanjanje programa u sustavu Windows XP prilikom pokretanja programa za deinstalaciju. (#30)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes when opening Spybot Search and Destroy
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne zamrzava kada se otvori Spybot Search and Destroy

segment.source: Access to web content with new in-process virtualBuffers (so far for Mozilla Gecko applications including Firefox3 and Thunderbird3)
segment.target: Pristup web-sadraju s novim virtualnim baferima (za sada za aplikacije Mozilla Gecko, ukljuujui Firefox3 i Thunderbird3)

segment.source: Load times have been improved almost by a factor of thirty (you no longer have to wait at all for most web pages to load in to the buffer)
segment.target: Vrijeme uitavanja poboljano je gotovo za faktor trideset (vie uope ne morate ekati da se veina web stranica uita u meuspremnik)

segment.source: Added a links list (NVDA+f7)
segment.target: Dodan je popis poveznica (NVDA+f7)

segment.source: Improved the find dialog (control+nvda+f) so that it performs a case-insencitive search, plus fixed a few focus issues with that dialog box.
segment.target: Poboljan je dijaloki okvir za pronalaenje (kontrola+nvda+f) kako bi se provelo pretraivanje neosjetljivo na velika i mala slova, a rijeeno je i nekoliko problema s fokusom u tom dijalokom okviru.

segment.source: It is now possible to select and copy text in the new virtualBuffers
segment.target: Sada je mogue odabrati i kopirati tekst u novim virtualnim baferima

segment.source: By default the new virtualBuffers represent the document in a screen layout (links and controls are not on separate lines unless they really are visually). You can toggle this feature with NVDA+v.
segment.target: Prema zadanim postavkama novi virtualni baferi predstavljaju dokument u izgledu zaslona (poveznice i kontrole nisu u odvojenim linijama, osim ako stvarno nisu vizualno). Ovu znaajku moe promijeniti pomou opcije NVDA+v.

segment.source: It is possible to move by paragraph with control+upArrow and control+downArrow.
segment.target: Mogue je pomicati se po odlomku s kontrolom+ strelicom prema gore i kontrolom+ strelicom prema dolje.

segment.source: Improved support for dynamic content
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za dinamiki sadraj

segment.source: Improved over all accuracy of reading lines and fields when arrowing up and down.
segment.target: Poboljano u odnosu na svu tonost linija i polja itanja prilikom strelica gore i dolje.

segment.source: Internationalization
segment.target: Internacionalizacija

segment.source: It is now possible to type accented characters that rely on a "dead character", while NVDA is running.
segment.target: Sada je mogue upisivati naglaene znakove koji se oslanjaju na "mrtav znak", dok je NVDA pokrenut.

segment.source: NVDA now announces when the keyboard layout is changed (when pressing alt+shift).
segment.target: NVDA sada objavljuje kada se raspored tipkovnice promijeni (kada pritisnete Alt+Shift).

segment.source: The announce date and time feature now takes the system's current regional and language options in to account.
segment.target: Znaajka najave datuma i vremena sada uzima u obzir trenutane regionalne i jezine opcije sustava.

segment.source: added czech translation (by Tomas Valusek with help from Jaromir Vit)
segment.target: dodan eki prijevod (autor Tomas Valusek uz pomo Jaromira Vita)

segment.source: added vietnamese translation by Dang Hoai Phuc
segment.target: dodao vijetnamski prijevod Dang Hoai Phuc

segment.source: Added Africaans (af_ZA) translation, by Willem van der Walt.
segment.target: Dodan prijevod Afrikanaca (af_ZA), Willema van der Walta.

segment.source: Added russian translation by Dmitry Kaslin
segment.target: Dodaje ruski prijevod Dmitryja Kaslina

segment.source: Added polish translation by DOROTA CZAJKA and friends.
segment.target: Dodan poljski prijevod DOROTE CZAJKE i prijatelja.

segment.source: Added Japanese translation by Katsutoshi Tsuji.
segment.target: Dodan je japanski prijevod Katsutoshija Tsujija.

segment.source: added Thai translation by Amorn Kiattikhunrat
segment.target: dodao je tajlandski prijevod Amorn Kiattikhunrat

segment.source: added croatian translation by Mario Percinic and Hrvoje Katic
segment.target: dodan hrvatski prijevod Marija Percinia i Hrvoja Katia

segment.source: Added galician translation by Juan C. buno
segment.target: Dodan galicijski prijevod Juana C. bunoa

segment.source: added ukrainian translation by Aleksey Sadovoy
segment.target: dodao ukrajinski prijevod Aleksey Sadovoy

segment.source: Speech
segment.target: Govor

segment.source: NVDA now comes packaged with eSpeak 1.33 which contains many improvements, among those are improved languages, named variants, ability to speak faster.
segment.target: NVDA sada dolazi u paketu s eSpeak 1.33 koji sadri mnoga poboljanja, meu kojima su poboljani jezici, imenovane varijante, sposobnost breg govora.

segment.source: The voice settings dialog now allows you to change the variant of a synthesizer if it supports one. Variant is usually a slight variation on the current voice. (eSpeak supports variants).
segment.target: Dijaloki okvir za glasovne postavke sada vam omoguuje promjenu varijante sintisajzera ako ga podrava. Varijanta je obino mala varijacija na trenutni glas. (eSpeak podrava varijante).

segment.source: Added the ability to change the inflection of a voice in the voice settings dialog if the current synthesizer supports this. (eSpeak supports inflection).
segment.target: Dodana je mogunost promjene infleksije glasa u dijalokom okviru postavki glasa ako trenutni sintetizator to podrava. (eSpeak podrava infleksiju).

segment.source: Added the ability to turn off speaking of object position information(e.g. 1 of 4). This option can be found in the Object presentation settings dialog.
segment.target: Dodana je mogunost iskljuivanja govora o informacijama o poloaju objekta (npr. 1 od 4). Ova se opcija moe pronai u dijalokom okviru Postavke prezentacije objekta.

segment.source: NVDA can now beep when speaking a capital letter. This can be turned on and off with a check box in the voice settings dialog. Also added a raise pitch for capitals check box to configure whether NVDA should actually do its normal pitch raise for capitals. So now you can have either raise pitch, say cap, or beep, for capitals.
segment.target: NVDA se sada moe oglasiti zvunim signalom kada govori velikim slovom. To se moe ukljuiti i iskljuiti potvrdnim okvirom u dijalokom okviru za glasovne postavke. Takoer je dodan potvrdni okvir za poveanje visine tona za glavne gradove kako bi se konfiguriralo treba li NVDA zapravo izvriti uobiajeno poveanje visine tona za glavne gradove. Dakle, sada moete imati ili podizanje tona, recimo kapu, ili zvuni signal, za velika slova.

segment.source: Added the ability to pause speech in NVDA (like found in Voice Over for the Mac). When NVDA is speaking something, you can press the control or shift keys to silence speech just like normal, but if you then tap the shift key again (as long as you havn't pressed any other keys) speech will continue from exactly where it left off.
segment.target: Dodana je mogunost pauziranja govora u NVDA-u (kao to je pronaeno u Voice Over za Mac). Kad NVDA neto govori, moete pritisnuti tipke Control ili Shift kako biste utiali govor kao i obino, ali ako zatim ponovno dodirnete tipku Shift (sve dok ne pritisnete nijednu drugu tipku), govor e se nastaviti tono tamo gdje je stao.

segment.source: Added a virtual synthDriver which outputs text to a window instead of speaking via a speech synthesiser. This should be more pleasant for sighted developers who are not used to speech synthesis but want to know what is spoken by NVDA. There are probably still some bugs, so feedback is most definitely welcome.
segment.target: Dodan je virtualni synthDriver koji alje tekst u prozor umjesto da govori putem sintetizatora govora. To bi trebalo biti ugodnije vidnim programerima koji nisu navikli na sintezu govora, ali ele znati to govori NVDA. Vjerojatno jo uvijek ima nekih pogreaka, pa su povratne informacije svakako dobrodole.

segment.source: NVDA no longer by default speaks punctuation, you can enable speaking of punctuation with NVDA+p.
segment.target: NVDA vie prema zadanim postavkama ne govori interpunkciju, moete omoguiti govorenje interpunkcije s NVDA+str.

segment.source: eSpeak by default now speaks quite a bit slower, which should make it easier for people who are using eSpeak for the first time, when installing or starting to use NVDA.
segment.target: eSpeak prema zadanim postavkama sada govori prilino sporije, to bi trebalo olakati ljudima koji prvi put koriste eSpeak, prilikom instaliranja ili poetka koritenja NVDA.

segment.source: Added user dictionaries to NVDA. These allow you to make NVDA speak certain text differently. There are three dictionaries: default, voice, and temporary. Entries you add to the default dictionary will happen all the time in NVDA. Voice dictionaries are specific to the current synthesizer and voice you currently have set. And temporary dictionary is for those times you quickly want to set a rule while you are doing a particular task, but you don't want it to be perminant (it will disappear if you close NVDA). For now the rules are regular expressions, not just normal text.
segment.target: Dodani korisniki rjenici u NVDA. Omoguavaju izgovor teksta na drugaiji nain. Postoje tri tipa rjenika: podrazumjevani, glasovnii privremeni. Upisi koji budu dodani u glavni rjenik, izvravat e se svaki put. Glasovni rjenici se odnose na postavljeni glas i govornu jedinicu. A privremeni rjenici slue za testiranje nekog pravila (nestat e kada se ponovno pokrene NVDA). Za sada, pravila se sastoje od regularnih izraza, ne samo pravilnog teksta.

segment.source: Synthesizers can now use any audio output device on your system, by setting the output device combo box in the Synthesizer dialog before selecting the synthesizer you want.
segment.target: Sintetizatori sada mogu koristiti bilo koji izlazni audio ureaj na vaem sustavu, postavljanjem kombiniranog okvira izlaznog ureaja u dijalokom okviru Sintetizatora prije odabira eljenog sintetizatora.

segment.source: Performance
segment.target: performanse

segment.source: NVDA no longer takes up a huge amount of system memory , when editing messages in mshtml edit controls
segment.target: NVDA vie ne zauzima veliku koliinu sistemske memorije prilikom ureivanja poruka u mshtml kontrolama za ureivanje

segment.source: Improved performance when reviewing text inside many controls that do not actually have a real cursor. e.g. MSN Messenger history window, treeview items, listview items etc.
segment.target: Poboljane performanse prilikom pregleda teksta unutar mnogih kontrola koje zapravo nemaju pravi kursor. npr. Prozor povijesti MSN Messengera, stavke prikaza stabla, stavke prikaza popisa itd.

segment.source: Improved performance in rich edit documents.
segment.target: Poboljane performanse u bogatim dokumentima za ureivanje.

segment.source: NVDA should no longer slowly creep up in system memory size for no reason
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne bi trebao polako uvlaiti u veliinu memorije sustava bez razloga

segment.source: Fixed bugs when trying to focus on a dos console window more than three or so times. NVDA did have a tendency to completely crash.
segment.target: Otklonjene su pogreke kada se pokuavate usredotoiti na prozor konzole DOS-a vie od tri puta. NVDA je imala tendenciju da se potpuno srui.

segment.source: Key commands
segment.target: &Naredbe tipki

segment.source: NVDA+shift+numpad6 and NVDA+shift+numpad4 allow you to navigate to the next or previous object in flow respectively. This means that you can navigate in an application by only using these two keys with out having to worry about going up by parent, or down to first child as you move around the object hyerarchy. For instance in a web browser such as firefox, you could navigate the document by object, by just using these two keys. If next in flow or previous in flow takes you up and out of an object, or down in to an object, ordered beeps indicate the direction.
segment.target: NVDA+SHIFT+NUMPAD6 i NVDA+SHIFT+NUMPAD4 omoguuju vam da se kreete do sljedeeg ili prethodnog objekta u protoku. To znai da u aplikaciji moete kretati samo pomou ova dva kljueva, bez da se brinete o tome da se roditelja podigne ili dolje do prvog djeteta dok se kreete oko objekta Hyerarhije. Na primjer, u web -pregledniku kao to je Firefox, moete se kretati dokumentom prema objektu, samo pomou ove dvije tipke. Ako vas sljedei u protoku ili prethodnom protoku odvede gore i izvan objekta ili dolje u objekt, ureeni zvuni signali ukazuju na smjer.

segment.source: You can now configure voice settings with out opening the voice settings dialog, by using the Synth Settings Ring. The synth settings ring is a group of voice settings you can toggle through by pressing control+NVDA+right and control+NVDA+left. To change a setting use control+NVDA+up and control+NVDA+down.
segment.target: Sada moete konfigurirati glasovne postavke bez otvaranja dijalokog okvira za glasovne postavke, pomou prstena za postavke sint. Prsten za postavke sinkronizacije skupina je glasovnih postavki koje moete mijenjati pritiskom na Control+NVDA+right i Control+NVDA+left. Za promjenu postavke koristite Control+NVDA+gore i Control+NVDA+dolje.

segment.source: Added a command to report the current selection in edit fields (NVDA+shift+upArrow).
segment.target: Dodana je naredba za izvjeivanje o trenutanom odabiru u poljima za ureivanje (NVDA+Shift+ strelica prema gore).

segment.source: Quite a few NVDA commands that speak text (such as report current line etc) now can spell the text if pressed twice quickly.
segment.target: Dosta NVDA naredbi koje govore tekst (kao to je tekui redak izvjea itd.) sada mogu pisati tekst ako se pritisnu dvaput brzo.

segment.source: the capslock, numpad insert and extended insert can all be used as the NVDA modifier key. Also if one of these keys is used, pressing the key twice with out pressing any other keys will send the key through to the operating system, just like you'd pressed the key with out NVDA running. To make one of these keys be the NVDA modifier key, check its checkbox in the Keyboard settings dialog (used to be called the keyboard echo dialog).
segment.target: Capslock, NumPad Insert i proireni umetak mogu se koristiti kao tipka NVDA modifikatora. Takoer ako se koristi jedan od ovih tipki, pritiskom na tipku dvaput pritiskom na pritisak na bilo koje druge tipke poslat e tipku u operativni sustav, ba kao to ste pritisnuli tipku s pokretanjem NVDA. Da biste jedan od ovih tipki bili tipka NVDA modifikator, provjerite njegov potvrdni okvir u dijalokom okviru postavki tipkovnice (nekada se naziva dijaloki okvir tipkovnice Echo).

segment.source: Application support
segment.target: Aplikacijska podrka

segment.source: Improved support for Firefox3 and Thunderbird3 documents. Load times have been improved by almost a factor of thirty, a screen layout is used by default (press nvda+v to toggle between this and no screen layout), a links list (nvda+f7 has been added), the find dialog (control+nvda+f) is now case-insensitive, much better support for dynamic content, selecting and copying text is now possible.
segment.target: Poboljana podrka dokumentima Firefox3 i Thunderbird3. Vremena uitavanja poboljana su gotovo trideset, izgled zaslona koristi se prema zadanim postavkama (pritisnite nvda+v za prebacivanje izmeu ovog i bez izgleda zaslona), dodan je popis veza (NVDA+F7), dijalog za pronalaenje ( Control+NVDA+F) sada je neosjetljiva na sluaj, sada je mogua puno bolja podrka za dinamiki sadraj, odabir i kopiranje teksta sada je mogue.

segment.source: In the MSN Messenger and Windows Live Messenger history windows, it is now possible to select and copy text.
segment.target: U prozorima povijesti programa MSN Messenger i Windows Live Messenger sada je mogue odabrati i kopirati tekst.

segment.source: Improved support for the audacity application
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za aplikaciju Audacity

segment.source: Added support for a few edit/text controls in Skype
segment.target: Dodana je podrka za nekoliko kontrola ureivanja/teksta u Skypeu

segment.source: Improved support for Miranda instant messenger application
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za aplikaciju Miranda instant messenger

segment.source: Fixed some focus issues when opening html and plain text messages in Outlook Express.
segment.target: Rijeeni su neki problemi s fokusom prilikom otvaranja html i obinih tekstualnih poruka u programu Outlook Express.

segment.source: Outlook express newsgroup message fields are now labeled correctly
segment.target: Polja s porukama grupe novosti programa Outlook Express sada su ispravno oznaena

segment.source: NVDA can now read the addresses in the Outlook Express message fields (to/from/cc etc)
segment.target: NVDA sada moe itati adrese u poljima poruka programa Outlook Express (za/od/cc itd.)

segment.source: NVDA should be now more accurate at announcing the next message in out look express when deleting a message from the message list.
segment.target: NVDA bi sada trebao biti toniji pri objavljivanju sljedee poruke u out look expressu prilikom brisanja poruke s popisa poruka.

segment.source: APIs and toolkits
segment.target: API-ji i alati

segment.source: Improved object navigation for MSAA objects. If a window has a system menu, title bar, or scroll bars, you can now navigate to them.
segment.target: Poboljana navigacija objektima za MSAA objekte. Ako prozor ima izbornik sustava, naslovnu traku ili klizne trake, sada ih moete otvoriti.

segment.source: Added support for the IAccessible2 accessibility API. A part from the ability to announce more control types, this also allows NVDA to access the cursor in applications such as Firefox 3 and Thunderbird 3, allowing you to navigate, select or edit text.
segment.target: Dodana je podrka za IAccessible2 accessibility API. Kao dio mogunosti najave vie vrsta kontrola, to takoer omoguuje NVDA-u pristup pokazivau u aplikacijama kao to su Firefox 3 i Thunderbird 3, omoguujui vam navigaciju, odabir ili ureivanje teksta.

segment.source: Added support for Scintilla edit controls (such controls can be found in Notepad++ or Tortoise SVN).
segment.target: Dodana podrka za Scintilla kontrole ureivanja (takve kontrole moete pronai u Notepad++ ili Tortoise SVN).

segment.source: Added support for Java applications (via the Java Access Bridge). This can provide basic support for Open Office (if Java is enabled), and any other stand-alone Java application. Note that java applets with in a web browser may not work yet.
segment.target: Dodana podrka za Java aplikacije (putem Java Access Bridge). To moe pruiti osnovnu podrku za Open Office (ako je Java omoguena) i bilo koju drugu samostalnu Java aplikaciju. Imajte na umu da java apleti u web-pregledniku moda jo ne rade.

segment.source: Mouse
segment.target: Mi

segment.source: Improved support for reading what is under the mouse pointer as it moves. It is now much faster, and it also now has the ability in some controls such as standard edit fields, Java and IAccessible2 controls, to read the current word, not just the current object. This may be of some used to vision impared people who just want to read a specific bit of text with the mouse.
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za itanje onoga to se nalazi pod pokazivaem mia dok se kree. Sada je mnogo bri, a sada ima i mogunost u nekim kontrolama kao to su standardna polja ureivanja, Java i IACCEssible2 kontrola, itati trenutnu rije, a ne samo trenutni objekt. Ovo bi moglo biti od nekih vizija ometalo ljude koji samo ele proitati odreeni dio teksta s miem.

segment.source: Added a new config option, found in the mouse settings dialog. Play audio when mouse moves, when checked, plays a 40 ms beep each time the mouse moves, with its pitch (between 220 and 1760 hz) representing the y axis, and left/right volume, representing the x axis. This enables a blind person to get a rough idea of where the mouse is on the screen as its being moved. This feature also depends on reportObjectUnderMouse also being turned on. So this means that if you quickly need to disable both beeps and announcing of objects, then just press NVDA+m. The beeps are also louder or softer depending on how bright the screen is at that point.
segment.target: Dodana je nova opcija konfiguracije, pronaena u dijalokom okviru Postavke mia. Reproducirajte zvuk kada se mi, kad se provjeri, svira 40 ms zvuni signal svaki put kada se mi pomie, sa svojim tonom (izmeu 220 i 1760 Hz) koji predstavlja osi Y, a lijevo/desno volumen, to predstavlja X osi. To omoguava slijepoj osobi da dobije grubu ideju gdje je mi na ekranu dok se pomie. Ova znaajka takoer ovisi o tome da je i reportObjectUnderMouse takoer ukljuen. To znai da ako brzo trebate onemoguiti i zvune signale i najavljivanje objekata, samo pritisnite NVDA+M. Znosnici su takoer glasniji ili meki, ovisno o tome koliko je zaslon u tom trenutku svijetli.

segment.source: Object presentation and interaction
segment.target: Prezentacija i interakcija objekta

segment.source: Improved support for most common treeview controls. NVDA now tells you how many items are in the branch when you expand it. It also announces the level when moving in and out of branches. And, it announces the current item number and number of items, according to the current branch, not the entire treeview.
segment.target: Poboljana podrka za najee kontrole prikaza stabla. NVDA vam sada govori koliko je stavki u podrunici kada je proirite. Takoer objavljuje razinu prilikom ulaska i izlaska iz grana. I, najavljuje trenutni broj stavke i broj stavki, prema trenutnoj grani, a ne cijelom prikazu stabla.

segment.source: Improved what is announced when focus changes as you move around applications or the operating system. Now instead of just hearing the control you land on, you hear information about any controls this control is positioned inside of. For instance if you tab and land on a button inside a groupbox, the groupbox will also get announced.
segment.target: Poboljano je ono to se najavljuje kada se fokus promijeni dok se kreete po aplikacijama ili operativnom sustavu. Sada umjesto da samo ujete kontrolu na koju se sputate, ujete informacije o svim kontrolama u kojima je ova kontrola smjetena. Na primjer, ako odaberete karticu i sletite na gumb unutar grupnog okvira, grupni okvir e takoer biti objavljen.

segment.source: NVDA now tries to speak the message inside many dialog boxes as they appear. This is accurate most of the time, though there are still many dialogs that arn't as good as they could be.
segment.target: NVDA sada pokuava izgovoriti poruku unutar mnogih dijalokih okvira kako se pojavljuju. To je uglavnom tono, iako jo uvijek postoji mnogo dijaloga koji nisu tako dobri kao to bi mogli biti.

segment.source: Added a report object descriptions checkbox to the object presentation settings dialog. Power users may wish to sometimes uncheck this to stop NVDA announcing a lot of extra descriptions on particular controls, such as in Java applications.
segment.target: Dodan je potvrdni okvir za opise objekta izvjea u dijaloki okvir postavki prezentacije objekta. Napredni korisnici moda e ponekad htjeti ponititi ovu opciju kako bi sprijeili NVDA da objavi mnogo dodatnih opisa na odreenim kontrolama, kao to je to sluaj u Java aplikacijama.

segment.source: NVDA automatically announces selected text in edit controls when focus moves to them. If there isn't any selected text, then it just announces the current line like usual.
segment.target: NVDA automatski najavljuje odabrani tekst u kontrolama ureivanja kada se fokus pomakne na njih. Ako nema odabranog teksta, tada samo najavljuje trenutni redak kao i obino.

segment.source: NVDA is a lot more careful now when it plays beeps to indicate progress bar changes in applications. It no longer goes crazy in Eclipse applications such as Lotus Notes/Symphony, and Accessibility Probe.
segment.target: NVDA je sada mnogo paljivija kada reproducira zvune signale kako bi ukazala na promjene trake napretka u aplikacijama. Vie ne ludi u aplikacijama Eclipse kao to su Lotus Notes/Symphony i Accessibility Probe.

segment.source: User Interface
segment.target: Korisniko suelje

segment.source: Removed the NVDA interface window, and replaced it with a simple NVDA popup menu.
segment.target: Uklonio je prozor NVDA suelja i zamijenio ga jednostavnim skonim izbornikom NVDA.

segment.source: NVDA's user interface settings dialog is now called General Settings. It also contains an extra setting: a combo box to set the log level, for what messages should go to NVDA's log file. Note that NVDA's log file is now called nvda.log not debug.log.
segment.target: Dijaloki okvir postavki korisnikog suelja NVDA-a sada se naziva Ope postavke. Takoer sadri dodatnu postavku: kombinirani okvir za postavljanje razine zapisnika, za poruke koje bi trebale ii u datoteku zapisnika NVDA. Imajte na umu da se NVDA datoteka zapisnika sada naziva nvda.log, a ne debug.log.

segment.source: Removed the report object group names checkBox from the object presentation settings dialog, reporting of group names now is handled differently.
segment.target: Uklonjeno je polje za potvrdu naziva grupe objekta izvjea iz dijalokog okvira postavki prezentacije objekta, izvjeivanje o nazivima grupa sada se obrauje drugaije.

segment.source: NVDA now has a built-in synthesizer called eSpeak, developed by Jonathan Duddington.It is very responsive and lite-weight, and has support for many different languages. Sapi synthesizers can still be used, but eSpeak will be used by default.
segment.target: NVDA sada ima ugraeni sintisajzer nazvan eSpeak, koji je razvio Jonathan Duddington. Vrlo je odzivan i lagan te ima podrku za mnoge razliite jezike. Sapi sintetizatori i dalje se mogu koristiti, ali eSpeak e se koristiti prema zadanim postavkama.

segment.source: eSpeak does not depend on any special software to be installed, so it can be used with NVDA on any computer, on a USB thumb drive, or anywhere.
segment.target: eSpeak ne ovisi o bilo kojem posebnom softveru koji se instalira, tako da se moe koristiti s NVDA-om na bilo kojem raunalu, na USB memoriji ili bilo gdje.

segment.source: For more info on eSpeak, or to find other versions, go to http://espeak.sourceforge.net/.
segment.target: Za vie informacija o eSpeaku ili za pronalaenje drugih verzija posjetite http://espeak.sourceforge.net/.

segment.source: Fix bug where the wrong character was being announced when pressing delete in Internet Explorer / Outlook Express editable panes.
segment.target: Ispravite pogreku kod najave pogrenog znaka kada pritisnete Delete u oknima koja se mogu ureivati u pregledniku Internet Explorer / Outlook Express.

segment.source: Added support for more edit fields in Skype.
segment.target: Dodana je podrka za vie polja za ureivanje u Skypeu.

segment.source: VirtualBuffers only get loaded when focus is on the window that needs to be loaded. This fixes some problems when the preview pane is turned on in Outlook Express.
segment.target: VirtualBuffers se uitavaju samo kada je fokus na prozoru koji treba uitati. To rjeava neke probleme kada je okno za pregled ukljueno u programu Outlook Express.

segment.source: Added commandline arguments to NVDA:
segment.target: Dodani argumenti naredbenog retka u NVDA:

segment.source: -m, --minimal: do not play startup/exit sounds and do not show the interface on startup if set to do so.
segment.target: -m, --minimal: nemojte reproducirati zvukove pokretanja/izlaska i nemojte prikazivati suelje pri pokretanju ako je tako podeeno.

segment.source: -q, --quit: quit any other already running instance of NVDA and then exit
segment.target: -q, --quit: zatvorite bilo koju drugu ve pokrenutu instancu NVDA-a, a zatim izaite

segment.source: -s, --stderr-file fileName: specify where NVDA should place uncaught errors and exceptions
segment.target: -s, --stderr-datotekaName: navedite gdje bi NVDA trebao postaviti neulovljene pogreke i iznimke

segment.source: -d, --debug-file fileName: specify where NVDA should place debug messages
segment.target: -d, --debug-datotekaName: navedite gdje bi NVDA trebao postaviti poruke za ispravljanje pogreaka

segment.source: -c, --config-file: specify an alternative configuration file
segment.target: -c, --config-datoteka: navedite alternativnu konfiguracijsku datoteku

segment.source: -h, -help: show a help message listing commandline arguments
segment.target: -h, -help: prikai argumente naredbenog retka za unos poruke pomoi

segment.source: Fixed bug where punctuation symbols would not be translated to the appropriate language, when using a language other than english, and when speak typed characters was turned on.
segment.target: Fiksna pogreka gdje se simboli interpunkcije ne bi preveli na odgovarajui jezik, kada se koristi jezik koji nije engleski i kada je ukljuen govor upisanih znakova.

segment.source: Added Slovak language files thanks to Peter Vagner
segment.target: Datoteke na slovakom jeziku dodao je Peter Vagner

segment.source: Added a Virtual Buffer settings dialog and a Document Formatting settings dialog, from Peter Vagner.
segment.target: Dodan je dijaloki okvir za postavke virtualnog meuspremnika i dijaloki okvir za postavke oblikovanja dokumenta, od Petera Vagnera.

segment.source: Added French translation thanks to Michel Such
segment.target: Dodan francuski prijevod zahvaljujui Michelu Takvom

segment.source: Added a script to toggle beeping of progress bars on and off (insert+u). Contributed by Peter Vagner.
segment.target: Dodana je skripta za ukljuivanje i iskljuivanje zvunog signala traka napretka (INSERT+u). Doprinosi Peter Vagner.

segment.source: Made more messages in NVDA be translatable for other languages. This includes script descriptions when in keyboard help.
segment.target: Omoguio je da se vie poruka u NVDA moe prevesti na druge jezike. To ukljuuje opise skripti kada ste u pomoi tipkovnicom.

segment.source: Added a find dialog to the virtualBuffers (internet Explorer and Firefox). Pressing control+f when on a page brings up a dialog in which you can type some text to find. Pressing enter will then search for this text and place the virtualBuffer cursor on this line. Pressing f3 will also search for the next occurance of the text.
segment.target: VirtualBuffersu (Internet Explorer i Firefox) dodan je dijaloki okvir za pronalaenje. Pritiskom na Control+f na stranici otvara se dijaloki okvir u koji moete upisati tekst koji elite pronai. Pritiskom tipke Enter trait e se ovaj tekst i postaviti kursor VirtualBuffer na ovaj redak. Pritiskom na f3 takoer e se traiti sljedea pojava teksta.

segment.source: When speak typed characters is turned on, more characters should be now spoken. Technically, now ascii characters from 32 to 255 can now be spoken.
segment.target: Kad je ukljueno izgovaranje unesenih znakova, sada bi se trebalo izgovoriti vie znakova. Tehniki, sada se mogu govoriti ascii znakovi od 32 do 255.

segment.source: Renamed some control types for better readability. Editable text is now edit, outline is now tree view and push button is now button.
segment.target: Preimenovane su neke vrste kontrola radi bolje itljivosti. Tekst koji se moe ureivati sada se ureuje, kontura je sada prikaz stabla, a tipka je sada gumb.

segment.source: When arrowing around list items in a list, or tree view items in a tree view, the control type (list item, tree view item) is no longer spoken, to speed up navigation.
segment.target: Prilikom strelice oko stavki popisa u popisu ili stavki prikaza stabla u prikazu stabla, vrsta kontrole (stavka popisa, stavka prikaza stabla) vie se ne izgovara kako bi se ubrzala navigacija.

segment.source: Has Popup (to indicate that a menu has a submenu) is now spoken as submenu.
segment.target: Ima skoni prozor (koji oznaava da izbornik ima podizbornik) koji se sada izgovara kao podizbornik.

segment.source: Where some language use control and alt (or altGR) to enter a special character, NVDA now will speak these characters when speak typed characters is on.
segment.target: Ako neki jezik koristi kontrolu i alt (ili altGR) za unos posebnog znaka, NVDA e sada govoriti ove znakove kada je ukljuen govor upisanih znakova.

segment.source: Fixed some problems with reviewing static text controls.
segment.target: Rijeeni su neki problemi s pregledom statikih kontrola teksta.

segment.source: Added Translation for Traditional Chinese, thanks to Coscell Kao.
segment.target: Zahvaljujui Coscell Kao dodan je prijevod za tradicionalni kineski.

segment.source: Re-structured an important part of the NVDA code, which should now fix many issues with NVDA's user interface (including settings dialogs).
segment.target: Restrukturiran je vaan dio NVDA koda, koji bi sada trebao rijeiti mnoge probleme s korisnikim sueljem NVDA-a (ukljuujui dijaloge s postavkama).

segment.source: Added Sapi4 support to NVDA. Currently there are two sapi4 drivers, one based on code contributed by Serotek Corporation, and one using the ActiveVoice.ActiveVoice com Interface. Both these drivers have issues, see which one works best for you.
segment.target: Dodana je podrka za Sapi4 u NVDA. Trenutano postoje dva upravljaka programa sapi4, jedan na temelju koda koji je pridonijela tvrtka Serotek Corporation, a drugi koristi suelje ActiveVoice.ActiveVoice com. Oba vozaa imaju problema. Pogledaj koji ti najvie odgovara.

segment.source: Now when trying to run a new copy of NVDA while an older copy is still running will cause the new copy to just exit. This fixes a major problem where running multiple copies of NVDA makes your system very unusable.
segment.target: Sada kada pokuavate pokrenuti novu kopiju NVDA dok je starija kopija jo uvijek pokrenuta, nova kopija e se samo zatvoriti. To rjeava veliki problem kada pokretanje vie kopija NVDA-a ini va sustav vrlo neupotrebljivim.

segment.source: Renamed the title of the NVDA user interface from NVDA Interface to NVDA.
segment.target: Preimenovan je naziv NVDA korisnikog suelja iz NVDA suelja u NVDA.

segment.source: Fixed a bug in Outlook Express where pressing backspace at the start of an editable message would cause an error.
segment.target: Ispravljena je pogreka u programu Outlook Express gdje bi pritisak na backspace na poetku poruke koja se moe ureivati uzrokovao pogreku.

segment.source: Added patch from Rui Batista that adds a script to report the current battery status on laptops (insert+shift+b).
segment.target: Dodana zakrpa od Rui Batiste koja dodaje skriptu za prijavu trenutnog stanja baterije na prijenosnim raunalima (INSERT+Shift+b).

segment.source: Added a synth driver called Silence. This is a synth driver that does not speak anything, allowing NVDA to stay completely silent at all times. Eventually this could be used along with Braille support, when we have it.
segment.target: Dodan je upravljaki program za sintisajzer pod nazivom Silence. Ovo je sintisajzer koji ne govori nita, omoguujui NVDA da ostane potpuno tih u svakom trenutku. Na kraju bi se to moglo koristiti zajedno s podrkom za Braillevo pismo, kada ga budemo imali.

segment.source: Added capitalPitchChange setting for synthesizers thanks to J.J. Meddaugh
segment.target: Postavka CapitalPitchChange za sintisajzere dodana je zahvaljujui J.J. Meddaughu

segment.source: Added patch from J.J. Meddaugh that makes the toggle report objects under mouse script more like the other toggle scripts (saying on/off rather than changing the whole statement).
segment.target: Dodana zakrpa od J.J. Meddaugha koja ini objekte za prebacivanje izvjea pod skriptom mia vie kao i druge skripte za prebacivanje (rei ukljuivanje/iskljuivanje umjesto mijenjanja cijele izjave).

segment.source: Added spanish translation (es) contributed by Juan C. buo.
segment.target: Dodano panjolsko prevoenje (i) koje je priloio Juan C. buo.

segment.source: Added Hungarian language file from Tamas Gczy.
segment.target: Dodana datoteka na maarskom jeziku od Tamasa Gczyja.

segment.source: Added Portuguese language file from Rui Batista.
segment.target: Dodana datoteka na portugalskom jeziku iz Rui Batiste.

segment.source: Changing the voice in the voice settings dialog now sets the rate, pitch and volume sliders to the new values according to the synthesizer, rather than forcing the synthesizer to be set to the old values. This fixes issues where a synth like eloquence or viavoice seems to speek at a much faster rate than all other synths.
segment.target: Promjena glasa u dijalokom okviru postavki glasa sada postavlja klizae brzine, visine i glasnoe na nove vrijednosti prema sintisajzeru, a ne prisiljavanje sintisajzera da se postavi na stare vrijednosti. To rjeava probleme u kojima se ini da sintisajzer poput rjeitosti ili putem glasa govori mnogo bre od svih ostalih sintisajzera.

segment.source: Fixed a bug where either speech would stop, or NVDA would entirely crash, when in a Dos console window.
segment.target: Ispravljena je pogreka u kojoj bi se govor zaustavio ili bi se NVDA u potpunosti sruio u prozoru konzole Dos.

segment.source: If support for a particular language exists, NVDA now automatically can show its interface and speak its messages in the language Windows is set to. A particular language can still be chosen manualy from the user interface settings dialog as well.
segment.target: Ako postoji podrka za odreeni jezik, NVDA sada moe automatski prikazati svoje suelje i izgovoriti svoje poruke na jeziku na kojem je postavljen Windows. Odreeni jezik i dalje se moe runo odabrati i iz dijalokog okvira postavki korisnikog suelja.

segment.source: Added script 'toggleReportDynamicContentChanges' (insert+5). This toggles whether new text, or other dynamic changes should be automatically announced. So far this only works in Dos Console Windows.
segment.target: Dodana je skripta 'toggleReportDynamicContentChanges' (umetnite+5). To ukljuuje automatsku objavu novog teksta ili drugih dinamikih promjena. Zasad to funkcionira samo u sustavu Dos Console Windows.

segment.source: Added script 'toggleCaretMovesReviewCursor' (insert+6). This toggles whether the review cursor should be automatically repositioned when the system caret moves. This is useful in Dos console windows when trying to read information as the screen is updating.
segment.target: Dodana je skripta 'toggleCaretMovesReviewCursor' (umetnite+6). Ovim se prebacuje treba li se pokaziva pregleda automatski premjestiti kada se pomie pokaziva sustava. To je korisno u prozorima Dos konzole kada pokuavate itati informacije dok se zaslon aurira.

segment.source: Added script 'toggleFocusMovesNavigatorObject' (insert+7). This toggles whether the navigator object is repositioned on the object with focus as it changes.
segment.target: Dodana je skripta 'toggleFocusMovesNavigatorObject' (umetnuti+7). Ovo mijenja je li objekt navigatora premjeten na objekt s fokusom dok se mijenja.

segment.source: Added some documentation translated in to various languages. So far there is French, Spannish and Finish.
segment.target: Dodana je neka dokumentacija prevedena na razliite jezike. Do sada postoje francuski, panjolski i finski.

segment.source: Removed some developer documentation from the binary distribution of NVDA, it is only now in the source version.
segment.target: Uklonio je neku razvojnu dokumentaciju iz binarne distribucije NVDA, sada je tek u izvornoj verziji.

segment.source: Fixed a possible bug in Windows Live Messanger and MSN Messenger where arrowing up and down the contact list would cause errors.
segment.target: Ispravljena je mogua pogreka u programima Windows Live Messanger i MSN Messenger gdje bi strelica gore i dolje po popisu kontakata uzrokovala pogreke.

segment.source: New messages are now automatically spoken when in a conversation using Windows Live Messenger. (only works for English versions so far)
segment.target: Nove se poruke sada automatski izgovaraju kada se u razgovoru koristi Windows Live Messenger. (zasad vrijedi samo za verzije na engleskom jeziku)

segment.source: The history window in a Windows Live Messenger conversation can now be read by using the arrow keys. (Only works for English versions so far)
segment.target: Prozor povijesti u razgovoru sa sustavom Windows Live Messenger sada se moe proitati pomou tipki sa strelicama. (Zasad radi samo za verzije na engleskom jeziku)

segment.source: Added script 'passNextKeyThrough' (insert+f2). Press this key, and then the next key pressed will be passed straight through to Windows. This is useful if you have to press a certain key in an application but NVDA uses that key for something else.
segment.target: Dodana skripta 'passNextKeyThrough' (umetnuti+f2). Pritisnite ovu tipku, a zatim e se sljedea pritisnuta tipka proslijediti izravno u sustav Windows. To je korisno ako morate pritisnuti odreenu tipku u aplikaciji, ali NVDA koristi tu tipku za neto drugo.

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes up for more than a minute when opening very large documents in MS Word.
segment.target: NVDA se vie ne zamrzava dulje od minute pri otvaranju vrlo velikih dokumenata u MS Wordu.

segment.source: Fixed a bug where moving out of a table in MS Word, and then moving back in, caused the current row/column numbers not to be spoken if moving back in to exactly the same cell.
segment.target: Ispravljena je pogreka pri izlasku iz tablice u MS Wordu, a zatim ponovnom ulasku, to je uzrokovalo da se trenutni brojevi redaka/stupaca ne izgovaraju ako se vratite u potpuno istu eliju.

segment.source: When starting NVDA with a synthesizer that doesn't exist, or is not working, the sapi5 synth will try and be loaded in stead, or if sapi5 isn't working, then speech will be set to silence.
segment.target: Kada pokrenete NVDA sa sintesajzerom koji ne postoji ili ne radi, sapi5 sintisajzer e se pokuati uitati umjesto sapi5, ili ako sapi5 ne radi, onda e govor biti utian.

segment.source: Increasing and decreasing rate scripts can no longer take the rate above 100 or below 0.
segment.target: Skripte za poveanje i smanjenje stope vie ne mogu imati stopu iznad 100 ili ispod 0.

segment.source: If there is an error with a language when choosing it in the User Interface Settings dialog, a message box will alert the user to the fact.
segment.target: Ako doe do pogreke s jezikom prilikom odabira u dijalokom okviru Postavke korisnikog suelja, okvir za poruku upozorit e korisnika na to.

segment.source: NVDA now asks if it should save configuration and restart if the user has just changed the language in the User Interface Settings Dialog. NVDA must be restarted for the language change to fully take effect.
segment.target: NVDA sada pita treba li spremiti konfiguraciju i ponovno pokrenuti ako je korisnik upravo promijenio jezik u dijalokom okviru za postavke korisnikog suelja. NVDA se mora ponovno pokrenuti kako bi promjena jezika u potpunosti stupila na snagu.

segment.source: If a synthesizer can not be loaded, when choosing it from the synthesizer dialog, a message box alerts the user to the fact.
segment.target: Ako se sintisajzer ne moe uitati, prilikom odabira iz dijalokog okvira sintisajzera, okvir s porukom upozorava korisnika na to.

segment.source: When loading a synthesizer for the first time, NVDA lets the synthesizer choose the most suitable voice, rate and pitch parameters, rather than forcing it to defaults it thinks are ok. This fixes a problem where Eloquence and Viavoice sapi4 synths start speaking way too fast for the first time.
segment.target: Prilikom prvog uitavanja sintisajzera, NVDA omoguuje sintisajzeru da odabere najprikladnije parametre glasa, brzine i visine tona, umjesto da ga prisiljava na zadane vrijednosti za koje smatra da su u redu. To rjeava problem u kojem sintisajzeri Eloquence i Viavoice sapi4 po prvi put poinju govoriti prebrzo.
